highlights.summary:
Ramakrishnan College of Technology, Tiruchirappalli is located in the famous temple town Samayapuram. The institute is approved by the AICTE and is affiliated with Anna University. Moreover, the institute is also accredited by NBA and NAAC with A+ grade. Additionally, KRCT is an ISO 9001: 2015 and ISO 14001: 2015 certified institute.
Ramakrishnan College of Technology, Tiruchirappalli provides various undergraduate, postgraduate, and diploma programmes in eight departments. The courses offered by the institute include BTech/ BE, ME, and PhD. Furthermore, the top recruiters of the institute include TCS, Cognizant, Wipro, Infosys, Tech Mahindra, HCL, Mindtree, etc. Below are the major highlights of K.Ramakrishnan College of Technology:
K.Ramakrishnan College of Technology Highlights
TCS, Cognizant, Wipro, Infosys, Tech Mahindra, HCL, Mindtree, etc

K Ramakrishnan College of Technology Reviews on Placements, Faculty & Facilities

reviews.course: B.E. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: Most trusted and good infrastructure.

detailed_review.Placements: By collecting information from the seniors, in my course, 80% of students got placed. The highest package in my course is 10 LPA, and the lowest package is 1.24 LPA. Recruiting companies are TCS, Zoho, Infosys, and Wipro. Mostly at Zoho 50% of students got internships in it. Roles offered in my course are IT, software developer, and data science.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Facilities and infrastructure available in my course are very nice. Wi-Fi facility is very good. Classrooms are neat and clean. We get weekly once library period. We go to lab atleast weekly 8 to 10 labs, and it is very useful. AC facilities are also available in it.
detailed_review.Faculty: On our campus, teachers are qualified and clear all the doubts. This course curriculum is relevant, and it makes the students industry-ready. Semester exams are mostly very easy for us because we used to teach and learn it in the class hours themselves. The highest pass percentage is 80%.
detailed_review.Other: I chose this course for the best placement and internship. Nothing to improve here. College events like freshers day, Pongal fest, club activities, Onam celebration, and culturals are very nice and we enjoy a lot. Campus is very neat, clean, and very peaceful to stay in.

reviews.course: B.E. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: Such a good college and placements are very good. Moreover, the infrastructure is very good.

detailed_review.Placements: We are in the final semester. There are about 120 students in my department, and 80 get placed. The highest package is 8 LPA, and the average is 6 LPA. Top companies are Zoho, TCS, Cognizant, Mindtree, Wipro, Hexaware, and many more. Many are offered internships along with full-time employment.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: There are many facilities available, such as Wi-Fi, labs, classrooms, a common library, and also a department library. The quality of infrastructure is very good, and the food is good in the hostel. Medical facilities are available weekly once, and a doctor is present on campus at the respective time.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers are well-qualified, and they are the talented people who guide us to get placed in a good company. The curriculum is relevant to company expectations and has courses that companies expect in their candidates. Semester exams cannot be passed without studying, students should concentrate on their studies.

reviews.course: B.E. in Civil Engineering
reviews.review_title: Honest insights on academics, campus life, cost & career prospects.

detailed_review.Placements: More than 85 percent of students got placed in our college. The salary package offered is 3 LPA to 8 LPA. Notable companies include Larsen & Toubro Reliance Infrastructure DLF Tata Projects Ltd. Hindustan Construction Company (HCC) Essar Group Jaypee Group and GMR Infrastructure. Additionally 80 percent of students obtain internships annually in various engineering fields. Top roles offered are structural engineering geotechnical engineering transportation engineering and consulting civil engineering.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The facilities are available 24/7 and provide a safe and secure environment. The hostel is clean and well maintained with a mess that features a separate dining hall and a well equipped kitchen for student use. The mess serves breakfast lunch evening tea and dinner every day with a weekly menu available from the mess in charge.
detailed_review.Faculty: Staff members are excellent, and the syllabus is well-planned. While exam questions can be quite challenging, the training provided helps students perform better than their counterparts in many other colleges. Generally, a passing grade requires a minimum of 40% to 60%; however, the specific percentage may vary depending on the institution and the course.

reviews.course: B.Tech in Artificial Intelligence and Data Science
reviews.review_title: KRCT review - A school life in Tiruchirappalli.

detailed_review.Placements: The management provides full support in placement training. Around 10% of students from my batch students got placed, with an average salary package of 4 LPA- 5 LPA. Top roles offered are full stack developer, software tester, etc. Multinational companies like Zoho visit our college.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: I am a day scholar, I don't know much about hostel. I got to know from my friends that the quality of food in a hostel is not good. Sometimes there are insects in hostel food. In classrooms, Wi-Fi is available, but sometimes there is no access to Wi-Fi.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers are helpful, but not every time. The management always informs students to write a letter if they are late to class or not wearing an ID card, because of this I don't like this college. My course curriculum is relevant to job roles. The pass percentage is 35%.

reviews.course: B.E. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: It is the best college for placements and CGPA, but not for enjoyment.

detailed_review.Placements: Colleges are providing placement training for students. The companies involved include TCS, Avasoft, Hexaware, and Zoho. These companies are organizing drives for students and allowing them to take time off to attend. So far, only 10 percent of students in my batch have been placed, but the remaining students are expected to secure placements soon. It provides good placements.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The college feels are too high for course. The hostel feels are also too high. It's not for all there also financially poor people are there so it's not good. The hostel food is good only when on fresher joins. I don't recommend my juniors to join hostel.
detailed_review.Faculty: The faculty are quite good in their teaching. Students put in effort in their academics. They must gain their skills outside of the course material. The staff primarily teach the course syllabus, but we need to gain skills on our own. We need to know at least one programming language to enhance our technical knowledge.
detailed_review.Other: It is not a good college for events. These are the only preferences for academics at this college. Events are cultural, with rare celebrations for Women's Day at this college.

reviews.course: B.Tech in Artificial Intelligence and Data Science
reviews.review_title: Satisfied because of faculty members as they are friendly and supportive.

detailed_review.Placements: Placement opportunities are overall good. Yet, they may not always fully help you secure a good position in companies. Placements offered are average, with some salary packages reaching only 15 LPA. This results in an experience that is not entirely satisfactory.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The entire college is covered with Wi-Fi facilities. Labs and classrooms have extraordinary infrastructure. Lab facilities are overall good. However, hostel is below average, and food quality is poor. When freshers join,  food is good initially, but quality deteriorates over time.
detailed_review.Faculty: College maintains strict discipline during exams. They provide a good teaching methodology, and all that is required is consistent studying. Teachers cover topics well and provide a curriculum for guidance. However, it may not always be effective, as students might miss some updates related to the topics.

reviews.course: B.E. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: K Ramakrishnan College of Technology Review.

detailed_review.Placements: The highest package offered is 10 Lacs per annum and the lowest is 1 Lacs per annum. I am from the 2025 batch. The college gives 100 percent placement to all the students, so you don't need to worry. You can join here. Companies like CTS and TCS are visiting.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The infrastructure is good. I would recommend this to others. The food is good, but sometimes bad. At first, when I joined the hostel, the food was good. But after several days, the menu was not good and the quality was also a little bit low. The library is open even on Sundays.
detailed_review.Faculty: The faculty covers the syllabus. But if you want to develop your skills, you need to learn by yourself. They cover only the syllabus contents. You need to do extra courses online. The staff will also help you log in to HackerRank to improve your coding skills.

reviews.course: B.E. in Mechanical Engineering
reviews.review_title: KRCT is a very good institution with fully loaded labs and techs. They provide a good placements.

detailed_review.Placements: In KRCT, the placement department provides a decent amount of placements. The leading companies are TCS, WIPRO, AMAZON, ZOHO INFOTECH, AVASOFT, etc. Also, provide placement training during final year and pre-final year. It's fully of both technical and aptitude .
detailed_review.Infrastructure: When it comes to infrastructure, there are two college summonses in the single compound; they are KRCE and KRCT. The environment was very clean and full of gardens. The hostel food was average, and there are spacious rooms for the hosts, and the rooms were cleaned by the organisation called Zolo.
detailed_review.Faculty: When it comes to curriculum, the teaching was best, and the professors are well trained and experienced. There are many laboratories for IT fields. The exams were conducted by the name called (CIAT 1, CIAT 2, CIAT 3, and finally the university exam).
detailed_review.Other: I wish to improve little bit freeness so that students can't be more stressed .

reviews.course: B.E. in Electronics and Communication Engineering
reviews.review_title: Really satisfied with faculty, coaching, and good placement records.

detailed_review.Placements:
About 70% of students were placed in my course.
The highest package available was 7 LPA, the lowest was 3 LPA, and the average was 3.5 LPA.
Zoho, Wipro, TCS, Tech Mahindra, Cognizant, Avasoft, and Hexaware are the top recruiting companies.
About 70% got internships from our companies like Zoho, Avasoft, TCS, etc.
Top roles are like assistant manager, executive manager, etc.
detailed_review.Infrastructure:
Our college has good infrastructure with strong WiFi and environmentally friendly classrooms with hi-tech laboratories.
The hostel has very good surroundings around it. Rooms are well organized on each floor with all facilities. Food in the canteen is also good.
detailed_review.Faculty:
Teachers are helpful, well qualified and very knowledgeable. Teaching quality is very good. They can clarify the doubts at any time when the students approach.
The course curriculum is relevant, and it makes the students industry-ready in technical aspects also.
The semester exams are moderate. If the student studies the concepts clearly and listens to the class. They can clear it. Pass percentage is about 98%.
detailed_review.Other:
In our ECE department, the classes are mostly practical, which would help to understand the course motivation clearly. So I chose this course. Classes are more practical; this is the best thing.
Nothing to be improved; everything is fine.
Culturals like Enthusia and Utsav bring the special talent from the students.

reviews.course: B.E. in Electronics and Communication Engineering
reviews.review_title: It is a good college at an affordable fee.

detailed_review.Placements: Above 90% of students got placed in our college. Most of them got placed in TCS, Zoho, Wipro, etc. Top recruiting companies are Accenture, etc. Our college provides placement training from the 2nd year.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: All kinds of labs are available in our college. The infrastructure of the hostel is very good. The food served in the hostel is average. The hostel facilities are good. It provides good Wi-Fi. We can play games in our college.
detailed_review.Faculty: Our college conducts exams according to Anna University. Faculty members are very friendly. The pass percentage is 60%. Exams are a bit difficult. If you study well, you can get passing marks.
detailed_review.Other: Our college ranks 3rd in NIRF in Tiruchirappalli. I chose this course to get jobs in both IT and core companies.

reviews.course: B.E. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: Review of K. Ramakrishnan College of Technology.

detailed_review.Placements: Almost 80% of students got placed in our course. The highest salary package offered is 8.5 LPA. The average salary package offered is 5 LPA. The lowest salary package offered is 4 LPA. Top recruiting companies are Zoho, TCS, CTS, Mindtree, and Virtusa. Around 50% of students got internships from our course in companies like TCS, Mindtree, Zoho, and Virtusa. The top role offered is a full-stack developer. Our college helps us to get better placements in top MNCs. Our college provides separate training for placements.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Wi-Fi is available in each classroom. Each laboratory has an ethernet port. Each department has many labs. Each classroom has Wi-Fi and a projector. The CSE lab is air-conditioned. The hostel contains more than 100 rooms for boys and girls. Each room contains 4 beds. Around 4 students are allowed in each hostel room. Our college provides facilities for sports like hockey, football, cricket, etc. We can play games after college hours.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers are helpful and cooperative. They help us to develop our careers. The course curriculum is relevant to make students ready for the industry. The teaching quality of teachers makes the semester exams easy. The pass percentage is 95%. College provides separate training for placements

reviews.course: B.E. in Civil Engineering
reviews.review_title: Our college had good placements every year, and I am satisfied with faculty members.

detailed_review.Placements: Many students got placed in our course. The highest salary offered is Rs. 90,000 per month. The lowest salary offered is Rs. 70,000 per month. Top recruiting companies are related to core companies. Many students got internships in companies like L & T, etc.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Classrooms and the whole department are Wi-Fi enabled. There are separate labs for all departments. All labs are high-tech. Classrooms are very clean. The library of our college is modern, and all departments have a separate core library. All games are available in our college.
detailed_review.Faculty: All teachers are well-qualified and knowledgeable. Their teaching quality is good. There are three CIAT exams per semester.  Our college has an exam cell. They strictly correct exam papers. Semester exams are difficult.
detailed_review.Other: I opted for this course because of my interest in it. The best thing about our course is it is easy to learn.

reviews.course: B.E. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: I hope that if you study here you have a bright future.

detailed_review.Placements: Our passed-out seniors were all placed with Zoho, Wipro, Capgemini, and more good companies. With a good salary package. Top recruiting companies means Zoho, Capgemini, TCS, Wipro, Amazon, HCl, cognizant and more. Every year 80 percent of students were getting good placements.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Department wise lab facilities are available. Clean and neat hostel facility with good environment. Hostel fees was 20000 and mess bill was seperate. Always clean and neat hostel facility food was also too hygiene. Clean and pleasent environment. Seperate rooms.
detailed_review.Faculty: If we study us no need to worry about exams. Teachers were always supportive and encouraged us and motivated us it helps to move on step forward. The exam was not much more difficult and not much more essays it was at a moderate level if we study well quite it was easy.

reviews.course: B.E. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: Dissatisfied because of college events and extracurricular activities.

detailed_review.Placements: K. Ramakrisknan College of Technology provides 90% of placement opportunities. Students who are good will definitely get placed in top companies. The college provides good placement training for students to crack placement exams and interviews.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The infrastructure is very good in labs with good internet connectivity, and other departments like mechanical and civil also have very good labs and good machinery. In my college, the library is neat and has good infrastructure. The classrooms are very good and neat. When we talk about the hostel, the hostel rooms are neat, and the staff will clean the floor every day. But the hostel food is a bit worst sometimes.
detailed_review.Faculty: Our faculty members are very knowledgeable and very helpful to students. The teaching is very good. If students listen to classes, they can easily pass the exams. Our college gives full knowledge about the course. Exams that are moderate, and the pass percentage in semester exams is 35%.
detailed_review.Other: Our college is fully focused on studies only, so they conduct very few events and extracurricular activities compared to other colleges.

reviews.course: B.E in Computer Science Engineering (Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning)
reviews.review_title: Totally my college is above average.

detailed_review.Placements:
There is 85-90 percent of students got placed.
Highest package- 12 lpa, lowest package-3lpa and average package-5 lpa.
Zoho, Amazon, Wipro, Infosys are the top recruiting companies of my course.
90-95 percent of students get internship in top recruiting companies.
Ai engineer, ml engineer, data scientist software developer are the roles offered in my course.
detailed_review.Infrastructure:
My course is achieved A+grade in Naac.
So don't worry about infrastructure there is good lab facilities, library, classrooms.
Hostel facilities is very good, and mess and canteen food is average there is good medical facilities and sports, games are very good.
detailed_review.Faculty:
Maximum faculty members in my college is Ph.D. staffs so their teaching quality is first class.
Course is definitely curriculum related and that course is going high in industry so that students are industry ready semester exam is slightly difficult and there is 100 pass percentage.
detailed_review.Other: Course is going high in industry so that students are industry ready. There is no thing to improve on my course. There is good scholarship and event fest is average.

reviews.course: B.E. in Mechanical Engineering
reviews.review_title: It is a good place to explore in.

detailed_review.Placements: Out of a total of 46 students, 14 students got placed till now. The highest salary package offered is 4.5 LPA, and the lowest salary package offered 1.6 LPA. TCS, Wipro, and CTS are the top recruiting companies.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: All the facilities are excellent. Our department lab has more than enough machines to operate and a good library with a very high-speed Wi-Fi facility is also available.
detailed_review.Faculty: The teaching by the faculty is far enough. If students cooperate with the staff they make them good and talented students in the society and provide them the knowledge to get ready for the industry. Our college pass percentage varies every year but the coaching they provide is good.
detailed_review.Other: The college needs improvement in things like a big auditorium. Less events are conducted here.

reviews.course: B.E. in Electronics and Communication Engineering
reviews.review_title: Review of K. Ramakrishnan College of Technology.

detailed_review.Placements: Every year a lot of our college students got placed in multinational companies because of good excellent placement training coaches. Top IT companies visit our campus during placements.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: In the hostel, rooms are not that huge, and we have to stay with 4 students. The food served is not that bad, and you have to adjust sometimes, but you will get ultimate fun here. They call your parents if you take leave and misbehave in classrooms. The infrastructure is well-developed.
detailed_review.Faculty: Faculty members in our college are well-qualified and experienced. Especially the electronics and communication engineering department conducts a lot of tests before semester exams like unit test 1, terminal 1, unit test 2, terminal 2, unit test 3, model 1, model 2 and retest.

reviews.course: B.E. in Electronics and Communication Engineering
reviews.review_title: For academically average students, this college is great, and you can enjoy it well.

detailed_review.Placements: Almost 40% of the students got placed in good companies. As of now, 4 students got placed in great companies from this batch. Many students stay in the hostel for placement training. Classes end by 10.00 pm.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Our college has only 2 blocks. There are 2 blocks of the boys' hostel and 2 blocks for the girls' hostel. Infrastructure is good to enjoy with good and lush green outdoor. Classrooms are good and windy. Canteen, cafeteria and bakery are good. Everything is available in the canteen with both vegetarian and non-vegetarian.
detailed_review.Faculty: Faculty members are good, but according to the management, some strict protocols are followed. Sometimes extra classes are conducted, and during exams, classes are also taken. Arrear coaching is given here, and they always put the main concentration for academics.
detailed_review.Other: Events are conducted but only based on the number of arrears students.

reviews.course: B.E. in Civil Engineering
reviews.review_title: It has good infrastructure and friendly teachers but below average placements for civil engineering.

detailed_review.Placements: Placements in core companies are not much enough, but for the software sector branches, many companies had visited here. For the civil engineering branch, none of the top companies visited here. I am expecting that nearly 50% of the students will get placed in the next year. Students can do internships as per their own interests but without knowing about students who are interested in internships, college won't offer any company for internships on its own.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Classrooms and labs have a good environment and have good Wi-Fi network signals. The food offered in the canteen is also good. The building is sprawled over 4 floors, but the elevator did not work yet. So, I had faced very difficultly from the very first year. There are two entrances to our college. Securities are very strict, and they are not allowed to go outside the campus.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers are absolutely good here. They are qualified and well knowledgeable. At any time, they clarify doubts and encourage my ideas. We are also called by the faculty members and make us ask doubts related to the subjects. But they do not introduce any new innovative ideas in the civil sector and do not teach current techniques which are used now in the industry.
detailed_review.Other: Civil engineering is the evergreen course, and I liked it very much, so I chose it. In every government sector, civil knowledge and ideas are must required, and they are useful in daily life.

reviews.course: B.E. in Electronics and Communication Engineering
reviews.review_title: More than satisfied about the clean and green campus and the faculty, good infrastructure and many.

detailed_review.Placements:
1. 90 percent of the students have been placed in the 2015-2019 academic year.
2. The highest salary 1Lakh and the lowest as of BPO companies (13 thousand) was offered.
3. IBM, CTS, INFOSIS are the top recruiters. 
4. Team Leader roles were offered.
5. 1.5Lakh per month,  12 thousand per month was the salary range offered to our course.
6. BSNL company has offered internship.
detailed_review.Infrastructure:
1. Free Wi-Fi has been enabled all over the campus for students use and for laboratories. Labs are well-equipped and well maintained, classrooms are been enabled with digi-boards for visual teaching, library are well equipped and modernised with all the academics and non academic books. 
2. Hostel is well maintained and the quality of food in canteen is out of world compared to other college canteens, weekly twice doctor is made to visit the college for solving students problems, all games are been taught and students are well trained and are sent for tournaments.
detailed_review.Faculty:
1. Teachers are well trained to handle students and are knowledgeable and updated with day to day updates. Teachers are students friendly and are ready to help students anytime
2. Course is relevant with full fledged knowledge required to the industries.
detailed_review.Other:
1. I opted this course to get trained in both electronics and comm field.
2. To get trained according to current trends.
3. College conducts various things for students and more than that our department conducts various academical and non academical activities for the students.

faqs.question: What is the total fee for BTech and M.Tech at K. Ramakrishnan College of Technology?
faqs.answer: The total fee for both BTech and M.Tech at K. Ramakrishnan College of Technology ranges is INR 2 Lacs for BTech and INR 50,000 for MTech. This fee, however, is been sources from unofficial websites on the internet. Hence, it can be considered indicative. For the exact fee for MBA, students are advised to visit the official website or visit the admission office of K. Ramakrishnan College of Technology.

faqs.question: Can I get admission to K. Ramakrishnan College of Technology without an entrance exam?
faqs.answer: There is no option available for direct admissions or admission without an entrance exam at K. Ramakrishnan College of Technology. Candidates seeking admission to K. Ramakrishnan College of Technology can check out the below table for the eligiblity and selection criteria: Course Eligibility Selection Criteria B.E. / B.Tech Class 10 and Class 12 with 45% aggregate TNEA Counselling M.E./M.Tech Graduation with 50% aggregate CEETA

faqs.question: How many courses does K. Ramakrishnan College of Technology offer?
faqs.answer: K. Ramakrishnan College of Technology offers two courses at the undergraduate, postgraduate, and levels i.e., BTech and MTech.The institute offers entrance-based admission. To be eligible for admission to BTech candidates have to appear for TNEA counselling and admission to M.Tech candidates are required to appear for the CEETA PG entrance exam.

faqs.question: Are Class 12th marks enough for K. Ramakrishnan College of Technology admission?
faqs.answer: For admission to K. Ramakrishnan College of Technology undergraduate courses, the minimum eligibility requirement is to pass Class 12 with a minimum aggregate of 45%. However, Class 12 marks is not enough to apply for K. Ramakrishnan College of Technology UG courses such as BE/ BTech. Further, candidates are also required to appear for TNEA counselling process.

faqs.question: How can I get admission to K. Ramakrishnan College of Technology for a BTech?
faqs.answer: K. Ramakrishnan College of Technology offers entrance-based admission. Candidates who are interested in BTech can apply for the admission form online on the official website TNEA. Additionally, applicants must follow the basic eligibility criteria to get admission to BTech they must have Class 12 with 45% aggregate from a recognised board.

faqs.question: How many seats does Ramaiah Institute of Technology have for BTech?
faqs.answer: Ramaiah Institute of Technology has a seat intake of 720 for the BTech programme. Candidates must complete the Class 12 with 45% score and must appear for TNEA counselling.

faqs.question: Does K. Ramakrishnan College of Technology accept CEETA scores for MTech?
faqs.answer: Yes, Admission to the K. Ramakrishnan College of Technology M.Tech course is based on CEETA entrance exam. To be eligible for the admission candidates required to apply and appear CEETA entrance exam. Candidates can apply by visiting the official website of tancet.annauniv.edu.

faqs.question: Who is eligible for M.Tech admission at K. Ramakrishnan College of Technology?
faqs.answer: For admission to the M.Tech programme at K. Ramakrishnan College of Technology , candidates must fulfill the given eligibility & selection criteria conditions: Course Eligibility Selection Criteria MTech Graduation with 50% aggregate CEETA-PG

college_info.college_name: Kakatiya Institute of Technology and Science: Courses, Fees, Admission 2025, Placements, Reviews

highlights.summary: Kakatiya Institute of Technology and Science is a private institute, established in 1980 in Warangal, Telangana. Kakatiya Institute of Technology and Science is approved by AICTE and offers a total of 21 courses at UG and PG levels in 10 specialisations such as Civil Engineering, Communications Engineering, Computer Science Engineering, Electrical Engineering and Electronics & Communication Engineering. Furthermore, it offer courses such as B.E. / B.Tech, M.E./M.Tech and MBA/PGDM in Full Time mode. Kakatiya Institute of Technology and Science fee structure includes a total tuition fee ranging from INR 1,00,000 to 5,00,000. Kakatiya Institute of Technology and Science has an annual seat intake of 1554 for all the programmes. It offers courses, in streams such as Engineering and Business & Management Studies. As per the recent Kakatiya Institute of Technology and Science placement records, the average median salary at the Institute is around INR 4,00,000. The institute has a safe and well-equipped campus with all the advanced facilities.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: Satisfied to a normal extent with college, placements, and really good infrastructure.

detailed_review.Placements: About 50% of students will be placed in my college every year. The companies are Oracle, Accenture, Infosys, Genpact, RealPage, and Cognizant. The highest package till date is 31 LPA, and the lowest is 1 LPA. Some of the students also secured internships in nice companies.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Infrastructure is good and has many labs. Wi-Fi is provided for every student. Classrooms are also good with boards and digital boards. Library is too good to study with no disturbance. The food at the hostel is good, and our college is especially good for conducting sports events. Canteen has very good food where samosas are famous in our college. Ambulance facility is also provided.
detailed_review.Faculty: Curriculum is related to JNTU colleges, similar to them and problem is that a lot of exams are conducted which makes students close their interest in studies. Curriculum is relevant, and makes students ready for the industries. Semester exams are moderate level, and pass percentage is 35%.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Electrical and Electronics Engineering
reviews.review_title: I'm not satisfied with the college course curriculum and sports. Placements were good in 2021.

detailed_review.Placements: About 35-40% students are placed from my course. The lowest package offered is 1.5 LPA, the average is 3.0 LPA, and the highest is 6.5 LPA. Top recruiting companies are Genpact, LTI Mindtree, Wipro, Infosys, Knowvation learning private limited, Bharat Electronics Limited, Cyient, etc. About 30% of students got internships in companies like Delhi Tvs, Cognizant, etc. Top roles offered are Graduate Engineer trainee, software developer, etc.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: I don't know about hostel facilities because I am a day scholar student. The college canteen is good, and medical facilities are also provided. But the encouragement towards sports and games is average. The college has a big ground to play different kinds of sports like cricket, football, and long jump, but the encouragement is less.
detailed_review.Faculty: The teachers are well qualified, but the problem is the course curriculum. The syllabus is from around 50-60 years ago, which is not competitive with the current generation. So it does not make students industry-ready for this generation. Coming to semester exams, the exams are above average, and the minimum pass percentage is 35% overall.
detailed_review.Other: They need to teach students only the necessary information that can help them get a job or compete with the current generation, and that helps them toward reaching their future goals, but not unnecessary content. There are some extracurricular activities conducted, like Sumshodini, which is an event where students can do projects and present them. But regarding scholarship, I have only received a one-year scholarship until now (2025).

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: Personally, I am very much satisfied with placements.

detailed_review.Placements: From our course, around 65% of students get selected through campus drives. The highest package is 10 LPA, the average package is 4 LPA, and the lowest package is 3 LPA. Deloitte, Infosys, Amazon, and Foxconn are the top recruiting companies for our course. About 80% of students receive internship certificates. Top roles include manufacturing and circuit testing.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The college provides awesome facilities such as a huge library, free Wi-Fi hotspots, an auditorium, seminar halls, project labs, an indoor complex, and waiting halls. There are AC and non-AC hostels for students. The food is delicious and reasonably priced in the canteen and mess. Medical facilities are available with a professional doctor. Physical activities, including indoor and outdoor games, are widely available.
detailed_review.Faculty: The teaching staff does an amazing job. Their teaching quality is outstanding throughout the academic years. They are highly qualified and experienced, with many holding PhDs. The course curriculum is really make students industry-ready. Semester exams are moderate and concept-based, and regular class attendance is required to pass. The pass percentage increases every year, and this time almost 70% of students passed.
detailed_review.Other: By choosing this course, we can easily shift from the hardware field to the software field, so I chose this course. Improvements like increasing the strength of faculty will be great. Cultural activities such as sports meets, festival events, fests, farewells, freshers, crowd meetings, tours, and concerts are conducted in the college.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Electronics and Instrumentation Engineering
reviews.review_title: The college is the best place for middle-class students.

detailed_review.Placements: 75.8 percent of the students got placed through college placements in various companies. The highest package was 6 LPA, the average package was 4 LPA, and the lowest package was 3 LPA from our course. Top recruiting companies like Deloitte, TCS, Foxconn, and Coulryt were included. Nearly 65 percent of students received internship certificates from companies such as IT Solutions Pvt Ltd and Deloitte. Top roles offered were circuit designer and manufacturing roles.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Facilities and infrastructure of the college were outstanding. The college provided many facilities. It includes AC classrooms, library, free Wi-Fi hotspots, auditorium, seminar halls, transportation, project labs, and radio rooms. The quality of the hostel and canteen was also good. Along with good food and neat, hygienic rooms. Medical facilities were very good, with a professional doctor and ambulance facility. Sports and games were most common thing in the college.
detailed_review.Faculty: Faculty members were highly knowledgeable and effective in their courses. The teaching quality was excellent, with practical examples. The course curriculum was well-designed. It made students industry-ready. The difficulty level of the semester exams was average. Students needed to understand concepts clearly to pass. The pass percentage from the course is 75 percent this year.
detailed_review.Other: This course offered many opportunities and platforms to improve my knowledge, so I chose this course. Improvements such as better equipment in project labs would be beneficial. Cultural activities like fests, campus tours, festivals, concerts, farewell parties, and crowd meetings. The connectivity were amazing in the college.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: The best faculty and the best facilities are provided by our college.

detailed_review.Placements: Placements for our seniors were very good. Highly reputed companies visited our college and recruited our seniors with reasonable packages. The highest salary package offered is 17 LPA. The lowest package was 5 LPA, and the average package was around 7 LPA. Almost everybody from our course 95 percent done their internship. The top roles include leading and managing the team.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: When I was in my intermediate, I wanted to take admission in this college by seeing its infrastructure, but it is beyond that. Our college has good buildings and good lab facilities. There is a good playground. I am advising my juniors to take this college infrastructure as a minimum benchmark. The facilities of the hostel were also great, with reasonable fees in both the hostel and canteen. The sports and games are played regularly in the college grounds, and the medical services are available.
detailed_review.Faculty: Our course curriculum is superb, and it is more useful in present life situations. Faculty members in our college are very friendly. They will explain our doubts many times with so much patience. The administration department is very polite with students, and the pass percentage was around 75 percent in our course.
detailed_review.Other: This course provides me with the best opportunities in various fields, so I chose this course. The improvements, like providing good equipment in the college laboratory, will be great. The events like farewell party, freshers, crowd meetings, tours, concerts, etc., will be great in college.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering (Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning)
reviews.review_title: The college has an amazing faculty, skilled and talented, with good infrastructure.

detailed_review.Placements: In my college, placements are good, with 75-90% of students placed. The highest package is 63 LPA, and the lowest is around 3-4 LPA. Companies like Infosys, Google, and Amazon recruit from my college. Around 30-40% of students get internships. Top roles include Design and Development and Cybersecurity.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The campus is clean and neat. Classrooms are large and good. Labs are good, and the computers work well. There are plenty of books available for academic purposes. The college hostel has Wi-Fi. Mess and canteen food are good. There is a playground and a basketball court.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers are skilled and talented. They provide full knowledge, and their teaching methods are good. The AIML course is relevant to other courses. It makes students ready for the industry. Exams are not very difficult. College management and faculty provide support. The pass percentage is around 60%.

The highest package offered from our course is 5.5 LPA, the lowest package offered from our course is 2.5 LPA, and the average package offered from our course is 3.5 LPA. Medical facilities are also good at providing services on time, and sports are played in the indoor complex every day.
detailed_review.Faculty: The faculty are absolutely knowledgeable and highly effective in their course. The teaching quality has been excellent with practical examples. The course curriculum of our course is designed excellently and makes many students industry-ready. The difficulty level of the semester exams is average, to pass, we need to understand the concepts clearly. The pass percentage from our course is around 75 percent this year.

The things I wish for are good improvements in the laboratory equipment. The fests, events, farewells, freshers, crowd meetings, tours, concerts, and festivals are the best enjoyment for the students.

detailed_review.Faculty: Faculty and their way of teaching were excellent throughout the academics. They were highly qualified and well knowledgeable in their course. Especially our curriculum really gave the best results in making students industry-ready. The semester exams were very easy to clear. The pass percentage was around 75 from our course.
detailed_review.Other: This course had the best opportunities for the students, so I chose this course. The betterments I wished for, like increasing the industrial visits, would have been great. The events like cultural activities, fests, farewells, freshers parties, crowd meetings, tours, and concerts were the best entertainment for the students.

faqs.question: How can I get into Kakatiya Institute of Technology and Science for UG/PG courses? Am I eligible for admission?
faqs.answer:
Kakatiya Institute of Technology and Science has below criteria for taking admissions to it's various courses: Courses Eligibility B.E. / B.Tech Candidates who have passed or appeared at the final year of the Diploma examination in Engineering conducted by the State Board of Technical Education and Training, Telangana / Andhra Pradesh or any other examination recognised as equivalent thereto by the State Board of Technical Education and Training, Telangana / Andhra Pradesh.
Candidates should have completed 16 years of age, as on 31st December of the year of admission. There is no upper age limit. M.E./M.Tech Candidate must have completed B.E. / B.Tech. in EE/AMIE in ECE/ AMIE (Electronics Telecommunication Eng), AMIETE ( Electronics) & Telematics Engg) (or) equivalent.
Preference will be given to GATE qualified candidates over TS PGECET qualified candidates.
Candidate must have secured 50% marks in group subjects taken together in the qualifying examination (45% for reserved category). MBA/PGDM Candidate must have passed Bachelor Degree (BA / B.Com/ B.Sc/ BBA / BBM / BCA / BE / B.Tech / B. Pharmacy / Any 3 or 4 year Degree except Oriental Languages). Examinations of minimum three years duration with at least 50% marks (45% marks in case of reserved categories) in the qualifying examinations.
Final year appearing students may also apply on provisional basis.
The minimum age of the candidates should be 19 years as on the date of notification (Candidates whose date of Birth up to 30th MARCH,  2003). No maximum age limit. Not satisfied with answer? Ask Shiksha GPT

highlights.summary:
KalaignarKarunanidhi Institute of Technology, also known as KIT, was established in 2008 and is located in Coimbatore, Tamil Nadu. It is a private college and was established by the Vijayalakshmi Palanisamy Charitable Trust. KIT is one of the best Engineering colleges in Tamil Nadu to offer quality education to students with modern facilities.
The college has been accredited by the NBA and NAAC with an A grade. Further, KalaignarKarunanidhi Institute of Technology courses are offered to students at the UG, PG, and PhD levels, mainly in streams such as Business Management, Computer Applications, and Engineering. Some of the popular courses offered at KIT are BTech, MTech, MCA, and MBA. KIT Coimbatore courses are offered to students in full-time mode, under its several departments such as Artificial Intelligence, Data Science, Aeronautical, etc., and are AICTE-approved.
In addition to this, the college also offers various research programmes, including PhD in CSE, PhD in ECE, PhD in Chemistry, PhD in Biotechnology, and many more. KalaignarKarunanidhi Institute of Technology has a huge campus with a library, an auditorium, a conference hall, a food court, transport facilities, etc. Apart from this, the college has decent connections with top-notch companies such as TCS, Microsoft, Infosys, Accenture, Oracle, Cisco, etc., to provide placement assistance to students. For more details, candidates can check the table below:
TCS, Microsoft, Infosys, Accenture, Oracle, Cisco

KIT Coimbatore courses strive to enhance the learning experience of students in order to prepare them for the industry. reviews.course: B.E. in Mechanical Engineering
reviews.review_title: Review of KIT College in Coimbatore.

detailed_review.Placements: Placement opportunity at this college was very good. Students got various placement opportunities after completing their degree. Big companies will come and hire students, and offer them various packages of Rs 1 LPA, and some will start their own startups.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Infrastructure of the college was very good. Classrooms were ventilated, and washrooms were also clean. Classrooms were smart with whiteboards, and the college building was also very big. Campus of college was also big, and whole college was under the camera surveillance.
detailed_review.Faculty: Faculty members of the college were good and very knowledgeable. They had various knowledge which was good for student's future. The whole staffs were very educated and pass- out from Ph.D. courses. Teachers were very helpful and very polite in nature. Their behaviour was good.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Biotechnology
reviews.review_title: Good placements in 2025 with high packages.

detailed_review.Placements: Students are placed for good package salary with the help of the better placement training provided. Companies like Zifo and Biocon provide job offers and also internships. While many graduates enter into core biotech roles, some pursue higher studies, and some transfer to IT/data science.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The department has a well-equipped laboratory and classrooms also have smartboards and Wi-Fi. In the library, we can able to access to review many research papers. Hostel is very clean and more secure space designed for students. The food provided in the hostel is very good.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers working at the college use modern pedagogical methods for teaching. Most of the teachers are well-qualified and knowledgeable. Teachers encourage and motivate the students to participate in more inter-college competitions and also give guidance for their careers.
detailed_review.Other: More events will be conducted to actively volunteer the students and more fests will be happening. The infrastructure is really good. So many clubs are available like dance, art, photography, social, music, etc.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Agriculture Engineering
reviews.review_title: It's a good college with a good placement. This college does not have much enjoyment.

detailed_review.Placements: Students with an attendance of over 80% are more likely to be placed. Based on my knowledge, the highest salary package for IT jobs is 12 lakhs per annum, while the highest for core branches is 6 lakhs per annum. The average salary package is around 4 lakhs per annum, and the lower packages tend to be lower than this. The top recruiters in the field include DAMS Agri Industries and JAIN Irrigation. Almost all students need to complete internships. The top role available is in farm machinery.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The college provides facilities such as labs that are somewhat average. Classrooms are average. The library is also average as compared to other departments. Our curriculum is sometimes tough and not relevant to the course as it is the first year we need to learn all the basics of other courses. Semester exams are not that tough if you study. Mostly the pass mark is like getting about 50 or something, not sure about that.
detailed_review.Other: This course is the main one in the next few years. Just thought of taking it so it could lead me to a good job and life. I need no change in the course and all but maybe in facilities they could change something. We will have 2 to 3 cultural events per year including annual day. reviews.course: B.E. in Electrical and Electronics Engineering

Perk labs curiosity, and faculty members push us to ask deeper questions. I'd love to see more startup exposure and interdisciplinary projects added. Electric fests are massive, clubs are passionate. Every corner has something happening. It is surrounded by nature but digitally connected, with a mix of cultures. For scholarships and sports, it is a great place to grow both technically and personally.

college_info.college_name: KIT- KalaignarKarunanidhi Institute of Technology Admission 2025: Fees, Courses, Eligibility and Selection

admission.title: KIT - KalaignarKarunanidhi Institute of Technology Admission Overview 2025
admission.overview_text: KIT - KalaignarKarunanidhi Institute of Technology offers courses at UG and PG levels such as B.E./BTech, M.E., MBA and MCA. Admission to all the courses is entrance-based. Students interested in applying to any courses at KIT - KalaignarKarunanidhi Institute of Technology must register for entrance exams and appear for the same. The college is affiliated with Anna University, However, the college follows the admission norms of Anna University for admission to all its courses. To know more information related to KIT - KalaignarKarunanidhi Institute of Technology admission 2025 , go through the sections below:

faqs.question: Is KIT - KalaignarKarunanidhi Institute of Technology admission open?
faqs.answer: Yes, admission is open to KIT - KalaignarKarunanidhi Institute of Technology for all UG and PG courses through TNEA and TANCET, respectively. Interested applicants can visit the official websites of TNEA Counselling and TANCET to apply for the BTech, M.Tech respectively. Further, candidates are also required to visit the college official website to fill out online application form.

faqs.question: How can I get admission to KIT - KalaignarKarunanidhi Institute of Technology?
faqs.answer: KIT - KalaignarKarunanidhi Institute of Technology admission to UG and PG courses is based on TNEA Counselling and TANCET entrance exams, respectively. Further, to be eligible for admission, students also need to pass Class 10 and Class 12 for admission to BTech and a graduation degree for admission to MTech, MCA and MBA with 50% aggregate from a recognised board.

faqs.question: What are the top courses offered at KIT - KalaignarKarunanidhi Institute of Technology ?
faqs.answer: KIT - KalaignarKarunanidhi Institute of Technology offers one course at UG level and three courses at PG levels, such as B.E./BTech, M.E., MCA and MBA. Candidates who have passed Class 10 and Class 12 are eligible to apply for BTech courses. Graduation with 50% aggregate is required to apply for the PG courses. Additionally, candidates, need to appear for TNEA counselling for admission to BTech and TANCET for admission to MTech, MCA and MBA courses.

faqs.question: What is the eligibility requirements for admission to MBA at KalaignarKarunanidhi Institute of Technology?
faqs.answer: The minimum eligibility required to get admission into the MBA course at KalaignarKarunanidhi Institute of Technology is that candidates must complete their graduation with an aggregate of at least 50% (45% for reserved category candidates). Additionally, for the selection process, applicants are required to appear for TANCET, followed by a counselling process. Further, the college also offers management quota seats.

faqs.question: Is TANCET compulsory for MBA at KIT- KalaignarKarunanidhi Institute of Technology?
faqs.answer: KIT- KalaignarKarunanidhi Institute of Technology accepts TANCET scores for admission to the MBA course. According to the information available on official sources, the college is affiliated with Anna University and accepts valid TANCET scores for admission to the MBA course. However, while filling out the application form for the MBA course, candidates have two options to choose from: counselling and management quota. So, there are chances that the college might accept scores of other entrance exams or merit to enrol students through the management quota. For detailed information, candidates can contact the admission department of the college directly.

faqs.question: When can I apply for MBA course at KalaignarKarunanidhi Institute of Technology?
faqs.answer: On the official website of the KalaignarKarunanidhi Institute of Technology, the admission tab for the year 2025 is live. Thus, candidates can apply for the MBA course currently through the official website of the institute. However, before applying for the MBA course, candidates must ensure that they complete the basic eligibility criteria and follow the complete admission process step by step.

faqs.question: What are the top courses offered at KIT - KalaignarKarunanidhi Institute of Technology ?
faqs.answer: KIT - KalaignarKarunanidhi Institute of Technology offers one course at UG level and three courses at PG levels, such as B.E./BTech, M.E., MCA and MBA. Candidates who have passed Class 10 and Class 12 are eligible to apply for BTech courses. Graduation with 50% aggregate is required to apply for the PG courses. Additionally, candidates, need to appear for TNEA counselling for admission to BTech and TANCET for admission to MTech, MCA and MBA courses.

faqs.question: How much percentage is required for B.E./BTech at KIT - KalaignarKarunanidhi Institute of Technology?
faqs.answer: KIT - KalaignarKarunanidhi Institute of Technology offers B.E./BTech at UG level. The college provides various specialisations in B.E./BTech. Here's a table explaining the percentage criteria of B.E./BTech programmes at KIT - KalaignarKarunanidhi Institute of Technology: Course Eligibility B.E./BTech - Class 10 and Class 12 from a recognised board - Cut off mark = 200 (100 for Mathematics and 100 for Physics + Chemistry)

faqs.question: What is the procedure to take BTech admission at KalaignarKarunanidhi Institute of Technology?
faqs.answer: Kalaignar Karunanidhi Institute of Technology admission is offered in online mode and is entrance-based. To get online admission to KIT, candidates must check the official website of the college. Candidates seeking admission to various courses at KIT Coimbatore must qualify for either the university-level or state-level entrance exams, such as TANCET for MBA/PGDM and MCA programmes, and TNEA for BE/BTech programmes. Further, candidates seeking admission to the BTech programme must be Class 12 passed with 45% aggregate from a recognised board.

faqs.question: Is TANCET required for MBA at KIT - KalaignarKarunanidhi Institute of Technology?
faqs.answer: Yes, TANCET exam is required for admission to MBA at KIT - KalaignarKarunanidhi Institute of Technology. Tamil Nadu Common Entrance Test which is mandatory for admission to MBA. Applicants seeking admission to MBA are required to apply and appear for TANCET to be eligible for admission.

faqs.question: How can I get MBA seat at KIT - KalaignarKarunanidhi Institute of Technology?
faqs.answer: Students are selected for MBA admission at KIT - KalaignarKarunanidhi Institute of Technology based on TANCET entrance exam, followed by  counselling round. Students are required to apply and appear for TANCET exam to apply for admission. Further, students are required to fill out the basic eligibility i.e., . pass graduation degree with 50% aggregate score.

faqs.question: What is the fees for MBA at KalaignarKarunanidhi Institute of Technology?
faqs.answer: The total fee structure of the MBA course at KalaignarKarunanidhi Institute of Technology includes multiple components, such as tuition fee, hostel fee, admission fee, application fee, etc. The total tuition fee for the MBA course is INR 35,000. The fee amount mentioned is sourced from the official website/sanctioning body and is subject to change . Therefore, it is indicative.

faqs.question: Which entrance exam does KIT- KalaignarKarunanidhi Institute of Technology accepts for admission to MBA course?
faqs.answer: KIT- KalaignarKarunanidhi Institute of Technology accepts TANCET scores for admission to the MBA programme. Moreover, before appearing for the entrance exam, candidates are required to fulfil certain eligibility requirements too, such as candidates must complete a general bachelor's degree of three years, or a professional/ technical course of four years. Additionally, candidates must have secured a minimum aggregate of 50% (45% for reserved categories).

faqs.question: Who is eligible for M.E. admission at KIT - KalaignarKarunanidhi Institute of Technology?
faqs.answer: For admission to M.E. programme at KIT - KalaignarKarunanidhi Institute of Technology, candidates must fulfill the following eligibility & selection criteria conditions: Course Eligibility Selection Criteria M.E. Bachelor's degree or equivalent in a relevant field from a recognised university

faqs.question: Can I get admission to KIT - KalaignarKarunanidhi Institute of Technology for M.E. with 60% in graduation?
faqs.answer: Yes, you can get admission to M.E. at KIT - KalaignarKarunanidhi Institute of Technology with 50 percentiles, as the minimum eligibility criteria are pass graduation degree from a recognised university. However, Applicants must appear for a TANCET entrance exam for admission.

faqs.question: What is the application process for KIT - KalaignarKarunanidhi Institute of Technology?
faqs.answer: KIT - KalaignarKarunanidhi Institute of Technology application process is online. Interested candidates can apply online by visiting the official website of the college. data.title: KIT - KalaignarKarunanidhi Institute of Technology Placement Report 2025
summary: KalaignarKarunanidhi Institute of Technology has released its placement report 2025. However, placement drive 2025 was ongoing at the time the page was updated.

More than 580 offers were made and 150 recruiters visited KIT Coimbatore during placements 2025. Further, the highest and average package offered during KIT Coimbatore placements 2025 stood at INR 52 LPA and INR 8 LPA , respectively.

Earlier, the highest package offered during BTech placements 2023 for CSE , ECE and EE branch stood at INR 8.4 LPA , INR 5.8 LPA and INR 5.8 LPA .  For MTech CSE branch, the highest package offered in 2023 stood at INR 12 LPA .

The highest and average package offered during KalaignarKarunanidhi Institute of Technology MBA placements 2023 stood at INR 4.8 LPA and INR 2.5 LPA , respectively. For MCA program, the highest and average package offered in 2023 was INR 7 LPA and INR 2.4 LPA .

highlights.summary: Established in 2000, Karpagam College of Engineering is located in Coimbatore, Tamil Nadu. The institute offers courses like B.E. / B.Tech, M.E./M.Tech, MBA/PGDM and MCA. These courses are offered in Full Time mode. A total of 19 courses offered by the Institute are available across streams such as Engineering, IT & Software and Business & Management Studies. The institute has all the necessary facilities to the students.
