Karpagam College of Engineering Reviews on Placements, Faculty & Facilities

reviews.course: B.E. in Computer Science and Engineering (Cyber Security)
reviews.review_title: Really good college for studies, excellent infrastructure, and also good placement in 2025.

detailed_review.Placements: Above 70% students were placed in my college. Highest package is 48 LPA in 2025, and lowest package is 3-5 LPA. In my course CSE (Cyber Security), currently, no companies are interested because all companies already have cyber analytics. Percentage doesn't matter at all, but you have no history of arrears and also have good coding skills to be placed. Top companies are Zoho, TCS, PayPal, etc. Data analysis and network analysis are the roles offered.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Wi-Fi is provided all around the college. Also, good infrastructure for studies. Library is open till 6 pm. Hostels are good, and food is average. Quality of the facilities is good, and they also have good knowledge about the course they teach. In food court, food is good and affordable. Many games are available, like football, hockey, throwball, cricket, kabbadi, etc.
detailed_review.Faculty: Faculty members are helpful and also knowledgeable about the courses. Also, their teaching is average but okay for average students to understand. In my course, CSE (CY) has a related course, and it is more helpful for industry readiness. Semester exams are a little bit easier compared to CIA's. A 50 mark out of 100 is a pass mark.
detailed_review.Other: I chose this course on my own decision and I like to study this course. Faculty are more improved in my department. There are 2 big events, and scholarships are provided. Also, extracurricular activities are here.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Artificial Intelligence and Data Science
reviews.review_title: Good placements in 2025, and a nice environment.

detailed_review.Placements: I am from the 2021-2025 batch of the AD department. Around 70% of our department students got placed in campus interviews. The placement training is good and knowledgeable. The highest package is 15 LPA, and the lowest is 3.5 LPA. Many top companies have visited our college from A to Z. Various roles are offered like SDE, Full stack, system engineer, etc.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Labs are renovated, computers are updated, and systems are good. The library is equipped with good books and is easy to access. Mess and canteen food are manageable. Sports is really good, as many events were conducted during the time. Gym facilities are provided inside the campus with the required amount of equipment.
detailed_review.Faculty: All the staff are really well educated and tried to share as much as possible. Definitely, this course curriculum will make students industry ready, unless one shows their own interest for the same. Semester exams should be taken care of because a single backlog can affect one's career.

reviews.course: B.E. in Mechanical Engineering
reviews.review_title: Karpagam College of Engineering is absolutely the best engineering college.

detailed_review.Placements: Karpagam College of Engineering was good placement college. 90% of mechanical department students are placed in reputed companies. The highest salary package was 8 LPA. The lowest salary package was 2 LPA. Top recruiting companies like Hyundai, Sonata, Tata Motors, TCS, Accenture, and Wipro visited this college for recruitment.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Karpagam College of Engineering infrastructure facilities were excellent. More classrooms and good library were available at this college. This college had more mechanical, electrical and computer laboratories available at this college. This college management provided good hostel facilities for boys and girls. Variety of foods were available at this college mess and canteen. Medical and sports ground facilities were also there at this college.
detailed_review.Faculty: Karpagam College of Engineering faculty members were very friendly people. They conducted more practical-oriented classes every week. So students easily understand the lessons. So 95% of students get good marks in all semester exams. This college management conducted more extracurricular activities programs every semester.
detailed_review.Other: This college campus environment was very nice. This college transportation facilities were also very good. More events were conducted at this college. Participated students got scholarships and certificates. This college courses and curriculum were updated. So this college is the best engineering college.

reviews.course: B.E. in Computer Science and Technology
reviews.review_title: The college has good placements, affordable fees, a strict dress code, and hostel rules.

detailed_review.Placements: Around 80% of students got placed last year, with recruitment primarily based on their core department. For computer science students, roles like software developer and web developer are common. Many seniors secured positions in top companies like Zoho, Infosys, TCS, CTS, and Accenture with attractive salary packages.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The hostel food is average, but the hostel rooms are quite good. Our college conducts a yearly sports meet for our campus students. Wi-Fi is available and free for laptops, especially for hostellers.
detailed_review.Faculty: Passing is relatively easy if we study consistently throughout the semesters. Our college uses a grading system with no pass percentage, where C is the minimum passing grade and O is the highest grade. The courses are industry-relevant, covering topics like coding languages, data structures and algorithms (DSA), web development, backend development, and more on a basic level.
detailed_review.Other: The college has good placements, affordable fees, a strict dress code, varied hostel accommodations, and outing restrictions for first-year students. It also hosts a national event named Dhruva in our college and students from other colleges also come here.

reviews.course: B.E. in Electronics and Telecommunication Engineering
reviews.review_title: Absolutely satisfied with experience as a fresher to 2025 passed out. It's a good college experience

detailed_review.Placements: Around 80% of students secure placements annually, with a salary package ranging from 3.2-24 LPA. Major recruiters include Infosys, EY, Accenture, Cognizant, Tata, Juspay, and Emphasis. Additionally, about 70% of students receive internships in the IT and hardware fields. Top roles offered include Graduate Engineer Trainee, Software Developer, and SDE.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: A well-furnished and well-equipped domain is needed, and technical equipment is installed according to the department's laboratory needs. The food provided in the hostel seems to be under the rating at 7/10, it is not too bad, but not very good. The sports meets are conducted every year, encouraging students to participate in various game events.
detailed_review.Faculty: Every faculty member is well-qualified up to the required knowledge level of their respective departments. The teaching quality looks its best. Each course offers students all opportunities to showcase their skills in industry-level training and careers. The exams look at an average rate of difficulty. If a student gets prepared for exams, then it is easy to score maximum.
detailed_review.Other: I chose my course through government counseling. Every course and domain here gives a minimum knowledge for a student to survive the fittest. The food court counter gets messy without any queue, so there is a need to improve. Events and cultural activities are conducted on a grand scale, engaging students to participate in various events and experience fun with knowledge.

reviews.course: B.E. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: I have a good future because I have knowledge in the field.

detailed_review.Placements: 75% of students got placed in my department. The highest salary package is 32 LPA, and the average salary package is 5 LPA, and 2 LPA is the lowest salary package. Zoho, TCS, Wipro, and Infosys are the top recruiting companies in our department. More than 70% of students got internship certificates.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: My department laboratory has advanced equipment. On the college campus, all laptops are connected to college Wi-Fi. Classrooms have a projector and screens for teaching. There is average taste food in the hostel.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers are highly knowledgeable and have a good ability to teach artificial intelligence and data science courses. The course curriculum is relevant to the industry and teaches about real-life experience. In artificial intelligence, exams are different than others. In our department, faculty members have industrial knowledge.
detailed_review.Other: I chose this course because it has high demand in the future. The college provides scholarships.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Artificial Intelligence and Data Science
reviews.review_title: In simple words, Karpagam College is a good campus, but not for all.

detailed_review.Placements: About 70% of students got placed last year. The average salary is 6 LPA, the highest salary is 33 LPA, and the lowest salary is 2 LPA. Zoho and TCS are the main campus recruitment companies for our college. Nearly 60 to 70% of students got their internships.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Not all faculty teach well; a few professors may teach based on their own interests, but many of them work only for their salary. The infrastructure of the college is good, but not all areas are well-maintained, for example, the toilets, grounds, etc. They provide more support for sports.
detailed_review.Faculty: The teaching quality depends on the faculty members. A few may be better, but most of them are not good and experienced. It is an autonomous college, so exams are simple because they frame their own curriculum. The course curriculum is only preferred for industry needs, and they are not focused on social development.
detailed_review.Other: Artificial intelligence is a very valuable course in the coming days, so I have chosen it.

reviews.course: B.E. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: Life at Karpagam College of Engineering.

detailed_review.Placements: 100% of students will get placed in our college for the past several years. The highest package is 40 LPA, and 7 LPA is the average package. ServiceNow and Microsoft are top recruiting companies here. JS developer is the top role offered here, and cloud engineer too.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Wi-Fi facilities are available at every place, and college infrastructure would be simple and elegant. The food available will be good enough, and the quality is good, and moreover, there is only one cafeteria here, and medical facilities are so good since there is a big hospital in our college, which comes with a medical course.
detailed_review.Faculty: Faculty members are so good, and they are so friendly. They are always ready to guide students in every way, and they are ready to do anything for students with their knowledge. They are fully available for students to teach, and they will help you out with any problems.

reviews.course: Master of Business Administration (MBA)
reviews.review_title: Everything is good and good placements.

detailed_review.Placements: Exactly 72% percent of students got placed at my college. The highest salary package offered is 15 LPA. The lowest salary package offered is 3 LPA. The top recruiting companies is Amazon and Wipro. The top roles offered is marketing manager, processing manager. 65% percent of students got internship in top companies.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Infrastructure is in our college. The facilities are good at our college. The classrooms are good. We have Wi-Fi connection, lab rooms, a big library, and medical facilities in front of our college. We have big playground. The hostel facilities are available. The canteen also available.
detailed_review.Faculty: At my college, the teacher are students friendly. The teacher are well qualified and knowledge. They clarify our doubts. The teacher have a lovely nature and support students throughout course. The course curriculum is relevant to the subject. The semester are difficult. The pass percentage is 70%.

reviews.course: B.E. in Civil Engineering
reviews.review_title: Best place for placements.

detailed_review.Placements: Nearly 70% of students from my batch got placed in many IT and core-related companies. The highest package I heard was 10 LPA, and the lowest is 3.5 LPA. Companies come for campus interviews. For my core, there are no top companies, only some MNC companies. Students without arrears got internships from companies.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Our college is old, but the labs and library are fully equipped. The campus has Wi-Fi, classrooms with projectors and smartboards. The hostel is the same for all; there is no AC hostel, and the food is average. Both veg and non-veg menus are available. Medical support is near our college; the institution medical college is close to us. They support sports and take students to various tournaments if they have talent.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers are experienced in our college; they teach very clearly, making it easy to understand. They are also available anytime to answer questions. All faculty members are ME graduates with high teaching quality. Our college is autonomous, so the courses are chosen by our staff to meet our needs and make us industry-ready. We have two semesters per year, and in each semester, we have three internal exams, two unit tests, and assignments to submit. We must score 50% to pass.
detailed_review.Other: This college provides better placement compared to other colleges with high fests. Our staff and practical knowledge are the best things about our course. We need more practical activities like those in industries. We have two major events: Kalam for first-year students and Dhuruva for second, third, and fourth-year students. This is one of the biggest events in Coimbatore among colleges. We have two scholarship options: one from the state and another from the central government for backward and low-class people. The campus has green surroundings and a pleasant environment. We have many clubs like NSS, photography, English, etc.

reviews.course: B.E. in Electrical and Electronics Engineering
reviews.review_title: I am satisfied with good placements and facilities provided to students.

detailed_review.Placements: Top companies visit our college to recruit students. They offer internships to students. Placement classes and training are conducted well for students. The highest, average, and lowest salary packages are offered in our course. I am satisfied with placements.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Wi-Fi, a laboratory, and classroom facilities and infrastructure are very good. Good infrastructure helps students to learn peacefully. Hostel facilities are well-satisfied. The quality of the food is good and tasty. Maintenance is good. Overall, students are satisfied.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers are well-qualified and knowledgeable. They are very helpful for exams and project work. The course curriculum is relevant to industries. It makes students industry-ready. Semester exams are easy because of the teaching methods of teachers.
detailed_review.Other: I chose this because of my interest in the electrical field.

reviews.course: B.E. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: Infrastructure is good, facilities are helpful, and placements are above average.

detailed_review.Placements: Placement is average in this college, with 30 out of 100 students getting placed. TCS, Wipro, ServiceNow, and Accenture are the top recruiting companies. This year, a student gets placed with a 40 LPA salary package. Most students were placed with an average salary package offered was 7 LPA -9 LPA. Students were placed in roles such as Software Engineer and Full Stack Developer. College conducts evening and night classes for placement purposes.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Infrastructure of this college is one of the best. Wi-Fi is available all over the college, the lab facilities are good, and labs are neat. Students get full access to the library, and classrooms are well-equipped. Every class has a projector. Hostel infrastructure is good, with separate hostels for each year of students. However, mess food is below average. College has playgrounds for separate sports.
detailed_review.Faculty: Faculty members in this college are helpful, and their way of teaching is good. All the teachers are well-qualified and knowledgeable. Syllabus helps students prepare for the industry, but they must improve their knowledge to get placed. If we regularly attend classes and study the syllabus, we can easily pass the exams and achieve a high CGPA."
detailed_review.Other: In this college, many cultural events are conducted. Several workshops and hackathons are held, and each department conducts separate workshops.

reviews.course: B.E. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: A True Review From A Student

detailed_review.Placements: Our college provides placement training starting from the 2nd year, making it very easy for students to get placed, mostly in the 3rd or 4th year based on their capabilities. Last year, 70% of students in the CSE department got placed. Top recruiting companies like Zoho, Amazon, and many others are coming for drives. More than 50% of students have received internship training in companies like Rapid Data Technologies and Turing. Roles offered include data analyst, app developer, SDE, and more. The highest package in our course is 10 lakh per annum, with an average package of 6 lakh per annum and a minimum package of 4 lakh per annum.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Our college is filled with greenery, providing a peaceful environment and great atmosphere. College infrastructure and classrooms are unique and always kept clean. We have a large number of labs for separate courses like Java, Data Structures, and Python, especially in the computer science department. There are separate libraries for each department and a common library in the center of the college where we can read all types of books for exam preparation. The hostel is clean and spacious, with separate blocks for each year, making it more comfortable for students to stay. The hostel food has a separate menu, and the food tastes good. A first aid box is kept in each room. The mess and food court are always clean, providing fresh food, although tastes differ from person to person. Sports contests are held once or twice a month, with many students participating and winning prizes. Various games are conducted to let students enjoy themselves outside academics.
detailed_review.Faculty: Faculty members are more like friends, guiding us beyond academics. The staff is always helpful, encouraging us to do more courses both offline and online and explaining their importance. They are well-educated and teach us clearly, with unique and easily understandable teaching skills. This course is very helpful for many posts in IT and other sectors. Semester exams are not very tough; it depends on student preparation. The pass percentage is 80%, and most students achieve passing marks.

reviews.course: B.E. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: If you have talent, then choose this college.

detailed_review.Placements: Basically, in the last year, only 32% of the students were placed, but they say that 95% were placed. This is absolutely fake. In the campus, lots of big companies will come, but the training for placement is worse and not worth the amount they ask us to pay. They also make the students stress by keeping evening and night classes, but in those classes, they will not teach you anything. If you rise any questions against them, they will blackmail you by saying, "If you want a job, then be suit to us; otherwise, get out of the placement."
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Infrastructures are better in the campus. Every block has Wi-Fi connection, and the library is open to everyone, and faculties are really well-trained and experienced. In the hostel, the food is the worst, but we can survive, and every staff is helpful and friendly with everyone.
detailed_review.Faculty: In case of placement, it is not worth the money they ask, but in case of academics, they will teach us well with well-experienced faculty members and everything they have. Every faculty will always want us to be the best, and they help us in each and every situation.
detailed_review.Other: I'm pursuing CS branch and currently in the 3rd year.

reviews.course: B.E. in Computer Science and Engineering

The food is good, not so bad, and the college supports sports. There is a hospital on campus, so there are no worries in emergencies.

They give more guidance for our final year projects. They conduct many industry visits program, workshop and events in every semester. 95 percentage of students pass every year.

reviews.course: B.E. in Electrical and Electronics Engineering
reviews.review_title: Absolutely dissatisfied because of faculty members .

faqs.question: How can I get into Karpagam College of Engineering for UG/PG courses? Am I eligible for admission?
faqs.answer:
Karpagam College of Engineering has below criteria for taking admissions to it's various courses: Courses Eligibility B.E. / B.Tech Candidate must have passed VIII, IX, X, XI & XII Std. from schools situated in Tamil Nadu.
Tamil Nadu native candidate who have passed any of the VIII, IX, X, XI & XII Std. or their equivalent exam from schools situated outside Tamil Nadu can also apply. They should produce Original Nativity Certificate.
Children of Central Government Employees, irrespective of their nativity, provided their parents or guardians (only if both parents are not alive) have been serving in Tamil Nadu continuously for the past five years can be eligible to apply.
Sons & daughters of All India service Tamil Nadu cadre officers are eligible to apply. A Self declaration from the parent in this regard is to be produced.
Children of employees in the Public Sector or Government recognised institutions had been working in their organisations for the past five years are also eligible, irrespective of their domicile.
Other State candidates who have studied VIII, IX, X, XI and XII Std. in Tamil Nadu are eligible to apply. MBA/PGDM Candidate who have completed 10+2+AMIE or 10+3 years Diploma + AMIE are also eligible.
AMIE candidate must have 2 years regular full time experience in the relevant field. MCA Candidate who have completed 10+2+AMIE or 10+3 years Diploma + AMIE are also eligible.
AMIE candidate must have 2 years regular full time experience in the relevant field. M.E./M.Tech Candidate who have completed 10+2+AMIE or 10+3 years Diploma + AMIE are also eligible.
AMIE candidate must have 2 years regular full time experience in the relevant field. Not satisfied with answer? Ask Shiksha GPT

faqs.answer: The overall seats available across all courses offered by Karpagam College of Engineering is up to 1506. Good thing to know is that Karpagam College of Engineering has courses which are approved by prominent Government bodies like AICTE. Not satisfied with answer? Ask Shiksha GPT

college_info.college_name: Lakshmi Narain College of Technology, Bhopal: Courses, Fees, Admission 2025, Placements, Reviews

highlights.summary: Lakshmi Narain College of Technology, Bhopal was established in 1993. It is a private institute and is located in Bhopal, Madhya Pradesh. Lakshmi Narain College of Technology, Bhopal courses are offered to students at the UG and PG levels. The institute is approved by AICTE and offers courses in Full Time mode. Lakshmi Narain College of Technology, Bhopal offers a total of 23 courses in streams such as Engineering, IT & Software and Business & Management Studies. Some of the popular courses offered at the institute are B.E. / B.Tech, M.E./M.Tech, MBA/PGDM and MCA and the total seat intake for the available courses is 3120. These courses are offered to students across several specialisations such as Civil Engineering, Computer Science Engineering, Electrical Engineering, Electronics & Communication Engineering, Electronics Engineering, Information Technology and Mechanical Engineering. Further, the fee for all these courses ranges between INR 62,000 and 3,52,500 and the average median salary is around INR 4,81,478. Apart from this, the Lakshmi Narain College of Technology, Bhopal campus has a state-of-the-art infrastructure with all the advanced facilities.

Lakshmi Narain College of Technology, Bhopal Reviews on Placements, Faculty & Facilities

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: Decent placements, the worst faculty members, small campus.

detailed_review.Placements: You can get decent placement from here if you are in the top 30-40%. Companies do visit here for placements. I know mostly service-based, but if you want only placements, then you can get 7. If you are aiming for a higher package, definitely look for off-campus.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The campus size is decent. They provide hostels for both genders, but for boys, you can stay in the college hostel only for the first year, and then from the second year, you have to leave it. They do have all the grounds for football, cricket, badminton, volleyball, basketball, and all. Mess food is okay.
detailed_review.Faculty: Faculty members I studied with till now are very bad at their job. They just want one thing from you: attendance. For curriculum, they follow the RGPV pattern, which is obviously outdated, like all other government universities. The mid-semester is conducted by the college itself, while for the end-semester, RGPV takes charge.
detailed_review.Other: If you are going to go for a private college, you can check out this one also if your budget is low, but keep in mind you will not be getting good quality of students around you. Most of them are very insecure about themselves and will pretend to you that they are doing nothing, as if what you will do if you know about them?

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: The college has the best on-campus placement record.

detailed_review.Placements: I am currently in my 3rd year of college, pursuing a B.Tech in CSE. LNCT is one of the best private colleges in Madhya Pradesh with a good placement record. My elder brother also went to the same college and got three offers from reputed companies. The highest package offered to students is between 18 and 20 LPA. The lowest is around 3.5–4 LPA. Companies like Infosys, Deloitte, Capgemini, Accenture, TCS, and EPAM often visit our college to recruit students. Cisco also offers internship opportunities to students. I am not currently aware of the roles.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The college has big labs with good computers where students can code well, but the quality of the chairs are not good and can break easily. Students cannot use Wi-Fi inside the campus, and cellular data is blocked due to jammers. The rest of the infrastructure is good. The food is decent but not as good as home. The college has its own dispensary where students can get medicine for free. There is also a ground where students can play.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers are the best in town, mostly well-experienced and able to teach very well. The college has its own TNP department that guides and helps students to be industry-ready. Semester exams are easy, and the pass percentage is 50%.
detailed_review.Other: I chose this college and course because it has the best placement record overall. Industrial visits can be improved to give students more knowledge. College fests happen once a year and totally worth it, with an amazing crowd to vibe with. As a 3rd-year student, I have been receiving a scholarship of Rs. 30,000 per year for the past two years. The college organizes LNCT Olympics every year in November and December as part of extracurricular activities.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: It is the best college in Madhya Pradesh and in a budget.

detailed_review.Placements: Around 60-70 percent of students from our course get placed. The highest package is 1.12 crore per annum. The lowest package ranges from 1-2 LPA. The average package ranges from 4-5 LPA. Top companies like Cysco, Microsoft, Capgemini, etc., hire students. From the 3rd year, students get internships, and from the 4th year, students get their jobs as they attend interviews with companies and get packages.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Infrastructure is good. There is nothing wrong with facilities. The college life is not enjoyable like other dummy colleges or government colleges. There are separate labs for different works and as per subjects. Facilities are good. It provides basketball, football, and other sports facilities.
detailed_review.Faculty: Exams are based on the RGVP course curriculum. Teachers are decent, not professional or of a high standard, but are not the worst, as per the college. The course curriculum is relevant. The college makes students industry-ready, but students should have some skills in coding. Exams are decent, and passing marks are 22 out of 70. Mid-semester exams are of 20 marks, and the pass mark is 7. We have 60 marks in internal exams.

reviews.course: B.E. in Computer Science and Engineering (Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning)
reviews.review_title: Satisfied with the placement, dissatisfied with the attendance criteria and self-learning time.

detailed_review.Placements: This college offers decent placement opportunities. Many students get placed in IT and service-based companies while a few land higher packages. Training and workshops help but competition is high. Overall the placement scene is average but supportive.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: LNCT Bhopal has a big and clean campus with good classrooms, working Wi-Fi, and well-equipped labs. The library is updated and helpful. Hostels and sports areas are okay and improving. Some buildings are a bit old but the infrastructure is good for students.
detailed_review.Faculty: This college has a balanced curriculum that covers both basics and practical topics. The faculty is supportive though teaching quality can vary. Exams follow the set syllabus and are mostly manageable if you stay regular. The course and teaching are decent for learning.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: Absolutely worth the money, the faculty is pretty good, the environment is normal, but good overall.

detailed_review.Placements: The college has pretty impressive placements. I think this is the highest-ranked college in placements in the whole of Madhya Pradesh. It has pretty well maintained placements, which gives a sense of security, and you should visit the college for more satisfaction on your own side.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The infrastructure is pretty well maintained and updated every year. There are many facilities that are currently working and will soon be shown in the college. The fests are started and a good competitive environment with good study teachers, where good hostels are near, so you don't have to travel a lot.
detailed_review.Faculty: 5 stars for the faculty, no ego, nothing, only a teacher with their teaching skills, no drama, nothing, they are just simply doing their work, they don't get rude and shout at you until you don't have focus on making your own career, so it's your responsibility, they don't have any issue with it.
detailed_review.Other: If you are searching for the best college with lower fees and higher placements, and if you want facilities and environment, and you are not ready to go outside M.P., then this is the best college you should choose, but remember it is strict, so don't expect fun, there is fun, but no lavish college life.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: Really good education, best in class.

detailed_review.Placements: 99% students are placed in your college. ₹1.10–1.12 CPA is the highest package offered in recent years. The lowest package goes from ₹1.5 to ₹2.3 LPA. Top recruiters are Amazon, TCS, Infosys, Wipro, and Accenture. Around 60 to 85% of students get internships. Top roles offered are software engineer, associate engineer.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Facilities and infrastructure available in your department are best, with Wi-Fi facilities and labs properly developed. Library has every material related to the course and other useful notes and books also. Mess, as per what I got to know, has good food. I have also tasted the food of a hostel friend the taste was very good.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers are helpful. All the staff is qualified and knowledgeable about their domain. Teaching quality is best. Course curriculum is relevant and useful as per the domain. Semester exams are up to the mark as they help students get ready for their final exams. Passing percentage is as per the student's education.
detailed_review.Other: The course I chose is the best thing as it helps me to learn and satisfy my eagerness about the development of applications and websites. It’s one of the best courses. It needs little improvement in a way that more languages should be added.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Civil Engineering
reviews.review_title: Review by a student of LNCT.

detailed_review.Placements: In my college course 70% students get placed. The highest package they get is 5LPA, and the lowest they get is 2.5LPA. The top recruiting companies are Quislex and many more. The top internships that students of my college get are in Bangalore tech companies.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The infrastructure and facilities we got are Wi-Fi, a moot court room, a conference room, a library, and good classrooms with digital learning. In the mess and canteen, hygienic food and water are available for us. The quality of facilities we get in the hostel is also good.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers here are helpful, qualified, and knowledgeable. The teaching quality of faculty here is good, they include all the best methods to teach us, like digital learning, PPTs, and Word documents. The semester exams are moderate. The passing percentage is 60%.
detailed_review.Other: I chose this course because in my college, this course has the highest ranking, and here I am getting all the knowledge that I would have gotten from any other college. For improvement, my college should conduct more expert lectures and pay attention to the weak students.

reviews.course: B.E. in Computer Science and Engineering (Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning)
reviews.review_title: Good college for students but not good for technical education.

detailed_review.Placements: Some companies, like product-based based, come to our campus for an internship. Around this year, more than 30 students are getting internships in the 2nd semester, and many more get paid internships in the 5th semester also. Top recruiting companies like Infosys, TCS, and Mahindra come and offer hundreds of placement offers to students. The average package is around 5 LPA, and the highest goes up to 25 LPA. Top roles offered are SDE, business analyst, sales, etc.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Infrastructure of the hostel and college is quite good, with AC rooms and well-ventilated classrooms and labs. The quality of mess food is not as good but bearable. The quality of life is good but not as expected due to bearable syntax and overall configuration and troubleshooting skills and experience.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers are quite helpful to the students and really teach us the real concepts. The semester exams are not very hard. One can prepare using previous year questions, and class notes are considered enough for a good CGPA. The college is good, but not as good as the one that is out of the world, just for fair and technical education.
detailed_review.Other: The courses offered here are quite good and futuristic. The batch consists of 70 students. One can improve their technical education and improve the quality of communication.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: Wanna join LNCT college?

detailed_review.Placements: About 60% of students get placements. The highest package from the college is 1 crore, and the lowest package is approximately 3.5 LPA. You will have to develop skills and grab opportunities provided in college. Top recruiting companies are Wipro, Amazon, Accenture, etc.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Wi-Fi facility is provided in college, and they provide 3-4 computer labs. Classroom is average. Infrastructure of college is good, very big, and elegant. Hostel facility of the college is good for girls hostel only, not for boys hostel. The food provided in mess is average. Medical and sports facilities are provided.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers are highly qualified and highly knowledgeable. But they are not too much supportive. The course does not seem to be relevant as its mainly theory learning, not practical learning. It doesn't make students industry-ready. The semester exam is moderate. If you start studying 7 days before the exam, you can score good.
detailed_review.Other: I chose this course B.Tech because I have an interest in engineering. This college is famous for its engineering courses. The things that need to be improved in the course are to bring more practical learning than theoretical learning.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: My college review as per my experience.

detailed_review.Placements: In my course, more than 80% of students got placed last year. The highest package offered by my college is 10 LPA - 20 LPA, and the lowest package offered in my college is 3 LPA - 4 LPA. Top recruiting companies in my college are Carwale, Quantiphi, and Epam. Top roles offered are software engineer and IT engineer.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Infrastructure of my college is very good. Smart classes and smart boards are there in the new building. There are fully Wi-Fi-connected labs and libraries. Our college has good environment. Hostel has good facilities. The quality of food in my mess is above average. Mess and canteen facilities are very good.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers are very much helpful and have good knowledge in each field. The course offered in my college is very much helpful. Semester exams are very easy, and one week per subject is recommended to crack the exam. The passing percentage is 33%, and the marks to pass the exam for each subject are 22.

reviews.course: Master of Computer Applications (MCA)
reviews.review_title: The fee is average in this college. Students get a good learning experience and enjoy studying.

detailed_review.Placements: 56-60% of students get placed in companies. The lowest package is 1.5 LPA, and the highest package offered is 4 LPA. The TCS company commonly offers placements for students. 60% of students got internships and packages. A developer role is offered by many companies for students. Some companies hire experienced candidates.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: There are good facilities. Sports and games are good. NCC training is given by the college. There are good indoor and outdoor games.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers are helpful for solving problems and providing guidance. The course curriculum is relevant, and it is helpful to make us ready to enter the tech industry. It is not too hard to clear exams, as it depends on students. The exam questions are not hard. It makes students learn. They have good behaviour with students, which I like. Each month, 1-2 seminars are conducted by college for new information and learning.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: I chose the best option LNCT.

detailed_review.Placements: The placement record of the college is very good. About 80% students get placed in various companies. The highest package is of 1.1cr, and the lowest is somewhere around 2 to 2.5 LPA. The recruiting companies are TCS, Infosys, Wipro, Capgemini, and many more. About 85% percent got internship in my course.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The best facility that you may get is in this college. The classrooms are designed so well and have good infrastructure. The labs are good with full facilities like Wi-Fi, AC, and a comfortable chair. Hostel rooms are good with proper bed cubicles, chair, and study table. The mess food is also very good with a proper routine.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers are very helpful in classrooms and outside of them. They are well skilled, so they thought very well they provide a good practical knowledge, and clear all the doubts of every student.  The course is much relevant to industrial knowledge. The semester exams are a little bit tough, but can be easily cleared with the teachers notes.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: Good campus with a good crowd and placements.

detailed_review.Placements: About 70%-80% got placed last year. The average package offered on my campus is 4 LPA, and the highest package is about 10 LPA-12 LPA. Carwale, Quantiphi, and Epam are the companies offering higher packages. The top roles offered in my course are AI engineer and DA engineer.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Good Wi-Fi, classrooms are digital, and labs are very good. The hostel is too good with good infrastructure and hospitality. Mess is good. The sports ground and department are also separate from the sports department. There are many competitions held every year for students to participate in.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers are very helpful. My course is very relevant. Semester exams are very easy, you can pass the exam in just one week. Also, the students got about 9.5 CGPA on my campus. In the end, the conclusion is that if you are good, then you are good everywhere.
detailed_review.Other: I chose this course because this course is in demand.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: LNCT University is a good college for your bright future.

detailed_review.Placements: 60-70% of students in my course are placed. The highest package is ₹14-15 LPA, and the lowest is ₹2-3 LPA. 60% of the students in my college get internships. Top recruiting companies like TCS, Infosys, and others come to our college for campus selection. The placement rate is high at my college.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The LNCT college hostels have good quality food and medical facilities, and sports and game zones are also available. To be honest, the infrastructure and facilities are excellent. The classrooms are big, and the mess is also maintained with good hygiene.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teaching quality is much better, and the teachers are helpful and knowledgeable. This course curriculum is also relevant and makes students industry-ready. The semester exams are difficult at my college and are conducted very strictly. The passing marks are 7 out of 20 for mid-term exams and 28 for semester exams
detailed_review.Other: I chose this course for better career opportunities. The events at my college are well organized.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Artificial Intelligence and Data Science
reviews.review_title: A good option for students who are not getting government ones.

detailed_review.Placements: 70% of students get placed this year. The packages vary from 3 LPA to 30 LPA, and average is 12 LPA. Multiple companies come to recruit. EPAM, Infosys, TCS, Jio, etc., are some prominent ones. The internships are also good. Mainly students who get their internship through college are very less.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Classrooms are fine, good lighting, fans are sufficient, and network is not working in most of the campus area. Wi-Fi is not that good but it works good in the library. No idea about hostels. Canteen is good, and food quality and pricing are okay. Sports and games facilities are available.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers are knowledgeable and qualified. Their teaching skills are okay. But some are less helpful, and sometimes strict. They are well-informed about the curriculum and try to make it more relevant for students. The mid-semester exams are tough. The environment during the exams is peaceful.
detailed_review.Other: There are a lot of events happening on the campus but students cannot be able to join all due to attendance as it is strict.

reviews.course: B.E. in Computer Science and Engineering (Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning)
reviews.review_title: Good infrastructure, decent faculty, and facilities.

detailed_review.Placements: Around 75-80% of all the students get placed every year, with the average package being around 4-6 LPA. Companies like TCS, Infosys, and Wipro recruit regularly, offering roles such as software engineers, full-stack developers, and AI/ML developers. Many students also secure final-year internships.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: There are good labs for AI/ML, and a good library with digital resources is also provided. The classrooms are well-maintained, clean, and spacious. The hostels are also kept clean with decent rooms, 24/7 water and electricity, and the food provided is also of decent quality.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers here are very helpful and knowledgeable, and they help students in each step. The course curriculum for all the first-year students is the same, becoming relevant to their specific course from the second year onwards. The course does help students to gain knowledge. The mid-semester exams are pretty easy, and the end-semester exams are also of a moderate level.
detailed_review.Other: There are fewer events and fests organized in this college compared to others. The network connectivity is decent throughout the campus, except in some places. Scholarships are provided for reserved categories.

reviews.course: B.E. in Computer Science and Engineering (Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning)
reviews.review_title: Lakshmi Narain College of Technology, Bhopal review.

detailed_review.Placements: With an overall placement rate of around 65.6%, where 705 out of 1,075 registered students secured placements, the average salary for all branches is approximately 5 to 5.5 LPA, and the top recruiters are mainly mass recruiters like TCS, Infosys, Wipro, Cognizant, Capgemini, Accenture, IBM, HCL Technologies, Tech Mahindra, and Emphasis Syntel.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: College sits on approximately 45-50 acres of landscaped grounds. There are multiple academic blocks dedicated to different disciplines (e.g., Civil, Mechanical, Electrical, and the Main/CS block), each spanning several floors and connected via internal roads. There are six hostels, with two for boys and the rest for girls. The Wi-Fi has restrictions but works a bit slow. The mess food is not good, to be honest. The classrooms are spacious and well-ventilated, with some being digitally enabled and air-conditioned with CCTV coverage. There is a modern digital library with both print and electronic resources, accommodating around 200 readers. Department libraries are also available, inclusive of DELNET access.
detailed_review.Faculty: Most departments, such as CSE, ECE, IT, Mechanical, Electrical, and Engineering Chemistry, feature qualified, experienced faculty aligned with RGPV standards. They actively engage in research, publications, and conferences, as well as workshops, and receive support from agencies like AICTE, DST, and MPCST.
detailed_review.Other: Fees are less compared to other private colleges. Although the attendance criteria are very strict, you can manage somehow. Areas for improvement: some students find variability, as while many professors are supportive, others may be less engaging or egoistic. Overall, the teaching quality is generally positive, but consistent effort and individual initiative are essential.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Electronics and Communication Engineering
reviews.review_title: Satisfied but not much, there are some good things and also some bad.

detailed_review.Placements: I am EC student in the LNTS B.Tech course. In the year 2024 to 2025, the placement rate for EC students is 70%. The highest package is 10LPA, the lowest is 2LPA in my course. Top companies are TCS, Wipro, IBM, and Infosys. If I talk about internship, then for a paid internship, you have to get on your own, as your college does not provide it, but some unpaid internships they provide and top roles are in the EC field, students only get in these companies.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: There is no Wi-Fi, even your network does not work due to jammers in the library. Wi-Fi is very fast and good. Infrastructure is best for LNCT main or LNCTE students, but the LNCTS building does not even have good paint, which looks very old. Horror building horror films should be shot in a hostel building. If I talk about the hostel, then the infrastructure is good, facilities and mess food are average, but wardens never cooperate with your issue and always blame students even though they do not do anything wrong.
detailed_review.Faculty: If I talk about this in one word, then it is Excellent. Teachers are very knowledgeable and teach like the best teachers. Curriculum is based on the RGVP syllabus that is not for todays job requirements, but I cannot blame the college for it. Semester exams are not that difficult. I only studied for four days before and easily got 8.5 CGPA. Almost 95% students passed.
detailed_review.Other: I got a TFW seat, so I came to this college. The best thing is that the study is properly organized. Librarians nature is good, they are very helpful. The main GATE guards are very kind. They talk so nicely, but all the staff are so rude. I thought college has to paint the LNTS building and focus more on students problems, events often happen, and other activities, fests are also continuing as per the season.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Electronics and Communication Engineering
reviews.review_title: Lakshmi Narain College of Technology, Bhopal

detailed_review.Placements: Here, the college provides placement opportunities to every student, but it's totally dependent on us. Almost 75-80% of students get placed. The highest and lowest packages also depend on which category you want to fall into. The highest has gone up to 1.12 crores, and the lowest is around 2-3 LPA. Companies like Infosys and Wipro visit the campus. Almost every student can easily get an internship; it depends on you and your skills. If you have the skills, you have a chance to succeed. Companies offer every fresher a basic position, if you have more skills or deserve more than a basic position, then you will obviously get it.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Facilities and infrastructure here are just okay, neither too good nor too bad. Compared to other colleges in Bhopal (except MANIT), it is nice. The quality of the food in the hostel mess and canteen is absolutely good, but the medical facilities are not. They don't have medicine, and for everything, they just give paracetamol. For sports and games, the college provides opportunities for students to participate in competitions and all.
detailed_review.Faculty:
Almost all the teachers are good, except for a few. Some teachers are rude; they don't listen to students properly and tend to ignore them. I can't really say much about this, as it is a reflection of our Indian education system, which is followed in almost every college.
okay not so much difficult it is easy to pass the sem exams. For pass the CGPA must be above 5. it is far better if it is above than 7 or 8.
detailed_review.Other: I want to do B.Tech. B.Tech students can do anything. I want a change in the Indian education system. It's an issue with the education system, not with the college. Everything else is good, but the connectivity with seniors is zero for first-year students. First-year students cannot meet with seniors.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: Lakshmi Narain College of Technology Review.

detailed_review.Placements: Placement drives begin in the 7th semester. Top companies include Google (16 placements), Oracle (5), Microsoft (3), Deutsche Bank (3), Grow (10), Amex (10), Nutanix (6), and Amazon (8). About 85% placement. Average 5.5 LPA, the highest 48 LPA (off-campus Intuit offer).
detailed_review.Infrastructure: College sits on approximately 45–50 acres of landscaped grounds. Multiple academic blocks are dedicated to different disciplines (e.g., Civil, Mechanical, Electrical block versus Main/CS block), each spanning several floors and connected via internal roads. Spacious, well-ventilated classrooms, some digitally enabled and air-conditioned with CCTV coverage. A modern digital library with both print and electronic resources, accommodating around 200 readers. Department libraries are also available, inclusive of DELNET access.
detailed_review.Faculty: Most departments, such as CSE, ECE, IT, Mechanical, Electrical, and Engineering Chemistry, feature qualified, experienced faculty aligned with RGPV standards. They actively engage in research, publications, conferences, workshops, and receive support from agencies like AICTE, DST, and MPCST. Some students find variability; while many professors are supportive, others may be less engaging or egoistic. Overall, teaching quality is generally positive, but consistent effort and individual initiative are essential.
detailed_review.Other: Focus on coding.

faqs.answer: After JEE session 2 is completed, only those candidates who are aiming for IITs need to start preparing for JEE Advanced after clearing JEE Main. faqs.question: How can I get into Lakshmi Narain College of Technology, Bhopal for UG/PG courses? Am I eligible for admission?
faqs.answer:
Lakshmi Narain College of Technology, Bhopal has below criteria for taking admissions to it's various courses: Courses Eligibility B.E. / B.Tech Candidate must have passed Diploma in engineering from a recognised university with minimum 45%.SC, ST and OBC Candidates are eligible on 40% of Total marks.
Candidates having B.Sc. degree with a minimum 45% marks and have passed 12th examination with mathematics can also apply to this course. M.E./M.Tech Candidate must have completed B.E./B.Tech. in relevant branch of Engg./Technology with above mentioned percentage.
The mentioned SC/ST percentage is for Madhya Pradesh residents.
Candidate belonging to OBC (excluding creamy layer) categories of Madhya Pradesh should have at least 45%.
Bachelors degree should be of minimum of four years duration and have been obtained from any AICTE approved institution or Indian University/ Institute or from a foreign University recognised by AIU or any Institutes of national importance (i.e. IITs/ IISc/NITs etc.) duly recognised by the MHRD, as equivalent thereto.
Candidates in the Final year of above degree examinations can also apply on provisional basis.
Rounding of marks or percentage is not permissible. MBA/PGDM Candidate must have completed Graduation with mentioned percentage in aggregate of any UGC/AICTE approved Indian University or from a foreign University recognised by AIU or Institute recognised by the concerned University as equivalent thereto. 
The mentioned SC/ST percentage is for Madhya Pradesh residents.
Candidates belonging to OBC (excluding creamy layer) categories of Madhya Pradesh can apply with at least 45%. 
The Bachelor's degree must be of minimum three years duration after passing Higher Secondary (10+2) examination of (10+2) system or equivalent.
Candidates in the Final year of above degree examinations can also apply on provisional basis.
Candidate who has passed qualifying examination with grace marks are also eligible for admission.
Candidates whose qualifying examination marksheet are based on grading system has to produce conversion of grade to marks. MCA Candidate must have completed BCA/ Bachelor Degree in Computer Science Engineering or equivalent Degree or passed B.Sc./ B.Com/ B.A. with Mathematics at (10+2) level or at Graduate level with above mentioned aggregate percentage of any UGC/AICTE approved Indian University or from a foreign University recognised by AIU or Institute recognised by the concerned University as equivalent thereto. 
The mentioned SC/ST percentage is for Madhya Pradesh residents.
Candidates belonging to OBC (excluding creamy layer) categories of Madhya Pradesh can apply with at least 45%.
The Bachelor's degree must be of minimum three years duration. Not satisfied with answer? Ask Shiksha GPT

college_info.college_name: M Kumarasamy College of Engineering: Courses, Fees, Admission 2025, Placements

highlights.summary:
M Kumarasamy College of Engineering is located in Karur, Tamil Nadu. It is a private institute, accredited by the NAAC with Grade ‘A’. It is also approved by the All India Council for Technical Education (AICTE) and the National Board of Accreditation (NBA). M Kumarasamy College of Engineering is affiliated with Anna University and is also ISO-certified. NIRF Ranking 2023 has also ranked it in the band of 11-50 under the ‘Innovation Category’. The Impact Rankings 2022 ranked it 44 in India under the ‘Sustainable Development’ category.
M Kumarasamy College of Engineering offers various programmes at the UG and PG levels. The institute offers over 9 undergraduate and 6 postgraduate courses. At the UG level, M Kumarasamy College of Engineering offers BE and BTech programmes in several specialisations such as Civil Engineering, Computer Science &Engineering, Artificial Intelligence & Data Science, and others. At the PG level, the institute offers ME, MBA, and MCA programmes. M Kumarasamy College of Engineering also offers placement assistance to students. The key highlights of M Kumarasamy College of Engineering are presented below:

college_info_program.intro:
BE, BTech, and MBA are the popular programmes of M Kumarasamy College of Engineering. BE and BTech programmes are offered for a duration of four years in various specialisations. Some of the popular BE/ BTech specialisations offered at the institute are mentioned below:
The total seat intake for the MBA programme at M Kumarasamy College of Engineering is 60. The Management Department of the institute regularly organises various training programmes for students, known as Leadership Development Intervention Programmes, to enhance their management skills. Below mentioned are the M Kumarasamy College of Engineering popular programmes:
