M Kumarasamy College of Engineering Reviews on Placements, Faculty & Facilities

reviews.course: Master of Computer Applications (MCA)
reviews.review_title: Overall, it is the best college for MBA.

detailed_review.Placements: Our placement cell is really helpful and active. Our placement rate is 90%. Every qualified student is assigned to a reputable company. Top hiring firms for my course include TCS, Wipro, Infosys, Capgemini, and Mindtree. 40 LPA is the largest wage package offered, 3.5 LPA is the lowest, and 4.5 LPA is the average. Many students secure internships at prestigious firms like Wipro, etc.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The facilities at our college are excellent. There is always high-speed Wi-Fi available on campus and in every classroom. Every lab, library, and classroom has contemporary amenities. Professors use projectors to instruct us. Although the canteen offers a wide range of meals, the quality of the food is good. Additional medical amenities are provided. This organization offers a range of sports.
detailed_review.Faculty: The instructors are competent and well-informed. They constantly guide us in the proper direction and are highly student-friendly. They employ clever teaching strategies. The course emphasizes understanding a pupil's core because a solid core allows a student to pick up additional skills with ease. Their main goal is to prepare us for the industry. Exams for the semester are not that tough if you study properly. The pass rate is 70%.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Artificial Intelligence and Data Science
reviews.review_title: See the truth yourself before admitting your child to a college.

detailed_review.Placements: I am currently a B.Tech AIDS student from the 2023-2027 batch. Placement scenario is not very promising. Hardly 30-40% of students from my course were placed in the last placement season. The highest package is around 5 LPA, the lowest is 1.8 LPA, and the average is 2.5 LPA. Many of the offers are for non-core roles like BPO and support jobs.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Infrastructure for the computer science department is very disappointing. Labs are outdated, with limited working systems. There is poor access to updated tools or real-time project environment. Wi-Fi is unreliable and often restricted. Classrooms are basic, and library lacks current CS reference books.
detailed_review.Faculty: Most of the faculty members are not specialized in core CS areas like AI, ML, or data science. A few are helpful, but many rely on outdated teaching methods (mostly PPTs). There is minimal focus on hands-on learning or real-world industry applications.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Artificial Intelligence and Data Science
reviews.review_title: Great infrastructure and growing placement opportunities, but faculty quality needs improvement.

detailed_review.Placements: Placement opportunities are increasing each year especially for CS/IT students. However core placements are limited. Packages vary widely. The syllabus is up-to-date for some branches especially tech related courses. However exam patterns and internal assessment can be unpredictable.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Campus is modern and well-maintained with good classrooms, labs, Wi-Fi, and libraries. Hostels are decent but could be cleaner. Hostel rooms are livable with basic amenities. Mess food is average, sometimes good, sometimes not. Hygiene can be improved.
detailed_review.Faculty: Some professors are experienced and helpful. But overall teaching quality is average. Many rely heavily on PPTs instead of practical teaching.
detailed_review.Other: Our college has fair tuition fee compared to facilities and placement outcomes. It is worth it for teaching branches, but other branches may feel less value. Good campus life with plenty of fests, clubs, and events. Student involvement in extracurricular activities is encouraged and well-managed. If the college is in a city, access is easy, if it's remote, it may feel isolated with limited public transport. Our college has value for money.

reviews.course: Master of Computer Applications (MCA)
reviews.review_title: Overall, the best college for the MCA course.

detailed_review.Placements: During my study period, about 77% of students were assigned to their family companies. The highest package offered was 25 LPA, and the lowest was 5 LPA. Accenture, Tech Mahindra, and NVIDIA were among the leading recruiters. The top positions offered in the course included software engineer, software developer, and similar roles. Approximately 75% of students receive internship opportunities.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Our college’s infrastructure was subpar, although improvements were being considered. Wi-Fi facility had a capacity of 35 Mbps. Libraries lacked a suitable collection of books. The mess facilities of Ramanujan Boys Hostel were adequate, but the meals served were unhygienic. There was a clinic on campus, but, most of medications prescribed by doctors had to be purchased elsewhere.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers were good. Some of teachers were really knowledgeable, but only a handful. The study curriculum was also acceptable. One thing was certain study schedules weren’t hectic. There was plenty of time to engage in other pursuits. Exams were not difficult at all, simply paying attention in class was enough. The pass rate was 87%.

reviews.course: B.E. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: M. Kumaraswamy College of Engineering is one of the best engineering colleges.

detailed_review.Placements: M. Kumarasamy College of Engineering was one of the more reputed engineering colleges in India. The college placement training and placements were very good. Every year, more than 90% of students get good jobs through campus interviews. India's biggest companies like Tata Motors, TCS, Infosys, Zoho, Accenture, Wipro, and Tech Mahindra visited the college for campus interviews. Student salary packages ranged from 3 to 10 LPA.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: M. Kumarasamy College of Engineering had very good infrastructure facilities. More spacious and comfortable classrooms were available in the college. Multiple computer laboratories with internet facilities. The college provided good hostel facilities for boys and girls. Mess and canteen food tasted good. Multiple sports ground facilities were also available in the college. Good library facilities were also provided.
detailed_review.Faculty: M. Kumarasamy College of Engineering professors were more experienced and skilled. They were very friendly and helpful. They conducted many model exams every month. They also conducted more extracurricular activity programs every semester. As a result, 95 percent of students passed all semester exams.
detailed_review.Other: M. Kumarasamy College of Engineering has more than 15 courses. Many master’s degree courses were also there in this college. The college provided good transportation facilities. The college management conducted many sports events every semester. Students who participated got scholarships and certificates.

reviews.course: B.E. in Mechanical Engineering
reviews.review_title: M. Kumarasamy College of Engineering is absolutely the best engineering college.

detailed_review.Placements: M. Kumarasamy College of Engineering is a more reputed college in Karur district. This college provides good placement records every year. Almost 80-90 percent of students get good job opportunities through this college's campus interviews. More reputed companies like Wipro, Infosys, Zoho, Accenture, TVS, Hero, and these companies visit this college's campus for interviews. Salary packages range from 3-12 Lacs per annum.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: This college's infrastructure and campus environment are excellent. More than 15 courses are available in this college. Multiple laboratories and more spacious classrooms are here in this college. A well-stocked library is also here in this college. This college's sports ground facilities are very good, and the coaching staff also work in this college. Hostel food quality is also good. Canteen facilities are also available on this college campus.
detailed_review.Faculty: M. Kumarasamy College of Engineering's faculty members are highly talented people. They have more than 5 years of experience in teaching. They conduct 5-8 lectures every week. More than 90 percent of students pass the semester exams. This college's staff members are very friendly and are very helpful with our final-year projects and placements.
detailed_review.Other: M. Kumarasamy College of Engineering has a larger number of courses. I am choosing mechanical engineering in this college. A larger number of mechanical laboratory facilities are available in this college. This college's management conducts many sports and cultural events every year. This college provides good transportation facilities. This college's courses and curriculum are updated. The college management celebrates many festival events like Deepavali, Pongal, Onam, Christmas, etc.

reviews.course: Master of Computer Applications (MCA)
reviews.review_title: One of the best colleges for MCA.

detailed_review.Placements: We have a very active and helpful placement cell with a 90% placement record. All eligible students are placed in good companies. TCS, Wipro, Infosys, Capgemini, and Mindtree are top recruiting companies for my course. The highest salary package offered is 40 LPA, the lowest is 3.5 LPA, and the average is 4.5 LPA. Many students get internships in leading companies like Wipro.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Our college infrastructure is very good. High-speed Wi-Fi is available in every classroom and throughout the campus. All labs, libraries, and classrooms are equipped with modern facilities. Professors use projectors to teach us. The food quality is good, and a variety of food is available in the canteen. Medical facilities are also available. The institution offers various sports.
detailed_review.Faculty: The faculty members are knowledgeable and well-qualified. They are student-friendly and always guide us in the right direction, using smart methods of teaching. The course focuses on strengthening the core of a student, making it easier to learn new things. They emphasize making us industry-ready. Semester exams are not very difficult if you prepare well. The pass rate is 70%.

reviews.course: Master of Business Administration (MBA)
reviews.review_title: Panimalar Engineering College is an excellent place to explore.

detailed_review.Placements: Most of our seniors are placed with several companies in and around Karur. The maximum pay package offered was 7.62 LPA, and the minimum pay package was 3 LPA. Some students want to start their own startup. Our college also helps students interested in startups.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Our college has two canteens inside the campus. The toilets are not hygienic. They follow infrastructure norms once every four years due to NAAC inspections. The classrooms are good. It has a good environment and less space for parking. After this, there is a good hostel and college.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teaching on our campus is good. The professors are doing their best and are very helpful to us. We follow a strong mentoring system at our college. Weekly, we have counselor meetings to overcome difficulties faced by students, and it is good. Otherwise, the faculty curriculum and exams are too tough.

reviews.course: B.E. in Electronics and Communication Engineering
reviews.review_title: Top engineering college in Karur.

detailed_review.Placements: It was one of the top colleges, which stands for it's excellence in academic and placement performances. The highest salary package offered by recruiters  is 12 LPA. The placement team helps the students gain their personal skills.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: It's a green, peaceful environment, and a good place to do our higher studies. This place stabilizes the mental health of our students. The foods are available in higher quality and make us feel at home. The sports grounds are too large, and students can practice their interests.
detailed_review.Faculty: All the faculty members were highly qualified and knowledgeable. They are very kind and friendly to us. They use native language to teach the concepts, which helps the students better understand the classes. The pass percentage was 99 percent in the previous academic year.

reviews.course: B.E. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: M. Kumarasamy College of Engineering is a really good college.

detailed_review.Placements: M.Kumarasamy College of Engineering has the best placements. This college conducts the maximum placement interviews. Every year, this college brings 10-15 companies for campus placements. Many job opportunities are provided by this college. Salary packages offered in this course range between INR 3-12 LPA.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The college infrastructure is very beautiful. CCTV cameras are installed in this college so nobody can move without a permission in this college. Facilities like that of laboratories and library are made available by the college. The hostel facility provided is good. The food in the mess is hygienic.
detailed_review.Faculty: Our college faculty members are experienced professors. They conduct extracurricular activities every day. They take 8-10 lectures per week. They conduct more practical classes than theoretical. 95% of the students pass in all the exams. This college and it’s course curriculum is excellent.
detailed_review.Other: This college is a reputed engineering college. It conduct cultural events every month. The college has a sports grounds facility for the students. Canteen facilities are also provided by this college.

reviews.course: B.E. in Mechanical Engineering
reviews.review_title: M. Kumarasamy college of engineering is a good college.

detailed_review.Placements: M. Kumarasamy College of Engineering is the best placement college in Karur district. This college placement staff arranges more campus interviews every semester. More than 20 industrial companies provide jobs to students at this college. My batch's 8.0 CGPA student gets an 11 LPA sale package.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: M. Kumarasamy College of Engineering Infrastructure is very awesome. Free Wi-Fi is available at this college campus. More computer labs with internet facilities. The biggest library is also available at this college. Separate hostels with air-conditioned rooms. Mess and canteen foods are very hygienic.
detailed_review.Faculty: The M. Kumarasamy College of Engineering has more courses and departments. So more designed staff are working at this college; they are more qualified and experienced. They are teaching more languages, too. So all students understand the lessons quickly. The student pass percentage is 96%.
detailed_review.Other: This college has volleyball grounds, football grounds, and cricket grounds. More transportation facilities are also available at this college. This college gives more scholarships and certificates to well-studied students.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in CSE (Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning)
reviews.review_title: Good infrastructure, good faculty members and placements.

detailed_review.Placements: More than 90% of the students get placed in our college, and internship offers are also well used by the students. The average package is about 4.6 lacs. The highest salary is 26 lacs per annum. The top recruiting companies are CTS, TCS, L&T, and Infosys.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Every classroom has a projector for easy understanding through PPT, and first-year classes have smart classes for better understanding. The food in the canteen and mess is really good, and the food in the canteen is affordable for all students and tastes good.
detailed_review.Faculty: 50% is the pass percentage, and students who have basic knowledge about the subject can easily pass the exams. The semester question papers are tough, but with the help of our staff during exams, we clear the doubts and get confident to face the end-of-semester examination.
detailed_review.Other: Each department often organizes various events, fostering stronger connections among students.

reviews.course: B.E. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: Mostly satisfied with the teaching and placement.

detailed_review.Placements: More than 70% of the students got placement by top recruiters like TCS, Wipro, Accenture, Cognizant, HCL, and so on. The top roles offered were software associate, software engineer, data analyst, DevOps engineer, cloud engineer, and so on. The highest salary offered was 14 LPA, the average salary offered was 4-6 LPA, and the lowest salary offered was around 3 LPA. The students need to find internships on their own and according to my knowledge, only 5–10% of the students got internships at companies like HCL and Wipro.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The college does not provide any Wi-Fi facilities, but the classrooms are well maintained and the labs are also considered to be good. It has a separate library with a lot of books available for student reference. The hostel is not properly maintained and the food quality is awful. Most of the hostellers eat canteen food but that too is average. The college has some basic medical facilities and does not give much importance to sports.
detailed_review.Faculty: The teachers are highly qualified but most of the teachers only teach what is in the textbook. Most of the teachers do not give practical sessions or live examples. But the style of teaching is easily understandable. The semester exams are difficult and it is quite hard to get a pass mark. The pass percentage is 40%.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in CSE (Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning)
reviews.review_title: We achieved enviable placement records in 2022 with 1150+offers.

detailed_review.Placements: In our college, the institution gives 1st priority for placements. There are many reputed companies recruited many students in every year. The Department of Training and placements envisages to train each learner as a successful person by giving competencies training to help the individual to be employed.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Infrastructure was good. The hostel for boys and girls was well furnished and sophisticated. The food was provided was good. Artificial Intelligence combines artificial intelligence and machines learning solutions to develop and deploy reliable and scalable data solutions.
detailed_review.Faculty: Our faculty members were well talented and knowledge. And the curriculum was more interesting to study. The of conducting exams was awesome. All faculty members would be friendly with the students. All of them are conservative. Pass mark is about 50% but our teachers train us to aim 75% and above.

reviews.course: B.E. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: Our college has good placements and academics but not satisfied with the infrastructure.

detailed_review.Placements: From the third year, we can avail of placements from 3rd year and guidance to crack the exams. Around 30 companies visit our college for recruitment. Training is given by reputed companies for placements. We usually have 3 months of training for aptitude and communication skills. As it is an autonomous college, we have a separate syllabus for aptitude every semester.
detailed_review.Faculty: Faculty members are well-experienced and knowledgeable. All faculty members are post-graduates. Exams are conducted very well. If we study well, we can score good marks. Every day, the classes will start at 8:40 AM sharp. There are 5 internal exams in each semester. We have to submit 5 assignments for each semester. Every year, project expos and tech expos are conducted to help the students get new ideas by doing projects. Every week, we have to do a seminar to increase our confidence.
detailed_review.Other: I chose this course because of my interest in it.

reviews.course: B.E. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: Good college to study and for career, placement record is ultimate.

detailed_review.Placements: The placements as a fresher is good in this college. Top most IT giants like TCS, CTS, Wipro, Zoho and some other companies is giving excellent number in their recruitment process. So the placement is good. In other hand, Core companies also come and give good numbers.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Infrastructure wise the college is good. The main library, playground, and three hostels are present inside the campus. Canteen is good. Gym facility also there. For games, they have separate court, kits and separate PET Masters. Mess is also good.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teaching faculty members are good and friendly to the students. They conduct exam for every month. Exam system is good. The courses in this college is attractive. Mainly CS and IT is good in this college.
detailed_review.Other: I chose CSE, it is good in this college. Because the placements they given is good numbers. So IT related course is good in this college. I too recommend IT related course for the new students.

reviews.course: B.E. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: Satisfied with our college.

detailed_review.Placements: Placement are good at the college. Almost all the students are placed every year to their preferable companies. Students and teachers work very hard together to crack the placements. Teachers are hardworking and provide good mentorship with students. So they can approach faculty any time.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Infrastructure of college was good, the buildings Are good and there are separate floors for each department. There are 20-30 class in every floor, the hostel are also good in infrastructure but the taste and quality of food was average, in our college they maintain very strict attendance.
detailed_review.Faculty: They provide sufficient material to refer for each subject that helps us to get good marks in exam. We have projectors in each class room that help the students to visualize the lesson so that we can learn the topic easily, we conduct monthly test to check our knowledge.

reviews.course: B.E. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: I am satisfied with this college because of its infrastructure and department organisation.

detailed_review.Placements: Almost 100% of students got placed in our course. The highest salary package offered is 8.4 LPA. The average salary package offered is 5.6 LPA. The lowest salary package offered is 3.4 LPA. Top recruiting companies are TCS, Wipro, CTS, Kaar, Vuram, Mindtree, and Sopra Steria. Almost 90% of students got internships at Zoho, Kaar, and Vuram. Every company that visits our college examines students' skills rather than grades.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The infrastructure of our college is well-organised and well-managed. The hostel facilities are well-organised and well-maintained. Our department has excellent lab and Wi-Fi facilities. We are motivated to learn apart from academics to enhance our knowledge.
detailed_review.Faculty: Our teachers are well-educated. They are well-trained to educate us. They are being instructive towards academics and building blocks. Semester exams are challenging as papers are designed to test our knowledge and understanding rather than book terms.
detailed_review.Other: All engineering courses pave way for various categories. This course paves way for the protection of user data and privacy. It enhances the user to utilise any technology efficiently.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Information Technology
reviews.review_title: Our college provides good placements.

detailed_review.Placements: Almost 80% of students got placed in our course. From our batch, around 5 students got selected for Kaar Technologies. Internships are also offered in this course. Top recruiting companies are Infosys, IBM, TCS, CTS, Tech Mahindra, Zoho, etc.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: All facilities are available in our college. Wi-Fi is available on campus. Laboratory and library are also well-maintained. There is no Wi-Fi facility in the hostel. The food served in the hostel is average. Washing machine facilities are provided.
detailed_review.Faculty: Semester exam fee is paid through the CAMS website. The pass percentage is 50 out of 100. This course is excellent, and our syllabus is better.
detailed_review.Other: Our college should improve the washrooms and auditorium hall. Boys are allowed to come dressed professionally on Wednesdays with clean shaved faces. We can also pay college fees online.

reviews.course: B.E. in Mechanical Engineering
reviews.review_title: Our campus life is very good.

detailed_review.Placements: Placements were good in our college. The top recruiting companies were TCS, CTS, Wipro, and mechanical companies like Roots, Lakshmi, Bhavani Industry, etc. The training was provided to students for placements.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The food served in the hostel was good. The hostel was strict and after 8.00 PM students cannot go outside. Our campus was Wi-Fi enabled. There was a big library.
detailed_review.Faculty: Faculty members were knowledgeable. The teaching method was good so that we can understand the concepts easily. Semester exams were conducted strictly. Our course curriculum made students ready for the industry.

faqs.question: How do I get a seat at M Kumarasamy College of Engineering?
faqs.answer: To secure a seat at M Kumarasamy College of Engineering, students can check the following steps presented below:

faqs.question: Who is eligible for M.Kumarasamy College of Engineering admission?
faqs.answer: In order to enroll for admission to various courses at M.Kumarasamy College of Engineering, candidates must complete the last educational qualification set by the college. Students can check course-wise eligibility from the table presented below:

faqs.question: What is the last date to apply for M Kumarasamy College of Engineering admission?
faqs.answer: M Kumarasamy College of Engineering admissions are open online. Till now, no schedule has been released by the college. Since the application portal is live, candidates can apply online for their preferred course. The college offers four courses in various streams such as Engineering, Management, etc.

faqs.question: Is there any entrance exam for admission to BTech course at M Kumarasamy College of Engineering?
faqs.answer: In order to apply for the BTech course at M Kumarasamy College of Engineering, candidates must pass Class 12 with PCM. For admission to BTech course at M.Kumarasamy College of Engineering, students need to fulfil the minimum eligibility criteria in the first place. The selection criteria for this course is merit-based + TNEA counselling and candidates must pass Class 12. Candidates who still need to complete Class 12 are eligible for admission.

faqs.question: What is the total tuition fee for BTech course at M.Kumarasamy College of Engineering?
faqs.answer: The total tuition fee for the BTech course at M.Kumarasamy College of Engineering is INR 2 lakh. Apart from the tuition fee aspirants might also have to pay a one-time, registration fee etc. However, the tuition fee varies as per course specialisation. However, aspirants should pass Class 12 with a 45% aggregate.

faqs.question: Is there any entrance exam for admission to MBA at M.Kumarasamy College of Engineering?
faqs.answer: Yes, the selection criteria for this course is the state-level entrance exam Tamil Nadu Common Entrance Test. The college provides a full-time, two-year MBA course. To enrol for the MBA course at M.Kumarasamy College of Engineering, candidates should meet the last educational qualification set by the college. Students should complete graduation with 50% aggregate to meet the eligibility for MBA admission.

faqs.question: Who is eligible for MBA admission at M.Kumarasamy College of Engineering?
faqs.answer: For admission in a MBA programme at M.Kumarasamy College of Engineering, it is crucial that the aspirant fulfills the course-specific eligibility criteria. Thus, only the asiprants who have passed graduation with at least 50% aggregate are eligible for admission. In addition, student should have passed the qualifying examination from a recognised board. Candidate must also hold the graduation mark sheet during application form filling and at the time of admission for verification purposes.

faqs.question: Can I get direct admission to MCA at M.Kumarasamy College of Engineering?
faqs.answer: For MCA course admission, candidates must meet the eligibility criteria set by the college. Aspirants should pass graduation with 50% aagregate. The admission criteria for the course is TANCET, AMIE Exam. Apart from this, the total tuition fee for MCA course is INR 35,000. However, students might also have to pay other fee components such as one-time, registration fee etc. For more details, students can visit the official website.

faqs.question: Is MCA available at M.Kumarasamy College of Engineering?
faqs.answer: Yes, MCA course is available at M.Kumarasamy College of Engineering. MKCE offers two-year MCA course divided into four semesters. The college is affiliated with Anna University. In order to be eligible for the award of the degree the candidate shall successfully complete the course in a maximum period of two years from the date of enrolment for the first semester of the course. Candidates must pass graduation with 50% aggregate to apply for MCA course.

faqs.question: How to apply online for various courses at M.Kumarasamy College of Engineering admisison?
faqs.answer: Candidates can apply online for UG and PG courses at MKCE . Below are the application steps to apply for courses at the M.Kumarasamy College of Engineering: Step one: Visit the official website, i.e., mkce.ac.in Step two: Click on 'Apply Now' on the Home page. Step three: Register with the basic details such as mobile number, valid email ID etc. to generate login credentials. Step four: Login to fill out the application form. Step five: Upload the documents and pay the application fee. Step six: Submit the application form.

college_info.college_name: MITS Colleges: Courses, Fees, Admission 2025, Placements, Reviews

highlights.summary: Madanapalle Institute of Technology and Science (also known as MITS Colleges) is a private institute, established in 1998 in Chittoor, Andhra Pradesh. MITS Colleges is approved by AICTE and offers a total of 30 courses at UG, PG and Doctorate levels in 10 specialisations such as Artificial Intelligence & Machine Learning, Chemical Engineering, Civil Engineering, Computer Science Engineering and Electrical Engineering. Furthermore, it offer courses such as B.E. / B.Tech, M.E./M.Tech, MBA/PGDM, MCA and After 10th Diploma in Full Time mode. MITS Colleges fee structure includes a total tuition fee ranging from INR 46,500 to 4,65,000. MITS Colleges has an annual seat intake of 3582 for all the programmes. It offers courses, in streams such as Engineering, Business & Management Studies and IT & Software. As per the recent MITS Colleges placement records, the average median salary at the Institute is around INR 4,52,727. The institute has a safe and well-equipped campus with all the advanced facilities.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: Our college is very good for placement cracking.

detailed_review.Placements: Most of the students are getting placed in our college, and many companies like giving high packages will come to our college. Most of the students get internship, and every student focuses on skills and problem solving. The highest package in the previous year is 23.5LPA.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Madanapalle Institute of Technology and Science is providing very good and excellent facilities of labs, classrooms, gym, sports, and have seperate sports club in my college. Our college supports students who are interested in sports and I do not belong to the college hostel.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers are qualified and knowledgeable. They are trained Ph.D. done faculty. Semester exams are very easy in my college, the pass marks for semester exams are 40 marks for every student. The faculty teaching is excellent and I liked the way of teaching students.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: Good campus life with decent placements and supportive faculty.

detailed_review.Placements: I am from B. Tech batch of Madanapalle Institute of Technology & Science, Madanapalle. Around 70–75 percent students got placed. The highest package was about 12 LPA, the lowest around 3 LPA, average nearly 4–4.5 LPA. Companies like TCS, Infosys, Wipro came. Nearly 60 percent students got internships as software roles.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Our course department has good classrooms, Wi-Fi, computer labs with needed software, and a big library with books and digital access. Hostels are clean, food is average but okay. Canteen is decent. Medical help is available. Sports grounds and indoor games are also there.
detailed_review.Faculty: The teachers are supportive and have good subject knowledge. They are qualified and clear doubts properly. Teaching is easy to understand. The course syllabus is useful and gives basic industry knowledge. Semester exams are manageable. Most students pass, with nearly 85–90 percent results.
detailed_review.Other: I am from B. Tech batch at MITS, Madanapalle. I chose this course for good job chances and interest in technology. Best part is practical learning and placements. It can improve with more industry training. College fests are good, campus crowd is friendly, surroundings are peaceful, buses are available, scholarships and activities are supported.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science Technology
reviews.review_title: Satisfied to study at MITS.

detailed_review.Placements: 80% of the students got placed in 2025. In my batch specifically, in my course, nearly 60% of the students got placed. The highest package offered is 7 LPA, while the lowest package offered is 3-4 LPA. The average package offered is 5 LPA. The top recruiting companies are Accenture, Cognizant, Wipro, Knowledge Lens, LTI Mindtree, and other companies that provide jobs and internships for students.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Our college has good infrastructure. The college has Wi-Fi facilities for the students in the college premises, and we also have a library. The classrooms are digitalized, and the labs are very good. The college hostel building is very beautiful, and the atmosphere is good for staying, but the only problem is that the college is not inside the campus. Apart from that, everything is good.
detailed_review.Faculty: All the teachers are qualified, and their way of teaching is good. You can learn with practical examples, and the placement training they provide is very good. The course curriculum is relevant, and it makes the students industry-ready. Semester exams are not difficult; you can pass easily, but you need to put in a little effort to score a good percentage.

The highest package is about 12 LPA, the lowest around 3 LPA, average nearly 4–4.5 LPA. Companies like TCS, Infosys, Wipro came. Nearly 60 percent students got internships as software roles.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Our course department has good classrooms, Wi-Fi, computer labs with needed software, and a big library with books and digital access. Hostels are clean, food is average but okay. Canteen is decent. Medical help is available. Sports grounds and indoor games are also there.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering (Data Science)
reviews.review_title: I am satisfied, but some pressure due to the many courses offered by the college staff.

detailed_review.Placements: Placements are better than those at other colleges. Many recruiters visit this college for placements. Yearly, 50 to 60% of PG students get placed easily. Wipro, Tech Mahindra, Cognizant, Asse Ture, Infosys, TCS, and CTS, and Mahindra are the companies that regularly visit.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: MITS has a well-established campus with multiple academic blocks. Along with modern labs and workshops, a two-floor library, Wi-Fi, separate hostels, sports grounds, an auditorium, and medical/transport facilities.
detailed_review.Faculty: MITS follows the autonomous curriculum (affiliated earlier to JNTU-Anantapur, now autonomous). The syllabus is outcome-based (OBE) and aligned with industry and higher studies. Regular updates are done in CSE, AI, IT, IoT, and Cyber Security branches compared to older universities.
detailed_review.Other: It is best for students who want to be placed in campus drives. Overall reviews describe the physical infrastructure as good. The hostel, food, and placement experiences vary by department and batch.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering (Artificial Intelligence )
reviews.review_title: I am not satisfied with placements, but overall, the college is good.

detailed_review.Placements: Placement rates generally range between 75-85% for eligible students. The highest package is 6 LPA, and some reports it ranges from 24-30 LPA, but those likely refer to outlier roles or selective specializations. The average package is 5 LPA. It generally ranges between 4-6 LPA, depending on the branch and year.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Our college has good infrastructure, but not as good as other institutions. It is good for the money we are spending now. There are more functions and programs, which are not bad. Overall, it is good. In college, the hostel is not good, but PGs are good outside.
detailed_review.Faculty: All teachers are qualified and knowledgeable. Their teaching quality is good. The course curriculum is relevant, and it makes students industry-ready. Semester exams are good and not more difficult. The pass percentage is also quite good. Faculty members are good.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Electronics and Communication Engineering
reviews.review_title: It is a good institute to gain knowledge.

detailed_review.Placements: In our college, approximately 90 percent of students get placed in different companies like TCS, Wipro, etc., every year. The highest package offered is 44 LPA, and the average package ranges from 5-6 LPA. The lowest package offered in our college ranges from 3.5-4 LPA. 75 percent of students got internships in companies like TCS, Wipro, etc. Roles like software engineering, cloud analysts, etc., are offered.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The college provides Wi-Fi facility for students, which is important while conducting placement drives. There are modern labs with advanced equipment. The library and classrooms are digital and very useful to students and faculty members. The mess food is hygienic. An emergency medical award with a doctor is available. Sports club is there for students to encourage them in sports.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers are well-educated. They are M.Tech qualified, PhD holders, and doctorates from famous institutions. The teaching quality is very good. The course curriculum is very relevant to industry knowledge. They will train us to reach the industry level and to get jobs in our areas of interest. Exams are not that difficult, and the pass percentage is 35 percent.
detailed_review.Other: I chose the electronics and communication engineering course because it is very interesting to learn various and modern technology-based knowledge in the field of communication. There is an event called ASHV, which is celebrated every year in February, and it is a two-day state-level program. Famous celebrities are invited, and they will share their experience with us to get more awareness. The campus environment is very peaceful with lots of various trees, which makes us feel relieved.

reviews.review_title: The college has a good environment with good placements and knowledge for students.

detailed_review.Placements: In our college, approximately 85-95 percent of students got placed in different companies. The highest package offered is 44 LPA, and the lowest package ranges from 3.5-4 LPA. The average package ranges from 5-6 LPA. The top recruiting companies for our course are TCS, Wipro, Cognizant, Infosys, etc. In our college, approximately 75 percent of students got internships in companies like TCS, Wipro, and Infosys. Software engineer, cloud analyst, and other roles are offered in our college.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: We have several facilities like 24x7 Wi-Fi, RO water, modern labs with advanced equipment, digital libraries, and classrooms. Our college encourages students in sports and makes them more talented by giving training with the PET teacher.

Every faculty member takes more care of backward students and helps them understand the subject. The course curriculum is relevant and industry-based. Every three years, they will update the curriculum to teach industry-level knowledge. In our college, highly qualified facilities are available with M.Tech, PhD, and doctoral degrees from famous institutes.
detailed_review.Other: I chose electronics and communication engineering at our college. This is the best course to gain knowledge and subject knowledge. ECE is the evergreen course, and it will never go out of style. Event organisation is also good in our college. There is an event called ASHV, which is a 2-day state-level event. For this event, big celebrities will come, and they will share their experiences with us.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: I chose it because my faculty is good.

Top recruiting companies are Infosys, Cognizant, and Tech Mahindra. 75 percent got internships. The top role offered is an artificial engineer.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The facilities are very good, and the infrastructure of our college is nice. Our college provides different facilities like Wi-Fi, classrooms, library, and canteen. The food in the canteen is nice, with our reasonable prices, and the quantity of food is also very good. There is a stationery store in our college.

Top recruiters include TCS, Infosys, Wipro, HCL, Accenture, Cognizant, etc. About 40-50 percent of students got internships mostly through companies like TCS iON, local startups, and campus-like firms. Top roles offered are software developer, analyst, support engineer, tester, and data-related roles.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The campus has good Wi-Fi, clean classrooms, well-equipped labs, and a resourceful library. Hostel facilities are average, food in the mess is okay while the canteen is better. Basic medical help is available and sports grounds and equipment are decent.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers are generally helpful, qualified, and clear in their explanations. Teaching quality is decent and supportive. The curriculum is fairly relevant and helps build industry-ready skills. Semester exams are moderate in difficulty and the pass percentage is usually high.
detailed_review.Other: I chose this course because it matches my interests and offers strong career opportunities. The best parts are the practical labs, supportive faculty, and good learning resources. I wish the course had more industry projects and updated tools. The campus has active fests and events, a friendly crowd, good connectivity, and decent surroundings. Scholarships and extracurricular activities are available and helpful for overall development.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in CSE(Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning)
reviews.review_title: The worst college I joined. I regret it. Teachers just read lies from online sites without teaching.

detailed_review.Placements: In my CSE (AI & ML) 2028 batch, about 50% of students get placed. Packages range from 1 LPA to 4.5 LPA, and the average is 2–2.5 LPA. Wipro is a main recruiter. Around 20–30% get internships in startups. The top role is Software Engineer.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Our department facilities are very poor with no Wi-Fi and faculty who just read online content. There is no hostel in the university and PG food is the worst. The campus has no sports, no cleanliness, and no trees, so students walk in the sun without shade. The worst college.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers just read content from online sites and lack real knowledge. The course does not make students industry ready. The semester exams are moderate in difficulty. The overall pass percentage stays around 40–50%. Teachers have no content themselves.
detailed_review.Other: There is nothing best in my course because they are teaching the same subjects and course to all the branches. I wish to change faculty. There are some extracurricular activities but our department HODs do not give permission for attendance.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in CSE(Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning)
reviews.review_title: College is overall good. Not satisfied with my curriculum.

detailed_review.Placements: About 65% of students got placed. The highest package is 23 LPA, the average is 5 LPA, and the lowest is 6 LPA. Top recruiting companies are Deloitte, Infosys, Accenture, and MindTree. Roles offered are backend developer roles, full-stack roles, and data science. Almost 90% of students got internships through college help.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The infrastructure design is not too modern, it just looks good. Provides Wi-Fi for free. We have 2 libraries, playgrounds, several labs equipped with good enough computers, a variety of labs, and a startup incubation cell. One decently maintained canteen with a variety of food. Also, Xerox shops inside the campus and near the campus. The hostel provides a decent quality of living. Good food, snacks. No need to travel to the hostel for lunch. It is provided in the canteen.
detailed_review.Faculty: Only 50% faculty in every department are talented. Few faculty are talented, the rest are trash. There are internal mid exams, internal lab, and external exams. They teach core subjects for the 2nd year only. In the first year, they have one programming language in the curriculum. Some faculty support students to actively take part in technical competitions. Its curriculum is being changed. They are planning to move on to a better curriculum to handle current industry standards. They are taking the help of college successful alumni.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Civil Engineering
reviews.review_title: The best college in Andhra Pradesh for middle-class people.

detailed_review.Placements: There are nearly 80% of people placed in my department, and the highest package was around 29.5 LPA, and the lowest package was around 2.5 LPA. The top companies were IBM, Bharath, etc. Almost 100% of students got an internship in different platforms like Code Tech, Code Soft and slash mark. The role is a civil engineer who constructs and designs the infrastructure of anything.
detailed_review.Infrastructure:
Well, very good lab systems and equipment were there, which are used for civil engineering, and there were more advanced systems and equipment. 
To use, there are 4 libraries in college, among them one is the biggest central library. 
Well, good and hygienic food was available in the mess and canteen, good medical facilities and good sports and games.
detailed_review.Faculty: There were highly qualified professionals on the college staff. They completed their Master's and PGs in highly ranked and top colleges, and in another university, and they were very friendly to us, and they make new students industry to market, and it is very difficult to pass without studying.
detailed_review.Other:
I like the course civil engineering, and I like the construction field, so I selected this field.
They need to conduct more festivals and events for students to decrease their stress levels.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Mechanical Engineering
reviews.review_title: Everything is very good in our college.

detailed_review.Placements: There are more chances of getting placed in MITS, you just have to study a little hard during placement times. The college should always have the mindset to place a student in any company according to their requirements. Skills should be learned enough, and we will get placed.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: In the college premises, everything seems to be good. College hostels and food are very good. The infrastructure of the college is very nice and attractive. Every block has separate engineering branches, so we can go according to our department.
detailed_review.Faculty: Very good qualified teachers. Semester exams are a bit more difficult. If we study as per the curriculum, we can get good marks. In college, there are mid exams and semester exams. First mid exams go well, and in the second mid, they start mid articles. Semester exams are at the same timings.
detailed_review.Other: This college gives you a good vibe of the environment. Mine is Mechanical Engineering. This course gives hands-on experience and opportunities to get into core companies. Compared to other branches, it is a bit tougher, but in the future, we will be at high standards.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Information Technology
reviews.review_title: Satisfied with faculty, good place to enjoy campus life.

detailed_review.Placements: About 70% of the students are placed from my course. Average package of 3-4 LPA is offered from my course. Many top MNCs like Infosys, Deloitte, TCS, etc. participated in the drive, almost every student should participate in the internship, so we can say that internship is mandatory for the students to participate in placements.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Facilities and infrastructure is very good in our college, and they are still trying to improve it further, developing it. The labs and classrooms are very well constructed. Library is also very well established with many books and huge collections present. But when it comes to college rooms, they are very clean, but food needs to be improved.
detailed_review.Faculty: Faculty are very friendly with us, the students, and have vast knowledge of the subject they are teaching about. Their curriculum also helps us get ready for real-time industry exposure. The difficulty of exams is moderate, which means if we study, we can definitely crack them.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering (Data Science)
reviews.review_title: It was ok, definitely do not prefer our college because you are not getting any placement.

detailed_review.Placements: Not many companies visit our college. There are no company visits to our college, but they will say that outside companies are coming to our college, and we are getting good placements. They will show that, but it is nothing. There is no campus messenger.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The college is good. There is a canteen, and the food is not much better. It is not nice. The costs of the food is very high compared to outside but the coffe is nice snacks or okay but the food problem is very costly and can't afford it was not work leave leave
detailed_review.Faculty: Some teachers are good and some are not nice. They don't help us with many things, and they will hesitate to teach. We cannot wait for good marks. If you write the correct answer, they will fail you, and you will have to write a supply exam

highlights.summary:
MSU University Baroda has been ranked 201-300 by NIRF 2025 under the Engineering category, 18th under the Law by The Week, & 46 under the Pharmacy category by NIRF 2025 . Maharaja Sayajirao University of Baroda, through 38 academic institutes, 111 departments, etc has UG, PG, and other courses to students. These courses are provided across the Law, Science, Commerce, and various other streams. MS University Baroda is accredited with A+ Grade by NAAC. Maharaja Sayajirao University has experienced faculty members. MS University Baroda India faculty are quite good and skilled. Some of the newly launched M S University's Polytechnic College courses include integrated Diploma-Degree courses. These courses have already received accreditation from NBA. These five diploma courses are Civil, Mechanical, Electrical, Petrochemical Technology and Information Technology.
MS University Vadodara provides BTech/ B.E., MBA/PGDM and BSc as flagship courses. The Maharaja Sayajirao University of Baroda (MSU University Vadodara) has state-of-the-art infra with multiple facilities available for students. The MS University of Baroda has various facilities available for students like a big library, sports and fitness facilities, and others. college_info_program.intro:
The Maharaja Sayajirao University of Baroda Vadodara (university of baroda) has BTech/B.E. , MBA, and BSc as popular programmes. The main objective of the MSU University Baroda is to provide fundamental knowledge of Computer Science and Engg. The students are taught ethical attitudes, professionalism, and soft skills. MS University in Baroda BTech and BSc students are placed in top companies such as Standard Radiators Pvt. Ltd., Caparo India Pvt. Ltd., and others. The MSUniversity of Baroda students can become Researchers or Teachers or can take up various job roles as per their preference. The MS University of Baroda (Maharaja Sayajirao Baroda) students can take up non-technical jobs in fields like Sales, Marketing, etc. Below mentioned are some of the MS University Vadodara courses & MBA fees in MSU Baroda:
