Cummins College Reviews on Placements, Faculty & Facilities

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Electronics and Telecommunication Engineering
reviews.review_title: Overall review of Cummins College.

detailed_review.Placements: The placements are excellent. Being an all-girls college, the crowd is smart and awesome, too. B.Tech in ENTC has good placements too, but the thing is you have to make a choice between software and hardware or both, and then keep working on it asap. Maintain your CGPA.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The campus is a little small, but overall, the vibe is good. Also, there's a college hostel provided, but it's not available for locals. The food in the hostel is average, and no breakfast is provided. You'll get to learn a lot of things, and there are many hostel facilities apart from this too.
detailed_review.Faculty: Faculty is experienced and after all you've to do and put efforts on your own only. Seniors are very helpful, and there are 3 exam patterns in our college. T1, T2, and the end-semester examinations are conducted. You've to maintain your CGPA to remain among the top students and bag opportunities.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Electronics and Telecommunication Engineering
reviews.review_title: We have good teachers who help you all the time; we have good placements almost every year.

detailed_review.Placements: In my course, more than 80% of students got placed. The highest package is 50 LPA, the average is 13.5 LPA, and the lowest is 3.5 LPA. The top recruiting companies are Google, Microsoft, Wells Fargo, and SAP. The percentage of students who got internships was 40%, which were at Texas Instruments. The top roles offered are data analytics, embedded design, and SDE roles.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The facilities provided by the college are good. Wi-Fi and smart classrooms, which have projectors or sensor boards, are available. The college also provides reading and discussion halls for studying. The library has good books for different subjects and also offers other books for reading. I am a local student, so I don't go to the hostel.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers are very helpful. They take tutorials in batches. The quality of teaching is very good. They use different methods, like think-pair-share activities, to make the lessons enjoyable. The course curriculum is relevant and makes students industry-ready. Semester exams are of a moderate level and are application-based.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Information Technology
reviews.review_title: Four year course in the college located at Pune.

detailed_review.Placements: The college shares a wide range of opportunities and also shares information about the usage of the job platform to grab the best offers. Apart from inviting various companies with the highest packages, they concentrate on providing various skills training that would be retained for a long time in everyone's memory. The moderate package would range between 3.5 LPA and 7.8 LPA.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Even after graduation, alumni are invited to the college once every 5 years, and create a good bond with the alumni and the students of the current year. College is updated with the newer technology, with better coordination, which is highly appreciated.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers are simply decision makers, while we follow their decisions. In our department, few of the teachers are good at teaching. But a few of them are not good at teaching, they won't even prepare for teaching classes. They casually come to the class, read the books, and move out when the bell rings.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Instrumentation and Control Engineering
reviews.review_title: Massive moderate companies arrived for placements.

detailed_review.Placements: I got placed in the company of IFM Electronic with a very minimal package of 3.1 LPA. I got this offer by undergoing the pressure training given by the college. Later this job didn't work out for me for long, but with such experience, I joined Omron Electronics with a good package.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: College is a demonstration for all colleges, so all courses are offered at better standards. This college shaped the lives of thousands of students in a good way. There will be a lot of resources available for studying which would be accessible to all students studying over here.
detailed_review.Faculty: All the credit that has been attained by students in examinations by the massive support of teachers and the results of our hard work. Teachers speak well to students without showing any differentiations and partiality. Many students cleared their exams in the first class.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Electronics and Telecommunication Engineering
reviews.review_title: I would recommend this course in our college.

detailed_review.Placements: Students have a lot of career opportunities in areas of semiconductor zones, electronics, information technologies, telecommunication, and automotive areas. Toyota Motors, BMW groups, Nokia network, and Reliance are some of the companies providing active offers to the students.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The college has a higher tendency to hold a massive number of students. College have their own standards to compete with any other colleges around them. Usually, college management forces the students to participate in all the inter-college competitions happening around.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers are so knowledgeable and help us to develop various projects under their mentorship. In some projects, we need some more guidance for completing it successfully but in such critical times, teachers refer the industrial professionals for completing the project successfully.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Engineering
reviews.review_title: B.Tech in Computer Engineering.

detailed_review.Placements: The placement office is so familiar with various recruiters across the college and invites them yearly for recruitment. They are connected with various multinational companies by paying them some charges for recruitment. Some of the companies like Microsoft, Apple, and IBM.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: College supports students' interests and helps us in our elevation to the next level. If we face any problems in the hostels, like water scarcity, nutrient-poor foods, we should immediately report to the specified representative appointed in the hostel. The fees charged for accommodation in hostels are undoubtedly expensive.
detailed_review.Faculty: The teacher strictly follows the management decisions blindly without showing any concern for the students. They won't allow us to participate in any other activities other than academics. They also ask us to write an apology letter for everything and fill it in the reports.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Information Technology
reviews.review_title: Review of Cummins College of Engineering for Women, Pune.

detailed_review.Placements: Comment College of Engineering for Women creates challenging women leaders, and entrepreneurs in various lead positions. The package offered to the department of Information Technology was higher than other disciplines. The top corporate IT sectors provide various opportunities to us.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: College gave priority to producing determined students with dignity and self-discipline. The college also arranges funds for the students who are involved in searching and other social activities. Roaming here and there on the college campus without any proper reasons leads to punishment.
detailed_review.Faculty: Instead of ranking cars, this management had introduced report cars for each and every student from all the disciplines. Our internal grades, extracurricular performance, and sports achievements are entered into the card for analyzing our performance and suggesting some advice for improvisation.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Mechanical Engineering
reviews.review_title: The college is good for placements and academics.

detailed_review.Placements: Top companies like Cargill and Lidl Stiftung are involved in the recruitment process of our college for our disciplines. There are multiple options available for the students in our college after completing the courses. Even our college arranges abroad opportunities for the students who excel in their academics.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: It’s a standardized college providing excellent education to thousands of students. The college creates a vintage feel with proper guidance provided to all the students. There are automatic cafes and other setups arranged for the benefit of the students.
detailed_review.Faculty: While teachers are as young as the students. They have a mature understanding of life. They want students to behave like flowing water instead of staying somewhere like stagnant water. Teachers have a generous heart and forgive the actions of the students with a good heart.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Engineering
reviews.review_title: Studying CSE at Cummins College is my journey.

detailed_review.Placements: Cummins is a good college for placements. The placement cell works with many companies for the on-campus placements. Students usually get offers between 4 LPA to 8 LPA. Many seniors also get placed in good companies, which gives confidence to current students.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The college has a nice campus for the CSE course. There is Wi-Fi all over the campus. Labs, library, and canteen are also there. These things are in good condition and helpful for students. Classrooms are clean and have projectors for better learning. The hostel and many sports activities, too, like cricket, football, and indoor games. Students can enjoy and relax after classes.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers are helpful and always ready to help. Teachers are experienced in the teaching field. They teach well and have good knowledge. They give both theory and practical knowledge. The course is useful and helps students get ready for jobs. In every semester, 3 exams are taken for CSE. Notes and study material are also given by teachers, which help during exams.
detailed_review.Other: The college organizes seminars and workshops to improve skills. Overall, it is a good place to learn and grow. Multiple fests and extracurricular activities are organized for students.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Engineering
reviews.review_title: Placements, infrastructure, and teachers of Cummins College are excellent.

detailed_review.Placements: The college has ideal on-campus placements every year. Students get good placement opportunities with proper support from the placement cell. From the 6th semester, placement drives start in the college. Many IT companies visit our college for on-campus placements. Top roles offered are web developer, app developer, cloud engineer, etc. Satisfied with the placements of the college.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Our college has a well-maintained and developed infrastructure for the CSE course. The college has Wi-Fi on the entire campus. Labs, library, canteen, etc. Facilities are also available for students. The quality of the offered facilities is really good. Various types of sports and facilities are available.
detailed_review.Faculty: Of course, teachers are qualified and knowledgeable at this college. They help and support each and every student. The quality of teaching is decent. Both practical and theoretical knowledge are provided to students. The course curriculum of the college for CSE is relevant and makes students industry ready. Tough exams are conducted in each semester.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Information Technology
reviews.review_title: Supportive teachers, excellent placements (2023-24), great infrastructure, and holistic growth.

detailed_review.Placements: Cummins College is one of the best colleges in terms of placements. The highest package is around 50 LPA. The lowest is around 5 LPA - 4 LPA. The average is above 20 LPA. Overall, the placements are the best in this college. Around 85% of students are placed in this college.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Mess food is delicious. Everything is available in the college like Wi-Fi, labs, classrooms, and library. Teachers use the smart boards which are really helpful for us as they make us understand the topic more easily. There are different activities that are done for a better understanding of the topic.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers are very helpful, you can ask them about anything at any time. The course curriculum is relevant and they make the students industry-ready. 90% is the pass percentage of the students. All the courses help us in the real world plus the exams are moderate so anyone can easily understand them.
detailed_review.Other: Everything is best in this college that's why I chose this college and I always wanted to do engineering. There are many events technical as well as cultural and both are best.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Engineering
reviews.review_title: More than satisfied and grateful for having studied at this college.

detailed_review.Placements: 100 companies including the top product-based and service-based offer placements in my college. More than 94% of students get placed. Top recruiting companies are Google, Microsoft, Amazon, Visa, JP Morgan, etc. The lowest package for CS is 6 LPA. The highest is 52 LPA. Top roles offered are SDE, data scientist, etc.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: There are 2 hostels in our college, Baya Karve Hostel and David Hostel. Each has different fees and facilities. For Baya Karve Hostel, the fee is around 1.2 lacks per year and for David, it is 1 lacs per year. For this fee, there are facilities like Wi-Fi, filtered water, and 2-time food. The college campus is very good. There are sophisticated classrooms and labs. Digital learning boards and projectors for teaching purposes are there. Inside the college campus, there is a canteen named Suswad Canteen, the food is average though.
detailed_review.Faculty: The college has an excellent staff which is helpful, friendly, and highly knowledgeable. They are mostly PhD qualified. The curriculum makes students industry-ready as it includes all the recent emerging technology knowledge. The exam level is difficult as it has all level 3 questions of bloom's taxonomy that are application-based questions. The passing criteria are 40% out of a total of 100 (insem+endsem) and 40% in end-sem (20/50).
detailed_review.Other: I chose this branch (comp) honesty for placements. But once I started studying it I developed a keen interest in this field. Things I would like to improve about my course is that adding more programming subjects rather than non-programming like GIS, chemistry, physics, and EG in FY.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Engineering
reviews.review_title: Review of Cummins College of Engineering.

detailed_review.Placements: My course is Computer Engineering, and the average package is between 10 LPA - 15 LPA, while the highest package is 55 LPA. Top companies include Amazon, Flipkart, Google, JP Morgan, and others. The roles offered include Software Engineer, Data Engineer, and AI Engineer.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: There are four buildings, each for Instrumentation, Computer, IT, and Mechanical. Wi-Fi is available in all the classrooms and the library. The canteen offers good food that is hygienic and nutritious. There is also a medical room and a sports playground is provided as well.
detailed_review.Faculty: The faculty is good and well-educated, holding degrees in their respective fields, and they teach very effectively. The course curriculum is up to date with the latest trends, which makes students industry-ready. The semester exams are easy, but you still need to study hard.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Electronics and Telecommunication Engineering
reviews.review_title: Great infrastructure and college placements are provided at Cummins College.

detailed_review.Placements: About 100% of students get placed in college in the internship and placement period. Amazon, Flipkart, ARM, Dell, TCS, Infosys, Microsoft, and Google are the top recruiting companies in our college. The highest salary package offered is 50 LPA, and the lowest salary package offered is 15 LPA.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The hostel facility is very nice. The campus is very nice. It is full of nature and trees. The hostel provides a mess also. Many activities are conducted by the hostel. Every festival is celebrated in the hostel. A mess is very nice and clean. The taste of the food is also nice.
detailed_review.Faculty: The exam pattern is very nice. The syllabus is organised such that many students can get the placements. Faculty members are friendly with students. The course curriculum is very nice.
detailed_review.Other: Sports activities are held by the college. Gandhar is the biggest gathering event and hackathons are also organised by the college. It also conducts extracurricular activities.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Instrumentation and Control Engineering
reviews.review_title: Absolute reality of Cummins staff and the college.

detailed_review.Placements: They don’t guarantee placement and internship, and in my course, it is not there in most of the colleges. So, the companies approaching us for internship and placement are very few, and they select 1-3 candidates maximum. The students’ placement percentage in my particular course would be 30-40%.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: There is Wi-Fi available, and there is a common library. The books that should be added for instrumentation and control engineering are not there; the quantity of books should be increased. The labs are okay, but they also need to improve the performance of the PCs available in the labs.
detailed_review.Faculty: The staff, I would say, are very partial, and they lack knowledge in my field. They provide us with YouTube links, and some of the staff are confused themselves while teaching us the concept. The course curriculum includes old technologies; instead, we should be provided with the latest technologies and skills available.
detailed_review.Other: The course I chose is very interesting, and I’ve also completed my diploma in the same due to my personal interest. There are a sufficient number of events.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Engineering
reviews.review_title: Best Engineering college

detailed_review.Placements: I m in computer branch and highest package is 52 and top recruiting companies are among Deutsche Bank, Citibank Barclays, MasterCard and BNY Mellon. Almost 100% of the students receive placement in our college and 80% of students receive internships and the roles offered are software analyst.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: College has very good library. It has silent zone and is it also has discussion zone. There are different sections such as account section. There are building such as computer building, IT department building, mechanical department building and instrumentation department building. The faculties are very good here.
detailed_review.Faculty: Various club are there such as GDSC and finance clubs with music club cybersecurity club and I will enjoy everything here. Exams are not very difficult, they are decent. There is a lot of scope for personal growth and development. There are various different kinds of club and they can be of your interest as well.
detailed_review.Other: Gandhaar is very good completely lovely and lively event. You get everything here from dramas to dance then singing and a poetry, shayaris, stand up, comedies. Everything is available you can take part in them and win.  It's best like no other.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Engineering
reviews.review_title: It's a great college which help us to learn and grow and be better us

detailed_review.Placements: I am in computer and my batch is excellent. Every classmate is helpful and even seniors are amazing. Top recruiting companies are Microsoft, De Shaw, Adobe, Desutche bank and Microsoft. Even placed 8 students of Cummins, like placement percentage is hundred percent
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Labs and classroom are in great conditions and faculty teaches amazingly. Infrastructure is good and it is beautifully designed. Our college had great sanstha were we get to play various games like volleyball, basketball, football, badminton and many more games.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers are qualified and some are even pursuing PhD. They teach each and every lesson and topic clearly. It's amazing how they teach and clear all out doubt. They pay attention to every student and do not overlook anyone. They teach so good that i love it.
detailed_review.Other: Studies and extracurricular activities go hand in hand.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Electronics and Telecommunication Engineering
reviews.review_title: Relly good placements  pune top 2 college very good supporting faculty and all facilities

detailed_review.Placements: About 83% of the ENTC students are placed with the highest package of CTC 50 LPA and an average package of around 12 LPA. The top recruiting companies are D. E. Shaw, Microsoft, Visa, Wells Fargo, Walmart, JP Morgan, etc. About 75% of the students get internships at top companies such as Amazon, Microsoft, Google, Adobe, etc., using a good CGPA or through hackathons conducted. As the college is autonomous, we get to learn software as well as hardware as ENTC students, so many top roles are offered in the course.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The college is surrounding by lots of trees and greenery with all facilities such as library with reading hall and discussion hall , wifi, all the classrooms have smart panel and projector. There is lab of each subject with all experimental setup. There are three college hostel with good quality of food and wifi. The college gives medical help and encourages in games and sports and also conduct event for sports called pentacle.
detailed_review.Faculty: Cummins college has a very well qualified teaching staff with lot of experience they really help students in each of the difficulty they have. The college focus more on what the student is going to need in professional career and what are they should study. The exams are quite  on the difficult  level but helps to Crack the interviews and learn many things. The college does not have pass percentage but have 22 credits for one year.
detailed_review.Other: ENTC is the branch in which you learn software as well as hardware  which helps to find career options in so many streams of science and technology . The ENTC branch has a bit of difficult core subject  and it then becomes difficult  to manage both hardware as well as software. As Cummins is known for its best placements its also known for if extracurricular  activities, events and fest. The college every year arranges the event Gandhar in which all students enjoy a lot and also a sports event known as pentacle. The college also gives the scholarship to the merit students . The campus has a very nice surrounding  filled with trees and plants.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Engineering
reviews.review_title: Top notch Placements along with great opportunities at Cummins College of engineering Pune.

detailed_review.Placements:
The placements for Cummins are the best in any college in Maharashtra. Microsoft hired 9 people at 50 LPA. If you get in Cummins CSE branch
you can be sure to get into a decent company. They train you so well and make you industry ready in 4 years. Near about 100% students got placed.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The college campus is not very big but the area is the very center of Pune so everything is feasible and pricing are decent as well. There is a lot of greenery all around the campus. Amazing environment for study. The faculty is very motivated and always there to help you.
detailed_review.Faculty: It is an Autonomous college hence the syllabus is great and faculty are friendly and very knowledgeable. The coding culture is amazing too. Semester exams are not that difficult. You just have to be consistent with your study schedule. There are a lot of opportunities for students to explore in the form of clubs and teams.
detailed_review.Other: As per location, it is the best college because all hackathons and events are easily accessible here.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Mechanical Engineering
reviews.review_title: Absolutely satisfied with the college curriculum and opportunities.

detailed_review.Placements: Nearly 100% students were placed last year. Highest package was 54 LPA and lowest was 6 or 7 LPA and top recruiting company for mech is Boeing. Nearly everyone got internship as much as I know.  Top roles offered depends on branch to branch and the field we choose to go.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Infrastructure is very minimalistic and nature worthy wifi library is the best. Food available in canteen and mess is the best in Pune. Medical facilities are provided in campus as well as in hostel and students interested in sports have a special coach.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers are very helpful and qualified and there are lot of opportunities to explore. College curriculum makes us industry ready. Semester exams are not that difficult just prepare properly. Course curriculum is best  and makes us truly ready for industry.
detailed_review.Other: Events and fests are the best organized by student panel they also provide food within fest.

faqs.question: What to do after JEE Main session 2 result?
faqs.answer: After JEE session 2 is completed, only those candidates who are aiming for IITs need to start preparing for JEE Advanced after clearing JEE Main. Those who are above the 98th percentile should start preparing for JEE Advanced as soon as possible. Those below this, between the 95th and 98th percentile, should focus on attempting more mock tests and previous year question papers so that they have a better chance of clearing JEE Advanced

highlights.summary:
In 1975, Mahatma Jyotiba Phule Rohilkhand University (MJPRU) was formed. It is state-level university accredited with a "B" Grade by the NAAC and recognised by the University Grant Comission (UGC). It is also a member of the AIU. The campus of MJPRU is spread across 206 acres of land. Bareilly Rohilkhand Univeristy got the status of a residential university in 1985. The university has been ranked 34 under the Overall category by India Today 2024. Bareilly Rohilkhand University offers undergraduate and postgraduate courses in various streams such as Engineering, Commerce, Science, Management, and others. The flagship courses offered at MJPRU Bareilly are BTech and MBA. The university offers scholarships to meritorious students.
MJPRU University Bareilly offers placement assistance to students who are placed in many eminent companies such as MTR Food, Union Bank, Britannia, and others. Mahatma Jyoti University Bareilly admission is based on merit and entrance exams. The institute accepts the MJRPU Entrance Exam, CUET PG, JEE Main and others. The institute has well-equipped infrastructure which includes classrooms, a library, a sports complex, a cafeteria, and others. Some of the major highlights related to MJPRU University Bareilly are given below: Check out more on Mahatma Jyotiba Phule Rohilkhand University Highlights in the below videos:

MJPRU Reviews on Placements, Faculty & Facilities

reviews.course: B.Sc. in Biotechnology
reviews.review_title: College is good and I am strongly satisfied with the faculty members. Environment is also developed.

detailed_review.Placements: It is good compared to other colleges. In the previous batch for us, the percentage is 25 percent, some are recruited to IVRI too. Top roles in the last batch, a girl is even selected for HR in a higher company and most of the students who are placed have a decent package of 5 to 6 LPA as a fresher.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Infrastructure is good. The college is a full lush green campus with well developed environment. A large canteen and labs are good, even experiments happen at times, when lab work is focused. Wi-Fi is okay. The library is big and a lot of reference books are available. Classroom is not as good as expected otherwise, games happen regularly.
detailed_review.Faculty: Faculty are too supportive and well qualified teachers who play their role significantly and nicely. The quality of education is good. The semester exams are okay because the faculty does their best so exams are not too difficult, and a good staff is available.
detailed_review.Other: I like searching, so that's the main reason I chose this.

reviews.course: Bachelor of Computer Application (BCA)
reviews.review_title: Nice faculty with great knowledge.

detailed_review.Placements: Students from the State Government board have greater knowledge in the field of computer applications and science, and their knowledge is greatly boosted as there are many extra classes for personality development to become well-groomed students and to be placed in good companies. Top recruiters are Infosys, Ola, and many other companies.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: There are computer laboratory classes twice a week, and students enjoy a lot in the lab classes. Students gain great experience in programming and coding, which helps in boosting their knowledge and setting limitless boundaries for technical opportunities.
detailed_review.Faculty: All the faculty members are enrolled in Ph.D. programs, and some are already doctors of philosophy. They have great knowledge in their areas and in their particular subjects like web development, frontend development, backend development, and application development. Semester exams are moderate in the institute, and one has to study hard to pass with good CGPA/marks.
detailed_review.Other: Hostels are well maintained.

reviews.course: Bachelors of Business Administration (BBA)
reviews.review_title: It offers good faculty support and decent placements for the BBA students.

detailed_review.Placements: I am from the BBA course. In my college, around 65-75 percent of students got placed through campus recruitment (varies year to year). The highest package ranges from 6-8 LPA. The average package ranges from 2.5-3.5 LPA. The lowest package ranges from 1-3 LPA. Companies visit the college for placements. Roles offered are mostly entry-level, but they are helpful for starting a career.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The campus is enabled with 24x7 Wi-Fi accessible in academic buildings, the library, and common areas. The speed is decent for academic tasks, online research, and project work. Labs are available depending on the course. Hostel rooms are clean and properly furnished. It has adequate lighting, fans, charging points, and basic amenities.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers at Rajshree College are helpful, qualified, and knowledgeable in their respective subjects. Most faculty members hold postgraduate degrees. They are approachable for doubts, provide academic guidance, and support students during projects and practical work. Teacher quality is clear, structured, and concept-oriented.
detailed_review.Other: I chose BBA because it is a strong foundation course for careers in management and business. BBA provides practical business knowledge and open pathways to MBA and corporate jobs. Rajshree College offers good faculty members and supportive learning facilities for this course. I wanted a degree that combines business concepts and professional skills.

reviews.course: Bachelor of Pharmacy (B.Pharm.)
reviews.review_title: Best University with NAAC A++  accreditation.

detailed_review.Placements: 30 percent of students are placed in these courses but students who are taking off campus placement are very good and got high packages. Last year some companies did not offer a good package to the students. This university placement is not good.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Facilities and infrastructure of the department are very good. Wi-Fi is not available in the classroom and labs are well maintained and library is also good. Quality of the hostel facility is good. The mess food is not good. Canteen does not work properly. Sports and games facilities are excellent.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers are very supportive in nature and they are always ready to help the students. Their teaching style is awesome. Teachers are very friendly and have a caring nature. There are many programs run by faculty for the students. They are well educated and have a year of experience in their field so their network is very strong in this field.
detailed_review.Other: I chose these courses because they are connected to the medical field and they improved the course in M.Pharma. No events or fests are held in this university. 100 percent scholarship is provided.

reviews.course: Bachelor of Pharmacy (B.Pharm. Lateral Entry)
reviews.review_title: Thank you, Future University, for making my future bright and happy.

detailed_review.Placements: I am currently pursuing a B.Pharm from Future University. I am a 2nd-year student in the Faculty of Pharmacy department. Every year, 90% of students get placements through the college. Many companies visit Future University each year and select 70-80% of students.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: In Future University, many types of facilities are provided for students, such as a large library, computer labs, and pharmacy labs with important equipment and chemicals. The hostel quality is very good. The hostel management provides outdoor and indoor games.
detailed_review.Faculty: In Future University, teachers are very experienced, knowledgeable, and supportive. They provide knowledge and guide students in experiments and other activities. That are helpful for practical knowledge and subject-related experiments.
detailed_review.Other: I chose the B.Pharm course because pharmacy is a large-scale course. That gives students many opportunities to be successful in life.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Information Technology
reviews.review_title: Average college needs better teachers. Placement programs and internships, but self-study is a must.

detailed_review.Placements: 70-80% of students are placed. The highest package is 10 to 11 LPA. The average is 3.5 LPA. Top companies are TCS, Wipro, Infosys, and HCL. Almost all of the people get internships. Mostly, the roles are developer and analyst support. Basically, the placement and internship program is very good. Most people get placed in internships.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Classrooms are good, but not properly maintained. Labs are also good. Wi-Fi is available, but it has a slow network. The library has good books. Hostel rooms are average, and washrooms need better cleaning. Mess food is okay. A medical room is available. The sports ground is present but not well-maintained.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers are very good and supportive, but teaching quality is not very good. Some are well qualified, while others are average. The curriculum is basic and not fully industry-ready. Semester exams are moderate. The pass percentage is around 85–90%. Self-study is needed for a student to clear exams by studying basic college books.
detailed_review.Other: I chose B.Tech due to my interest in teaching and software development. The best part is practical learning, but improvement is needed in coding labs and classrooms. Fests are okay, crowd is mixed. The campus is peaceful, but there are issues with the bus and other transport. Scholarships are available and good, but extracurricular activities are limited.

reviews.course: Bachelor of Commerce (B.Com.)
reviews.review_title: In 2015, I realized that my college has good facilities.

detailed_review.Placements: I have offered roles at Commerce Zen. The percentage of students who got internships is between 50% to 80%. The top requirements of my course are so valuable and sufficient. In my college, the highest average is Rs. 40,000 and the lowest course fee is Rs. 27,000.  So, we are proud of my college.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: We have labs, libraries, a very good model, and games, with a high quality of science. In my college, the hostel has a good token system, good food, and good facilities. So, we are proud of our college to describe the good things.
detailed_review.Faculty: The teaching quality is so good. The teachers are very qualified and provide high quality graduate teaching. The semester exams in college are good in quality and not tough. The pass percentage is a minimum of 50 percent. My college has the most sought after location for students and industry.

reviews.course: Bachelor of Arts (B.A.)
reviews.review_title: The infrastructure is very good.

detailed_review.Placements: 60% of students are placed in our course. The highest salary is Rs. 3,00,000, the lowest salary is Rs. 1,00,000, and the average salary is Rs. 2,00,000. The top recruiter companies are Hero and Mind. 30-40% of students are doing internships in this course in Ashoka and Lumax, an ex-company. The top role offered in the course is higher education.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: No more facilities are available on the campus, like a hostel and a canteen, but Wi-Fi is available on the campus. The library is very good, and the department is very good. The hostel is not available, and medical facilities are not available, but sports and games are provided by the college.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers are very good, helpful, and qualified. The teaching quality is very good. This college curriculum is relevant, and many companies are ready to hire. Semester exams are not difficult. The exam is easy, and the passing percentage is 50%.
detailed_review.Other: I chose this course because it's a good course. MA is improving this course. Events and fests are available, and scholarships are provided by the government.

reviews.course: B.A. LLB.
reviews.review_title: HRK College Pilibhit not satisfied.

detailed_review.Placements: There is no placement. I have never heard of any placement from this college, and I don't think that any placement will happen from this college. Some students are not coming regularly, and teachers are only teaching in Hindi which I will not accept.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Infrastructure is quite good. But animals roam here and there, covering the whole area. However, the infrastructure is good. But the maintenance is zero, and dogs roam freely. The seats are good but dusty and remain uncleaned.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers are knowledgeable but they only teach in Hindi. Even when they write in Hindi on the blackboard, the blackboard is not clean. However, the curriculum is relevant, but it doesn't make studying interesting. The thing is that students also have to make notes in Hindi.  Teachers are not worried about students' attendance.
detailed_review.Other: Students are not helpful.

reviews.course: B.Sc. (Physicsc, Chemistry, Mathematics)
reviews.review_title: B.Sc. is a very good course, and this college is very good.

detailed_review.Placements: 60% of students are placed in the course, The highest package is 4 LPA, and the lowest package is 2 LPA, with an average package of 3 LPA. The top recruiter company is MRF. 60% of students get internships in pharma and automobile companies. The top role in the course is Bachelor of Science.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Infrastructure is very good and big, the library has a very cool atmosphere, and good quality Wi-Fi is available. Classrooms are very big and very good. Hostel is not available, and canteen and medical facilities are not available. Sports and games are provided on the college platform.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teaching quality is very good, and teachers are very well-qualified and well-known persons. Industry is ready for the jobs offered by the students as they pass the course. Exams are very difficult, and English and Hindi papers are available in the course. The passing percentage is 40%.
detailed_review.Other: I chose this course because it is a very good Science course, and M.Sc. is improving the course. Events and fests are available.

reviews.course: Master of Commerce (M.Com.)
reviews.review_title: Fewer placements and faculty, affordable but needs to be improved.

detailed_review.Placements: A very small percentage of students got placements, especially from the college itself. The students need to search for placements privately, the college doesn't provide these facilities. No internships are offered through the college itself, but after completion of the course, one could opt for different internships.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Infrastructure is quite good. The facilities available are a playground, a good building, science labs, computer labs, and a well-maintained library. The classrooms are very good. No hostel is available, nor is a mess or canteen, there are good games and sports facilities.
detailed_review.Faculty: The teachers are good, qualified, appropriate, and have high knowledge. The teaching quality differs for different faculty members. The course is relevant and makes students industry-ready. The semester exams are not very difficult, and passing percentage is approximately above 75-80%.
detailed_review.Other: I chose this course because of the knowledge and specialty it offers. I wish more funds were given by the government for the maintenance of this college, and number of teachers needs to be increased. A few events, fests, and extracurricular activities are arranged. Students can get a government scholarship.

reviews.course: Bachelor of Business Administration (BBA)
reviews.review_title: The college has great study, infrastructure, and facilities.

detailed_review.Placements: The percentage of placement in my course is 40 to 45%, which is good according to other colleges. The package is high, speaking 5 LPA, and the minimum is 3.5 LPA. The companies recruiting the students include Ajanta, Bottling, HBQ Solution, and others. Talk about internships; students have got positions at ICICI Bank, V Smart, and others.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The facilities are good, like the freedom to use labs, the library, and other amenities. The infrastructure is good and well-designed, and the hostel facility has great security, both manually and digitally. The food quality is good in both the mess and canteen, and the medical facilities are great. There are also excellent sports facilities.
detailed_review.Faculty: Faculty members are great, well-qualified, and have extensive knowledge according to the course requirements. They are also very helpful. The semester exams are easy, and students pass them easily. The alumni help prepare students to be industry-ready.
detailed_review.Other: My reason for choosing this course is to gain more knowledge in the business sector. I wish there were a better focus on practical knowledge rather than theoretical knowledge. Events are held regularly, and scholarships are also provided by the government in this college.

reviews.course: Bachelor of Arts (B.A.)
reviews.review_title: The college is good and has a helping nature.

detailed_review.Placements: B.A. History Honours helps in getting information about our past, present, and future and helps in doing an M.A.. A maximum number of students get placements in the college, and according to their percentage, students get their placements and internships.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The college has a well-developed infrastructure and provides all facilities. A library is available for students to study in the college with peace, and clean bathrooms and a gym are also available for the students. Many other activities are also available.
detailed_review.Faculty: It is a good exam, and I got 80% in our courses. The teachers are very helpful, they assist students with their studies and provide materials. They also take tests before the semester for students to improve their marks in the main exams.
detailed_review.Other: I am choosing History because it is an interesting subject that helps with many civil services exams.

reviews.course: Master of Commerce (M.Com.)
reviews.review_title: It is affordable and a good value for money.

detailed_review.Placements: To be honest, they do not provide many placements, but they provide knowledge and information because of the low fees. These facilities are very low. My course is good if we study with honesty. Students should opt for this course. Mostly, students are opting to get a degree
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The infrastructure is quite good, according to the fee, etc. It has science and computer labs, a good library, good classrooms, furniture, and overall facilities. There are no hostels. However, a gym is available at the college. There is sports equipment and an area to play.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers are very good, helpful, knowledgeable, and supportive. They don't put stress on students and try to give maximum support. The course curriculum is relevant, and if studied properly, students will become industry-ready. Semester exams are not very difficult. The pass percentage is great.

reviews.course: B.Sc. (Hons.) in Agriculture
reviews.review_title: No better college than this in the whole of Bareilly.

detailed_review.Placements: Around 80% of students got placed from my college last year. The highest package is 17 LPA, the lowest package is 5.5 LPA, and the average is 11.4 LPA. Around 75% of students got internships from a course, and international companies that are working for agricultural purposes.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Infrastructure and facilities are next level. Wi-Fi is enabled in labs, classroom, and libraries. Campus contains CCTV cameras for security purposes. The food and snacks are very much tasty, you can't deny that. The mess and canteen are very clean and hygienic.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers are helpful. They are highly qualified. They are very much knowledgeable. Teaching quality is best. The course curriculum is relevant, it makes the students industry-ready. The students are very much talented even the top companies cannot deny their talents. They must hire the students from my college.

reviews.course: B.Sc. (Hons.) in Agriculture
reviews.review_title: Very good college in Bareilly.

detailed_review.Placements: Last year, in my college around 95% of students got placed from my course. The highest package was 16 LPA, the lowest package was 7.5 LPA, and the average was 9.7 LPA. About 65% of students got internships from my course in very famous companies that are working in the agriculture field.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Facilities and infrastructure of my college, course, and department are very good, with Wi-Fi-enabled labs, classrooms, and library. The food available in the canteen and mess is very hygienic and tasty. You can share it with anyone, there's no offence.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers are very intelligent, qualified, and knowledgeable. They are very friendly. They treat students like brothers. The teaching quality is very different, and also according to the new education policy, the post-curriculum is relevant to the industry, which makes the students industry-ready. The semester exams are not so hard.

reviews.course: B.Sc. (Hons.) in Agriculture
reviews.review_title: The best college in Bareilly.

detailed_review.Placements: Companies come to my college and give the best package, like the highest package is 20 LPA, and the lowest package is 10 LPA. The average pack is 15 LPA. Around 50% of students from my course got the best companies for internship roles, like burgers and managers.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Facilities and infrastructure of my class are very good, and the high-tech library contains all the books of all the courses in my department, and the hostel quality is very good. The building is very new and food. Quality is very hygienic in mess and canteen, and medical facilities are available 24 hours.
detailed_review.Faculty: The curriculum of my course is according to the government, and teachers are very helpful, friendly, and qualified. So the teaching qualities of teachers are good. So the semester exams are not so difficult because the teachers teach the same as what comes in exams.
detailed_review.Other: I chose this college and course because of the placement of the new course and the lack of crowd. In this course, the scholarship given according to the government website and campus is very good, and it has a garden.

reviews.course: B.Sc. (Hons.) in Agriculture
reviews.review_title: The best college in Bareilly.

detailed_review.Placements: Around 80% of students got internships from my course in very famous industries and companies. The placement of students is around 60% from my course, and the highest package is 6 LPA, the lowest package is 3 LPA, and the average is 5 LPA.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The facilities and infrastructure in my course are very new and high-tech, and Wi-Fi connectivity is available. Whole college and labs and classrooms are also high-teach library contains all the books. The quality of food in my hostel is very good, and the mess and canteen are very hygienic.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers are very helpful and qualified. Teaching quality is according to the semester exams, and teachers make students industry-ready, according to the course curriculum. The semester exams are not so difficult to do because the teaching quality is very good.
detailed_review.Other: I chose this college because of placement and nothing to improve in my college.

reviews.course: B.Sc. (Hons.) in Agriculture
reviews.review_title: Everyone should come and make their future bright.

detailed_review.Placements: The percentage of students placed was around 95% last year. Highest package was 21 LPA, lowest was 11.5 LPA, and average was around 16 LPA. About 70-85% of students were placed from my course. Top roles were senior supervisors and more.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Facilities and infrastructure available in my college are very good. Classrooms are next-level future sick classroom enabled with Wi-Fi and digital boards, projectors. Libraries are also digital types. Normal food available in the hostel canteen is also very good, it is hygienic and friendly.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers are highly qualified and knowledgeable. Teaching quality is very good, so that students feel like they are watching some animated movie, something like that. Course curriculum is relevant to the industrial level, making the students industry-ready.

reviews.course: B.Sc. in Microbiology
reviews.review_title: It is a good college in Shahjahanpur for PG courses.

detailed_review.Placements: I think 90% of students are placed in my course. The highest package offered is 7 LPA, and the lowest package is 2 LPA. The top recruiters for my course are medical companies, and students from my course also get internships.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The facilities of my college are very good, and the infrastructure is also new. All the departments for all courses are separate. There is free Wi-Fi, computer labs, science labs, and good classrooms. The library is full of books for all the courses.
detailed_review.Faculty: The teachers of my college are truly qualified, very helpful, friendly in nature, and knowledgeable. The teaching quality is very good, and the course curriculum is very relevant, making students industry-ready. Semester exams are not that tough, but not easy, you have to study hard.
detailed_review.Other: The college is good, but do not come in this college for events, fests, or the campus crowd.

college_info.college_name: MJPRU Admissions 2025: Eligibility, Last Date, Application & Selection Process

admission.title: MJPRU Admission Overview 2025
admission.overview_text:
Mahatma Jyotiba Phule Rohilkhand University (MJPRU) admissions 2025 is open for admission for the top courses. The university offers over 20 courses under various streams, such as Engineering, Management , Law, Designing , etc. The courses offered by the MJPRU campus are under six faculties. In addition to this, the MJPRU also offers UG, PG, doctorate and diploma courses across its 563 affiliated colleges.

MJPRU admissions to all the courses are either entrance or merit-based. However, the MJPRU entrance exam is conducted for admission to MSc, LLB, B.Ed, B.El.Ed, BPEd, MEd and LLM programmes.Candidates need to meet the respective eligibility criteria to apply for any of the programmes at MJPRU . From last year onwards, Rohilkhand University has also started accepting CUET UG/ PG scores for BPharm, MBA, MCA and Lateral Entry course admissions.



Check out the video given below for details on MJPRU course admissions and more:

faqs.question: What are the top courses offered by MJPRU?
faqs.answer: MJRPU offers around 30 courses at the UG, PG, and PhD levels. Some of the courses include BTech, MA, MSc, LLB, LLM, B.Ed, M.Ed, and various others. MJRPU admissions based on merit and entrance exam for some courses. The university further conducts an entrance exam for admission to the MSc, LLB, B.Ed, B/El.Ed, BPEd, M.Ed, and LLM courses.

faqs.question: How can I get admission in MJPRU Bareilly?
faqs.answer: MJPRU Bareilly admissions are both merit and entrance-based for respective UG and PG courses. For a few UG courses such as BA, BSc, BCom, etc., admissions are offered based on candidates' merit scores obtained in their last qualifying exam. Further, to get admission to courses such as LLB, MEd, MSc, etc., candidates have to qualify for the university-level entrance exam. For other UG and PG courses, Rohilkhand University accepts a valid scores of CUET UG and CUET PG entrance exams. Later on, the selected students are allocated seats via a counselling process. Read more about the detailed MJPRU admission process 2023, here .

faqs.question: Can I take direct admission at MJPRU?
faqs.answer: MJPRU admissions are either entrance or merit-based. Candidates have to qualify for the minimum eligibility criteria to apply for any of the UG & PG courses. For PG courses, MJPRU conducts the MJPRU entrance exam. Apart from that for courses such as BPharm, BTech, MBA, MCA, etc., the university accepts valid scores of JEE Main, CUET UG & CUET PG entrance exams. Further, for other UG courses, admissions are entirely based on the merit obtained in the previous qualifying exam.

faqs.question: What is the fee for BTech at Mahatma Jyotiba Phule Rohilkhand University?
faqs.answer: The tuition fee for BTech at Mahatma Jyotiba Phule Rohilkhand University is INR 3.01 Lacs for all the four-years of the course. As per the MJPRU BTech fee structure, the selected candidates will also have to pay for a Refundable Caution Deposit along with Hostel and Sports fees as well. However, this information is sourced from official website/ sanctioning body and is subject to change. Students are requested to visit the official website or the admission office to get more details on MJPRU BTech fees structure.

faqs.question: Can I get direct admission to BTech at Mahatma Jyotiba Phule Rohilkhand University?
faqs.answer: No, direct admissions to a four-year BTech course is not possible at Mahatma Jyotiba Phule Rohilkhand University. MJPRU course admissions for a four-year BTech course is entirely based on the candidate's rank in JEE Main. Also, they must have passed Class 12 with PCM as subjects from a recognised board. However, candidates get an option to apply directly for the second year of BTech through a valid score of CUET UG entrance exam. Aspirants are required to pass one of these entrance exam before applying for MJPRU BTech admissions. Only if the seats remain vacant, candidates will get admission based on their scores obtained in the last qualifying exams of Class 12 in case of BTech and Diploma for BTech Lateral Entry courses.

faqs.question: I want admission to Mahatma Jyotiba Phule Rohilkhand University, Bareilly for BTech. What to do?
faqs.answer: For admission to Mahatma Jyotiba Phule Rohilkhand University, Bareilly for a four-year BTech course, the university has a selection process to select the eligible candidates. Candidates who passed Class 12 with PCM subjects or who're appearing in the final examination of Class 12 can fill an online application form at MJPRU. Aspirants are also required to appear for JEE Main entrance exam and submit their scorecard before applying for the course. Later on, candidates have to participate in the physical counselling process. Find below the steps for Rohilkhand University BTeech admission:

faqs.question: What is the entrance exam for admission to MJPRU BTech course?
faqs.answer: For MJPRU BTech course admissions, candidates must pass JEE Main entracce with a valid score. This is a national-level entrance exam conducted for all the BTech aspirants. Candidates who qualify for JEE Main entrance exam are required to fill an online application form for admission on the official website of MJPRU. All the JEE Mai qualifiers can submit their scorecard and other qualificational documents by email as per the notification released by the university.

faqs.question: What is the eligibility for BPharm at MJPRU?
faqs.answer: For admission to the four-year BPharm course at MJPRU, there is a set minimum eligibility criteria as per the university's guidelines that every aspirant need to fulfil before applying to this course. Candidates willing for admission to BPharm at MJPRU must pass Class 12 with minimum of 45% aggregate in the Science stream from a recognised board. They must have taken either Physics, Chemistry & Biology (PCB) or Physics, Chemistry & Mathematics (PCM) as the combination of subjects in Class 12. For the complete MJPRU BPharm admissions process, click here .

faqs.question: What is the selection criteria for BPharm at MJPRU?
faqs.answer: The selection for BPharm at MJPRU is entirely based on a national-level entrance exam. MJPRU accepts a valid score of CUET UG for admission to BPharm courses. Candidates who passed Class 12 with minimum 45% aggregate are eligible to apply for MJPRU BPharm admissions on the official website of the university. Next, they need to qualify for CUET UG entrance exam and submit the scores on the MJPRU's admission portal. Candidates will be evaluated based on their past academic records and entrance exam scores. Later on, the university will conduct a counselling process for the final seat allotment.

faqs.question: What is the admission process after qualifying CUET PG for MBA at MJPRU?
faqs.answer: To get admission to MBA at MJPRU, candidtaes have to appear and qualify for CUET PG exam, which is conducted every year by NTA. Further, after qualifying for CUET PG entrance exam, candidates have to register for UPTAC Counselling process, which is conducted by AKTU annually. Eligible candidates can visit the official website of UPTAC at (uptac.admissions.nic.in) to apply online. Based on the counselling process and final seat allotment, candidates will be offered admission. Futher, the selected students have to make the fee payment on the official website of MJPRU.

faqs.question: Is MBA available in MJPRU?
faqs.answer: At the university's campus, MJPRU offers both full-time and part-time MBA courses. For a duration of two years, MBA (General) course is offered at MJPRU. Futher, students can also pursue MBA in Marketing specialisations. For the part-time MBA aspirants, the university offers this course for a duration of three years, which is appropriate for working professionals. Candidates willing to get admission to MBA at MJRPU must pass graduation from a recognised university.

faqs.question: Who is eligible to apply for MBA at MJPRU?
faqs.answer: MJPRU offers a PG level MBA course for a duration of two-years. To pursue MBA from MJPRU, candidates must fulfil the minimum eligibility criteria before applying for the course. To be eligible for this course, candidate must pass Class 12 and graduation in the respective subjects from a recognised board. Admission to MJRPU MBA course is entirely based on CUET PG scores. Candidates must obtain minimum of 50% aggregate to appear for CUET PG entrance exam.

faqs.question: What is the fee for LLB in MJPRU?
faqs.answer: MJPRU LLB fee for three-years of course duration ranges between INR 36,000 - INR 1.44 lakh. This is a total tuition fee amount, which is based on all the MJPRU affiliated colleges offering LLB course. The selected candidates will also have to pay for a Refundable Caution Deposit along with other fee components. However, this information is sourced from official website/ sanctioning body and is subject to change. Students are requested to visit the official website or the admission office to get more details on MJPRU LLB fees structure.

faqs.question: How can I take admission to LLB at MJPRU?
faqs.answer: To get admission to LLB course at MJPRU, candidates must pass the basic educational qualifications as per the university's guidelines. Canidates seeking for MJPRU LLB admissions must pass Class 12 and either graduation or post graduation in any stream in order to pursue the LLB course. Further, admission to LLB at MJPRU is entirely based on candidates' performance in MJPRU LLB entrance exam. Apirants are required to appear and qualify for the entrance exam conducted by the university in an offline mode.

faqs.question: Who is eligible for admission to MJPRU LLB course?
faqs.answer: LLB is a PG level programme that can be pursued after qualifying an undergraduate degree. Candidates seeking for admission to LLB at MJPRU must fulfil the baisc educational qualification before applying for the course. In order to apply for this course, aspirants must pass Class 12 in any stream. Further, they must also have either an undergraduate or postgraduate degree in any discipline from a recognised university. It's a mandatory step to qualify before applying for LLB admission at MJPRU. Find here about the complete MJPRU LLB admission process .

faqs.question: Are admissions 2023 open for LLB at MJPRU?
faqs.answer: No, MJPRU LLB admissions 2023 have been closed for the year. The application window got closed in the month of July . Further, the university-level entrance exam for LLB was conducted in the month of August. The registrations for the year 2024 is likely to begin during the similar timeline. Checkout the following MJPRU LLB admission 2023 dates to get an idea about the upcoming year's admission schedule: 1 Jul '23- 26 Jul '23

faqs.question: How can I get admission to MJPRU MBA course?
faqs.answer: In order to get admission to MBA at Mahatma Jyotiba Phule Rohilkhand University, students need to fulfil the minimum eligibility. Those who pass a UG degree from a recognised university are eligble to apply for this course. As per the next step, aspirants have to qualify CUET PG exam, followed by UPTAC Counselling. Further, they need to visit the official website of MJPRU and fill an online application form and deposit course fee within the stipulated deadline of the submission.

faqs.question: How do I fill MJPRU registration form?
faqs.answer: MJPRU admissions to all the courses are both entrance and merit-based. Candidates who are interested in MJPRU admissions can apply online by visiting the official website of the university and its affiliated colleges as per the opted courses. Mahatma Jyotiba Phule Rohilkhand University admissions generally begin in May and end in September every year. Candidates also need to fulfil the eligibility criteria for admissions. The entrance exams accepted include JEE Main, NEET, CUET, GPAT, etc.

faqs.question: Does MJPRU offer scholarships?
faqs.answer: MJRPU offers both scholarships and financial assistance to its UG and PG students. However, students can apply for various Government scholarships such as the Merit Cum Means Scholarship for Professional and Technical Courses (Minorities), the Central Sector Scheme of Scholarship for College and University Students, the Graduate Scholarship for Professional Courses for SC/ST, Post Graduate Merit Scholarship for University Rank Holders, and Post-Graduate Indira Gandhi Scholarship for Single Girl Child.

faqs.answer: MJPRU admissions are either entrance or merit-based. Candidates have to qualify for the minimum eligibility criteria to apply for any of the UG & PG courses. For PG courses, MJPRU conducts the MJPRU entrance exam. Apart from that for courses such as BPharm, BTech, MBA, MCA, etc., the university accepts valid scores of JEE Main, CUET UG & CUET PG entrance exams. Further, for other UG courses, admissions are entirely based on the merit obtained in the previous qualifying exam. Not satisfied with answer? Ask Shiksha GPT

faqs.question: What is the fee for BTech at Mahatma Jyotiba Phule Rohilkhand University?
faqs.answer: The tuition fee for BTech at Mahatma Jyotiba Phule Rohilkhand University is INR 3.01 Lacs for all the four-years of the course. As per the MJPRU BTech fee structure, the selected candidates will also have to pay for a Refundable Caution Deposit along with Hostel and Sports fees as well. However, this information is sourced from official website/ sanctioning body and is subject to change. Students are requested to visit the official website or the admission office to get more details on MJPRU BTech fees structure.

faqs.question: Can I get direct admission to BTech at Mahatma Jyotiba Phule Rohilkhand University?
faqs.answer: No, direct admissions to a four-year BTech course is not possible at Mahatma Jyotiba Phule Rohilkhand University. MJPRU course admissions for a four-year BTech course is entirely based on the candidate's rank in JEE Main. Also, they must have passed Class 12 with PCM as subjects from a recognised board. However, candidates get an option to apply directly for the second year of BTech through a valid score of CUET UG entrance exam. Aspirants are required to pass one of these entrance exam before applying for MJPRU BTech admissions. Only if the seats remain vacant, candidates will get admission based on their scores obtained in the last qualifying exams of Class 12 in case of BTech and Diploma for BTech Lateral Entry courses.

faqs.question: I want admission to Mahatma Jyotiba Phule Rohilkhand University, Bareilly for BTech. What to do?
faqs.answer: For admission to Mahatma Jyotiba Phule Rohilkhand University, Bareilly for a four-year BTech course, the university has a selection process to select the eligible candidates. Candidates who passed Class 12 with PCM subjects or who're appearing in the final examination of Class 12 can fill an online application form at MJPRU. Aspirants are also required to appear for JEE Main entrance exam and submit their scorecard before applying for the course. Later on, candidates have to participate in the physical counselling process. Find below the steps for Rohilkhand University BTeech admission: Appear for JEE Main entrance exam Fill an online application form at (Admission: mjpru.ac.in) along with submitting the relevant documents Participate in Physical Counselling Get the seat/ branch allotment Fill the admission form and pay the fee

faqs.question: What is the entrance exam for admission to MJPRU BTech course?
faqs.answer: For MJPRU BTech course admissions, candidates must pass JEE Main entracce with a valid score. This is a national-level entrance exam conducted for all the BTech aspirants. Candidates who qualify for JEE Main entrance exam are required to fill an online application form for admission on the official website of MJPRU. All the JEE Mai qualifiers can submit their scorecard and other qualificational documents by email as per the notification released by the university.

faqs.question: What is the eligibility for BPharm at MJPRU?
faqs.answer: For admission to the four-year BPharm course at MJPRU, there is a set minimum eligibility criteria as per the university's guidelines that every aspirant need to fulfil before applying to this course. Candidates willing for admission to BPharm at MJPRU must pass Class 12 with minimum of 45% aggregate in the Science stream from a recognised board. They must have taken either Physics, Chemistry & Biology (PCB) or Physics, Chemistry & Mathematics (PCM) as the combination of subjects in Class 12. For the complete MJPRU BPharm admissions process, click here .

faqs.question: What is the selection criteria for BPharm at MJPRU?
faqs.answer: The selection for BPharm at MJPRU is entirely based on a national-level entrance exam. MJPRU accepts a valid score of CUET UG for admission to BPharm courses. Candidates who passed Class 12 with minimum 45% aggregate are eligible to apply for MJPRU BPharm admissions on the official website of the university. Next, they need to qualify for CUET UG entrance exam and submit the scores on the MJPRU's admission portal. Candidates will be evaluated based on their past academic records and entrance exam scores. Later on, the university will conduct a counselling process for the final seat allotment.

faqs.question: What is the admission process after qualifying CUET PG for MBA at MJPRU?
faqs.answer: To get admission to MBA at MJPRU, candidtaes have to appear and qualify for CUET PG exam, which is conducted every year by NTA. Further, after qualifying for CUET PG entrance exam, candidates have to register for UPTAC Counselling process, which is conducted by AKTU annually. Eligible candidates can visit the official website of UPTAC at (uptac.admissions.nic.in) to apply online. Based on the counselling process and final seat allotment, candidates will be offered admission. Futher, the selected students have to make the fee payment on the official website of MJPRU.

faqs.question: Is MBA available in MJPRU?
faqs.answer: At the university's campus, MJPRU offers both full-time and part-time MBA courses. For a duration of two years, MBA (General) course is offered at MJPRU. Futher, students can also pursue MBA in Marketing specialisations. For the part-time MBA aspirants, the university offers this course for a duration of three years, which is appropriate for working professionals. Candidates willing to get admission to MBA at MJRPU must pass graduation from a recognised university.

faqs.question: Who is eligible to apply for MBA at MJPRU?
faqs.answer: MJPRU offers a PG level MBA course for a duration of two-years. To pursue MBA from MJPRU, candidates must fulfil the minimum eligibility criteria before applying for the course. To be eligible for this course, candidate must pass Class 12 and graduation in the respective subjects from a recognised board. Admission to MJRPU MBA course is entirely based on CUET PG scores. Candidates must obtain minimum of 50% aggregate to appear for CUET PG entrance exam.

faqs.question: What is the fee for LLB in MJPRU?
faqs.answer: MJPRU LLB fee for three-years of course duration ranges between INR 36,000 - INR 1.44 lakh. This is a total tuition fee amount, which is based on all the MJPRU affiliated colleges offering LLB course. The selected candidates will also have to pay for a Refundable Caution Deposit along with other fee components. However, this information is sourced from official website/ sanctioning body and is subject to change. Students are requested to visit the official website or the admission office to get more details on MJPRU LLB fees structure.

faqs.question: How can I take admission to LLB at MJPRU?
faqs.answer: To get admission to LLB course at MJPRU, candidates must pass the basic educational qualifications as per the university's guidelines. Canidates seeking for MJPRU LLB admissions must pass Class 12 and either graduation or post graduation in any stream in order to pursue the LLB course. Further, admission to LLB at MJPRU is entirely based on candidates' performance in MJPRU LLB entrance exam. Apirants are required to appear and qualify for the entrance exam conducted by the university in an offline mode.

faqs.question: Who is eligible for admission to MJPRU LLB course?
faqs.answer: LLB is a PG level programme that can be pursued after qualifying an undergraduate degree. Candidates seeking for admission to LLB at MJPRU must fulfil the baisc educational qualification before applying for the course. In order to apply for this course, aspirants must pass Class 12 in any stream. Further, they must also have either an undergraduate or postgraduate degree in any discipline from a recognised university. It's a mandatory step to qualify before applying for LLB admission at MJPRU. Find here about the complete MJPRU LLB admission process .

faqs.question: Are admissions 2023 open for LLB at MJPRU?
faqs.answer: No, MJPRU LLB admissions 2023 have been closed for the year. The application window got closed in the month of July . Further, the university-level entrance exam for LLB was conducted in the month of August. The registrations for the year 2024 is likely to begin during the similar timeline. Checkout the following MJPRU LLB admission 2023 dates to get an idea about the upcoming year's admission schedule: Event Name Important Dates Application Start & End Date for LLB 1 Jul '23- 26 Jul '23 Admit Card Date 5 Aug '23 Entrance Exam Date 10 Aug '23

faqs.question: How can I get admission to MJPRU MBA course?
faqs.answer: In order to get admission to MBA at Mahatma Jyotiba Phule Rohilkhand University, students need to fulfil the minimum eligibility. Those who pass a UG degree from a recognised university are eligble to apply for this course. As per the next step, aspirants have to qualify CUET PG exam, followed by UPTAC Counselling. Further, they need to visit the official website of MJPRU and fill an online application form and deposit course fee within the stipulated deadline of the submission. Not satisfied with answer? Ask Shiksha GPT

faqs.question: How do I fill MJPRU registration form?
faqs.answer: MJPRU admissions to all the courses are both entrance and merit-based. Candidates who are interested in MJPRU admissions can apply online by visiting the official website of the university and its affiliated colleges as per the opted courses. Mahatma Jyotiba Phule Rohilkhand University admissions generally begin in May and end in September every year. Candidates also need to fulfil the eligibility criteria for admissions. The entrance exams accepted include JEE Main, NEET, CUET, GPAT, etc. Not satisfied with answer? Ask Shiksha GPT

faqs.question: Does MJPRU offer scholarships?
faqs.answer: MJRPU offers both scholarships and financial assistance to its UG and PG students. However, students can apply for various Government scholarships such as the Merit Cum Means Scholarship for Professional and Technical Courses (Minorities), the Central Sector Scheme of Scholarship for College and University Students, the Graduate Scholarship for Professional Courses for SC/ST, Post Graduate Merit Scholarship for University Rank Holders, and Post-Graduate Indira Gandhi Scholarship for Single Girl Child. Not satisfied with answer? Ask Shiksha GPT

sections.heading: Introduction
text: Mahatma Jyotiba Phule Rohilkhand University was ranked 5th best among colleges in Uttar Pradesh in 2025 by India Today. Spread over an area of 31,287 square kilometres and sheltering more than thirty million , MJPRU infrastructure boasts a gigantic administrative block, teaching infrastructure, library and laboratory structures, auxiliary facilities, and a residential area.

It features clean , hostel accommodations for both girls and boys with 80 well-furnished rooms . The university provides its students with well-maintained water coolers, an Xerox machine, sports and mess facilities, and a canteen. Furthermore, MJPRU University has a separate student grievance redressal committee to address and solve issues raised by students. To know more about MJPRU infrastructure, read on.

sections.heading: MJPRU Campus Highlights
text: The Mahatma Jyotiba Phule Rohilkhand University exercises its jurisdiction over 567 affiliated colleges, covering nine districts. There are separate hostel accommodations, with four dedicated to girls and five for boys. MJPRU infrastructure also includes a guest room with 22 AC rooms and one meeting room for visitors.

The university offers its students state-of-the-art facilities and equipment. It houses a sports facility and a day care centre for its faculty, non-teaching staff, as well as for visitors. Students with marital family status can also leave their children with the caretaker during examinations or other academic activities. The MJPRU campus also includes a museum for its students, named the Panchal Museum , to generate awareness among its students about the historical significance of the Rohilkhand Region.

tables.MJPRU Campus Highlights: Sports centre, hostels, canteen, library, training and placement cell, guest house, post office, Panchal museum, Vatsalaya Day Care Centre
Recreational ambience with attached washroom facilities
The rate for an official visit ranges from INR 200/- to INR 1000/-The rate for a personal/unofficial visit is around INR 1000/- to INR 1500/-

sections.heading: MJPRU Hostel Facilities
text: Allotment of MJPRU hostel rooms is only available for legal students residing outside the city. There are five MJPRU hostels for boys, namely, BDA, Nani Ji Deshmukh, Mains boys' hostel, which is the oldest one with an intake of 250 students, and is open to all facilities.

The other two hostels are the PG and Research hostel and a new boys’ hostel, which was constructed in 1997 and is only for Engineering faculty students, with a capacity of 270 . All hostels are equipped with water coolers, common rooms, phone, a canteen, a vehicle stand, sports facilities, a mess, and TV facilities. The calm and peaceful ambience of the hostel campus helps in building a more academically focused atmosphere for longer hours of study.

There are also four girls' hostels, namely, Maitreyi, Savitri, Laxmibai Kelkar, and Manorama, in the MJPRU campus. It has a total of four blocks named as Ganga, Yamuna, Saraswati, and Godawari, including one separate block for fresher students as per the UGC guidelines. There are in total 197 rooms where approximately 390 girls can be accommodated on a sharing basis.
