sections.heading: MJPRU Library
text: Mahatma Jyotiba Phule Rohilkhand University established its central library in 1985 with a seating capacity of about 150 students, with a total number of books being 74045 . The library timings are from 10:30 am to 4:30 pm on all working days.

The MJPRU library also includes a reading room, with the timings being from 8:00 am to 8:00 pm on all working days. The MJPRU library has a section named ‘book-bank’ exclusively for SC/ST students to issue books for a complete academic year. The library also provides leading daily newspapers and magazines, both in Hindi and English, related to competitive examinations and topics of general interest.
Some of the MJPRU library collection is as follows:

sections.heading: MJPRU Academic and Research Facilities
text: MJPRU infrastructure accommodates well-equipped and fully furnished classrooms, ICT-enabled seminar halls, a conference room, and individual faculty chambers. The university is home to 150 computers and a variety of licensed software, and major laboratories such as a research laboratory, a multimedia lab, computer network, and a project lab. Students at MJPRU University benefit from exposure to various training programs, workshops, and internships during their course of study at the institution. The university's completed research projects are funded by esteemed institutions like the ISRO, DST, UGC, etc.
For more information regarding the academics of MJPRU University, click on the provided link: MJPRU Courses

sections.heading: MJPRU Sports Facilities
text: The university actively encourages its students to focus not only on academics but also on extracurricular activities. The MJPRU infrastructure houses Deen Dayal Upadhyay Sports Complex, a fully equipped facility that includes an indoor stadium where both national and international levels of games can be organised, such as badminton, table tennis, boxing, and wrestling, with grappling mats provided, along with a modern gymnasium and a shooting range. MJPRU University also includes an outdoor sports section featuring a standard athletics track and has dedicated courts for volleyball, basketball, shotput, javelin throw, and other such games.

sections.heading: Places to visit in and around MJPRU Campus
text: Both the Panchal Museum, situated inside the MJPPRU campus, and the Army Service Corps Museum in Bareilly Cantonment have an amazing collection of artefacts and manuscripts. Students can go to many religious sites such as Trivati or the Shiv Shakti Peeth Temple , etc. They can also hit up poplular local cafes for delicious delicacies, attend cultural festivals with friends or plan a vist to the Ramnagar Fort for a day spent exploring.
Check out the video below for more information on Mahatma Jyotiba Phule Rohilkhand University's infrastructure.

facilities.name: Library
facilities.description: MJPRU central library has a collection of 3947 books (text/ reference on and general interest), 1849 back/ bound volumes of journals, 6790 theses/ dissertations and 567 CD’s (audio/video). Currently, 102 print (75 Indian and 27 Foreign) and 1390 on-line Journals are being subscribed. Book bank, reading room, and internet facility are also available for the users.

facilities.name: Hostel
facilities.description: The hostel is equipped with all the necessary facilities which include mess and canteen, water coolers, common room, xerox machine, phone and recreational facilities such as television, indoor games etc.

facilities.name: Sports Complex
facilities.description: The university has a playground spread over an area of 33,000 sq. mtr. of which 4,375 sq. mtr. is covered area consisting of indoor and outdoor facilities. Within outdoor facilities, the university has a well-built outdoor stadium, which can accommodate approx. 2,000 spectators at a time. The indoor stadium is also well built with synthetic courts of different sports and its stadium can accommodate nearly 200 spectators at a time.

facilities.name: Gym
facilities.description: The gymnasium is part of the indoor stadium of the university and it comprises eight electronics treadmills, one manual treadmill, six cycling and three AV Pro exercise set, two inclines and decline benches and two sets of 12 station multi- work out gym.

college_info.college_name: Malla Reddy Engineering College: Courses, Fees, Admission 2025, Placements, Reviews

highlights.summary: Malla Reddy Engineering College was founded in 2002. It is a private institute and is located in Secunderabad, Telangana. Malla Reddy Engineering College courses are offered to students at the UG and PG levels. The institute is approved by AICTE and offers courses in Full Time mode. Malla Reddy Engineering College offers a total of 21 courses in streams such as Engineering and Business & Management Studies. Some of the popular courses offered at the institute are B.E. / B.Tech, M.E./M.Tech and MBA/PGDM and the total seat intake for the available courses is 2790. These courses are offered to students across several specialisations such as Artificial Intelligence & Machine Learning, Civil Engineering, Computer Science Engineering, Electrical Engineering and Electronics & Communication Engineering. Further, the fee for all these courses ranges between INR 1,20,000 to 4,60,000 and the average median salary is around INR 4,15,000. Apart from this, the Malla Reddy Engineering College campus has a state-of-the-art infrastructure with all the advanced facilities.

Malla Reddy Engineering College Reviews on Placements, Faculty & Facilities

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Electronics and Communication Engineering
reviews.review_title: It's good on the whole but the quality of placements in the current year 2026 is satisfactory.

detailed_review.Placements: My college has a placement percentage of around 40% till now in my course. The highest package is 6 LPA, and the lowest is 2.4 LPA. One of the top recruiting companies that come to my college is Renault Nissan (a manufacturing company). Around 10% of students got internships, and the companies are Zepto, Thermopads, Zen Technologies, etc. The top role offered in my course is VLSI and embedded engineer at present.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Facilities and infrastructure of my department are top-notch. They include good Wi-Fi, lab equipments, classrooms, clean washrooms, drinking water, and also an excellent library for learning. There is an issue regarding the campus hostels' food which is very unclean but now they offer quite good food only. The canteen, medical facilities, and sports are also top-notch.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers are highly-qualified, very helpful, and also qualified. The teaching quality is so pure. Students gain very good knowledge from their lectures. This course curriculum is relevant, and makes the students industry-ready. I don't feel very difficult in semester exams, the difficulty rate is 10% or maybe not that too if we concentrate on lectures and don't waste time. The pass percentage is around 70%. The faculty in my department are very friendly and easy to interact. They help to clarify students' doubts.
detailed_review.Other: I chose this course because I feel I am connected to it. I also love interacting with hardware components, and chose to do so under my sister's guidance. The best thing about my course is interacting with hardware components, and also sometimes software. The things I wish would be improved about my course are maybe having more practical knowledge than theoretical knowledge. My college is known for events, fests, and extra activities other than academics. Connectivity, campus crowd, and surroundings are good but scholarship is still not allotted by the government to few batches.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Information Technology
reviews.review_title: Not satisfied. Faculty has zero knowledge, but placements are good. We have a decent infrastructure.

detailed_review.Placements: There is approximately 80% placements. The highest package is 25 LPA, the lowest package is 2 LPA, and the average package is 4-5 LPA. Top recruiting companies are Amazon, Microsoft, TCS, and IBM. Only 2 students got internships: one at Vivnovation and the other at Life Guru organisation. Top roles offered are Software Developer and Data Scientist.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: There is decent infrastructure and no proper Wi-Fi, and there will be no signal. Computers in the lab don't work properly, and the AC does not work. No proper infrastructure. Only some work. In the hostel, the quality of food is okay, there are decent medical facilities, and there are no sports and games.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers are very poor. They have zero knowledge, and the teaching quality is decent. No faculty has proper communication skills, including the HOD. They don't teach properly. The course curriculum is not at all industry-ready, and the semester exams are not that difficult. the pass percentage is around 75-80%.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering (Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning)
reviews.review_title: MREC (MRDU) review: Strict faculty, strong skills and curriculum

detailed_review.Placements: Placements are pretty good, with the highest package as I know being 21 LPA from the IT department, and the AIML department has also received good placements this year while the college provides professional training and students from any branch can achieve any company.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The new block for us (1st year) is the best, with good classrooms, high-speed Wi-Fi, well-equipped modern labs, a huge well-infrastructure library, good mess and canteen, though the playground is short and not good for cricket.
detailed_review.Faculty: Faculty are experienced but fast-paced, and the AIML curriculum is robust covering key ML/DL concepts, though math-heavy, with tricky exams that test logic over memory, making it a tough environment that demands constant effort but builds strong technical skills.
detailed_review.Other: Malla Reddy Engineering College (MREC), Maisammaguda is known for being strict with a school-like atmosphere due to rules on attendance, dress code, and GATE passes, has a huge and energetic crowd because multiple colleges share the campus, and mostly consists of local students from Hyderabad and Telangana with a competitive peer group in CSE and AIML focused on placements and grades.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: The training program is very helpful.

detailed_review.Placements: Almost 85% are placed. The highest package is 96 LPA, the lowest package is 2.6 LPA, and the average package is 4.5 LPA. Amazon, Google, Infosys, Wipro, West Gold Resources, etc. Internships are based on students' interests. They can apply online, and written test exams are conducted on the college campus and off-campus.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: We have the best infrastructure in the whole of Telangana state. We have built-in Wi-Fi and smart screens in our class. We have a library with 10,000+ books, Wi-Fi, and a research area. The hostel is very well-maintained, and the food is very tasty. In the canteen, the staff is very hygienic and have good taste. We have NCC camps in our college and cricket matches.
detailed_review.Faculty: Our teachers are very helpful, but some of them are not good at teaching. This year, our college implemented an industry-ready training program. The trainers are really very helpful; they explain everything in detail and in a practical way. Semester exams are good and somewhat difficult, but if we learn the concepts, we can perform well in the exams. The pass percentage is 35-40%.
detailed_review.Other: I chose CSE (general) and am currently in 1st year, and I feel the course is worth the money because I have learned everything in a practical way that I never imagined.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering (Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning)
reviews.review_title: You will learn many things.

detailed_review.Placements: AI & ML course with nearly 80% placements. The highest package was 20 LPA, and the average was 3 LPA. Google was a top recruiter. Around 50% students got internships. Top roles offered included AI/ML Engineer and related positions. Many are going with AI/ml.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: MREC College has well-equipped labs, smart classrooms, a library and campus Wi-Fi. Hostels are decent with basic facilities. Mess food is average, and a canteen is available. Medical aid, sports grounds and indoor games facilities are available. The food is also very good.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers are helpful, qualified, and knowledgeable with good teaching quality. The curriculum is relevant and helps students become industry-ready. Semester exams are moderate in difficult, with a high pass percentage. They are very clear in the subject.
detailed_review.Other: I chose AI & ML due to strong industry demand and future scope. The course offers good exposure to emerging technologies. Campus hosts active events and fests with a diverse crowd. Connectivity is good. More hands-on training and industry tie-ups can be improved.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: Best college to recommend in the budget with professional experience.

detailed_review.Placements: 100% of students get placement in our college. 94 LPA is the highest package, 3.5 LPA is the lowest, and the average is 5 LPA. TCS is the top recruiting company for our course. 50% of the students got the internship from our course, and it's from Infosys.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The hostel building is very spacious and is a new building, with 4 blocks, each block has 4 floors. It's a 24-hour Wi-Fi connection, and the mess is neat and clean. Moreover, it has a spacious place outside. It also has gym facilities with a proper trainer. The taste is good in the canteen.
detailed_review.Faculty: The faculty in our college is good. They teach us in an understandable manner. Every faculty member has a minimum of 5 years of experience, and everyone has completed their PG. The curriculum is related to our course. It makes the students get ready for interviews at college.
detailed_review.Other: I have chosen Computer Science Engineering with Data Science specialisation because it has a great hike in the present day.

This course has a good scope, and we are learning all things that I need in competitive exams in this course, like we can write GATE as the GATE subjects are covered in the 2nd semester only.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: Nice placements, supportive faculty members, and good infrastructure.

The most common roles offered are software developer, data analyst, and cloud engineer. It gives students exposure to both service-based and product-based industries.

Medical care is available. Sports facilities like cricket, football, and indoor games are available. The mess food is decent.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers are helpful and generally qualified. The curriculum is relevant and covers industry needs through extra practice. Projects are required to be fully industry-ready. Semester exams are moderate in difficulty. The pass percentage is around 50-60% for most batches.
detailed_review.Other: I chose this course because I liked it. They are good at upskilling, and they are better. Events are not conducted here.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: You can join this engineering college. College life is good here. The college is covered in trees.

The mess food is also fine, neat, and clean. I will be having supplementary exams in between the semesters. The mess food is fine, and the canteen area will be cleaned every day.

The top recruiting companies were TCS, Infosys, Amazon, and Capgemini. 60% of students got internships from companies like Google, Microsoft, and local startups.

The faculty treat students in a friendly manner and help us complete daily tasks in DSA and other programming-related questions. Our college also has hostel facilities for both girls and boys, with a clean environment.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers are well-qualified and have enough knowledge to teach us. The professors help us in doubt-solving in any field of the course. The semester examinations are not that tough, and everyone can get the passing marks of 12.
detailed_review.Other: I chose Computer Science and Information Technology, which is a collaboration of computer science and the IT sector. The MREC campus provides enough facilities for students to get a good education.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: Good for people who want to learn new things.

detailed_review.Placements: There are many opportunities for studies in the budget. The package was about 64 LPA last year. Now our college has been promoted to university and there are many more opportunities for students to get placed well in many companies. It would be great for the students who are looking forward to joining our college.

Special training sessions are offered by the college in order to improve students' capabilities in the college courses like CSE, and are very common in this college. College examinations are also conducted quite often.
detailed_review.Other: Events are held in the college but they are very rarely hosted. If you are a person who wants events, just skip this college.

faqs.question: How much is the intake across all courses being offerred at Malla Reddy Engineering College?
faqs.answer: The overall seats available across all courses offered by Malla Reddy Engineering College is up to 1740. Good thing to know is that Malla Reddy Engineering College has courses which are approved by prominent Government bodies like AICTE. Not satisfied with answer? Ask Shiksha GPT

faqs.question: How can I get into Malla Reddy Engineering College for UG/PG courses? Am I eligible for admission?
faqs.answer:
Malla Reddy Engineering College has below criteria for taking admissions to it's various courses: Courses Eligibility B.E. / B.Tech Candidate must have passed Diploma in Electronics and Communication Engineering/Technology or B.Sc with Mathematics secured minimum 45% marks (40% in case of candidates belonging to reserved category) from a recognised University. M.E./M.Tech Candidate must have completed B.E./B.Tech./AMIE in Mechanical Engg./Mechanical Engg. (Automobile Engg., )/ Mechanical Engg. (Industrial Engg) /Mechanical Engg. (Mechatronics) /Mechanical Engg. (Production) / Mechanical Engg. (Production Engg.) / Mechanical Engg. (Material Science & Nanotechnology)/ Mechanical Engg. (Industrial and Production Engg.)/ (or) equivalent from a UGC recognised University/ Institute.
Preference will be given to GATE qualified candidates over TS PGECET qualified candidates.
Candidate must have secured 50% marks in group subjects taken together in the qualifying examination (45% for reserved category). MBA/PGDM Candidate must have passed Bachelor Degree (BA / B.Com/ B.Sc/ BBA / BBM / BCA / BE / B.Tech / B. Pharmacy / Any 3 or 4 year Degree except Oriental Languages). Examinations of minimum three years duration with at least 50% marks (45% marks in case of reserved categories) in the qualifying examinations.
Final year appearing students may also apply on provisional basis.
The minimum age of the candidates should be 19 years as on the date of notification (Candidates whose date of Birth up to 30th MARCH,  2003). No maximum age limit. Not satisfied with answer? Ask Shiksha GPT

college_info.college_name: Malla Reddy College of Engineering For Women: Courses, Fees, Admission 2025, Cutoff, Reviews

highlights.summary: Malla Reddy College of Engineering For Women was founded in 2008. It is a private institute and is located in Hyderabad, Telangana. Malla Reddy College of Engineering For Women courses are offered to students at the UG levels. The institute is approved by AICTE and offers courses in Full Time mode. Malla Reddy College of Engineering For Women offers a total of 4 courses in stream such as Engineering. Some of the popular course offered at the institute is B.E. / B.Tech and the total seat intake for the available courses is 810. This course is offered to students across several specialisations such as Artificial Intelligence & Machine Learning, Computer Science Engineering and Electronics & Communication Engineering. Further, the fee for all these courses is INR 2,80,000. Apart from this, the Malla Reddy College of Engineering For Women campus has a state-of-the-art infrastructure with all the advanced facilities.

summary.college_name: Malla Reddy College of Engineering For Women

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering (Data Science)
reviews.review_title: Good placements in the last year.

detailed_review.Placements: My college has decent placements. As for now, it's not more than 60 percent of people are placed in the placements, so the remaining students are not given any. Companies like Capgemini, Accenture, Infosys, and TCS offer internships. The average package would be 4 LPA.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Infrastructure is very good, and it is well maintained with hygiene. Hostel is also provided by the administration. The facilities in the hostel are also very nice as they provide hot water, Wi-Fi, beds, and washing machine facilities. The food provided is very well maintained with hygiene, and the taste is very good.
detailed_review.Faculty: Faculty members are very well qualified. They do teach the students in their phase. They make sure to complete all the required syllabus before the exams. Semester exams are also very well conducted, and in terms of level of difficulty I could rate them around 4.
detailed_review.Other: I have chosen data science. The campus always has a great connection during events as they are involved with all the people around the campus.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering (Data Science)
reviews.review_title: It has good infrastructure and facilities.

detailed_review.Placements: Actually, the placements are kind of average as of now, but last year they are decent compared to now. There are companies like Capgemini, Accenture, and Infosys. The average package would be around 4 LPA to 6 LPA, and last year the highest package is 24 LPA.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The infrastructure is quite decent, actually, as it is always well-maintained by the administration. The facilities in the hostel are quite good, as it always has Wi-Fi, and food is maintained very hygienically, and the taste is always prioritized. There are alternative days when Zumba dance is conducted in the hostels. A canteen is also available with a juice point in it.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers are very qualified and give their best. The teaching quality is very good, and they make the subjects more understandable to the students. They also provide subject-related references. The semester exams are mostly tough and kind of indirect, but completely from the syllabus, and the pass percentage is always above 85 percent..
detailed_review.Other: I chose Data Science in Computer Science as I found it interesting and thought it has a career potential. The best thing is it kind of makes people look at a problem in different ways to solve it, as it helps in critical thinking.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering (Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning)
reviews.review_title: Its good we can satisfy with the faculty.

detailed_review.Placements: In our college, the students were placed above 7.5 LPA. The lowest package is 4.5 LPA. TCS, Capgemini, Accenture. Above 8.0 percent of students got internship. They got placed in Graffiti, Accenture, Capgemini, etc. Before Covid, placements are good but okay.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: There is hostel availability in our college. In our college hostel, there are so many facilities like hot water, good food, and good security. Our college infrastructure is good. We had proper classrooms and lia brary. We had a canteen in our college.
detailed_review.Faculty: They are qualified for teaching. Mostly our lecturers have completed M.Tech and Ph.D., and they have at least 6 to 7 years. The curriculum is good. It makes us ready for the industry. Our semester exams are difficult. The pass percentage is 75 percent.
detailed_review.Other: I chose this because I am interested in AIML. Basically, AI is a trending department and AI can do the work equally to the humans. But what humans can do, it cannot. It can help the work for humans.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: Malla Reddy Engineering College for Women (MRECW) is a brand name for Placements.

detailed_review.Placements: In our college, 90% placements are there. The highest package is 32 LPA, the average package is 15LPA, and the lowest package is 3 LPA. Top recruiting companies at our college are Visa, Accenture, Flipkart, Amazon, Cisco, HP, etc. Mostly 50% people got internships in companies like Cisco, Accenture. They are paced too.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Classrooms and labs are provided. The systems work very well, and classrooms are always neat, and we have smart boards in every classroom and lab. In our college, there is a library, where we have so many books to read and gain knowledge for free.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers are very good friends to the students. No male faculty member will misbehave with the students. They help to learn the subjects. The college provides so many training sessions regarding the branch. The teaching quality of the faculty is awesome. In our college, semester-end exams are conducted in a very strict manner, and students get a good pass percentage. The pass percentage is at least 80% above.
detailed_review.Other: The present generation totally depends on CSE, so I have chosen this branch. In our college, there will be so many events. Musical, dance, etc.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Electronics and Communication Engineering
reviews.review_title: It's a good platform for experiencing all kinds of activities but need more placements.

detailed_review.Placements: The percentage of students placed in our college is maximum 70%. The highest package in our college is 20 LPA, and the lowest package is 4.5 LPA in our course. Top recruiting companies are Wipro and Capgemini. 80% of the students got internships from our course at Wipro, TCS, and Capgemini. Top roles offered in our course are software developer, java developer, and full-stack developer.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: In our college, there are benefits of labs, classrooms, library, engineering equipment, and many more. Wi-Fi is also provided. There is no canteen facility in our college. Medical facility is also there in our college. There is no mess on our campus also.
detailed_review.Faculty: Our lecturers are very helpful, qualified, and also knowledgeable. The teaching quality of our lecturers is good. This course curriculum is relevant, and it also makes students industry-ready. The examination will be conducted very strictly as our college is autonomous. The pass percentage is 85%.
detailed_review.Other: It is the most used course in marketing in our course. This helps to improve the coding skills and develops coding skills. It will be easier to learn by providing extra coding courses.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering (Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning)
reviews.review_title: Need college improvement.

detailed_review.Placements: No placements. Placement support is almost non-existent. Very few companies visit, and the ones that do offer low-level roles with poor packages.
detailed_review.Faculty: Most faculty members seem to have academic degrees but lack actual teaching skills. Many of them just read out slides or stick to theory without explaining concepts in a student-friendly way. This really affects our learning experience. No coding education. In today's world, not teaching even basic coding or programming languages is shocking. There's zero technical skill development, which affects students' future job prospects.
detailed_review.Other: There no such events and extracurricular activities . I am currently a student here and feel it's important to highlight some areas that need serious improvement. Auditorium conditions are in very poor condition. There's no proper ventilation.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering (Data Science)
reviews.review_title: Good college and infrastructure.

detailed_review.Placements: We have seniors who are 80% placed. JPMC is the top recruiter, followed by Deloitte and Google. Placements start in the 2nd year, 2nd semester. Almost all students got placed. As long as you follow their curriculum strictly, you are sure to receive placements.

Food is regularly delivered every week and made fresh every day. The key lies in selecting the most popular dishes and relying on them. Fries are to die for.
detailed_review.Faculty: There is a supportive faculty. They are filled with a lot of knowledge. As long as you get used to the working style of the respective teachers, you will feel that it is for the best of you. This course makes students industry-ready, with courses like business communication.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: I am satisfied with the college and its facilities. Facilities are good.

Top recruiting companies are  TCS, Capgemini, Infosys, MNC, etc. 65% of students got internships from our courses in companies. Top roles offered are analyst, debugger, and tester.

This course is very helpful nowadays and need to every industry. They should improve internships through companies to help students. 
Events, fests, a campus crowd, connectivity, scholarship, extracurricular activities, project expo, and food fests are done frequently.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: I am satisfied with the college.

detailed_review.Placements: Almost 70% of students got placed. The highest package offered is 30 LPA. Top recruiting companies are Mahindra and TCS. Almost 60% of students got internships. Top roles offered are tester, debugger, and processor.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: In our college, our department has infrastructure and facilities. We have digital boards for a near and clear explanation. The hostel facilities are good. The food management is good. They prepare hygienic food which is good for our health.

They provide extra training classes and CRT classes for our job purpose. It is not difficult it is easy to pass the semester exams. The pass percentage in our college is 75%.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Electronics and Communication Engineering
reviews.review_title: I would recommend joining my college for a better future.

detailed_review.Placements: I am satisfied with my college because of its good placement percentage. Many companies came to my college like Accenture, Flipkart, Capgemini, Cognizant, Cisco, Infosys, and Tech Mahindra. Many of the students placed up till now. One student got 35 LPA in a Visa company.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Facilities and infrastructure are good. Our library contains several books, and we can also take them to our home/hostel and submit them after 2 weeks. If late to submit, then you have to pay a Rs, 1 fine. In my hostel, the quality of food is okay.
detailed_review.Faculty: Our faculty members are good enough to teach the subjects. They are knowledgeable. The pass percentage for every semester would be approximately 90-95%. In semester papers, sometimes it may be tough to attempt all the questions, but it would be easy to pass the subject.
detailed_review.Other: I opted for this course because I have an interest in it. Currently, it is a highly demanded course. It would be easier for me to be placed in other courses.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: Our college can be said to have faculty members and facilities that are not up to the mark.

detailed_review.Placements: Actually, in our college, more than 150 people are placed in Accenture, Infosys, IBM, and TCS in 2024-2025. This year, the count of placements will increase again because our college became a university in the last academic year, and 50% of students are selected for internships.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Coming to infrastructure, it's awesome because we have smart boards in every classroom and different labs full of computers. We don't have a canteen regularly, but we have a juice point in our college. Sports and games are available.
detailed_review.Faculty: All faculty members working in our college have done their M.Tech, and some of them have done their PG. I can say 90% of the faculty are very good at teaching, and they are helpful to the students. The courses are always related to the curriculum. They do make us industry-ready, but not in the best way.
detailed_review.Other: I choose this course because there is no option for me at the start. But to stay in this course, I accept it and learn the subject with a peaceful and accepting mind. The best thing about CSE is that we can make the world turn with our fingertips. I think the general CSE course provides information about every other course in an introductory manner, but it needs more than just an introduction. Fests and events are very rare in our college, and the campus crowd is large, leaving no time for connectivity.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: The college is good. Studies are also good with friendly faculty members and good infrastructure.

detailed_review.Placements: 50% of our college students get placed. The highest package offered by the companies is 12 LPA. The average package offered by the companies is 6 LPA. The lowest package offered by companies is 3 LPA. The top recruiting companies for our course are Genpact, Capgemini, Infosys, Tech Mahindra, and TCS. Above 50% of students got internships in computer science and engineering in companies like Genpact and Capgemini. Top roles offered in the computer science and engineering course are data analyst, debugger, etc.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Facilities for students are good enough because the library, classrooms, and labs are very spacious. It has a good Wi-Fi connectivity. In the hostel, the mess is so spacious and the quality of the food is good. There is a spacious ground to play sports.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers are very helpful during exam times. They clarify doubts at any time. The course curriculum is relevant. If students pay attention, they can reach their goals. Semester exams are good and not too difficult. If students are interested, they can crack exams. The pass percentage is 95%.
detailed_review.Other: I chose this course because it is very useful and helpful for my career. The best thing in this course is everyone can catch the subjects easily. The thing which I would like to improve in my course is there should be some more classes about today's technology. Events are not regularly celebrated and the surroundings are cool enough.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: Good infrastructure, facilities, and placements.

detailed_review.Placements: Around 80-100% of students got placed in our course. The salary package offered is 5 LPA. Around 65% of students got internships. Top recruiting companies are Google, Amazon, Infosys, Wipro, etc. Our seniors got selected by top recruiting companies in campus selection of the CSE course.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Our college provides digital rooms and system monitors for every student. Our college has a great garden. There is a nice ambiance in our college canteen. We have a well-structured auditorium and seminar halls. Free Wi-Fi is provided so that we can use it for coding easily. There are well-structured labs. We have classrooms and a peaceful library. The facilities of the hostel are good. It provides tasty food. We have a medical room. Our college provides indoor and outdoor sports. It provides nice facilities. There is good nature.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers are qualified. The teaching quality is fabulous. Our teachers are very knowledgeable and friendly. Faculty teaching is easy to understand.
detailed_review.Other: Our college provides courses like CSE, ECE, and AIML.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering (Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning)
reviews.review_title: Proper information about our college.

detailed_review.Placements: Every year we have 90 % placements. The highest package of our college is 41.64 L per annum from the AIML department. The average package is 5 L per annum. The lowest package is 3 L per annum. We have very good placements in our college. Placements drives start from 3rd year 2nd semester.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: We will be having free Wi-Fi in our college labs. And our labs are very neat and clean. Every class in our college has digital boards. We will be having a duplex library with n number of books. We will have a 1 hr activity every week. And there is a big canteen.
detailed_review.Faculty: For every 5-6 months we will be having a semester with 2000 feels. All faculty are knowledgeable and the pass percentage in every class is 90-95%. The teachers are very good and they have a good grasp of the subject and they will have a complete grip on the subject.
detailed_review.Other: We will be having many events. And there is also a bus facility with nearly 15-18 bus routes.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: The faculty is good and placements are great.

detailed_review.Placements: The highest package for CSE is 31 Lacs; the lowest package is 3.4 LPA. Most of the companies that recruit are Cisco, Tata, Genpact, Wipro, Amazon, Flipkart, Capgemini, Google, Oracle, Microsoft, etc. The packages that the college provides are good. The college can assure 98% placement of students. We also have tie-ups with international companies.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The food in the college hostel is average, and the fee is too high. It is better to prefer a private hostel than the college hostel. The facility is good, teaching is great, sports activities are also good, and events are celebrated grandly. The canteen is average because the price is too high, and the food quality is okay in the canteen.
detailed_review.Faculty: Semester exams are hard, but the faculty provides the required resources to study, and notes are useful. We can go to the library and take the required textbook for the exam. The question paper is hard, and any kind of malpractice is not allowed on campus. If any student is caught in this activity, serious disciplinary action is taken.
detailed_review.Other: Events are good, but there is too much crowd. There is no greenery on campus.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Electronics and Communication Engineering
reviews.review_title: Good placements and good faculty.

detailed_review.Placements: The placements of Malla Reddy Engineering College for the academic year 2019-2020 have yielded 800+ offers for 600 registered students. More than 50+ companies conducted campus recruitment drives and integrated with the students of B.Tech, M.Tech, and MBA across 8 departments. Reputed core companies like Tech Mahindra, IBM, HCL, NTT DATA, Open Text, Apps Associate, etc., have recruited students. The highest salary offered this year is 14 LPA and the average salary is 3.25 LPA. A good number of UG and PG students opted for higher education in India and overseas with scholarships.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The infrastructure provided includes the following: adequate land, smart classrooms, laboratories, central and departmental libraries, research & development facilities, innovation centre, conference halls, faculty chambers/cabins, washrooms, purified drinking water, internet with Wi-Fi facility, ladies rooms, canteen, student activity centre, sports & gym, hostel, electricity & power backup, transport, medical facilities, bank, and ATM.
detailed_review.Faculty: There are 8 semester examinations. The pass percentage of semester examinations is 60%. Friendly and good-natured faculty is available in our college. Good curriculum and good faculty are present in this college. Lecturers are helpful, qualified, and knowledgeable.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Electronics and Communication Engineering
reviews.review_title: My college life is the best college experience.

detailed_review.Placements: Every year, 70% of students are placed in different placement jobs based on their branch. The highest package is 15 lpa, and the lowest package is 5 lpa. If a student has minimum knowledge, they can gain more than 25 LPA. The companies that reach our college are Amazon, Google, Microsoft, TCS, Infosys, etc. Rather than jobs, paid internships are also provided to students in their 2nd or 3rd years.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Our college building and infrastructure are very good. We have a total of 4 blocks, in which each block belongs to each individual department, like CSE, ECE, etc. We have a separate library of 2 floors where all books are provided. Wi-Fi is available throughout the college, and we have smart boards in our classrooms. Hostel facilities are also available in the college. Canteen, sports, etc. are available.
detailed_review.Faculty: Staff who teach in this college are well trained and educated. They play a very crucial role. They teach students and understand very easily and clearly. Semesters are average and excellent. The pass percentage will be 80% for each semester and depend on student performance.
detailed_review.Other: I choose course ECE because by choosing this course, I can go either for hardware jobs or software jobs. By learning the ECE course, we will have more knowledge in communication and chip and hardware components. Having high chances to get a job in government, like DRDO, BHEL, etc. Events and fests are also held in our college, like technical and non-technical events.

faqs.question: How can I get into Malla Reddy College of Engineering For Women for UG/PG courses? Am I eligible for admission?
faqs.answer:
Malla Reddy College of Engineering For Women has below criteria for taking admissions to it's various courses: Courses Eligibility B.E. / B.Tech Candidates who have passed or appeared at the final year of the Diploma examination in Engineering conducted by the State Board of Technical Education and Training, Telangana / Andhra Pradesh or any other examination recognised as equivalent thereto by the State Board of Technical Education and Training, Telangana / Andhra Pradesh.
Candidates should have completed 16 years of age, as on 31st December of the year of admission. There is no upper age limit. Not satisfied with answer? Ask Shiksha GPT

college_info.college_name: Manav Rachna University: Courses, Fees, Admission 2026, Placements

highlights.summary:
Manav Rachna University is a private university and is located in Faridabad. Earlier, in 2004, it was known as the Manav Rachna College of Engineering (MRCE), that later got evolved into Manav Rachna University (MRU) in 2014. It is a UGC-recognised university and has been accredited by the NAAC with an A grade. All the Technical programmes offered by the university are approved by the AICTE. Manav Rachna University comprises more than 5 schools that offer various UG, PG, and PhD programmes in the fields of Law, Management, Technology, Sciences, and others.
The university has been ranked in the band of 201-300 by the NIRF 2025 in the BTech category. It has also ranked 51 by the India Today 2025 in the BBA category. Manav Rachna University courses are offered to students at the UG and PG levels, mainly in Engineering, Management, Science, Law, and Computer Application streams. Some of the popular courses offered by the university are BTech, BBA, BSc, BCA, MBA, and MTech.
Manav Rachna University admission is both merit and entrance-based. The university accepts several national-level entrance exams such as JEE Main, CUET UG, CLAT, etc., for admission to its various courses. In addition, the university also provides scholarship opportunities to students to help them financially. MRU scholarships are offered through several schemes, namely 'Utkarsh' and 'Uttam' scheme, Sports Scholarship, Alumni Scholarship, etc. The major highlights of Manav Rachna University are mentioned in the table below:
Manav Rachna University Highlights 2026
Check out more on Manav Rachna University [MRU] Highlights in the below videos:

college_info_program.intro:
Manav Rachna University offers BTech and MBA programmes to students as its flagship programmes. These courses are offered to students at the UG and PG levels for a duration of 4 and 2 years, respectively. The university offers a BTech programme in several specialisations such as Computer Science and Engineering, Mechanical Engineering, Robotics and Artificial Engineering, etc.
Manav Rachna University courses are AICTE-approved and are offered in full-time mode. The university also offers various specialisations under its MBA programme, namely HR Analytics, Marketing Analytics, Finance Analytics, and Operations & Supply Chain Analytics. Candidates can check some of the popular programmes offered at Manav Rachna University, along with the eligibility criteria and the total course fees, in the table provided below:
For more information about Manav Rachna University [MRU] check out the below video:

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: I am satisfied because of the good faculty, helping mentors, and extracurricular activities.

detailed_review.Placements: 70% of students get placed on campus placements and others go off-campus placements. The highest package ranges from 14-20 LPA. The lowest package is 4 LPA, but it can vary. Companies like Thoughtworks, LTIMindtree, HCL, etc., hire students. 30-40% of students get internships in companies like National Instruments, etc. Software developer roles are preferred here.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Wi-Fi is available. Labs and libraries are pretty good. There are many libraries inside the campus only where students can study. It is decent. The food is good and healthy and as a college student, it is satisfying. Medical facilities are available on the campus. Sports tournaments are also conducted.
detailed_review.Faculty: The teaching quality is pretty good if students are willing to learn. The course curriculum is related to the core demands of the computer science course. Students need to do the hard work from their side too. Exams are easy if we are prepared well enough. The pass percentage is 80%.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: Satisfied with the faculty members and they are very helpful.

detailed_review.Placements: The highest salary package offered in the previous year was 55 LPA, and the lowest salary package offered was 2 LPA. Many companies like TCS, Dyson, etc., visit the college for placements. Many students got unpaid internships and many students got paid internships as they vary by student.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: I am not a hostel student, but my friend told me that is nice but not so good. Our college provides Wi-Fi, classrooms, clean labs, and proper computer setup. The library is full of books, either knowledgeable, funny or modern technology in sports. There are many clubs at the college and university levels.
detailed_review.Faculty: The course curriculum of the university is a little bit hard but good. It is very interesting and knowledgeable for students with higher learning levels in the classroom. They make students industry-ready, I thought, but the placements are average here.
detailed_review.Other: It has mainly a crowd of Delhi NCR, and seniors are very helpful.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: Manav Rachna University is a university one should join to enjoy campus life.

detailed_review.Placements: I don't remember the exact amount but around 80% of students got placement in my course. As we all know the packages vary according to our knowledge. The highest salary package offered is 18 LPA. The average salary package offered  ranges from 4 LPA - 5 LPA and the lowest salary package offered is 3.5 LPA.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: They provide good facilities like a gaming zone (indoor games), outdoor games, and good Wi-Fi speed throughout the campus. Libraries and classrooms are also good. And yes you will love our food courts.
detailed_review.Faculty: To join a college, faculty members play an important role. I can say that our faculty members are very supportive and of good nature. Students can easily build a good bond with them. They are also highly qualified and teaching quality is good. This course will properly make you industry-ready. Exams are quite tough so be ready.
detailed_review.Other: I chose B. Tech because it has been my childhood dream. The best things I can say about B. Tech are, first of all, I can get the tag of engineer, which is a prestigious tag. Also, B. Tech provides a high salary. So I guess overall my course is good and no betterment is needed. Our college also provides many events, and those events are quite well organised. The crowd at Manav Rachna University is also good.

reviews.course: BBA in Business Analytics in collaboration with ISDC
reviews.review_title: Good college, value for money.

detailed_review.Placements: 20 percent were placed. I don't know the highest and the lowest package offered by HR, and I don't know about the packages of the students as I was not in touch with the friends and faculty for a long time. But yes, it was average as I know till now.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Good amenities provided by the college, and the infrastructure was also very nice. The canteen was very good as there were 3 places to eat with different options. A Nescafé and a Subway were also there to chill and have food with friends and spend time.
detailed_review.Faculty: The exams were challenging enough, and the teachers were also equally helpful according to the problems given by the students. The teachers also gave us remarks and study material for the exams that were tough and also gave grace marks if someone needed only 1 or 2 marks to pass.
detailed_review.Other: I chose this course as I got fewer marks in 12th. The thing that should be improved is the PSC/reappear fees, as they cost a lot.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: If your home is near MRU you can definitely take admission.

detailed_review.Placements: My university has a good placement record. About 70% of students who study seriously get placed easily. The top recruiters are TCS, Capgemini, Infosys, Genpact, and American Express. The majority of us became computer science engineers through B.Tech. About 60% of students get internships, and the rest have to do a compulsory course. The companies offering internships are the same as those offering placements.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The infrastructure of my college is very good and well maintained. The college provides excellent facilities, including Wi-Fi, labs, and three libraries, each with a different purpose. The library is quiet, and students can study there from 8 am to 4 pm. The entire college is air conditioned. For sports, we have a basketball court, a cricket ground, a football ground, and an indoor sports arena. All the playing grounds and equipment are well maintained. The canteen food is very good, but a bit expensive. The food in the mess is okay, but it is affordable, and they try to offer a variety of dishes. Overall, we enjoy our meals at the college.
detailed_review.Faculty: The teachers at our college are very helpful and qualified. If we respect the teachers, they try their best to share their complete knowledge with us. The teaching quality is quite high, as teachers use projectors, smartboards, and PDFs to teach us. However, sometimes the lectures get very boring, and the teachers don't try to make them more interesting. The lectures should be made a little more interactive. Exams in our college are not very difficult, and 70-80% of students pass easily. However, there are too many exams in this college, and the checking is not very strict.
detailed_review.Other: I chose this course because I wanted to become a computer science engineer. I thought it was very cool, and I love using software to solve real-life problems for people. I can do this without going out, and I can be exposed to the whole world. This is the best choice for me because I am an introvert. However, if our college would start giving us real-life exposure from the start, it would be very beneficial for us.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: Absolutely satisfied with the college till now.

detailed_review.Placements: Good college in terms of placements. The highest package is 60 LPA in 2024. The lowest package is 4-5 LPA. Top recruiting companies are Wipro, Infosys, HCL, etc. There is a good culture for students who want internships. Recently, one student got placed in Google.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Good facilities and infrastructure are provided by Manav Rachna University. They have 4 libraries, 2 auditoriums and many rooms for workshops. It contains many lectures and tutorial rooms. All rooms are well equipped with ACs. There is Wi-Fi facility all over the campus. Hostels are also well maintained. Food at the mess and canteen is good. Well-developed medical facilities and sports arenas are there.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers are very supportive. If you really want to learn, they always back you. College provides money to students who participate in competitions and hackathons. Teachers are very qualified and have many connections in MNC. The course is very specific to industry. It is easy to pass a semester exam if you study as per teacher guidelines.
detailed_review.Other: Choosing B.Tech. CSE is really good in this college. This is the future of the world. The college provides many workshops and sessions with experts.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: Overall, I am satisfied with my college, and I love being in it.

detailed_review.Placements: On average, 80 students out of 400 get placements. The average package is 8 lakhs per annum, and the highest package is 54 lakhs per annum. Top recruiting companies are HCL, IBM, Tata, TCS, and many more. Almost 90% of the students get internships in various companies like JCB, Reliance, Google, etc.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The infrastructure is good, but the labs are not well-equipped with computers. Some of the computers do not work, and Wi-Fi sometimes creates issues. The quality of facilities in my hostel and the quality of food everywhere in the mess are not that good compared to other colleges, and I think my college is good in sports and games.
detailed_review.Faculty: The curriculum and exams of my courses are really good, and the teachers are very helpful, qualified, and knowledgeable. Almost every teacher has a doctorate in their specific field. I don’t think they are industry-ready just because being industry-ready requires much self-practice and other things; no one can make them industry-ready unless they do self-study.
detailed_review.Other: I chose the course just because I love technology, and I wish that it could be better. Many events take place, but fests take place only once every 2-3 years.

reviews.course: B.A. LL.B. (Hons.)
reviews.review_title: Manav Rachna University? Maybe think again!

detailed_review.Placements: The highest package offered was 5 LPA and the lowest is 2 LPA. Top recruiters were some successful lawyers from the area. The placements are not satisfactory at all, I got to know about it  later because I chose the college in a hurry, and now I lowkey regret.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: There are 2 libraries and both the libraries have an e-library access. Every classroom has AC installed which keeps the classrooms cool during the summers. There is a college wifi available which is only accessible to the hostelers. The hostel food has degraded and is not satisfactory as per the heavy fees charged.
detailed_review.Faculty: Apart from one or two, most of the faculty members are okay. They might have good degrees but a very few have actual experience which is satisfactory and worth the time. The course curriculum definitely has space to improve for it stresses less on practicals.
detailed_review.Other: Our batch was so boring and the vibe in the class was always off. There was just no interaction or positive vibes in the class. I chose this course because it Is my passion and a challenge to myself. I think the faculty should be more sincere and put in more efforts.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: Good private college for engineering .

detailed_review.Placements: As I get to know from my seniors, the placement package is low this year as compared to the previous years. The average is around 4 LPA. Companies like TCS come for placement, but you have to maintain a good CGPA without any backlog or any PSC in any subject, which will certainly help you get a better placement.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Manav Rachna provides good facilities and has a great infrastructure. The whole campus has a Wi-Fi network and there are numerous labs for different subjects. The classrooms were equipped with ACs and also had three libraries, a sports arena, and two medical rooms.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers are well qualified and knowledgeable, and some teachers are very supportive. Even after you graduate, they still help you out. The core curriculum is relevant as it follows AICTE guidelines. The semester exams were hard in some subjects, and the passing criteria is 40% for semester exams.
detailed_review.Other: The 2023 batch was good. There are students of different personalities and backgrounds who all come together to do their CSE core course, and the college also provides scholarships.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: My Review With My Experience .

detailed_review.Placements: There is an 80% chance of placement in my course. The highest package is 60 LPA, with an average of 8 LPA in the college. Top company recruiters visiting our college include HCL, Xebia, Google, Capgemini, Microsoft, etc. There is an opportunity for students to acquire an internship through the college as well. A student secured an internship at Google last month.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The infrastructure of the college is amazing. There is campus-wide free Wi-Fi support for students. There are around 15 labs in the college, including computer labs, chemistry labs, etc. There are about 4 libraries in the college. The medical facility is very good; the doctor is available on Wednesday and Friday at no cost. There are many sports facilities in the college.
detailed_review.Faculty: The faculty is very good in nature. All the faculty members are Ph.D. holders. They are supportive of students and guide them in many ways. They are like the backbone of the students, there will be 1 midterm exam and 1 end-of-semester exam for each semester. Each subject will be of 200 marks. The difficulty level is good in the semester exams, no one can copy. They conduct exams very strictly.
detailed_review.Other: I chose this course because, after completing my graduation, I will have clarity on which curriculum I should choose, there are many events that will happen in the college. Most of these events will be related to students and education. There will be a scholarship test to join the college. With high marks, we can acquire around 50% scholarship.

reviews.course: BBA in Finance and Accounts in association with Banking ,Financial services, Insurance sector Skill Council of India ( BFSISSCI)
reviews.review_title: Moderately satisfied because of environment .

detailed_review.Placements: There is very less chance of getting placement from this branch as an average student or being sitting in an interview, you need to work hard. The roles offered in our course are sales marketing, HR finance accounts, and internship opportunities from campus.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Classrooms are fully air conditioned and smart class with projector in each class. Students have also access to Wi-Fi labs are also well designed there are indoor and outdoor sports both and equipments for both are available There are 3 libraries in campus, and one is the biggest in Faridabad .
detailed_review.Faculty: Faculty members are very helpful, kind, and hardworking; they maintain good behaviour with students and have a have a friendly nature. The course curriculum is very nice, and in between there are industry visits, which makes it exciting for all students as it is a is a fun part. The semester exams are moderate, and you at least need to pass 50% of them.
detailed_review.Other: As the crowd is so bad in this college, the caste discrimination goes on. Only one fest is being organised by the college in a year, which is a big fest. There are so many activities and clubs to join by the students. I opted for this course as I wanted to do business. That's why I want to do the management stream.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: Overview of Manav Rachna University.

detailed_review.Placements: 100% placements guarantee is taken by the college. The highest package offered this year was 51 Lacs and the average was around 3 to 4 LPA. Nokia, Qss, Amazon web services, and Plato are big companies which make the highest offers in the campus. 70 to 80% guaranteed internships are provided in various role like tech, account as well as sales.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Infrastructure is so good and well maintained, it is based on greenery and the building looks is like a flagship. There are too many departments like Engineering, Law, Science, BBA, MBA, etc. My department is so good because in the IT field, there is a boom in the market and the course focuses on it. The hostel is too expensive and the quality of food is good. There is a sports arena where you play many games. There is collaboration with Sarvodhya in terms of medical facilities.
detailed_review.Faculty: The teachers are very helpful and will solve your problems within a minute. Their way of teaching is good with good qualification and experience of above 20+ years. The curriculum is all about what the companies ask in the interviews. It is to make us completely placements ready. The exams level is difficult. 60-70% students pass in the semester exams.
detailed_review.Other: In the era of IT industry, there is a boom in technology which is of an extreme level and I love programming, so I chose this course. Many of the subjects which are not IT related, could be cut by the course. Every year, fest is organized for students like cultural, sports and tech. If you score 80%, you are eligible for scholarship.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: Great college with great infrastructure .

detailed_review.Placements:
Okay, so I will be telling you about our senior batch placement record. The placements at MRU are pretty good, as even if you manage to perform just above average in your exams and maintain a good CGPA throughout the course, you can crack a job of about 8–10 LPA. As about 80% of the students placed, the highest package was 54 LPA. The average package is around 7-8 LPA, with the lowest being about 4-5 LPA. There were some top recruiters like HCL, cognizant, HDFC, etc.
As far as the internships are concerned, they are conducted by the college itself but I would suggest an internship from the outside. We are provided with all sorts of courses.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The hostel here is pretty great and has decent-quality food. We are provided with free Wi-Fi, laundry, library, gym, sports arena, etc. The hostel looks after the health and hygiene of the students and the food quality is average. Overall, I would say the hostel is good.
detailed_review.Faculty: The teachers are great and supportive; they are ready to help you out in every possible way, as we have some highly qualified professors. The course is designed in a great manner, which gives us clarity on everything as it is designed to be productive. We had mid-semester exams, then followed the end terms.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: Overall, it is a good university.

detailed_review.Placements: Placements are average. The average package is like 5 LPA and the highest is around 54 LPA. Just stay away from those students who don't want to study, because they will ruin your future too. Many clubs are there at the university; you can join them to shape your future.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Good infrastructure. It is very well maintained and it is situated in the Aravalli Hills. contains a park and sports arena. They gave their volleyball and cricket teams, which play in tournaments like district or state. There is Wi-Fi enabled all over the campus.
detailed_review.Faculty: Very well-behaving faculty. Good exams and interview or placement preparation. Interview preparation starts in the first year. Good and qualified teachers from DU and MDU. The course is well maintained according to recent needs. If you study consistently, then exams are very easy.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: It is a very good college in Faridabad to pursue B.Tech.

detailed_review.Placements: Around 80-90% of students got placed in our college. Many students got placed with an average salary package of 5 LPA - 7 LPA. The highest salary package offered for the UI/UX designer role is 54 LPA. Many companies visit our college for internships and placements.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The girls' hostel is well-maintained. It is Wi-Fi enabled. There are 4-5 libraries in our college. They have very peaceful environment. The hostel provides food 4 times a day. It has a proper menu. Our college has a very good ground for basketball and cricket.
detailed_review.Faculty: All teachers are good and qualified. They guide us during exams. They teach well. Many of them have given TEDx speeches. The teaching quality is good. The curriculum gets updated along with time. The semester exams are average.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: Good college infrastructure, campus, and all facilities are also good.

detailed_review.Placements: Placements are very good in this college. Every student got internships and placements both. Facilities are very helpful for forcing the students to get participate in various hackathon. Average package is 24 LPA. Companies are TCS, paypal, Wipro, microsoft.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Classrooms are well maintained. Library is also good where students study in environment. Canteen food is also good. Various sports are playing in this college and events are also held for sports academy. Hostel is also good Wi-Fi facility is available in whole campus.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers are very helpful and qualified. Teaching quality is also good. Projectors are also good in all classes. Yes course curriculum is updated every year. There are two categories for exams mid term and end term session and practical are also held.
detailed_review.Other: I choose this course because like coding and develop website. Events, fest are also held .

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering (Cyber Security and Threat Intelligence) in Association with Quick Heal
reviews.review_title: Manav Rachna University : A Dynamic Learning Hub.

detailed_review.Placements: So, I am in first year and after digging a little bit I found out that the placement of this college is not actually bad. The average package in this college is around 5-6 LPA and the highest package this year (2023) was 54 LPA. The Top recruiters of this university is TCS, Wipro, Infosys, Paloalto, capgemini. Many Students from my Course got internship from Gurugram Cyber Police.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The Campus is spread across a vast area. The classrooms are equipped with modern teaching aids. Their are in total 4 library in campus with variety of study materials each library also have a digital library equipped with high-speed internet. Whole campus have a high-speed internet connectivity. Overall the infrastructure supports a enriching educational experience.
detailed_review.Faculty: All the teachers are helpful expect a few. They possess a strong academic background and industry experience. The teaching quality is somewhat average, but professor do use variety of teaching methods including case studies, practical sessions. The Course curriculum is relevant and it frequently changes from sem to sem. The curriculum focuses on balanced mixed of theory and practicals. The semester exams are not that difficult, you have studied enough it will be easy for you. The teachers give you some tutorials and most of the time the exams come from that only.
detailed_review.Other: I chose this course because of my interest in Cyber Security. The best thing about my course that the faculty is very nice and always help us in learning new stuff. We frequently participates in CTF and the faculty always help us if we are stuck in the CTF. I would like to add more practical rather than theory because it is boring. There are many events happening like every week or two, the fest are also great even the crowd. The seniors are also helpful. If you score above 90 percent in Class 12 boards then there is scholarship on tuition fees, but then you have to maintain 7 CGPA in every year. There is a cricket ground, football ground, basketball court and sports arena inside campus.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering (Lateral Entry)
reviews.review_title: It is a decent underrated college.

detailed_review.Placements: Around 85-90% of students got placed in this course. The lowest salary package offered ranges between 3.8 LPA - 4.5 LPA. The highest salary package offered was 40 LPA. The minimum salary package offered was 6 LPA. Summer internships are mandatory in this college. Training is also provided for recruitment.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Our campus is Wi-Fi enabled. Laboratories are well-equipped. Our campus is beautiful. Many libraries are available in this college. Canteens are better. Subway, Nescafe, and Hush are also available in this college.
detailed_review.Faculty: All faculty members are qualified. Semester exams are easy. The pass percentage is 75-80%. The course curriculum is 80% relevant as it regularly gets updated.
detailed_review.Other: I chose this course because of my interest in computers. Annual fest is conducted in this college. Singers like Milind Gaba visit our campus for entertainment purposes.

reviews.course: BBA in Health Care Management
reviews.review_title: Good campus and infrastructure.

detailed_review.Placements: It has a decent placement. the things matters during your placement is the way you talk to the supervisor and almost all students got placed having good CGPA, many big companies visits MRU.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The infrastructure is very nice all building looks like newly build. time to time recreation takes place in manav rachna University. classroom are very big and have good interior. there is full Wi-Fi excess and all buildings are fully AC.
detailed_review.Faculty: The teachers are well qualified and experienced and have brilliant teaching skills. if a person goes under their supervision they will never face failure in semester. one should have practice good to get good marks at the end.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: A good infrastructure and facilities with highly qualified professors .

detailed_review.Placements:
More than 90% of the students got placed in my CSE general course.
The highest package offered by our university is INR 54LPA.
The average is INR 12 lpa, and the least is INR 4 lpa.
The top recruiters at my university are Microsoft, Google, Jio, Infosys, and Qualcomm C.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: In our university hostel, there is super-fast 5G networked Wi-Fi availability, international-level good labs with high-end equipment, digital and recorded classrooms, and more than 20 libraries, all of which are highly filled with the greatest and most researchable books for every block of campus.
detailed_review.Faculty:
The entire teaching staff and faculty are from top IITs and NITs. There are highly qualified teaching staff with professional teaching methods.
Yes, the course curriculum is relevant to the subjects they are given. It makes the students industry-ready.

admission.title: Manav Rachna University Admission Overview 2026
admission.overview_text: Manav Rachna University course admission is both merit and entrance-based. The university conducts its entrance exam by the name of Manav Rachna National Aptitude Test (MRNAT) for providing admission to various courses. MRU also accepts national-level entrance exams like SAT India, CLAT , etc. for admission to specific courses. Manav Rachna University offers various courses at UG and PG levels in multiple streams like Engineering, Management, Science, Law, etc. through its five schools under Manav Rachna Educational Institutions. The MRU application process is conducted in online mode only. Along with its in-house entrance exam, the college also accepts CUET scores for scholarships.

faqs.question: How can I get admission in Manav Rachna University BTech course?
faqs.answer: The selection to BTech course is based on MRNAT score. MRNAT is a national-level entrance examination that is conducted every year for the students seeking admission to the university. MRNAT is an objective type online-based entrance test of 90 minutes duration with questions from the syllabus covered in the qualifying exam. Manav Rachna University also accepts scores of SAT India. The merit of the candidates in the last qualifying exam is also considered for admission. All the shortlisted candidates, who receive admission offer letter from the university shall be required to send the acceptance of admission for the offered course in the format which shall be sent by the university authority along with the letter. After completion of the selection rounds, the shortlisted candidates are called for verification of the documents

faqs.question: What is the fee for BTech at Manav Rachna University?
faqs.answer: The tution fee for BTech course ranges between INR 4.96 lakh- INR 6.88 lakh . Aspirants are required to pay the course fee after completion of all the selection rounds to confirm their seats in the university.  The fee for BTech specialisations is different as the course is in collaboration with industry and includes the training fee of knowledge partners. In case, a candidate is unable to pay the fee within the specified time, his or her admission will stand cancelled. Aspirants will also need to pay a registration fee to apply for admission. The application fee for each course is INR 1,200 . Candidates can pay the registration fee via any of the online payment mode. After getting admission in the university, students need to pay yearly fee as per the deadline specified to avoid additional charges. Other than this, candidates must also have to pay for additional components such as hostel and one-time charges. However, t his information is sourced from official website/ sanctioning body and is subject to change. Candidates are advised to visit the official website for more details.

faqs.question: What is the application fee for BTech at Manav Rachna University?
faqs.answer: Candidates seeking for admission to BTech at Manav Rachna University must apply online on the university's official website.  The application fee for each course is INR 1200 .

sections.heading: Introduction
text: For more information about Manav Rachna University [MRU] check out the below video:

facilities.name: Library
facilities.description: A well-equipped Library is an icon of quality education in its supreme form. It has a collection of more than 3, 00,000 documents in print and electronic format. The library deploys a single point of access for the content management system for e-Learning through library portal, MOOCs, NPTEL Video Lectures and Open Access Resources, and Current Awareness Service like Book Alert Service, Article Alert Service, and Book Review Service. The collection offers a range of textbooks, reference books and general reading material for enrichment and development. The Library with its state-of-the-art infrastructure, plush and spacious settings, aesthetically done up interiors and the huge collection of documents is bibliophile’s dream come true.

facilities.name: Hostel
facilities.description: The university has the total of 4 hostels (2 for girls and 2 for boys) which include A/C, Non-A/C on single/ double/ triple/ seater rooms with attached/ common bathrooms with essential modern facilities like TV, computer systems, Wi-fi, hygienic mess, first-aid and ambulance facility, Hot water in winters, 24 hrs security, 24 hrs electric power back up, Transport facility for local market on weekly basis, Laundry facility for hostelers, and many more. Sports activities are also available for the hostel students.

facilities.name: Shuttle Service
facilities.description: The university has a fleet of luxury A/C buses to provide transport to the students for Delhi – NCR covering various locations of Delhi, Noida, and Gurgaon. It has also a fleet of Non-AC Delux buses for Faridabad, Ballabgarh and Palwal students. During end semester exam days, apart from regular routes, MREI provides shuttle service for Tughlakabad Metro Station, Delhi, Mathura Road (Badkhal Chowk) Faridabad & Pali Chowk from the campus.

available_facilities: EM Theory and Tx Lines Lab
