college_info.college_name: Marwadi University: Courses, Fees, Admission 2025, Placements, Cutoff

highlights.summary:
Marwadi University was established in 2008. The University has been accredited with an 'A' grade by NAAC. It is ranked 62nd by India Today for its Science stream programmes. The university campus boasts of world-class facilities such as Wi-Fi, Networked, ICT enabled, 190 MBPS Internet BW, Hostels with all the modern facilities, Theater Type, Interactive, ICT enable world-class teaching-learning Infrastructure, lab Equipment from leading multinational companies like Bosch, IBM, and many more.
Marwadi University Rajkot offers programmes at UG, PG, Diploma, and doctoral levels in different disciplines. Admission to the courses is merit and entrance-based. The highest package offered in the Marwadi University placements was recorded to be INR 34.5 LPA. It was offered by Amazon Development Centre India Pvt. Ltd. Furthermore, the University also offers certificate courses.
Multinationals and International Universities
For more information about Marwadi University check out the below videos:

college_info_program.intro:
The university offers undergraduate, postgraduate, diploma, and doctoral-level programmes. It offers popular courses such as BTech, MBA, BCom, and more across different specialisations. Some of the specialisations in which a four-year BTech is offered include Mechanical Engineering, Computer Engineering - Artificial Engineering, Information Technology, etc. Admission to the courses is done as per the ACPC and the norms of Gujarat government. Marwadi University Reviews on Placements, Faculty & Facilities

reviews.course: B.Tech in Computer Science and Engineering (Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning)
reviews.review_title: Infrastructure is good, facilities are available at any college time.

detailed_review.Placements: 60 percentage of students can be placed in our course. The highest package is 12 LPA and the lowest package is 3 LPA. Top recruiters are Flipkart, Amazon, etc. 20 percentage of students got internships in our course in Infosys, Amazon. Top roles offered are artificial Intelligence engineers and machine learning engineers.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Well-regarded for its modern facilities, labs, seminar halls, and good Wi-Fi. Classrooms are very good and the most beautiful thing in this college is the library. The quality of the facilities in our hostel is good, and all the food which we have is very tasty. The mess and canteen, medical facilities are good, and sports and games are very few.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers are very helpful and highly qualified and there are very knowledgeable.  The curriculum is relevant to the course. The curriculum is helpful to make the students industry-ready. If we study well and attend the class regularly, the semester exams are easy. In our course, 80 percentage of students pass their exams.
detailed_review.Other: Because the upcoming years depend only on Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning. My wish to management is to focus on computer systems. Events and fests are held in a year at once. The campus surrounding looks good.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Mechanical Engineering (Artificial Intelligence & Machine Learning - PBL)
reviews.review_title: Infrastructure is good, facilities are available at any college time.

detailed_review.Placements:
75 percent of students are placed in 2023. The highest package is 34.50 LPA, and the lowest package is 5 LPA. The list of recruiters includes Amazon, TCS, Cognizant, Capgemini, and many others. 40 percent of students got internships in Infosys, Amazon, and others.

.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: In Marwadi University, the facilities are well maintained, and the staff is well trained and educated. The library is very good. Classrooms and labs are excellent, and the overall infrastructure is excellent. Hostel facilities are good, and wardens are very helpful. If there is any issue, they respond immediately. Mess, canteen, and medical facilities are also good.
detailed_review.Faculty: The teachers are very helpful and can explain in a simple manner. They are well trained and experienced. The teaching quality is good. The curriculum is relevant to the course. Semester exams are moderate for students, and around 85 percent of students pass the exams.
detailed_review.Other: The upcoming years will always depend on Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning. Timings are excellent.

reviews.reviewer_name: Devi Veera Venkata Sai Ram Tamma
reviews.course: B.Tech in Mechanical Engineering (Robotics and Automation)
reviews.review_title: Overall, the university is good.

detailed_review.Placements: More than 80% of students get placed. The packages range from 3 LPA to 7 LPA. Companies like Honda, Bosch, Adani, and Toyota hire students. Many students get placement in core companies. This R&A course started in 2025, but the offers are good.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Labs and other facilities are all perfect. Sometimes, you may face network problems. Sports and games, as well as medical facilities, are good. In the hostel, the main C-block rooms and washrooms are unhygienic. Food is also good. Only vegetarian options in the mess, but non-vegetarian food is available at one center of the university.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teaching is excellent. Teachers are helpful to us. When you explain a problem clearly, they answer you. It is based on students. You don’t need to worry about exams. You need to write the main points based on the question to get marks, and they do not consider the length of the answer. Faculty is good at teaching AutoCAD, designing, and automation.
detailed_review.Other: Robotics is my passion. Based on that, I joined here due to the lower fees for Andhra Pradesh and Telangana students. AI is the future, and robotics will be combined with it. In the boys’ hostel, some rooms and washrooms in C-block are not good and should be improved. In other activities, they are very good.

reviews.course: B.E. in Computer Engineering (Artificial Intelligence)
reviews.review_title: Supportive faculty, modern infrastructure, and good placement with an industry-ready curriculum.

detailed_review.Placements: In our course, the overall placement record has been quite impressive, with nearly 85%-90% of the students from the recent passing out batch securing jobs. The highest package offered is around 44 LPA, and the average package ranges between 6 LPA-7 LPA. The roles offered are diverse, ranging from software engineering, data analyst, VLSI design, etc.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The facilities and infrastructure available in our department are well-developed to support both academic and practical learning. The Classrooms have smart board projectors and Wi-Fi connectivity, ensuring an interactive teaching environment. The campus has good medical facilities with a health center, and the college has excellent sports and games infrastructure.
detailed_review.Faculty: The teachers in our department are highly qualified and supportive, always willing to clarify doubts and guide students in academics as well as projects. The teaching quality is generally good, with a maximum of traditional classrooms. The course curriculum is updated regularly to include trending technologies like AI, ML, data science, VLSI, etc.

reviews.course: BBA in Business Analytics
reviews.review_title: Average experience: Decent infrastructure, but poor teaching quality and limited placements.

detailed_review.Placements: Around 50% of students were placed from the course, with an average package of 3-4 LPA and the highest package reaching 8 LPA. Companies like Amazon, ICICI, and others recruited. Nearly 80% of students got internships, mainly in sales and marketing-related roles.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Infrastructure of the college is good, with proper classrooms, library, and labs. The hostel is decent but overcrowded, forcing many students to stay in outside hostels. The hostel department is rude, Wi-Fi is poor, but the food quality and canteen facilities are good.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers are generally helpful, but many are not highly qualified, which makes the teaching quality average. The curriculum is moderately relevant and provides some exposure to the industry, along with extracurricular activities. Semester exams are of easy to moderate level, and nearly 80% of students are able to clear them without much difficulty. Overall, the academic experience is fair but has scope for improvement.
detailed_review.Other: Because business analyst is a booming career, there should be industry professionals to explain business analytics to us, and events should go on smoothly. However, there is no scholarship provided by the college.

reviews.course: B.E. in Computer Engineering
reviews.review_title: The university is highly satisfactory and has had good placements since 2023.

detailed_review.Placements: 75% of students from our course are placed. The highest package is 40 LPA, and the lowest is 8 LPA, with an average package of 6 LPA. The top recruiting companies include Tech Mahindra, TCS, and other state-based companies like the Adani Group. Nearly all students from our course secured internships with various companies across Gujarat.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: We have a well-stocked library with a variety of books, and the entire campus is equipped with Wi-Fi. Each class has its own dedicated lab for different subjects, with lab sessions held weekly. The facilities in our hostel are good, with both AC and non-AC rooms available. However, the quality of the food is not ideal for South Indian students from Andhra and Telangana.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers are very helpful, assisting us with both our studies and external exams. They are highly qualified and knowledgeable, and the overall teaching quality is good. The course curriculum is relevant to current industry standards, and we also have industry collaborations. The semester exams are not very difficult, it's easy to pass by studying just one day before the exam.
detailed_review.Other: This course is currently trending, with many industries offering placements in this field. There is no need for improvement in our course as it is perfectly aligned with industry needs. Events and festivals are organized in our college twice a week by various clubs. The campus is well-connected to the university, with all types of transportation facilities available nearby, including an airport.

reviews.course: B.E. in Computer Engineering
reviews.review_title: It has good infrastructure and facilities.

detailed_review.Placements: A concise overview of B.Tech placements at Marwadi University (Rajkot): in 2023, the university witnessed more than 800 job offers from over 450-480 recruiting companies, achieving a placement rate of around 75-90% for engineering students. The highest package is 34.5 LPA. The average salary package ranges from 5.3-6 LPA. More than 125 students secured a package above 5 LPA. Major recruiters include Amazon, TCS, Capgemini, Cognizant, IBM, and Microsoft. Student reports and reviews highlight that the CSE and IT branches perform the best. The core streams typically get the average package that ranges from 3-5 LPA.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Marwadi University boasts a modern and well-planned campus spread over more than 100 acres in Rajkot, Gujarat. It features smart classrooms, high-tech labs, a vast digital library, and dedicated innovation and research centers. The campus includes separate hostels with Wi-Fi, sports complexes, a gym, and medical facilities. It has an eco-friendly design with lush greenery that enhances the learning environment. The university also provides advanced computing resources, incubation centers, and auditoriums to support academics, entrepreneurship, and extracurricular development in a holistic manner.
detailed_review.Faculty: Marwadi University houses more than 500 faculty members, including more than 110 PhD holders. Many faculty members are from top institutions like IITs, NITs, BITS, and Stanford. The faculty team comprises professors, associate professors, and assistant professors actively engaged in research, papers, and workshops. We are led by experienced academic administrators such as Dr. R. Sridaran, with more than 25 years of teaching and guiding PhD scholars. Faculty members emphasis holistic students. Some students provide feedback from Reddit notes that only top performers receive strong support, and others feel limited involvement from faculty beyond core academics.

reviews.course: B.E. in Computer Engineering
reviews.review_title: It is excellent and recommended to next coming juniors because it's a wonderful university.

detailed_review.Placements: Placements are excellent, and the CSE course at Marwadi University is excellent because there are so many clubs. The average package for students is higher compared to other colleges, wonderful.I like this college, it has an excellent student success team and motivation.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Hostel life in Marwadi University is wonderful, and the food is excellent compared to others. The hostel maintenance is excellent, and the rules are very good. Both the college and hostel were wonderful.
detailed_review.Faculty: Faculty and the system of education at Marwadi University are excellent compared to other colleges. The faculty are well-experienced and trained as per industry standards. Exams are strict and conducted under CCTV surveillance, and they return the papers to us to check for mistakes.
detailed_review.Other: Events at Marwadi University are excellent and more enjoyable than being at home.

reviews.course: Bachelor of Physiotherapy (BPT)
reviews.review_title: Consider going to a government college.

detailed_review.Placements: To get admission in Marwadi University, you must have 50% marks in 12th Science if you want to enroll in BPT. Placement is fine, but one has to struggle. To get a good salary, you need to pursue a master's degree. You cannot expect too much from this bachelor's degree.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Facilities in Marwadi University are good. All labs and classrooms are good. There is a library as well, but the classrooms do not have AC. This college wastes a lot of money. You can't even think of eating or living. They do not provide the study material beforehand.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers here are good and teach well, but they call us home for small mistakes. Discipline has to be maintained. One has to struggle. After completing the college course, one does not get much attention. One has to do a master’s degree as well. Only then can one get a good salary.
detailed_review.Other: If I do not pass NEET, I will decide to do this course because I find it better than a B.Sc. But a 4-year course and a 6-month internship are necessary, followed by MPT, and then one gets a good salary. This course is good if you have completed a master’s degree. You cannot expect a salary of 1 lakh without it.

reviews.course: Master of Business Administration (MBA)
reviews.review_title: I am absolutely satisfied with this college.

detailed_review.Placements: The percentage of placements at Marwadi University is about 90% to 95%. They provide an average package of about 4 LPA, and maximum is 20 LPA. The companies that come for recruitments are Berger, Flipkart, Amazon, Adani, Reliance, D Smart, and also Gujarat's local companies. The sum of total companies is about 500. Percentage of getting an internship is about 100%. The top role is offered at the managerial level.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The infrastructure, hostels are far better than the other universities at this level. There are good speed Wi-Fi, big space 2 libraries with super computers and seperate cabins, and good classroom as we see in movies. They organise many games, good and healthy food, medical facilities, and all are good.
detailed_review.Faculty: All faculty members are good and helpful and give their full effort to prepare you for the future. They provide industrial visits, training on how work is done in industry, and many more. Semester examinations are not much difficult. They prepared you well but the passing marks are based on cutoff system.
detailed_review.Other: I chose this course because my interest is in that field. I chose this college because it provides the best way of learning within my budget and good classroom facilities with good professors. This college is ragging-free. They organise fest in the best way.

reviews.course: B.E. in Information Technology
reviews.review_title: It is a very good college.

detailed_review.Placements: It is the best college for education. It has many advantages and is very beneficial to the students; the fees are friendly. Many students secure placements, with the highest B Tech package being 54 LPA and the lowest 4 LPA. Approximately 70% of students received internships from companies like TLC, Amazon, and Google. The B Tech degree is the top program at our college.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The facilities are very good, and there are luxurious amenities. The mess food is okay; perhaps I feel a bit disappointed with the food because I come from the South, but it is manageable and not too bad. For sports, we have excellent facilities as well.
detailed_review.Faculty: It is not very difficult maybe be passing percentage is 90%. Sometimes it feels difficult in the exams time but we have to study right so we have to do hard work. We have to study. We have to mainly concentrate on computer languages like Python, java, etc. It is very nice.
detailed_review.Other: It is very nice to celebrate festivals and events.

reviews.course: B.E. in Computer Engineering (Artificial Intelligence)
reviews.review_title: About the college everything is nice but the rules are so critical that students can't follow.

detailed_review.Placements: I have joined in the college very recently and the college placement are nice. These year in our college there are over 50%placements in our college and 20% students got internships. According to this in our college placement are good and I think they are better.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The infrastructure is good but the hostel capacity is not that much good there are less rooms than the capacity inside the hostel and the food also should be changed according to the student taste and this can be more nice. And the wife will close at night 2:00 and starts morning 7:00 .
detailed_review.Faculty: The teachers are good and friendly to the students. They are well knowledgeable about the subject and they are polite, decent and friendly to the student. They will explain well. The staff is very friendly so the students can ask anything freely and the best part is they explain till students understand .
detailed_review.Other: There are full of strict discipline in the college that no one can follow. I think I discipline rules should be less so a student can express themselves .

reviews.course: Bachelor of Business Administration (BBA)
reviews.review_title: Best infrastructure in the Saurashtra region, a must for admission.

detailed_review.Placements: Around 6 to 7% of students are placed in my course. The highest package offered in my college is around 34 LPA, and the average is 5.27 LPA. The top recruiting companies for my course are Amazon, Google, TCS, IBM, HDFC Bank, and Kotak Mahindra Bank. The top roles offered are business analyst, marketing executive, financial analyst, sales manager, and HR executive.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: All the necessary things which a student wants are provided, like modern classrooms, 2 large libraries, computer labs, and a hostel. The quality of food in the mess is average and good in the canteen. Medical facilities are also available 24 by 7. All types of grounds and courts are available for sports and games.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers at Marwadi University are quite helpful, well-qualified, and knowledgeable. The BBA course curriculum is well-structured and highly relevant to current industry trends. As for the exams, they are moderate in difficulty. The pass percentage is generally high.
detailed_review.Other: I chose this course because I have a strong interest in business. I wish that teachers teach us in more practical ways as it will be more helpful. I love my college events and fests.

reviews.course: B.E. in Computer Engineering
reviews.review_title: Academic idea about Marwadi University.

detailed_review.Placements: Placements of the college is the main reason I chose this college. The university has a great network with various companies offering a great placement. Particularly for the computer science branch, the average package offered is 6 LPA. The highest package is 22 LPA.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The college is well-equipped with air-conditioned classrooms with Wi-Fi facilities all over the campus. The college also has great mess and canteen facilities where the food provided is hygienic and the cost of food is also reasonable. The college also has various sports grounds and NCC cadets.
detailed_review.Faculty: The university has teachers from renowned universities across the globe and the content delivery of the professors is great. The course is designed in a way to increase professionalism and make students ready for the outside world. Exams at the college are more based on practicality.
detailed_review.Other: The college is situated near the city of Rajkot and is a good option to choose from localities. However, if we have an option to choose any other better colleges, then I would suggest going with it.

reviews.course: B.E. in Computer Engineering
reviews.review_title: One of the best colleges I have seen.

detailed_review.Placements: The percentage of students placed in my course is 3000 students. The highest package is 15 LPA, and the lowest package is 6 LPA. More than 70 companies visit for recruitment. 75% of internships are offered in my course. You must be in the discipline in the classes or on the campus.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The facilities of the college are very good. Classes are so neat and clean. Labs facilities are so good. Hostel facilities are good. The quality of the food is good. Medical facility is there. The canteen is so clean. The faculty of medical is good and they will take care of the students.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teaching quality is good. Teachers have more than 10 years of experience. The semester exams are so difficult, and the invigilation is very strict at the college. The pass percentage is 60%. The exam facilities are good.
detailed_review.Other: I chose this course to become a software engineer. We can also learn coding. College will also conduct fests for everyone.

reviews.course: B.E. in Information Technology
reviews.review_title: Industry-relevant curriculum with strong infrastructure, but needs more real-world exposure.

detailed_review.Placements: I am from the 2024-2027 batch of B.Tech in Information and Communication Technology at Marwadi University. Around 85% of students in our course got placed, with the highest package being 10 LPA and an average of about 4.2 LPA. Many got internships too, mostly in companies like TCS, Elnfochips, and some local startups.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Marwadi University offers excellent infrastructure for all courses, including high-speed Wi-Fi, modern labs, smart classrooms, and a vibrant library. Hostels are clean and secure with good amenities, while the mess provides hygienic food meals and multiple canteen options. They provide a gym, 24/7 ambulance service, and maintained sports grounds with indoor game zones.
detailed_review.Faculty: The teaching quality is good, combining theory and practical exposure through labs and projects. The course curriculum is regularly updated, covering trending technologies like AI, IoT, and cloud computing, making students industry-ready. Semester exams are moderately difficult, focusing on concepts and applications.
detailed_review.Other: I chose this course because it blends core computer science with communication technologies, opening doors to fields like networking, IoT, AI, and full-stack development. The best parts of this course are the hands-on lab sessions, supportive faculty, and industry-relevant curriculum.

reviews.course: Discontinued (Sep 2025)- Integrated B.Tech in Computer Engineering
reviews.review_title: One of the best value to money ratios provided by college.

detailed_review.Placements: According to recent placement status, only less students got placements. About 50% of students got placed in good companies. The highest package is 34 LPA, and the lowest salary is 4 LPA. Top companies like Adani Group, Reliance Group, and many more. Many people got internships too.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Infrastructure of the course is well-organised. Wi-Fi is provided for laptops, only the connectivity is good. There are many labs also. Classrooms are very nice. The library has many books available and all models of law books are also available. When come to the hostel, it is no less than a 3-star hotel. The hostel is very good. They provide many facilities and good medical services are also available any time on campus.
detailed_review.Faculty: Curriculum is well-organised. Faculty members are very good and are friendly to everyone. They explain in such a way that everyone will understand easily. They are good qualified and have high knowledge. The curriculum is relevant. Student industry-ready. The exams are designed in such a way that everyone has to pass the exams.
detailed_review.Other: All the activities in college are good and provide lots of fun.

reviews.course: Discontinued (Sep 2025)- Integrated B.Tech in Computer Engineering
reviews.review_title: It is a good for an economical week.

detailed_review.Placements: The highest package offered is 34 lakhs, while the lowest package is 2 lakhs. The average package is 3 lakhs, and 70% of students are placed through the college's placement program. The college provides internships starting from the second year and offers high-quality education.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The hostel infrastructure is poor, and while Wi-Fi is available, the food quality leaves much to be desired, although it is somewhat convenient. The library is accessible, and there are 24-hour facilities for students to study and work.
detailed_review.Faculty: The exam structure and curriculum are excellent, providing a conducive environment for learning. The college has numerous research labs, which enhance the academic experience. However, the semester challenges make passing difficult, and only students with a top percentage of 9.0 SPI achieve significant recognition.
detailed_review.Other: I am enthusiastic about learning and interested in pursuing new courses that emphasize top-quality examinations.

reviews.course: B.E. in Computer Engineering
reviews.review_title: Value for money and the best campus life.

detailed_review.Placements: About 97% of students are placed in the last placement round. The highest package is 37.5 LPA when I saw, the average package is 5 LPA, and the lowest package is 2.5 LPA. The top recruiting companies are Amazon, Wipro, and private banks. About 40% of students get internships, and others aren't interested.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Everything is very good here. Hostels and high-speed Wi-Fi connection are available overall on the campus. Classrooms are air-conditioned. Our library holds a world record. We have TV rooms on every floor, as well as a cricket ground, two football grounds, a box cricket ground, and individual grounds for various games. The food is excellent, and there is a 24/7 medical room and a reliable water supply, etc.
detailed_review.Faculty: Every faculty member are friendly and supportive. They explain everything easily by using real-life examples. Their curriculum is very good, making it easy to follow without any stress. We also have personality development classes every week. The semester exams are easy too, they don't make the paper tough. It is very easy to pass, and the pass percentage is about 35%-40%.
detailed_review.Other: I chose this course because I'm interested in computers. My course offers many benefits, and there are many individual faculties for subjects like arts, robotics, etc. There is nothing to improve about my course. Every year, our college has many fests, like in January, February, December, and Diwali Garba, etc. The campus life is very well enjoyable. Scholarships are available for students with above 90% in 12th.

reviews.course: Discontinued (Sep 2025)- Integrated B.Tech in Computer Engineering
reviews.review_title: We have a good course, but a bad outcome.

detailed_review.Placements: Placements are poor. Very few reputed companies visit the campus. Most offers are from startups with low-pay core branches that get almost no attention. The college lacks proper training and industry tie-ups are not recommended if you are looking for good job opportunities.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The course infrastructure is well developed with good labs and classrooms. However, the hostel facilities are below average, poor maintenance, hygiene issues, and lack of basic amenities make the stay uncomfortable and need serious improvement in living conditions.
detailed_review.Faculty: Faculty members are average. Some are helpful others not so much. The curriculum is well structured and up to date with industry needs exams are manageable with fair evaluation. Overall academics are decent but could improve with more interactive teaching.
detailed_review.Other: The college offers some value for money with decent academics, but the overall experience doesn't match the cost campus life is dull with limited events poor student engagement, and a lack of extracurriculars. Not ideal if you're looking for a vibrant college environment.

college_info.college_name: Marwadi University Admission 2025: Eligibility, Application Process, Exam Dates

faqs.question: What is the procedure to take Diploma course admission at Marwadi University?
faqs.answer: Admissions Procedure: Merit-based admissions are used for Marwadi University's Diploma program. All of the admissions are completed online. PIN Generation: The PIN must be obtained from the bank via an online or offline procedure through the Admission Committee for Professional Diploma Courses (ACPDC), Gujarat.

faqs.question: How many students can do B.Tech at Marwadi University?
faqs.answer: 8500+ students can do B.Tech at Marwadi University. Marwadi University offers UG and PG courses in the field of IT & Software, Law and Engineering. Under these streams, the college offers B.A. LL.B. (Hons), B.Com LL.B and B.E. / B.Tech courses at the undergraduate level. Moreover, it offers M.E./M.Tech and MBA/PGDM courses at the postgraduate level. The tuition fee for all the courses offered here ranges between INR 1,000 and INR 625,000. Marwadi University Rajkot is spread over 32 acres. It is acknowledged for its campus and residential facilities. There is a long list of facilities that the university offers to its students to make their college life better and more comfortable. Marwadi University facilities include hostels, a library, labs, and sports facilities, among many other things. Marwadi University hostel offers separate accommodations for boys and girls with all modern facilities and attached mess. It has 3 hostel buildings that can accommodate more than 2200 students. Hostel rooms are fully furnished with beds, ceiling fans and lights, study tables, chairs, and inbuilt cupboards. Some facilities provided by the hostels are Wi-Fi, banking, ATM, indoor games, transportation, laundry, medical, music room, dance room, gymnasium for girls and boys, common room with TV and cable, and separate courts for volleyball, basketball, and badminton. Each hostel is managed by a Warden/Hostel Manager who is resident in the hostel. The diners of a mess may be drawn from different hostels. Each mess is administered by a Warden.

faqs.question: What is the fee structure for B.Tech in Marwadi University?
faqs.answer: The total cost of the B.Tech courses at Marwadi University is INR 5 Lakhs. Marwadi University charges an annual fee for B.Tech programmes that range from 98,000 to 1,25,000 INR. Guidelines for Paying Fees at Marwadi University in Rajkot. Exams like JEE Main, GATE, GUJCET, CAT, and MAT are just a few of the ones used to determined admission to Marwadi University courses. On the official website, you can get more facts about the Marwadi University tuition and admission requirements.

faqs.question: Which entrance exam scores are accepted by Marwadi University for admission?
faqs.answer: GUJCET or JEE Main entrance exam scores are accepted by Marwadi University for admission. Marwadi University offers 46+ programs leading to undergraduate and postgraduate degrees, diplomas as well as doctoral degrees in the fields of Engineering and Technology, Science, Commerce, Management, Law, etc. Marwadi University has been recognised by Innovative Learning & Teaching Awards by ET NOW, and adjudged the Best Upcoming University of India 2018 by ASSOCHAM as well as University of the Year (West) by Times NOW.

faqs.question: Is there any scholarship available at Marwadi University?
faqs.answer: Yes, Marwadi University provides various scholarships and they areas under: 1. University provides financial assistance to Students based on GATE Score- To avail the scholarship, the candidate must secure admission to such a postgraduate program, as per the prevailing procedure of the admitting institution. 2. Vidya Lakshmi Yojna 3. Mukhymantri Yuva Swavalamban Yojana 4. Central Sector Scheme of Interest Subsidy for education loans by scheduled banks 5. Chief Minister Scholarship Scheme 6. Scholarship for the privileged Scholarship 2 International Scholarship Programmes: Marwadi University / Marwadi Education Foundation Group of Institutions offers categories of scholarship to International Students. 1) 100% Tuition Fee Waiver 2) President Scholarship 3) FULLY FUNDED Scholarship Scheme through SII 100% Scholarship on Tuition Fee: Students are given 100% waiver on Tuition Fee. They only need to spend on accommodation and food. Apart from 100% Tuition Fees Waiver, the President has also given his consent to give additional President Scholarship. Marwadi University is also an academic partner of the ‘Study in Gujarat – SIG’ – a campaign aimed towards promoting Gujarat as an education hub on both national and international level.

sections.heading: Introduction
text: Check out more on Marwadi University Infrastructure:

facilities.name: Library
facilities.description: Marwadi University has two main libraries having collection of more than 50000 books on engineering, computers, information technology, management sciences and its allied subjects. Libraries are equipped with RFID enabled, open source – ILS KOHA software based comprehensive information system. Library also has thespecially devised and designed Mobile Application having features of Intimation, Alerts, History, Account Status and Books search facilities.Library is Connected with other libraries and resource centers to retrieve information resources worldwide.

facilities.name: Hostel
facilities.description:
Marwadi University Campus has separate hostels for boys and girls with all modern facilities and attached mess. University has 3 hostel buildings which can accommodate more than 2200 students. Hostel rooms are fully furnished with beds, ceiling fans and lights, study tables, chairs and inbuilt cupboards.
Some facilities provided by the hostels are:
Wi-Fi, Banking, ATM, Indoor games, Transportation, Laundry, Medical, Music room, Dance room, gymnasium for girls and boys, Common room with TV and cable, separate courts for Volley Ball, Basket Ball and Badminton.

facilities.name: Shuttle Service
facilities.description: Marwadi University has got 84 drivers with 4 Mechanical Support Staff, who takes care of in total 66 buses and 14 cars. These drivers discharge their duties to commute 3000 plus students and 400 plus faculties on a daily basis to their destinations in Rajkot City and surrounding cities like Morbi, Gondal, Dhrol, Wankaner, Jasdan and en route a number of small centers.

facilities.name: Labs
available_facilities: Basic and Advanced Analog Electronics Lab
RF, Microwave Engineering and Antenna Design Lab
Fluid Mechanics and Fluid Power Engineering

college_info.college_name: MIT ADT University Pune: Courses, Fees, Admission 2026, Placements, Scholarships

highlights.summary:
Maharashtra Institute of Technology Art Design and Technology University was founded by an Act of the State Legislature of Maharashtra as a private University and is UGC recognised. MIT ADT University won "The Best University Campus" in the 10th National Education Excellence Awards 2017 presented by ASSOCHAM. Moreover, MIT ADU was under the flagship of MAEER’s MIT Group of Institutions. MIT ADU offers over 172 courses at the UG, PG, and PhD levels covering 12 streams, some of which include Engineering, Management, Design, Humanities & Social Sciences, Architecture, Media & Journalism, and Arts (Fine & Performing).
The highest and average package offered during MIT ADTU placements in recent past stood at INR 61 LPA and INR 6.5 LPA, respectively. Further, more than 1,200 placement offers and 600 internship offers were made during recent placements. Students can check the highlights of MIT ADT University Pune in the table provided below:
For more information about Maharashtra Institute of Technology Art Design and Technology University check out the below video:

college_info_program.intro: MIT Art Design and Technology University Pune courses are offered to students across 12 streams including undergraduate, postgraduate, PG diploma, doctoral, diploma, and certificate programmes. The university offers more than 100 courses to students at various levels in full-time mode. At the UG level, the university provides courses such as BTech, BSc, BCA, BCom (Hons), BDes, BArch, and BSc (Hons), among others. At the PG level, MIT ADTU offers MBA, MCA, MDes, MTech, MCA, MSc, MArch etc. Below are the MIT Art Design and Technology University Pune popular programmes:

college_info.college_name: MIT ADT University Pune Reviews on Placements, Faculty & Facilities

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: Absolutely satisfied with placements and facilities.

detailed_review.Placements: Placements are very good. According to the previous year more than 75 percent of students got placed. There are a lot of big companies like Nykaa, Myntra, etc. coming to SOC. There are a lot of students from SOC who are serving as engineers in big companies.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Infrastructure of our college is the best. We have separate classes for every division. There are computer labs with good internet. Library is also nice, we can also borrowbooks for a few days. The hostel is equipped with Wi-Fi and water coolers and all the floors have separate Wi-Fi with good speed.
detailed_review.Faculty: Faculty members are so good and qualified. They keep an eye on every student, there are doubt sessions and also there are frequent tests for each subject. The toughness of our exams is moderate and the passing percentage is 60 percent. The level of end semester exam is tough.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: Very good facilities are provided by the college.

detailed_review.Placements: Placements are very good in our college. Our college students are getting packages up to 25 LPA, average package is 10 LPA - 15 LPA. Almost 70% of students are getting placed every year. There are a lot of big companies coming to our college like Amazon, etc.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Infrastructure of our college is best. We have separate classes for every division. There are computer labs with good internet. college_info.college_name: MIT ADT University Pune Course Admissions 2025: Fees, Eligibility, Dates & Selection Process

admission.title: MIT ADT University Pune Admission Overview 2025
admission.overview_text: MIT ADT University Pune admissions 2025 are a mix of entrance or merit-based as per respective courses. Maharashtra Institute of Technology Art Design and Technology University, Pune , offers various courses such as BSc, BBA, MBA, MTech, etc at the UG, PG, and PhD levels. Candidates must complete the basic educational qualification set by the university. Read the article to know more about MIT ADT University Pune course admission 2025.

faqs.question: Who can apply to BBA at MIT ADT?
faqs.answer: To get admission to BBA course at MIT ADT, candidates who passed Class 12 with minimum 50% aggregate in either Arts/ Science/ Commerce or any other stream from ICSE/ CBSE or any recognised board are eligible to apply for this course. Candidates belonging to reserved categories are given a relaxation of 5%. They are required to get minimum of 45% aggregate in Class 12. It's mandatory for every aspirant to fulfil these eligibility criteria before applying for admission to BBA at MIT ADT.

faqs.question: What is the mode of application for MIT School of Computing, MIT-ADT admission?
faqs.answer: The mode of application is online for all courses. The application fee is INR 1,500 for each course. Candidates can check below the steps to apply for MIT School of Computing: Documents required at the time of application

faqs.question: Can I get admission to MIT ADT University Pune BTech with 60% in Class 12th?
faqs.answer: A minimum of 60% aggregate in 12th, along with an attempt for MHTCET or JEE Mains for Graduate programs, is required to get into MIT Pune. Passed HSC exam with more than 50% marks in subjects like Physics, Chemistry, and maths (45% marks in case of OBC candidates belonging to Maharashtra). Non-zero marks in MHTCET, too is necessary for Maharashtra State candidates seeking State Quota seats. Out-of-state candidates must possess the same academic standards and should have secured marks more than the cut-off marks in AIEEE.

faqs.question: What is the fee for B.Tech at MIT ADU?
faqs.answer: The BTech course at MIT ADT University ranges from INR 7.5 Lacs to INR 13 lakh . The fees vary throughout the schools offering the BTech course. The fee for the BTech course at MIT School of Engineering and Science ranges from INR 8.1 Lacs to INR 9.9 lakh . The shortlisted candidates will then be called for an interview and can complete the admission formality by paying the MIT ADT course fees. The fee information is sourced from the official website/ sanctioning body and is subject to change.

faqs.question: What are the cutoff marks required for MBA at MIT ADTU Pune - Art Design & Technology University?
faqs.answer: MIT Arts Design & Technology  (MIT ADT) comes under flagship of Maharashtra Academy of Engineering and Educational Research (MAEER) and was established in year 2015. There is an online entrance exam You need to score above 85 per cent in it to get the desired branch If You have a good CET score there are chances you can also get a scholarship up to 80 thousand rupees. It is situated in Pune, Maharashtra. MIT ADT is set up a vast beautiful campus spanning more than 100 acres. It is inspired from Indian spirituality and philosophy with sporting state-of-art infrastructure.MIT Art, Design & Technology University, Pune provides both Undergraduate, Post Graduate, as well as special industry, focused postgraduate programs. Presently more than 4000 students are enrolled in MIT ADT.

faqs.question: Can I get direct admission in MIT ADTU Pune BTech?
faqs.answer: Direct admisson to the BTech course at MIT ADTU Pune BTech is not applicable. Candidates must a valid qualification to secure admission. Entrance examinations:

faqs.question: What is the fee for BTech course at MIT School of Computing, MIT-ADT?
faqs.answer: The total tuition fee for MIT School of Computing BTech is INR 12.72 lakh . The total fee, includes tuition fee, development fee, university fee, medical insurance, etc. Candidates are required to pay the course fee after completion of all the selection rounds to confirm seats. Students also need to pay a registration fee to apply for admission. The application fee for BTech course is INR 1,800. Its payment can be done in an online mode.

faqs.question: What is MIT ADT BCA fee?
faqs.answer: MIT ADT offers BCA course for a duration of three years. The tuition fee for this course is INR 3.30 lakh. This fee is taken from unofficial sources and hence, is indicative. Students are requested to visit the official website to get more details on the MIT ADT BCA fee. Apart from the tuition fee, students also have to pay Development Fee, University Fee, Medical Insurance and Holistic Development Charges every year. There are some other one-time charges, which are only required to pay in the second year of the course. These are Alumni Charges, Convocation Fee and Placement Charges.

faqs.question: Can I get direct admission at MIT ADT?
faqs.answer: Direct admission is possible for a few of the courses at MIT ADT. The university offers multiple UG and PG courses in the stream of Arts, Science, Commerce, Engineering, Management, etc. For admission to courses such as MBA, MCA, BTech, MTech, BArch, etc., it's mandatory for candidates to submit the scores of any relevant entrance exam, which is accepted at either the state or national level. Apart from this, admissions to courses such as BCA, BBA, BSc, MA, BCom, etc., are done based on the merit of candidates in their last qualifying exam as per the course's requirements. For some courses, the selection process also includes qualifying for Group Discussion and Personal Interview rounds.

faqs.question: How do I get admission to MIT ADTU Pune?
faqs.answer: Candidates can take MIT ADT admissions by applying online on the official website of the university. Admission to some of the courses is based on merit whereas, for some courses, it is based on the respective entrance exam. The students who fulfil the eligibility criteria need to appear for group discussion and personal interview round. Moreover, candidates can check out the below table for details regarding the entrance exams accepted for specific courses: Course Name Entrance Exam Accepted MBA MAH MBA CET / CAT / XAT / ATMA / AIMA/ GMAT JEE dir="ltr"> MHT MCA CET / PERA CET / Any state MCA Common Test BTech JEE Main / MHT CET / PERA CET/ Uni-GAUGE / any other state-level entrance exams

faqs.question: How can I get admission to MIT ADT for MCA course?
faqs.answer: In order to get admission to MCA at MIT ADT, candidates have to pass a selection process, which is inclusive of fulfilling the minimum eligibility criteria, qualifying for the respective entrance exam and filling an online application form. Those who have a UG degree in any stream may apply for this course. Admissions to MCA are given based on scores of candidates in either MAH MCA CET/ PERA CET or any other state MCA Common Test. Candidates who pass any one of the mentioned entrance exams may submit their scores at the time of filling the application form.

faqs.question: Are admissions at MIT ADTU Pune - Art Design & Technology University entrance-based or merit-based?
faqs.answer: MIT Art, Design, and Technology (MIT ADT) University in Pune, India has both merit-based and entrance-based admissions. MIT ADT considers a candidate's merit in previous qualifying exams and their scores on entrance exams like: MAH CET, CAT, MAT, PERA CET, JEE Main, MHT CET. The university also offers merit-based admissions to some courses, including: BBA, B.Com, BCA, BA, B.Sc, M.Sc. For example, admission to the university's B.Tech+M.Tech (Integrated) courses is based on a candidate's performance in JEE Main, MHT CET, or Uni-Gauge. To be eligible, candidates must have completed 10+2 with Physics and Mathematics as compulsory subjects, with a minimum of 50% marks.

faqs.question: Does MIT ADT Pune accept MHT CET for MBA?
faqs.answer: Yes, MIT ADT Pune accepts scores of MHT CET for admission to a two-year MBA course. MIT ADT is a Maharashtra-based university and Maharashtra Common Entrance Test or MAH CET is a management entrance test, which is particularly conducted by the State Common Entrance Test Cell, Maharashtra, for admission to MBA courses in various institutes in the state of Maharashtra. Apart from this, candidates can also get admission to this course via other state/ national-level entrance exams such as CAT/ MAT/ XAT/ ATMA or AIMA.

faqs.question: Is MBA available at MIT ADT Pune?
faqs.answer: MIT ADT Pune offers a two-year MBA course. This course is taught through the Faculty of Management and Leadership, which falls under the MIT College of Management. MIT ADTU MBA course is offered across 11 specialisations. The total seat intake for this course is 410, which is inclusive of all the 11 specialisations. Further, those who get admission to MBA at MIT ADT have to pay a tuition fee between ranges of INR 2.51 Lacs – INR 4.03 lakh. The most popular MBA specialisations offered at MIT ADT are Human Resource Management, Marketing Management, International, Business Management, Logistics & Supply Chain Management. To know about the other MBA specialisations, click here .

faqs.question: Which specialisation is the best in MBA from MIT ADTU Pune - Art Design & Technology University?

facilities.name: Library
facilities.description: University provides central library facility to the students on the requisition basis which has a corporate membership with the British library - Pune, MCCIA - Pune and online membership with design management institute -DMI (USA), car design news -UK. Library supports the research and teaching of Raj Baugh campus. Individual institution has their own library in the respective building as well as departmental libraries are maintained in the department.

facilities.name: Hostel
facilities.description: Hostel provides accommodation with compulsory food facility to students from various faculties as well as institutions. Visiting guest for admission purpose as well as parents willing to meet students can book guest houses on request basis based on prior booking through website.

likes.text: Many top companies like Infosys, Tech Mahindra, TCS, Cognizant and Persistent visited our college for placements.
There are no placements in architecture, but in our college, we get many chances to interact and enhance yourself to become a good intern and architect.

The facilities provided in the hostel are good, and the food served in the mess is fine and hygienic.

The curriculum is updated with all the latest subjects to understand the knowledge of the recent development, and that makes students industry-ready.

likes.text: The best thing about this course is that students here get not only academic knowledge but also get practical knowledge with various site visits, study tours and market surveys.
Persona (the college fest) is pretty good you can enjoy during that, also we have foreign languages and society, health and development for extracurricular activities.

college_info.college_name: MLR Institute of Technology: Admissions 2025, Courses, Fees, Eligibility, Placements

highlights.summary:
MLR Institute of Technology is a private institute located at Dundigal, Hyderabad, Telangana. The institute was established in 2005 by the KMR Education Trust, headed by Mr. Marri Laxman Reddy. MLRIT is affiliated with Jawaharlal Nehru Technological University, Hyderabad (JNTUH), and is recognised by the UGC.
MLR Institute of Technology offers a variety of undergraduate and postgraduate courses, including BTech, MTech, and MBA programmes. MLR Institute of Technology course admissions are based on entrance exam scores. Candidates must also fulfil the minimum eligibility requirements of the respective courses.
During MLR Institute of Technology placements, the highest package stood at INR 33 LPA. Furthermore, the top recruiters of the institute include Inovalon, Zscaler, Amadeus Labs, Flipkart, Lumen, Accenture, Deloitte, Amazon, Capgemini, Tech Mahindra, Intellipaat, Virtusa, Wiley Edge, etc. Below are the major highlights of MLR Institute of Technology:
MLR Institute of Technology Highlights 2025
Inovalon, Zscaler, Amadeus Labs, Flipkart, Lumen, Accenture, Deloitte
