college_info.college_name: National Engineering College Fees 2026
National Engineering College Reviews on Placements, Faculty & Facilities

reviews.course: B.E. in Electrical and Electronics Engineering
reviews.review_title: One of the best options for engineering graduates with more upgradation year by year.

detailed_review.Placements: More than 70% of students got placed during my period of college. Top recruiting companies were Infosys, TCS, Data Pattern, Bosch, Nova Carbons, Deloitte, Capgemini, Accenture, and HCL. More than 50% of students got internships in Data Patterns, Infosys, and TCS. System engineer and software developer roles were offered.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: In our department, every facility was available like Wi-Fi all over, system facilities, classrooms, smart classes, conference rooms, and separate library in common for departments. The hostel was neat and more friendly, cleanliness was maintained, and the quality of food was more defined. Medical emergency department is also available separately.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers were more knowledgeable about current techniques and very helpful with every process of study. The course curriculum was related and it makes the student available to the industry with all basic knowledge. The semester exams were at moderate level not more difficult. The pass percentage is above 80%.

reviews.course: M.Tech. in Information and Cyber Warfare
reviews.review_title: Master of technology at National Engineering College.

detailed_review.Placements: Course-wise placements for M.Tech were literally at a lower rate than B.Tech students. From the overall strength, around 70% of students get placed yearly. Apart from college placements, we have enormous scope in off-campus drives with a salary package of 4 LPA - 12 LPA.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: An unlimited quantity of food items were cooked and served in a higher quality considering students' hygiene. So the hosteller's should not worry about the food. They don't insist on any specific time to have food. Three members can share a single room in both girls' and boys' hostels. Necessary facilities for relaxing, studying, and entertaining were provided by the college.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers maintain their academic standards and records related to the student's progress properly. We report to the senior staff in charge. Incharge meetings were conducted once a month with the principal in order to take necessary remedies for the improvement of academic standards.

reviews.course: M.E. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: National Engineering College For Computer Science Engineering Course admission.

detailed_review.Placements: This course is very good because many companies provide internships. Students must score above 60% to participate in placement facilities. TCS, Accenture, etc., companies visit the college.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Our college provides quality infrastructure like fast Wi-Fi, bathrooms, labs, classrooms, a library, drinking water, etc. In this college, the hostel is very neat. It is of high quality. The college has a canteen. Its food is very tasty and healthy for students.
detailed_review.Faculty: Our teachers are very educated and qualified in Delhi University and other states. They are very knowledgeable and helpful. They solve any problem. This course is for 4-5 years. The passing mark is 42 which is very difficult.

reviews.course: M.E. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: Best college and has good facilities.

detailed_review.Placements: Around 85% of students got placed from our course. The highest salary package offered is 38 LPA, and the lowest salary package offered is 3.5 LPA-4 LPA. Recruiting companies are Dell, Infosys, HDFC, TCS, Amazon, and Capgemini. Around 78% of students secured internships.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: College infrastructure is good and has all facilities. Architecture is modern with full ventilation. Wi-Fi is provided at high speed. Libraries are stocked with all books. Hostel is well-maintained, with good food and serves good food three times a day.. The facilities in a hostel are good.
detailed_review.Faculty: Semester exams are tough to pass. Teachers are helpful and they are qualified with Ph.D. and the highest degree. Teaching quality is best. The course curriculum is relevant to CSE technologies. Pass percentage is 78%. They make students industry-ready.

reviews.course: M.E. in Embedded Systems Technologies
reviews.review_title: Review of ME-EST in National engineering college.

detailed_review.Placements: Course grades/percentages play a major role in choosing students for giving placement training. Students with lower grades won't be allowed to participate in all the sessions. I'm a topper student and got placed in Emertxe, an embedded-based company, with a starting salary of 19000 in a month.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The green environment with all the required amenities. Our campus was fitted with all the safety measures like earthquake resistance and emergency cylinders. Facilities like lifts should be used by teachers and differently abled persons. Canteens are available with good quality of foods.
detailed_review.Faculty: Instead of blackboard coaching, we mostly attend practical workshops/case studies to understand the concepts in a better way and to gain practical knowledge. Our scores/grades were updated to our parents at the end of every internals. Parents meetings were conducted at least once a month.

reviews.course: M.E. in Embedded Systems Technologies
reviews.review_title: Your concepts will be very clear.

detailed_review.Placements: Both internship and final placement programs are conducted by the college. Although the placement rates are slightly lower compared to other departments, more than 60% of the batch can secure both internships and placements. Top recruiting firms are generally IT giants, consulting firms, and a few from manufacturing industries.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The canteen and mess are clean and provide satisfactory food. Hostel rooms and washrooms are also cleaned daily, and classrooms are equipped with AC. The library is large, and the labs are well-equipped. Basic medical help and a sports area are available.
detailed_review.Faculty: A good curriculum is developed to create a strong foundation for students in the first year. In the second year, a few elective options are provided. The teachers act as guiding mentors and are always available to help students. The passing rate is above 80%.

reviews.course: M.E. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: Curriculum is Pretty Nice.

detailed_review.Placements: More than seventy percent of the students secured internship opportunities, and over ninety percent received good placement offers through the campus recruitment program. The highest salary was around twenty lacs per annum.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The infrastructure is okay, not that bad at all. The classrooms are modern and well-designed, with good computer labs. Laptop training is provided and encouraged. We have good hostels with AC and attached washrooms for a comfortable stay, and the food is also healthy.
detailed_review.Faculty: The curriculum is good, covering a lot of aspects through both practical and theoretical sessions. Many seminars are conducted to encourage industry exposure for students. The teachers are very knowledgeable and helpful, and the exams are not very difficult.

reviews.course: M.E. in Embedded Systems Technologies
reviews.review_title: Overall, satisfactory facilities are available at this college.

detailed_review.Placements: 30–40% of the students get placements in our course. Students were getting decent placement opportunities at this college. The average package offered was between 3-7 LPA. Various companies visit college for the placements. Some of the students also get internships in our course. Overall, this college has decent placement records.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: National Engineering College is having a good infrastructure for our course. The college has library, canteen, Wi-Fi, sports, etc. facilities for the students. Labs with all equipment available for the students. Food available at the college canteen can be improved. Various sports tournaments are conducted at this college as the college focuses on promoting sports activities.
detailed_review.Faculty: The faculty of our college was helpful, qualified, and knowledgeable. Teachers were teaching well. The course curriculum was absolutely relevant and makes students industry-ready. Regular discussion and industry visits are conducted by the college management. Professors were of a friendly nature. Exams can be easily passed with proper studies.

reviews.course: B.E. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: Review about National Engineering College.

detailed_review.Placements:
90% of students were placed in computer science and engineering. The highest package is 12.5 lacs per annum.
The lowest package is 3.5 lacs per annum.
The average package is 7.5 lacs per annum
Top recruiting companies are Mistral Solution, Zoho, Wipro, Vlinder, etc.
detailed_review.Infrastructure:
Wi-Fi has high-speed internet access available throughout the department and campus. 
Computer labs are equipped with the latest hardware and software to support a variety of programming and development tasks. Well-furnished rooms with options for single, double, or triple occupancy. Nutritious and balanced meals are provided three times a day.
Different cuisines are offered with a rotating menu.
detailed_review.Faculty: Faculty members are qualified and knowledgeable, with many holding Ph.D.s from reputed institutions. The curriculum is regularly updated every 4 years. Core subjects are algorithms, data structures, operation systems, database management, networking, etc.
detailed_review.Other: I chose computer science and engineering because of my passion for technology and innovation. The rapid advancements in computing and the vast opportunities in the teaching industry were major factors in my decision.

reviews.course: B.E. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: About my college journey.

detailed_review.Placements: It was one of the top colleges to do engineering. I was dreaming of joining this college since my schooling. And now I had joined my dream college in my dream course. I was longing to join computer science and engineering, which have good placement records.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Our college supports various undergraduate and postgraduate courses. The overall facilities available at our college were really good. I was amazed with the infrastructure of our college often. We have a large sports stadium, an open auditorium and close auditoriums too.
detailed_review.Faculty: All our teachers deliver high-quality content. They always focused on maintaining a healthy and eco-friendly campus. They always preferred to take interactive practical sessions rather than blackboard or PPT teaching. And they made remarkable achievements in academics too.

reviews.course: B.E. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: National Engineering College.

detailed_review.Placements: The highest salary package that was offered from National Engineering College is 19.5 Lacs per annum. We never bother about placement activities because nearly 50+ companies approach our campus for placement drives yearly. To perform well in such drives, we have a lot of training sessions.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: We are served with hygienic and nutritious food. The food is available at all times on our campus. There are separate hostel facilities for boys and girls students, and there are certain restrictions on student movements outside the campus. They maintain a neat and healthy campus.
detailed_review.Faculty: Our faculty members are very strict and question us on every small thing. They always expect perfection from our work. They are very motivating and encouraging and believe in us more than we believe in ourselves. They also clarify all our doubts without any hesitation.

reviews.course: B.E. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: National engineering college.

detailed_review.Placements: Our students got placed with an average salary package of up to 4.2 Lacs per annum. National Engineering College arranges a lot of placement opportunities for us with various salary packages. Many companies have approached our campus for placement drives till now, and they are hiring a maximum number of students yearly.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: It’s a healthy, hygienic, and peaceful environment to pursue our higher education. We have friendly faculty members in our college, and they arrange all the medical facilities within our campus. They also provide all the necessary facilities for our students.
detailed_review.Faculty: We often went for industrial visits for a better understanding of the practical classes and to gain practical knowledge. Our teachers were very kind and supportive. The overall academic results for the previous year were really good.

reviews.course: B.E. in Electrical and Electronics Engineering
reviews.review_title: Review of National Engineering College.

detailed_review.Placements: It's proven by it's placement records till now. As of 2024 placements, 98 percent of students got placed in various companies across the world. The highest salary package offered to students at the National Engineering College will be 18.5 lacs per year.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The National Engineering College has very constructive infrastructure. It has big, spacious classrooms with all the needed facilities like projectors, smart classes and so on. It's a peaceful and eco-friendly environment to do our best without any distractions.
detailed_review.Faculty: Our lectures were very strict and they asked us to maintain the decorum of the campus. Even though they are strict, they care about us in all ways. They always asked us to keep updated, learn new skills and so on. They were highly helpful during the development of projects.

reviews.course: B.E. in Electrical and Electronics Engineering
reviews.review_title: It is an excellent college.

detailed_review.Placements: In our college, almost 95% of students are placed. The highest salary package offered is 10 LPA and the lowest salary package offered is 1 LPA to 2 LPA. Top recruiting companies like TCS, Capgemini, Data Patterns, Tesolve, Zoho, etc., visit our campus. Almost all students get internships. Top roles offered are in high voltage control and instrumentation and VLSI.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: It is an excellent college. Wi-Fi is available. Our college provides a high-voltage lab. The hostel serves both vegetarian and non-vegetarian meals. Our college has good infrastructure. The atmosphere of the college is pleasant. Many books are available in the library.
detailed_review.Faculty: Our teachers are helpful, qualified, and knowledgeable. They are experienced. Our teachers are courteous with students. The teaching quality is good. The course curriculum is relevant. It makes students industry-ready.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Information Technology
reviews.review_title: Very satisfied with good placements, infrastructure and faculty members .

detailed_review.Placements: In each departments, above 90% of the students were placed in each batch. In our department above 97% of the students were placed. The top companies for our course are Zoho, Wipro, Amazon, CTS, capegemini, uram etc. Top roles offered are in testing field and developing field.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: In our department, we have Wi-Fi, three labs, department library and a seminar hall, elective hall. We also have an hall for placement and project discussion. In each lab, there will be more than 50 computers. We have a football ground, cricket ground with nets and hockey ground, basketball court, tennis court, shuttle court and throw ball, volleyball court. In our college, the quality of food provide by canteen and hostel mess are good.
detailed_review.Faculty: The staffs are helpful and knowledgeable people. They are encouraging the students to prepare for the placements, the national level contests like smart India hackathon and help in more projects for the students. The course curriculum are relatable and relevant to the industry and placements. This college is autonomous college and follow the relative grade. So the pass percentage is very high.
detailed_review.Other: I choose this course to place in an IT company after completing the course. Based on the knowledge, we can get more salary. Practice in online sites and contests will make the student better. Scholarships also available such as first graduate, women's scholarship, BC/MBC/SC/ST scholarship s.

reviews.course: B.E. in Mechanical Engineering
reviews.review_title: You can join this course. If you want to achieve really something good then come here.

detailed_review.Placements: Above 75% of the students got placed from my course. Few of them went to core companies. Remaining students got placed in IT field. The highest package in my course is 7.4LPA and the lowest package is 2.7LPA. The top recruiting companies are Zoho, CTS, TCS, Brakes India and cognizant.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The infrastructure of our college is good. Our department is bigger as compared to other departments. Our lab facilities are the most highlighted ones in our college. We have 2 buildings for lab. We have a machine shop, Welding shop, Carpentry shop, foundry shop, fluid dynamics lab, strength of materials lab, etc. Hostel facility is also somewhat good in our college.
detailed_review.Faculty: The teachers are helpful, qualified and their lectures are knowledgeable. The teaching quality is also good in our college. The lab works perfectly. This course makes students industry ready. The semester exams are not too difficult. If we observe the classes thoroughly then we can clear all the subjects.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Information Technology
reviews.review_title: Great placement record for the past five years. Excellent faculty and facilities.

detailed_review.Placements: 95% of students got placed with good salary packages. The highest package offered is 12 lakhs per annum and the minimum is 2-3 lakhs per annum. Zoho is the top recruiting company. 60% of students got internship in big companies.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: There is a central library with all the department books. There are 3 computer labs in our department. Wi-Fi is available both inside and outside the campus.Good and healthy food is available in our hostel and all sports and games are there in our college.
detailed_review.Faculty: Our teachers are highly qualified. The curriculum is designed to make students eligible to work in the industry. Exams are a bit difficult. Pass percentage is 50 to 60. Faculty members help students in all technical as well as non-technical activities.
detailed_review.Other: I chose this course because it has a great scope for high placements.

reviews.course: B.E. in Mechanical Engineering
reviews.review_title: I am very satisfied because of its good placements and quality education.

detailed_review.Placements: Almost 90% of students are placed. The highest salary package offered is 8.4 LPA, and the lowest salary package offered is 2.5 LPA. The top recruiting companies are Cognizant, Zoho, Wipro, etc. Almost 245 students get internships in some companies.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The facilities and infrastructure of our college are very good in our mechanical engineering department. Wi-Fi, laboratory, classrooms, and a library are provided. Students have a separate library for our department. Wi-Fi is very useful for skill rack assessment, and online classes.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers are well educated and experienced. Teachers are very helpful and knowledgeable. The teaching quality is very good and easily understandable. This course curriculum is relevant, and it makes the students industry-ready. The semester exams are difficult because quality education provided by our department and they want to test students' knowledge.
detailed_review.Other: I opted for this course because of my interest in machines, and I want to gather knowledge to study about designing.

reviews.course: B.E. in Mechanical Engineering
reviews.review_title: Satisfied because of the faculty and good placements in 2020, really good.

detailed_review.Placements: The placements are much better than other Colleges but most of the job offerings only in its companies and core companies are rare. And placements are covered for all students and salaries are much lower for the freshers. And most of the passed-out alumni are well settled in foreign. And the college supports Students who are interested in business.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Infrastructure is better okay compared to other institutions. This institution has the biggest library. Classrooms are well altered all the classroom has a projector to visualise the content that we have learnt. Wi-Fi facilities are not satisfactory. In the hostel, food is not better and mess fees also increasing. The hostel is not satisfied.
detailed_review.Faculty: Here all teachers are completed their Ph.D. And the staffs are much friendly with students and they help in all ways to improve the student quality. This institution develops good engineers in society. And most of the funded projects are done by students under the faculty members.
detailed_review.Other: Mechanical engineering is my interest area.

reviews.course: B.E. in Mechanical Engineering
reviews.review_title: I am absoulty satisfied with good placements.

detailed_review.Placements: About 98% of students placed in our course. The highest salary package was 15 LPA and the lowest was 2.5 LPA. The top recruiters are Zoho, TCS, Wheels India, Bright India, Hyundai, TVS, and Infosys. About 99% of students got internships from our course at Zoho, Infosys, TCS, Wheels India, and Bright India. The roles offered are in management.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Our college has excellent facilities. We have a good Wi-Fi facility. Our labs and classrooms are very neat and clean, with smart classes. In the hostel, food preparation is very hygienic and clean. It is also tasty.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers are helpful with studies and project work. They are excellent at teaching. The curriculum makes students industry-ready. Semester exams are of a medium level and the pass percentage is 95%. In COVID time, the pass percentage is 100%.
detailed_review.Other: I like machines, so I got interested in mechanical engineering.

A total of 12 courses offered by the Institute are available across stream such as Engineering. The institute has all the necessary facilities to the students.

National Institute of Advanced Manufacturing Technology Reviews on Placements, Faculty & Facilities

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Engineering
reviews.review_title: College is good. It is value for money but some further improvements are needed.

detailed_review.Placements: The top branch of this college is metallurgy and mechanical. In 2025, almost all students get placed and the average for metallurgy is approximately 9LPA and for mechanical is 6 to 7 LPA. The placement of 2026 is ongoing, some students of computer engineering get full time offer, metallurgy and mechanical are going decently.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The infrastructure is old but some buildings are new. There is a computer lab, classrooms are decent but AC is not available in classroom, and a library is there beside the red building where almost all books are available. There is two seater room for the 1st year. One table, one chair and a bed provided by the hostel authority. Mess food is good. It is value for money.
detailed_review.Faculty: All faculty members are well qualified. All faculty have done their Ph.D. from IIT. In 1st semester they taught about C and from 2nd start the data structure will start. The semester exam level in college is average. In 1 or 2 subject papers can be tough but normally the paper is moderate where you can except question from notes.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Mechanical Engineering
reviews.review_title: NIAMT Ranchi has strong academics with scope for modernization.

detailed_review.Placements: The placements are good around 8 to 10 LPA for a above average student, but if you maintain a good CGPA and if you do perform well in a technical club like a racing club for mechanical engineering it improves your placement percentage, and mainly you should not have any backlog.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: College has a fully residential green campus with a well equipped academic block and modern manufacturing labs and workshops. A central library, computer center with Wi-Fi, separate boys and girls hostels, sports facilities, gym only after the first sem, medical center, and basic campus amenities.
detailed_review.Faculty: The Mechanical Engineering department has experienced faculty and PhD qualified faculty, the curriculum is a structured 4 year programme covering core mechanical and manufacturing subjects. The examination system includes mid semester tests, end semester exams, and continuous internal assessment.
detailed_review.Other: Main problems include outdated infrastructure in some areas, very average mess facilities, limited extracurricular exposure, and uneven teaching quality. Improvements are seen in well equipped labs, a peaceful residential campus, a gradual decrease in placements and increasing focus on practical manufacturing skills.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Mechanical Engineering
reviews.review_title: Absolute college for return on investment.

detailed_review.Placements: More than 95% of students of my branch (mechanical engineering) got placed with an average package of 9 LPA and the highest package of 13.95 LPA. The top recruiting companies that come here for placement are JSW, Vedanta, Maruti Suzuki, Tata, Anand Group, L&T, Pradeep Metalliks, NowPurchase, Future First, etc.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: A 67-acre green campus with a library that consists of more than 50000 books, a centralized computer room, a gym, a cafeteria owned by KitKat, a lush green football and cricket ground on campus, Wi-Fi campus, a lecture hall complex for all classes, and for each year, there is a separate hostel. From the 2nd year, single rooms are allotted.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers are very helpful, and their qualifications are no less than those of any professor. They qualify for the NTA exam for a professor. Most of them are IIT graduates, IIT post-graduates, and IIT Ph.D. The course curriculum is designed according to the college's brand value. Not for computer engineering, but every branch considers the topic of manufacturing engineering.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Metallurgy and Material Engineering
reviews.review_title: If anyone gets an average rank in JEE, this is the best college for core branches.

detailed_review.Placements: It's a very good college in terms of placement in core branches. Here, the average and highest package for the last year 2024 is 7.4 LPA and 15 LPA Abroad or 13.95 LPA Domestic. This year, 100% of students in Metallurgy and Materials Engineering have been placed. Companies like JSW, Vedanta, Cresent Foundry, NBC Bearings, Tata Steel Limited, Hitachi, etc., come for recruitment. The first batch of Computer Engineering has not passed yet, so data for this department is not available.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: There is an administrative building situated in the center of the campus. On the opposite side of the administrative building, there is a faculty building where students can ask doubts, etc. There is a multi-purpose building and a gym for students. There are 4 hostels on the campus 3 for boys and 1 for girls. For first-year students, there is HJB hostel, which is well-maintained. For second and third-year students, there is JCB hostel. For final-year students, there is MV hostel. For ADC and M.Tech students, there is Nirala hostel. And for girls, there is KCC hostel.
detailed_review.Faculty: There are 5 departments in the college. The Head of the Department HOD of Materials and Metallurgical Engineering is Dr. Ghanshyam Das. The HOD of Manufacturing Engineering is Dr. G. Rajamohan. The HOD of Foundry and Forge Technology is Dr. Madhu Kumari. The HOD of Applied Science and Humanities is Prof. Anil Kumar. The Director of this college is Prof. Path Protim Chattopadhyay. The course curriculum is relevant and mostly helpful for the GATE examination. This curriculum also makes you industry-ready to tackle problems and more. The semester exams are conducted fairly, and there is no stress or pressure during exams. The passing percentage here is almost 95% and above.
detailed_review.Other: I chose this college for a better future in core branches, and this college is a way to secure my future. There is an annual fest named JINKS-PRANAV held every year. There are also scholarships offered like NSP, ASPIRE Scholarship, and Reliance Foundation Scholarship.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Metallurgy and Material Engineering
reviews.review_title: Placements and infrastructure are good but lack of sports facilities. This is very good college.

detailed_review.Placements: Placements are very good. Approximately 100% placement is there. The highest package is 14 LPA, and the lowest is approximately 4 LPA and average is 7 LPA-8 LPA. Top recruiting companies are Tata Metallics, JSW, Vedanta, MPM, Ashok Leyland, etc. Here you will not get internships from college you have to find internships by yourself.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Infrastructure is good you will get good Wi-Fi availability, labs are well maintained, and classrooms are very good. Every classroom has projector. In library you will not get every book but will get maximum course related books. Mess food is not good sometimes it is okayish or bad. Medical facilities are average and not much proper facilities for sports.
detailed_review.Faculty: Faculty members are the main part of any college. Here faculty members are supportive but teaching way of some faculty members are very good while some are very bad. Teachers are very knowledgeable. Course curriculum is relevant and updated. It makes students ready for industries. Semester exams are difficult but not very much difficult. Approximately 85% of students pass without having back.
detailed_review.Other: Fest is not so good. As the previous year, Jinks Pranav (annual fest) did not conducted.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Mechanical Engineering
reviews.review_title: A college is a boon in the core sector.

detailed_review.Placements: As per the placement brochure, more than 95% of seniors get placed every year with 9 LPA as the average package for the metallurgy branch and 7 LPA package for the mechanical branch. While other two branches are new and their first batch will pass out in 2026 to get tier placement data.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Despite being an old established college in the 1960s era, still, the infrastructure and buildings do not seem to be very old. Although hostel rooms are spacious still the mess food quality is poor. Medical facilities are okay they provide a health card on which one can have their free checkup.
detailed_review.Faculty: Faculty members are good, course curriculum of mechanical is on track with a good mixture of theory and practical knowledge. Deep understanding and attention are required when professors are teaching. Semester exams are easy and based on whatever is taught in class.
detailed_review.Other: I chose mechanical because of my interest and also because my brother was from the 2014-18 batch from IIT Kanpur in same branch. College can improve its campus area as it is very small. Also adding a few more branches can enhance its exposure along with good student capacity.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Metallurgy and Material Engineering
reviews.review_title: An underrated government college.

detailed_review.Placements: Currently, I am in 3rd year so our batch will pass out next year, but considering the next batch placement scenario we can see more than 70% of students have been placed and still it is ongoing. The highest package offered is 8.5 LPA by Crestan Foundry. The lowest is 4 LPA by L&T. It is quite less as compared to the previous year's placements which is 13.95 LPA the highest with an average 9 LPA. Top roles offered are shift in-charge, MTT, and GET.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: For metallurgy, facilities are top notch with well-equipped labs and workshops as it is a prime branch of this college. Books are filled in library but are of old editions. Hostel is very good as compared to other colleges. We have single seater rooms from 2nd year onwards. Mess food quality is poor so we have to adjust by eating outside. There is a health center for regular checkups. There is a big ground for playing outdoor games.
detailed_review.Faculty: Faculty members are well qualified with Ph.D. holder degrees from IIT or NIT. Teaching quality is good but varies from student to student, how they connect to their respective professors. Courses curriculum is slightly outdated with an old syllabus. Still, it is relevant as there is not much thing which has changed in the past few years. Semester exams are easy, consisting of one mid-semester exam between the semester and one end-semester exam at the end of the semester.
detailed_review.Other: I chose this course for purpose of GATE as student intake is less so competition is not very high for PSU government job. The thing that can be improved abour Metallurgy is that can add more value-adding or practical learning subjects rather than theoretical parts. Only one major fest is conducted every year named JINKS-PRANAV, which has still not been conducted for past 2 years due to internal conflicts.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Metallurgy and Material Engineering
reviews.review_title: Highly underrated in terms of ROI, less exposure is the biggest drawback.

detailed_review.Placements: Placement in the metallurgy branch is decent and good as compared to other branches. More than 98% of students get placed every year due to low student intake. The highest package offered was 13.95 LPA by Vedanta, meanwhile, the lowest package data is still unidentified, ranging from 2.5 to 3 LPA. But the average package for both branches combined is 7 LPA. Top recruiting companies are JSW, Vedanta, Mahindra, L&T, etc., offering roles in sales and marketing, shift in charge, or management trainee.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: As the branch is the core, labs are present in the main administrative building. Two lecture halls for all branches and years are there, which is a slight drawback. But as the college has a low student intake, it doesn't matter much, though upon expanding in the future, it may cause problems. Now, coming to the hostel, they have provided single rooms to students from 2nd to final year, while double-seater rooms are for girls and 1st-year students. Mess food is okay.
detailed_review.Faculty: Well-qualified teachers with Ph.D. from IIT / NIT are present to provide any help required. Teaching quality is moderate, as the branch is theoretical, so the student himself has to put in more effort. The course curriculum is outdated; they are still going with the old syllabus. Semester exams are easy, as 2 mid-sem and 1 end-sem occur.
detailed_review.Other: I chose this course by chance, but now I am bound to have a career in this in the future. The best thing about this course is less competition because only government colleges are offering B.Tech in Metallurgy. The only thing they can improve is adding more skillful / attractive subjects instead of theoretical subjects that require mugging up talent. A major fest, JINKS-PRANAV, is conducted every year, while a few small programs occur frequently.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Mechanical Engineering
reviews.review_title: It is a renowned college for students who do better in mechanical and metallurgical industries.

detailed_review.Placements: Yes, here placement is good. My college gives 100 percent placement in the mechanical engineering department. Also, many of our seniors crack the GATE examination with good ranks, and today, he is in many government agencies like IOCL, etc. This college has a great alumni network.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: My course is mechanical engineering. Here, India's largest workshop for mechanical is available. My hostel facility is also good; mess food is hygienic and in the hostel group, you can play games like volleyball, cricket, badminton, etc. Wi-Fi is not available in the 1st-year hostel.
detailed_review.Faculty: Faculty members are very helpful. They help students with making projects that students want to make. Curriculum are completed on time by our professors. Also, the exam is also taken on time by our college authority. Here, college gives no academic loads; you pass by scoring 33 marks out of 100.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Mechanical Engineering
reviews.review_title: "Underrated College" – I am sure you will get more than what you have expected from the college.

detailed_review.Placements:
As of 2024, the core (Mechanical and Metallurgy) branches have 100% placements.

The highest: 15 LPA,
The lowest: 3 LPA,
Average: 7.4 LPA.
Top companies: JSW GROUP, MAHINDRA & MAHINDRA, L&T, VEDANTA, TATA MOTORS, TATA STEEL, TATA AUTOCAMP.

Talking about the placements of the Computer Engineering branch, the first batch will pass out in 2026. But it is predictable that placements will be very good since the college and students are very much focused on internships and skills. Although the college is in the upgrading process (meaning the cons are fixing), the current infrastructure of the college is good enough.
detailed_review.Infrastructure:
Every hostel has Wi-Fi, but some Wi-Fi (~10%) needs repair/placement.
Classrooms are well-equipped (including projectors and speakers).
Labs and central workshops are also equipped with advanced machines.
The library has a sufficient quantity of books but lacks Wi-Fi, AC, and an e-Library.
The new administrative building will provide excellent facilities and features like advanced labs for departments.
Hostels have good quality food.
The mess serves tasty and good quality food.
As of 2024, the canteen is in the upgrading process, but you can fulfill all your needs just outside the campus gate.
Medical facilities are excellent.
There are basic clubs: Art, Dance, Drama, Photography, Cricket, Football, Volleyball, NIAMT Racing (technical club), and Entrepreneurship Development.
detailed_review.Faculty: Professors are well-qualified from IITs, NITs, and other premier institutes. 90% of professors are good and helpful. Semester exams are of average to good difficulty, so you have to be prepared for the exams. Since the college is autonomous, the papers are set by professors.
detailed_review.Other: I joined the course because I have an interest in mechanics. Also, the Mechanical Engineering branch is the evergreen branch, so you will have lots of opportunities. This college is "Ragging Free," and GIRLS are very SAFE here. The decorum of the college is very GOOD.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Metallurgy and Material Engineering
reviews.review_title: Return on investment is best here, but the crowd is low, so extracurricular are not very active.

detailed_review.Placements: Placement is nearly 98% in metallurgy and materials engineering. The average package is moving around 7 - 9.25 LPA in 2024 (in campus). Major recruiters include companies like JSW Steel, Tata Steel, Vedanta, Jindal Steel, L&T, TCS, Mahindra, and others who frequently visit for recruitment. Many roles are in design, production, quality control, and project management.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: I'm in first year, so I can only provide a first-year hostel review (Homi J. Bhabha Hostel). The room is good, the hostel is very good, and the mess food is decent. There are 2 students per room, 2 tables, 2 cabinets, 2 small cabinets, 2 beds, and 2 chairs. The new washrooms are clean. The hostel is well-constructed with basic facilities like shared rooms, equipped with beds, study tables, chairs, and wardrobes. The rooms are spacious enough to accommodate 2 students, depending on the batch size and allotment. Wi-Fi is available but only for laptops. The hostel has common rooms equipped with televisions and indoor games for relaxation. Sports enthusiasts can access the campus's outdoor fields or courts.
detailed_review.Faculty: In terms of faculty, academics are the best. A 75% attendance is mandatory. Professors are supportive, and the classroom is the best academically. This college is best in academics. Most professors hold PhDs or advanced degrees from reputed institutions and have significant teaching and research experience. Many faculty members are involved in industrial consultancy projects and collaboration. Labs and workshops are integrated into the curriculum, and professors encourage hands-on learning through projects and assignments.
detailed_review.Other: I chose metallurgy and materials engineering because my brother said if you're going to NIAMT (NIFFT), choose metallurgy because of the best alumni network in this branch, placement, faculty, etc. Based on my JEE rank, I got the last branch, and I am from Jharkhand. I have taken placement here, and the return on investment was also good from the start.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Mechanical Engineering
reviews.review_title: Shortly, this institution is a prestigious institute for mechanical and metallurgical engineering.

detailed_review.Placements:
Almost 100% of students were placed. The highest package in mechanical engineering is 16 lakh per annum, and the lowest is 4 LPA. The average package is 9.5 LPA, which is better than many NITs.
Most recruit companies are JSW.
Almost 97% of students got internships in JSW Steel and Vedanta, which gives an average of 8 LPA.
detailed_review.Infrastructure:
Hostel is good. The mess is also good . It gives proper food for a healthy life. The quantity is enough to fulfill all the students’ needs. The facilities and infrastructure are lower than NIT but sufficient for spending a good college life.
Many programs or seminars are held every month.
detailed_review.Faculty:
Faculty is good , all are qualified and have done PhD from authorised institutions like IIT and foreign institutes.
Difficulty faced in the semester exam due to an incomplete syllabus, but it depends on students who have done their HW and complete their syllabus through a reference book which is present in the library.
detailed_review.Other: Choose this course because in that institute, mechanical engineering is good in placement wise, and many students crack GATE exam with  AIR 3.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Mechanical Engineering
reviews.review_title: My review on our college and my experience till now.

detailed_review.Placements:
The average package was 7.5 lakhs. 
The highest was 14 lakhs off campus. 
Our college assures 90 percent placement. 
JSW and Vedanta Steel are mass recruiters. 
Placements are conducted by the placement cell.
Average CGPA for placement is 7.5.
There should be no backlogs.
detailed_review.Infrastructure:
Hostels are well furnished. 
Courses are mainly core-focused. 
Hostels are very spacious. 
Seniors are supportive. 
Lecture hall is very big. 
There are 6 hostels in total on our campus.
In which 5 are for BTech students and one is for MTech students.
Girls have separate hostels.
detailed_review.Faculty:
Faculty are very supportive. 
Curriculum is a bit old.
Faculty are graduates from well-known institutes around India. 
There are 4 branches, in which computer engineering, production and industrial engineering are the new ones.
We have the biggest workshop in Asia.
detailed_review.Other: The intake for 4 branches combined is around 250 students.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Production and Industrial Engineering
reviews.review_title: This college is very good at low fees. Here, the placement percentage is approx. 90 to 100 percent.

detailed_review.Placements: In this college, production and industrial engineering branch are passed out in 2026. But this course is similar to manufacturing engineering so don't worry about placement. Definitely, placement will be very good. This year approximately 100% placement of Mechanical engineering and MME branch. This year 2024-25, the highest package is 15 LPA, the lowest package is 4 LPA and the average package is 7.5 LPA. Top recruiting companies are JSW, Vedanta, TATA, Mahindra, etc. Almost every student has done internship with good companies.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: In our college, facilities and infrastructure are decent. Labs, classrooms, and libraries are good. Wi-Fi, grounds for sports are available, mess food is average, and medical facilities are also available. In this college mess, food is average, but nowadays no canteen is open for students.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers are very helpful, well qualified, and very knowledgeable, and their teaching quality is also very good, but some professors are egoistic. My course is very relevant for industry. It makes the students ready for industry. This course is very relevant to the current industry, so this course is good.
detailed_review.Other: This course is related to manufacturing and management. The best thing about this course is that it is very relevant to the current industry.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Metallurgy and Material Engineering
reviews.review_title: Want a good government engineering college with a low JEE rank? This is it.

detailed_review.Placements: Good college for those who want to study only because many of our seniors got qualified for GATE. Placements are currently going on in our college, and many students have secured placements in JSW with a package of 9.5 LPA. As per the previous trend, almost every student gets placement here with an average package of 7-8 LPA. The top recruiting company is JSW, and the company offering the highest package is Vedanta. Last year, Vedanta offered 14 LPA to a student, which was the highest.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The buildings of our hostel are very nice, and this year, renovation work is also underway. So, it will improve the look and interior of the hostel too. There is availability of Wi-Fi, a volleyball playground, a common room for watching television, and playing table tennis. The food here is not quite good, but our hostel, HJB hostel, is quite spacious. In our college, only 1st-year students live two in a single room; otherwise, all the students live in single rooms. You will also get 24-hour electricity, and there is no water problem. Medical facilities are good, and the doctor is also good. Caretakers of the hostel are also nice.
detailed_review.Faculty: Actually, the teachers are very good; they are very helpful in nature. Also, their teaching skills are too good, and they have good knowledge. The most important thing is that they teach in a very good manner. Also, there is no restriction on anyone of any kind in the classroom. I currently haven't appeared for exams, but our institute has become deemed, so from now on, the difficulty of exams might increase.
detailed_review.Other: Actually, for the branch of Materials Engineering, this institute is one of the best institutes, which also gives tough competition to NITs. The only thing that I don't like here is that there are no good fests and no such excess of extracurricular activities, but these activities are slowly increasing. Also, you will get a chance to avail scholarships.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Production and Industrial Engineering
reviews.review_title: The best core college in Asia.

detailed_review.Placements: There is 100 percent placement opportunity in our college. The highest package till now is 14 LPA. The average package is about 7-8 LPA. Our branch production and industrial engineering is new in this college, so till now the first batch of production and industrial engineering is in its 3rd year, so we can't say of its placement. But being a part of mechanical engineering, it's placement is assumed to be the same for mechanical engineering students.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The facilities in the college are good. It has a library, computer lab, workshop, and different labs for different work areas. Our college core branch facilities are of great quality throughout Asia. The hostel facilities are good enough. The work is done occasionally, particularly in the girls' hostel. There is a mess available at the hostel. No canteen is there in our college.
detailed_review.Faculty: The faculty members of our college are good, helpful, and advisable. They help us whenever we need it at the time of internships, any doubts or queries, or any other activities. The teaching courses are well designed with a touch of manufacturing technologies. The course curriculum is good enough and helps to know about the real-world situations.
detailed_review.Other: There is a yearly fest in our college, Jinks Pranav. The extracurricular activities are done on a monthly basis.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Production and Industrial Engineering
reviews.review_title: One of the best college you should take admission into.

detailed_review.Placements: Production and Industrial Engineering course is new in our college, it’s a 3 years course. Other departments’ placements rate is 100%. The highest package offered is 14LPA and the lowest is 5LPA. The average package is 7-8 LPA. All the students appearing in the interviews get placed.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The facilities and infrastructure of the college are good. We have a library where all the books related to the core branches are easily available. The classrooms are big enough. Wi-Fi connection is available across the campus. We have labs for each subject along with Asia's largest Workshop. The hostel facilities are good and the quality of mess food is better than many other colleges in the country. There is no canteen available.
detailed_review.Faculty: The teachers here are well qualified, helpful and knowledgeable. Their teaching quality is also good. Notes are provided for each and every subject. The course curriculum is relevant to that of the real world technology. This college provides  valuable knowledge for the students to work in industry. The semester exams are not so difficult if the students pay attention in the classrooms.
detailed_review.Other: There are always ongoing events in the college which gives us a busy schedule. The college fest is also celebrated every year.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Metallurgy and Material Engineering
reviews.review_title: Join if you want a good government engineering college with a lower JEE Main rank .

detailed_review.Placements: This year's placement rate was almost 100%, as 114 students got placed out of 120, which is quite good. The top recruiters are JSW, Vedanta, Tata Motors, etc. Most students were placed in JSW with a 9.6 LPA package and the highest package offered by Vedanta is 13.5 LPA.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The college infrastructure is good but small, not big, as compared to other NITs or big private colleges but it is well maintained. The facilities provided by the college are Wi-Fi, labs, a common room, Gymkhana and many other things. There are 5 boys hostels and 2 girls hostels, of which one is under construction. But there are no canteen facilities and the mess quality is also average or, at times, below average.
detailed_review.Faculty: The faculty members are very helpful and supportive. Most young faculty are quite helpful and good in teaching and they will help you if you want help regarding higher education, placement, internships, etc. If you are tortured by senior, you can complain they will immediately help you.
detailed_review.Other: Metallurgy and Materials Engineering is the best course in this college and if you want to prepare for higher studies like an MBA or GATE, then seniors will help you. The mess should be improved.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Engineering
reviews.review_title: NIFFT: A college with memories.

detailed_review.Placements: NIFFT boasts a track record in placement. Due to its emphasis on core branches such as metallurgy and manufacturing, most placements are secured by students in core companies. Individual attention is given to each student, resulting in an almost perfect placement rate. In 2023, the average package was 7 LPA. Notable recruiting companies at NIFFT include Tata Steel, Heavy Engineering Corporation, NML, IOCL, ONGC, Vedanta, JSW and others.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The college may be on 65 acres when compared to institutes but its campus is well planned and fully utilized. The labs, classrooms, instruments and equipment are all in good condition and equipped with modern facilities. There are four boy hostels and one girl hostel on the campus. The hostels provide a range of amenities, such as 24-hour Wi-Fi, round-the-clock electricity supply, equipped common rooms and nicely furnished rooms. Additionally, the college offers mess and canteen services that are reasonably priced.
detailed_review.Faculty: The professors at this institution have credentials holding Ph.D. degrees from universities such as IITs, NITs and international institutions. They are known to be very supportive and primarily conduct classes in English  to cater to the student population coming from parts of India. NIFFT is recognised for its programs in fields like metallurgy and mechanical engineering. Recently, two new disciplines have been introduced: computer engineering and production & industrial engineering. Admission to these B.Tech. courses is based on the JEE Main Rankings administered by the NTA.
detailed_review.Other: The college is quite impressive in terms of placement and infrastructure. The main thing about the college is that it provides all the facilities at very reasonable prices. Overall, it is a good place for learning and having splendid memories. If we talk about cons, the college is located in Hatia, a small town in Ranchi, so it does not provide good connectivity for transport. The other thing is that NIFFT doesn't have any impressive clubs or societies, so it lags in terms of exposure and crowds.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Metallurgy and Material Engineering
reviews.review_title: Want good government engineering college with a low JEE rank ? This is it.

detailed_review.Placements: Placement was quite good this year, and the placement rate was 100% for the Mechanical and Metallurgy branches. The highest package was 16 LPA, and many students received 13.6 LPA from Vedanta and JSW. Additionally, as always, companies like JSW offered 9.6 LPA and hired in bulk. Therefore, the average package is between 9 to 10 LPA, which is quite good for Metallurgy and Materials Engineering as a fresher.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The infrastructure is not that great, but it is well-maintained. There are a total of 7 hostels: 5 boys' hostels and 2 girls' hostels. Each year has a separate hostel for boys, so there is not much ragging. Each hostel has a large common room with a big TV, table tennis, and many indoor games. The 1st-year hostel has 4 grounds inside, including a badminton court, volleyball court, and cricket area. Wi-Fi is available in the hostel 24/7. There is also a library for studying or borrowing books.
detailed_review.Faculty: The faculty are very helpful and knowledgeable as well. If you need any assistance with internships or preparation for the GATE exam, they will help you. There are a total of eight semesters and sixteen midsems; each semester has two midsems, and the best of the two will be chosen.

faqs.question: What to do after JEE Main session 2 result?
faqs.answer: After JEE session 2 is completed, only those candidates who are aiming for IITs need to start preparing for JEE Advanced after clearing JEE Main. Those who are above the 98th percentile should start preparing for JEE Advanced as soon as possible. Those below this, between the 95th and 98th percentile, should focus on attempting more mock tests and previous year question papers so that they have a better chance of clearing JEE Advanced

data.title: National Institute of Advanced Manufacturing Technology Placement Report 2024
summary: The National Institute of Advanced Manufacturing Technology has released the placement stats for the BTech (MME and ME) batch 2024. As per the latest report, the highest international package offered to BTech (MME and ME) batch 2024 during the National Institute of Advanced Manufacturing Technology placements in 2024 stood at INR 15 LPA . Further, the domestic highest and average package offered to BTech (MME and ME) batch 2024 stood at INR 13.95 LPA and INR 7.4 LPA, respectively . The top recruiters of the National Institute of Advanced Manufacturing Technology in 2024 included KPMG, Mahindra, JSW Group, Sona Comstar, LUMIVO, Reliance, ISGEC Heavy Engineering, Tata Steel, etc.

Earlier, the highest and average packages offered to BTech students during the National Institute of Advanced Manufacturing Technology placements 2023 were INR 14 LPA and INR 9.25 LPA, respectively. The highest and average packages offered to the MTech batch 2023 were INR 4.8 LPA and INR 4.1 LPA, respectively.

college_info.college_name: NIT Andhra Pradesh (NIT AP): Cutoff, Placement, Fees, Courses, Admission 2025, Ranking

highlights.summary:
NIT Andhra Pradesh is the 31st institution in the chain of NITs started by the Government of India. The institute was established in 2015-16 and is located in Tadepalligudem, Andhra Pradesh. National Institute of Technology, Andhra Pradesh, is approved by the AICTE. The National Institute of Technology Tadepalligudem offers UG and PG programmes through 8 departments of study. The flagship course offered at NIT AP is BTech. The institute offers scholarships to meritorious students. The last closing rank during the NIT Andhra Pradesh cutoff 2024 ranged between 16278 and 45636. NIT Andhra Pradesh has been ranked in the 201-300 band, under the 'Engineering' category by the NIRF 2025.
The highest and average package offered during NIT Andhra Pradesh placement 2024 stood at INR 44 LPA and INR 8.13 LPA, respectively. NIT AP admission is based on the entrance exam. The institute appoints well-trained and expert faculty members and offers quality education to the students. The institute was spread over 172.6 acres of area and includes all the necessary facilities for the students, including a library, labs, sports complex, health centre, hostel, and others. The major highlights of NIT Andhra Pradesh are tabulated below:
National Institute of Technology Andhra Pradesh, National Institute of Technology Tadepalligudem, NIT Andhra Pradesh
