college_info.college_name: DY Patil Navi Mumbai Reviews on Placements, Faculty & Facilities

reviews.course: Bachelor of Sports Science (BSS)
reviews.review_title: Global Education and Sports- The DY Patil Nerul Legacy.

detailed_review.Placements: My batch is of 2024 and it was the best batch in the course. We learn about physiotherapy, anatomy, biochemistry, physiology, exercise form and technique, etc. After completing, we can either do a Masters abroad, get a job at a hospital, or even start a business as a dietician, physiologist, etc.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Hostels at D. Y. Patil University in Nerul generally have good infrastructure with a variety of room options. It includes AC rooms, attached bathrooms, study tables, and cupboards. Some reports suggest the rooms are quite big and clean, with daily cleaning services. A recurring point of feedback is that the hostel fees are considered expensive by many students. Especially, the mess food is sometimes not included in the base fee. It must be paid for separately.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers are well qualified and successful in their lives as well, but the college doesn't pay attention to each and every student that much. Also, the exams are a nuisance, as we have exams every week. The exams are not hard but consistent; instead, they should be held once a month.

reviews.course: B.Tech in Computer Science and Engineering (Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning)
reviews.review_title: The college has great placement and modern infrastructure with supportive faculty.

detailed_review.Placements: Dy Patil University, Navi Mumbai's B.Tech in CSE in (AI & ML) sees 70-85 percent placement yearly, with the package ranging from 16 LPA and the average of 4-7 LPA. Top recruiters like TCS, Infosys, Wipro, Accenture, Amazon, and Deloitte hire students for roles such as Software Engineer, Data Analyst, AI engineer, and ML engineer, making it a solid course for a career in the tech field.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: For the academic or department side, the facilities are very good in terms of modernity and breadth. The hostel and student life ancillary facilities are good overall; you'll find comfortable accommodation, modern amenities, and sports/leisure infrastructure. However, based on reviews, the mess food and hostel location/pricing may have some room for improvement.
detailed_review.Faculty: Dy Patil University, Navi Mumbai's CSE in (AI & ML) programme has qualified and supportive faculty with good teaching quality. The curriculum is industry-relevant, covering modern AI and ML tools with practical labs and projects. Semester exams are moderately difficult, but with regular study, most students pass easily. The overall pass percentage is around 85-90 percent.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Engineering
reviews.review_title: This is all about DY Patil University.

detailed_review.Placements: I am in the cyber security course, and in the coumpter science there are 1050 students who take admission. The average package is 8 LPA and goes upto 40 LPA to 50 LPA. Top companies are Amazon, Cisco, TCS, etc. 100% of students got internships according to my information.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Classrooms are well-equipped with modern projection and audio systems. University has specialized labs such as apple lab, IoT lab, weather direction system, many more hi-tech machines, and lab available. There is no need to worry about DY Patil food and other essential facilities.
detailed_review.Faculty: DY Patil University has a positive reputation for its faculty. Teachers are often described as being qualified and knowledgeable, with many of them holding PhDs and doctorates. The overall teaching quality is considered as effective, with a focus on being student-centric.
detailed_review.Other: DY Patil is best for all the things about fest, campus crowd, and all other things.

reviews.course: Bachelor of Medicine and Bachelor of Surgery (MBBS)
reviews.review_title: Good college and best faculty with easy guidance.

detailed_review.Placements: There are almost 250 students each year for a single batch. Since it's an MBBS course, all students have an internship in the college itself in their final year of 1 year where they receive a stipend of Rs. 20,000 per month. Rs. 60,000 for 3 months is given in advance.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: There are a total of 3 lecture halls with full AC and a good projector capable of accommodating more than 250 students. Along with it, there are many small demo rooms, a 2-floor library with many accessible books for free, and good Wi-Fi connectivity except in classrooms.
detailed_review.Faculty: The faculty members are really great, attentive towards every student, and in general very helpful. Exams are also very tough, you need a minimum of 40% in theory and 60% in practical to pass, and an aggregate of 50% out of 300 to pass university exams. There are 4 exams.
detailed_review.Other: The seniors are sweet and helpful, and the crowd is also very simple and easier to make friends with.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Engineering
reviews.review_title: Good placements, supportive faculty, and vibrant campus life with scope for curriculum update.

detailed_review.Placements: Around 80 to 85% of Computer Engineering Students at RAIT, Navi Mumbai, are placed annually through campus drives. The highest package is 32 LPA, with an average of 6 to 8 LPA and a minimum of 3 to 4 LPA. Recruiters include TCS, Infosys, Capgemini, Cognizant, Accenture, LTI, JP Morgan, Barclays, Amdocs, and occasionally Microsoft, Amazon, and Oracle. About 70% secure internships via campus, alumni, or startups, gaining practical exposure. Common roles include Software Engineer, Data Analyst, Web Developer, and Cloud Engineer. Festivals like Horizons and societies like IEEE enrich student life, blending academics, exposure, and campus vibrancy.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The Computer Engineering department at RAIT, Navi Mumbai, has modern labs like Mac and Siemens labs, updated hardware/software for AI, ML, and Cybersecurity, spacious AC classrooms, and a resourceful central library. The campus is Wi-Fi enabled and shares with DY Patil University broader facilities like a gym, playgrounds, and reliable medical access with DY Patil Hospital nearby. Hostel facilities exist mainly for girls but are costly, while boys prefer PGs, mess food gets mixed reviews. Sports and recreation are strong, with access to the DY Patil Stadium, gym, and pool. Overall, academic infrastructure is excellent, though hostel/food feedback is average.
detailed_review.Faculty: The Computer Engineering faculty at RAIT is highly qualified, with many holding PhDs, and is approachable, supportive, and interactive. They use smartboards, presentations, and guide projects and research. The curriculum is industry relevant, covering fundamentals along with AI, ML, Data Science, and Cybersecurity. It is practical, with projects, coding, and modern tech exposure. Exams are moderately difficult, testing understanding, with internal assessment making them manageable. The pass percentage is above 90%, thanks to supportive teaching. Overall, the department blends theory, practical, and guidance, making students confident and industry ready.
detailed_review.Other: I chose Computer Engineering at RAIT because of my interest in technology, problem-solving, and career opportunities in AI, data Science, and software. The course provides a strong foundation in hardware and software, with labs, projects, and subjects like AI/ML, cybersecurity, and cloud computing. Placements are strong, with students joining reputed IT and product firms. Faculty are supportive, and clubs like IEEE and CSI enhance learning. Fests like Horizons and Infinite Loop, plus a vibrant crowd, make campus life lively. Improvements in canteen facilities, internships, and syllabus updates would make the experience better.

reviews.course: B.Sc. in Hospitality Studies
reviews.review_title: I am satisfied with my college, faculty, campus, and the training provided to us.

detailed_review.Placements: My university provides great internships and placements with great hotels.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The services of college are very nice, we are provided with all kinds of services. The classroom and teachers are all friendly. The ambiance of the college is positive. The university also provides various teachers and chefs, so that they can help us. The university provides us with all the cutlery and Ingredients. No additional expenses are required, within the fees university provides us everything.
detailed_review.Faculty: In Hotel management, they provide us with good quality education and also help us to gain knowledge in every field. They take us to IV's great hotel trips, and they even provide all the good stays and food. They lead us to seminars and webinars, and they provide us with a great experience. If we have any issues, we can directly consult the staff and teachers for any doubts.
detailed_review.Other: We need more practical training in fieldwork. So the college must look forward to it.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Information Technology
reviews.review_title: A great pick in the Navi Mumbai region, this college actually values skills over grades.

detailed_review.Placements: 90 percent of the students get placed and those 10 percent are students who are not academically inclined. Average placement lies around 7 LPA-10 LPA. Higher ends of placement lie around 16 LPA-17 LPA. Over 65 percent of students got internships. Top recruiters are TCS, Wipro, Infosys, Capgemini, Cognizant, Bosch, L&T Infotech, Deloitte, Barclays, JP Morgan Chase, Morgan Stanley and Zensar. Roles offered are data analyst, IT consultant, Database engineer, software engineer, etc.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The college has a well-maintained infrastructure with modern, air-conditioned classrooms and clean washrooms. Labs are well-equipped for practical learning and the library offers a wide range of academic resources. Overall, the campus is clean, organized and student-friendly.
detailed_review.Faculty: The teachers at RAIT are supportive, well-qualified, and knowledgeable, making complex topics easier to understand. The IT curriculum is updated and aligned with industry needs, offering hands-on learning. Semester exams are moderately difficult, and the overall pass percentage is above 90%.
detailed_review.Other: I chose IT because of my interest in coding, problem-solving, and the vast career opportunities in the tech field. The best part about the course is its practical approach and industry-relevant subjects. I wish there were more advanced elective options and deeper project exposure. The campus is always buzzing with events, workshops, and teach fests, along with fun concerts and cultural programs. The crowd is energetic, connectivity is good, and there are ample opportunities for extracurricular and scholarships.

reviews.course: Master of Business Administration (MBA)
reviews.review_title: My college review for upcoming MBA students.

detailed_review.Placements: All the students out of 180 are placed at some top-level companies like Deloitte, Tata Capital, JP Morgan, Hindustan Unilever, etc. The highest package offered is 18 LPA, and the lowest package offered is 7 LPA. Top companies like Deloitte, Tata Capital, and Hindustan Unilever recruit from this college. All 180 students got internships from the college itself. Top role offered in this course is marketing manager.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The students learning at this college can avail a lot of facilities like all over Wi-Fi connection, totally centralized air-conditioning in the entire college including the lecture halls, lobby, and canteen area. There is a 4 storied library in the C wing of the college, where students can refer to various books and articles that can help them in their academics. The quality of the food is also nice. There are different counters for different cuisines which also helps reduce longer waiting time. There is an indoor sports unit as well.
detailed_review.Faculty: Faculty appointed by the college is very skilled. They have a lot of experience in tackling situations that the students might face in the future. The course curriculum is also very much relevant to the ongoing needs of the corporate offices, and these can help the students to be industry-ready. The semester exams are a bit difficult but not that much if you are willing to learn and want to become successful in life.
detailed_review.Other: I chose this course because I wanted to bring out the leadership qualities and nurture them to fit the corporate work cycle. There are no improvements required in the course. College also hosts various events in the stadium for which the students can volunteer if they want.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Engineering
reviews.review_title: RAIT is one of the best colleges, and I am currently studying here. I'm a proud RAITian.

detailed_review.Placements: In RAIT, there is 100% placement. Every student gets the opportunity to work in their dream job. The highest package offered is 43 LPA, the lowest is 3 LPA, and the average is 6 LPA across all fields. The most in-demand fields are AIML, Data Science, Cybersecurity, and core IT branches. Nearly 100% of students get internships at various companies like Deloitte, Amazon, and Google Pay.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Every facility is provided to every student, with delicious mess food on time. RAIT is very clean compared to others. There is 24/7 electricity. The labs are equipped with multiple ACs, and classrooms have digital boards to make learning faster and easier to understand.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers are very helpful. They take 3 internal assessments as revision before the semester exams. The exams are difficult, but the way teachers teach ensures you never fail. The course makes us industry-ready, by the end, you just need to revise, and you’ll remember everything. Professors are friendly and clear each doubt.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Information Technology
reviews.review_title: I love my college more than anything.

detailed_review.Placements: I joined D.Y. Patil Vidyapeeth for the very same reason that there are 100% placements and very good companies visit the college to provide placements. The highest package offered in placements was 42 LPA for the last year. It provides internships in the 3rd year itself.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: I have seen the hostel and the infrastructure is quite vast and big. There are 3 hostels one for boys and one for girls. There is a hostel for both in the same building named Centre of Excellence and their girls hostel is right below the boys hostel.
detailed_review.Faculty: The course I am doing is quite good. The first semester exam can be cleared easily and the second semester which I find hard to clear as of now the results are not out for the second semester. However, it is difficult for me to answer such hard questions.
detailed_review.Other: The crowd is awesome. Seniors will help us literally with anything if we have a doubt.

reviews.course: B.Sc. in Radio Imaging Technology
reviews.review_title: College and the campus are very good, worth every penny.

detailed_review.Placements: The name of DY Patil University on your degree is enough to get a placement anywhere in India. But in my course, we get internships at DY Patil Hospital itself, and it is compulsory for 1 year after that we can join DY Patil or we can search for other places for jobs.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Infrastructure and campus are very good. They have legends cafe in the medicine building. There is a Nescafé in the hospital building. Also, girls and boys hostels are available on the campus. Nearly every type of course is available on the campus so no matter what career you are going to choose you can pursue it here.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers are very good. They are very helpful but the other staffs are not. Semester exams are tough, only scholars can pass them. Average students might fail. If you fail once then it is going to be very hard to make a comeback so don't take exams slightly that's it.

reviews.course: B.Tech in Computer Science and Engineering (Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning)
reviews.review_title: It is advanced in infrastructure and decent in placements.

detailed_review.Placements: Placements are confused about it because I am the very first batch of this course. Job offerings right now are for the role of SDE and being an AI ML student. It is a question to continue doing AI ML or switch to SDE from the placement point of view. Because for students placements are important.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The infrastructure is quite good. Library, canteen, high tech, and advanced labs based on trending domains like Apple lab, Robotics lab, intel unnati lab, Blockchain lab, etc., are available. Students can work in these labs by obtaining permission. Few classrooms don't have AC which I feel isn't worth paying so much fees.
detailed_review.Faculty: The course curriculum is decent enough and faculty members too. Many faculty members are good enough in the teaching point of view. Some of them even guide us for betterment in academics and life. Few faculty members in this college lack somewhere behind. Giving unwanted trouble to students and parents can be avoided by this college.
detailed_review.Other: This college is very good for fests and events. We will enjoy our university life here. Somewhere it lacks if we want to do extraordinary work like bigger projects or hackathons, etc., due to its mismanagement and internal politics. From the placement point of view, we get a very minimum package in hands as compared to the amount of fees we pay.

reviews.course: B.Sc. in Physician Associate
reviews.review_title: It is a good college for study and extracurricular activities.

detailed_review.Placements: B.Sc. in Physician Associate course is a recently introduced course with a limited number of colleges offering it currently. One can join a private or government hospital as an assistant physician after graduation. Students do internships for 1 year after 3 years of course completion in the same college. The stipend given is zero but one can earn by joining a clinic or hospital side by side to a decent amount.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The university has a huge campus, providing all the basic to great amenities here. It has Wi-Fi for every department. Labs are well-developed. Anatomy dissection halls are well-maintained and dissection is carried out for the medical courses as it requires. Classrooms are very spacious with projectors, whiteboards, and all other teaching facilities. The hostel has good infrastructure. It has 3-4 different canteens on the campus. It has sports and games fields, and equipment is well-maintained. Cricket and football grounds are provided. The library has reading halls with all the academic course books.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers are well-qualified here with very polite and helpful non-teaching staff members too. Their teaching is decent. The course curriculum is designed to make a good scope in the medical field. There are two semesters and a final exam with unit tests being conducted in between semesters. The difficulty level is moderate to hard.
detailed_review.Other: Every year grand annual and fest celebrations are conducted. Intercollege sports competitions are also being conducted here.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Information Technology
reviews.review_title: Campus tour of RAIT in brief.

detailed_review.Placements: Companies like TCS, Cognizant, KPMG, Deloitte, Accenture, Capgemini, etc., come to our college. The average package is 4 LPA - 5 LPA, and the highest salary is 12 LPA. 90% of students sit for placements, and rest go for masters. Companies start coming from June and July months of final year studies.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Labs and libraries are well-equipped. For studies, you can find all the books in the library. Labs are also renovated and are very attractive now. There are data analytics lab, cyber lab, robotics lab, etc. Although there are no Wi-Fi facilities for students.
detailed_review.Faculty: Exams are of medium level, easy to pass. You just have to give a little effort to pass your exams. Teachers have great knowledge of their particular subjects. You can always ask them any doubts and they are always ready to guide and brief you. Maximum teachers are Ph.D. holders.
detailed_review.Other: As compared to fees, the companies that college brings are of very low packages. Return on investment is low. In my opinion, if the college is increasing fees, then companies with higher packages should be coming. Also, students who are serious about their studies should be getting admissions, so that the standard of college is maintained.

reviews.course: Bachelor of Business Administration (BBA)
reviews.review_title: Great college experience, but the placement is average.

detailed_review.Placements: Placement opportunities are average. The packages range between 3–4 LPA, with the highest being 8 LPA. There are various opportunities and roles, as the college offers multiple specializations like finance, international business, marketing, analytics, hospitality, etc.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The infrastructure is really nice, and the overall college experience is good. The classrooms are well-maintained, with proper seating, good ventilation, and clean washrooms. The library is well-equipped. The canteen is the best part of the college. There is a specific study area for students.
detailed_review.Faculty: The difficulty level is medium, I would say, but faculty members are quite helpful. Most of them are good qualified and explain concepts well. The curriculum is fairly relevant and includes subjects that help build industry knowledge. Semester exams are of moderate difficulty.
detailed_review.Other: For all events, you have free access with just a student ID. Concerts and fests feature national and international artists at D.Y. Patil. The overall experience is amazing.

reviews.course: Online Bachelor in Business Administration (BBA) (General)
reviews.review_title: The best course from the best university.

detailed_review.Learning Experience: I am having a good experience here. The course I am doing is online BBA. They post the lectures at accurate time. They have good professors, and their way of teaching is the best.
detailed_review.Placements: The best placements they provide. Maximum students get placement.
detailed_review.Faculty: They post the lectures at accurate time. The way of explaining things is the best.
detailed_review.Course Support: The support is also too good and helpful. They are polite in talking to us.

reviews.course: B.Sc. in Hospitality Studies
reviews.review_title: Good placements, vibrant campus, and decent facilities.

detailed_review.Placements: Our course placement rate is around 35% with the highest package reaching 3 LPA. Around 90% of students secured placement in Taj, JW Marriott, Radisson, The Park Hotel, Courtyard by Marriott, St. Regis, Taj Land's End, etc.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: College provides well-equipped labs, high-speed Wi-Fi, classrooms, and stocked libraries. Hostel is the best but a bit expensive. There are sports amenities available. Canteen is okay but college cafes are best and college has four grounds, two swimming pools, and one clubhouse.
detailed_review.Faculty: Faculty members are good and highly educated plus qualified, sporting, and well-experienced. Course curriculum is mostly industry-relevant though some updates are needed in future years. Semester exams are moderately difficult. Pass percentage is around 35%.
detailed_review.Other: College hosts exciting cultural and sports activities with major events like IPL, WPL, women's football matches in the stadium, and concerts by artists such as Coldplay, 50 Cent, and Darshan Raval.

reviews.course: Integrated M.Sc. in Biotechnology
reviews.review_title: Based on my experience, I would not recommend this college to other students.

detailed_review.Placements: They promise placements at the time of admission, but during the course, they fail to provide proper information or update regarding placement opportunities. Placement cell is poorly organized, and there is minimal involvement in connecting students with potential employers. The chances of getting placed are very low, as the college lacks strong ties with reputed companies or industries, especially in the field of integrated M.Sc. Biotechnology.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: College does not have a hostel, but classrooms are good. Lab facilities are available, but some chemical and media in the lab are expired, which raise safety and quality concerns. Canteen is small and often crowded, making it convenient for students. Additionally, campus lacks proper recreational areas and adequate parking facilities.
detailed_review.Faculty: Exams are quite tough, with two external examiners overseeing the process, and the examination pattern is challenging. However, faculty members are highly skilled. Their teaching is excellent, making it easier for students to understand complex concepts. Despite the tough exams, the guidance provided by faculty members helps students prepare effectively.
detailed_review.Other: I chose biotechnology because offering solutions to real-world problems in fields like healthcare, agriculture, and environmental sustainability. This course provides opportunities to work on groundbreaking innovations like genetic engineering, drug development, and sustainable farming. College has only one building, and the space in front of it is limited, which restricts the area available for events. Despite this, events like Species are conducted occasionally. I'm part of the drama club Jaiwarangaytan, but unfortunately, college does not provide adequate funding for our drama or allocate a proper space for practice. This lack of support hinders extracurricular activities significantly.

reviews.course: B.Sc. in Hospitality Studies
reviews.review_title: I suggest students if they think of joining this college, then they can join it without hesitation.

detailed_review.Placements: Placements are very good and students get placements in the top hotels of Mumbai. About 80% of the students get placements and 40% of the students get the top hotels. Most of the students get placements in the Taj Hotel, JW Marriott, and big hotels in Mumbai so there is no need to worry about placements.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Facilities are the best. It is one of the best colleges in Mumbai. There is a Wi-Fi in the college. The mess is very nice. The canteen is the best, and students can sit there and have lunch. The price of the food is affordable and the taste it is very good.
detailed_review.Faculty: Some teachers are helpful some seem like they are teaching themselves or are reading the books for the first time. The course curriculum is not relevant. Semester exams are okay if we study we can write them. The pass percentage is 89%. But if our attendance is less than 80%, then we have to give back.
detailed_review.Other: The best part about this college is the events. Students will get to see all the big events happening here like the Coldplay, Cricket World Cup, Football World Cup, etc.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Biotechnology
reviews.review_title: Review for DY Patil School of Biotechnology and Bioinformatics.

detailed_review.Placements: The highest package offered was forty Lacs per annum, and the average package after the college is 4 Lacs per annum. The top recruiting companies for this course are Transasia Biomedical Ltd., IKS Health, and Himedia Labs. The top roles offered in this course are mostly as interns, as internship is a compulsory part of the 7th and 8th semester syllabus. 100% of the students get internships in the 7th and 8th semesters.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The campus and facilities are not much and are very average. The library, canteen, reading room, labs, and the general infrastructure of the building are subpar. Sports and games are promoted a lot, and the seniors are very helpful and motivate others to take part in the events. The food in the canteen is very average, with only 2-3 items that are regularly ordered from there, like vada pav, noodles, and cold coffee.
detailed_review.Faculty: The teaching faculty is average and does not teach as per the hours assigned to each of the modules. Hence, the semester 1 final examination had to be postponed, causing a lot of stress among the semester 1 students. The course curriculum is relevant. The syllabus is interesting and useful in the real world. The semester exams are moderately tough and can be passed with a decent amount of studies. The pass percentage is 40%.
detailed_review.Other: I chose this course as I was always interested in Biology but did not want to go into medicine, and this college was close to my residence and hence, convenient for me. The campus can be greatly improved as it is very unimpressive compared to the DY Patil, Nerul campus, and even compared to an average college campus. There are a lot of events and fests, which is a great thing. The seniors are very motivating and supportive. The campus surroundings are good as there are a lot of restaurants to visit and many hangout spots.

admission.title: DY Patil College of Engineering Navi Mumbai Admission Overview 2025
admission.overview_text:
DY Patil College of Engineering Navi Mumbai admits students based on various national-level entrance exams such as NEET, JEE Main, NEET PG, etc. The mode of application at DY Patil College of Engineering, Navi Mumbai is online.

The university offers a range of undergraduate, postgraduate, and doctoral, advanced master's courses in the stream of Aviation, Business and Management Studies, Engineering etc. DY Patil College of Engineering admission will be based on various national-level entrance exam scores as per course requirements. Popular courses offered by the university are BTech, MBA, BAMS, BDS and BBA.

faqs.question: Who is eligible for BTech at Dr DY Patil Vidyapeeth, Navi Mumbai?
faqs.answer: To apply for B.Tech course at Dr DY Patil Vidyapeeth, Navi Mumbai student need to meet the last educational qualification. Aspirants need to complete Class 12 with 45% to 50% aggregate. Apart from this, a total of 180 seats are available for B.Tech at Dr DY Patil Vidyapeeth, Navi Mumbai.

faqs.question: Who is eligible for MBA at DY Patil Deemed to be University, Navi Mumbai?
faqs.answer: The eligibility criteria for MBA at DY Patil Deemed to be University, Navi Mumbai is graduation with 50% aggregate. However,  any graduate with minimum 50% aggregate in graduation, MBA programme in HR need to clear an entrance exam. While the eligibility criteria are generally determined by the respective colleges, the well-known entrance exams include CAT, XAT, CMAT, MAT and GMAC’s NMAT, DYPCET.

faqs.question: What is the fee structure for MBA at DY Patil University Navi Mumbai?
faqs.answer: The fee structure for DY Patil University Navi Mumbai MBA courses includes all the fee components to be paid by the students to complete the programme. As per the fee structure, students are mainly charged with three components: tuition fees, hostel fees, and a one-time payment. Only the students who opt for hostel facilities are required to pay the hostel fees. Combining all, the total fees for the MBA programme ranges from INR 4.5 Lacs to INR 17.2 lakh. Check the below table to learn the component-wise bifurcation of the total fees: Fee Components Amount Tuition Fees INR 1.3 Lacs - INR 14 lakh Hostel Fees INR 3 lakh One-time Payment INR 20,000 Total Fees INR 4.5 Lacs - INR 17.2 lakh Note: The above-mentioned fee is as per the official sources. However, it is indicative and subject to change.

faqs.answer: BTech seats offered by DY Patil University Navi Mumbai BTech are allocated based on marks obtained in the accepted entrance exams. The exams accepted by the university are JEE Main, MHT CET, SAT, and DYPRAIT-ET. Moreover, the students seeking admission must apply for the preferred course by visiting the official website of the university. After submitting the application, those who receive admission offers are required to report to the university for verification of documents and payment of fees.

faqs.answer: The admission process for DY Patil University Navi Mumbai BTech begins with the eligibility check. The university offers a 5% relaxation in case of Disability candidates belonging to Maharashtra State only.

Candidates seeking admission to Ph.D. (Ayurved) and Ph.D. (Engineering) must appear for Ph.D. Entrance Test (PET), conducted by the University.

faqs.answer: Yes, students who have appeared for the MAT exam can get an MBA seat at DY Patil Navi Mumbai. However, getting a good score in MAT might not be enough to secure admissions. faqs.question: Can I get a hostel room at DY Patil University Navi Mumbai? If yes, then what is the hostel fee?
faqs.answer: Yes , students officially enrolled in any of the DY Patil University Navi Mumbai courses can opt for hostel facilities available at the university. As per the university's official website, the university provides separate hostel facilities available for male and female students. Moreover, the official website also states that each hostel is equipped with necessary amenities. These amenities are water facilities, recreational areas, and a mess. As per sources collated across the web, the hostel fees range from INR 1.7 Lacs to INR 12 lakh . Note: The above-mentioned fees is as per official sources. However, it is subject to change.

faqs.question: Which entrance exam scores does DY Patil Deemed to be University, Navi Mumbai accept for admission to MBA?
faqs.answer: DY Patil Deemed-to-be University, School of Biotechnology & Bioinformatics is best known for its health Science education and research programs. Graduates from the institute are placed with the highest salary package of INR 4LPA (approx.) and an average salary of INR 2 LPA in top recruiting companies such as Biocon, Hindustan Unilever (P) Ltd, SRL Ltd., Mumbai, Bharat Serum (P) Ltd, Lupin Biotech (P) Ltd, Biogenomics Ltd, etc. The institute offers B.Tech and M.Sc programs in the allied fields of health Science such as Biotechnology, Bioinformatics and Data Science, Food Technology, and Biomedical Engineering under the School of Biotechnology and Bioinformatics. Admission to DY Patil Biotechnology & Bioinformatics Institute is based on the scores obtained in recognised national and state-level entrance exams. The eligibility criteria for admission to the MBA programme at DY Patil School of Management are as follows: BBA with a minimum of 50% aggregate marks for General. 45% for reserved category candidates. Minimum of 50% at graduation and with a consistent academic record. Scores in CAT / GMAT / XAT / GRE will be further considered for shortlisting to the personal interview. Bachelor’s degree with at least 50% marks in aggregate for the General category and 45% for SC/ST candidates. Completed a degree programme at an accredited university in any stream having obtained a minimum of 45% or 50% on the whole (for unreserved categories) (for reserved categories).  Entrance Exams: DY Patil Deemed to be  University, situated in Navi Mumbai, considers JEE scores as part of its admission criteria. Additionally, the university accepts scores from various other entrance exams, such as MHT CET, NATA, NEET, DYPCET, GATE, and MAH-M.Arch-CET.

placement_faqs.question: How are B.Tech placements at DY Patil Deemed to be University, Navi Mumbai?
placement_faqs.answer: DY Patil Deemed-to-be University, School of Biotechnology & Bioinformatics is best known for its health Science education and research programs. Graduates from the institute are placed with the highest salary package of INR 4LPA (approx.) and an average salary of INR 2 LPA in top recruiting companies such as Biocon, Hindustan Unilever (P) Ltd, SRL Ltd., Mumbai, Bharat Serum (P) Ltd, Lupin Biotech (P) Ltd, Biogenomics Ltd, etc. The institute offers B.Tech and M.Sc programs in the allied fields of health Science such as Biotechnology, Bioinformatics and Data Science, Food Technology, and Biomedical Engineering under the School of Biotechnology and Bioinformatics. Admission to DY Patil Biotechnology & Bioinformatics Institute is based on the scores obtained in recognised national and state-level entrance exams. eligibility criteria for admission to the B.Tech programme are as follows: - The candidate should be an Indian National. - The candidate must have either appeared at the Higher Secondary Certificate (HSC / Std. XII) examination or equivalent qualification of any board in India or abroad, with Physics, Chemistry, and Biology Life Sciences (and desirably with Mathematics) or if the result of the examination has been declared, he/she must have passed the same examination with minimum 45% marks in Physics, Chemistry and Biology taken together (40% for the Reserve Category candidates). - The selection process is done through an online proctor-based entrance test conducted by the university. you may be eligible to apply for the B.Tech programme at DY Patil Deemed to be University, Navi Mumbai if you have passed your 10+2 examination with the required subjects and marks. However, your admission will depend on your performance in the entrance test and the availability of seats. The placement rate for B.Tech students at this university is around 60%, with the highest package reaching 11 LPA, the lowest at 3.36 LPA, and an average of 4 LPA. The top recruiters include Cognizant, Tata, Infosys, Accenture, Amazon, and more. The placements are decent.

college_info.college_name: Panimalar Engineering College: Courses, Fees, Admission 2025, Placements, Reviews

highlights.summary: Panimalar Engineering College, is located in Chennai, Tamil Nadu. Established in 2000, it is a private institute approved by AICTE. Panimalar Engineering College provides 16 UG and PG courses in 9 specialisations, namely Civil Engineering, Computer Science Engineering, Electrical Engineering, Electronics & Communication Engineering, Electronics Engineering, Information Technology and Mechanical Engineering. Theses programmes are offered in both Full Time mode. B.E. / B.Tech, M.E./M.Tech and MBA/PGDM are some of the courses offered at Panimalar Engineering College. Some of the streams in which these courses are offered include Engineering and Business & Management Studies. The total fee at Panimalar Engineering College ranges between INR 35,000 and 2,00,000. Panimalar Engineering College has a student intake of 3906 for all the courses. The average median package at Panimalar Engineering College is INR 4,31,684. Panimalar Engineering College offers all the infrastructural facilities to students.

reviews.course: B.Tech in Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning
reviews.review_title: Review of Panimalar Engineering College.

detailed_review.Placements: Placements in our college are excellent, and every year, more than 90% of students are getting placed. Training provided by the management is excellent and efficient, students benefit from the training. Top organizations like CTS, Hexaware, Accenture, Tech Mahindra, etc., come for hiring, and students get hired for both IT and core engineering fields.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Classrooms and laboratories are very well-equipped with high-end technologies and smart rooms. Many AV halls and seminar halls are available for every department. Many labs are available for every department. Libraries are also available for each and every department in addition to the two central libraries. We have a separate mess for vegetarian and non-vegetarian food. Hostels are provided with facilities like a gym, sports, smart, etc.
detailed_review.Faculty: Almost all teachers from our college are Ph.D. graduates, and their style of teaching is very efficient. Teachers teach the concepts in a very easy manner, making it easy to remember the concepts very well. The curriculum is well updated to the current industry standards for every department. Semester exams are pretty easy because of the excellent teaching by staff, and students can score more than 80% in all exams.
detailed_review.Other: The rules in our college are strict. But there are a lot of good things about the campus. Many scholarships are provided for students, and free Wi-Fi is available. Our college supports sports as well as academics equally. Our campus is very green, surrounded by lots of trees. The environment is very blissful.

reviews.course: B.E. in Electronics and Communication Engineering
reviews.review_title: Good college with a good environment.

detailed_review.Placements: The course is good for both software and hardware company jobs. The placements are very good in the college, and many companies are offering placements. Every student must want to apply for placement; once the job comes, there is no chance to apply for the next company.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The college infrastructure is very good; it is on more than 50 acres of land. The ground is very large, and the facilities are good. The college provides morning breakfast and snacks, as well as afternoon lunch for day scholar students. The college is good.

reviews.course: B.E. in Computer Science and Engineering

reviews.course: B.E. in Electrical and Electronics Engineering
reviews.review_title: I like my college, because it provides good placements. It has great infrastructure and facilities.

detailed_review.Placements: Placement rates are lower for EEE in my college than for other branches. Placements are really good for the CSE and ECE branches. But the management treats all branches equally. They take extra care for placements by conducting separate classes and training for students.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Our college has an advanced and well-structured infrastructure. In the hostel, the fee structure depends on the room category, like 2 sharing, 3 sharing, and facilities provided. We have sports tournaments at the college level. There is an open space and an auditorium where cultural events are held every year.
detailed_review.Faculty: At Panimalar Engineering College, professors are well-qualified and knowledgeable. They provide great support during lab sessions, internal exams, and assignments. Semester exams are not very tough if we attend all classes regularly. The pass percentage is 85%.

reviews.course: Master of Business Administration (MBA)
reviews.review_title: My review of this college.

detailed_review.Placements: The placement and job opportunities are ample for students of the one-year MBA program as it gives them a lot of experience and knowledge. There are some criteria for being eligible to sit for placements. Students must have 75% of attendance and a 7.5 GPA in either last semester or overall. If a student has any of the above, then they are allowed to sit for placements. Students get jobs in various sectors such as the manufacturing sector, IT, etc. The major recruiting companies for our course are KPMG, Tech Mahindra, Asian Paints, Bajaj Auto, ICICI Securities, etc., with good packages. The average package is 3 LPA.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The college has separate gents and ladies' hostels. Students are provided spacious rooms with attached bathrooms and running hot and cold water. The hostel offers spacious and large play courts and playgrounds for volleyball, basketball, shuttle, badminton, gymnastics, and yoga classes. The mess food quality is also super and well-maintained.
detailed_review.Faculty: The college has great faculty members who provide their best efforts to make students understand and expand their knowledge whether on a theoretical basis or on the practical round. Students are just required to be obedient to shining academic performance. Semester exams are conducted which fully depend on the affiliated university of this college, which is affiliated with Anna University, Chennai. It conducts exams semester-wise. There are two semesters in one year. Exams are conducted in April and May months. There are also internal exams between each semester, which consist of 20 marks for each paper. The course curriculum is based on a way that makes students ready to take up any challenges. They are given skills in decision-making and public speaking. Every soft skill is also imparted to make the best out of the course and there is practical learning in this course.

reviews.course: B.Tech in Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning

detailed_review.Infrastructure: Facilities and infrastructure available in our department are good and neat. There is good equipment in the department. There are good labs with good equipment required for students. The network connection is good, fast, and enough for students.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers in the college are good with a well-educated background. The course curriculum is good and nice for students. Exams have tricky questions and moderate papers. There is a required syllabus in the course curriculum at the college.
detailed_review.Other: The course curriculum should be developed.

detailed_review.Infrastructure: The food in the mess is good, the hostel now has free Wi-Fi, and labs are in good condition. The library has all the books needed for students. The mess is kept clean, and the campus is cleaned multiple times a week. The hostel rooms are cleaned daily.
detailed_review.Faculty: The staff is friendly and covers all topics, clearing any doubts asked by students. There are clubs for robotics, AIML, etc., which students can join, and it has advantages like special workshops that list club members. The pass percentage is 50% in all tests, internals, and semesters.

reviews.review_title: Review of Panimalar Engineering College.

Rooms were very spacious, and the playground and recreation hall everything was good. The food was very tasty. There was no Wi-Fi facility inside the campus.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers and staff were very nice to students. The course curriculum was good and made students industry-ready. Teachers were well-qualified, and their teaching was also good. The semester exams were based on the performance of students.

reviews.course: B.E. in Civil Engineering
reviews.review_title: A short review of my college.

detailed_review.Placements: Our college provides better placement opportunities for students. The basic salary package is around 2.4 LPA and the highest salary package is around 8 LPA. Core recruiters are Sobha Develops, Brigade, Raunaq Foundation, and Ashiana Housing Ltd.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The college campus is very peaceful. The hostel and mess facilities are excellent in this college. The hostel has a 24/7 electricity supply and water supply. Classrooms, laboratories, library, etc., are well-maintained. The mess food is very tasty and has varieties.
detailed_review.Faculty: Staff of all departments is well-qualified in their fields and they help in the upliftment of the students career. The course curriculum is relevant to the industry. The semester exams difficulties are moderate. The pass percentage is around 50% in all papers.

reviews.course: B.E. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: Really good infrastructure and facilities.

detailed_review.Placements: Around 70% of students got placed in our batch. The highest package was 12 LPA, and the lowest package was 3 LPA. The average package was 4 LPA. Top recruiting companies were Accenture, Zoho, TCS, CTS, etc. Roles offered were software developer, testing, and technical support engineer.

Classrooms were very good and contained many fans, white boards, and projectors that will be used for taking a class when needed. Libraries were also there with fully air-conditioned and had many computers with internet facilities and a wide variety of collections of books i.e., more than 10,000 books. Food was compulsory for day scholars and hostellers also. Food quality was good and tasty. Medical facilities were there for emergency situations. Sports facilities were less only.

Courses were not completely industrial standards, but somewhat high standards. Semester exams were easy to medium and pass percentage was mostly more than 90%.

reviews.course: B.E. in Electronics and Communication Engineering

detailed_review.Placements: The placement cell is very good. They provide several opportunities to the students. The salary package ranges from 2.4 LPA to 8 LPA, and more based on the company. Both core and IT companies will recruit the students. Top roles offered are GET, MT, etc.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: College has a good infrastructure and environment. The department blocks have all the facilities. Classrooms are well maintained. The library is excellent. The mess food is very tasty and has both vegetarian and non-vegetarian food on alternative days.
detailed_review.Faculty: Faculty members, supporting staffs, HODs, etc., are very kind towards the students. They shape the future of the students. Their teaching is very helpful. The course curriculum is relevant to the field with more practical. Semester exam difficulty is moderate.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Information Technology
reviews.review_title: Panimalar Engineering College offers a structured academic environment.

detailed_review.Placements: The college offers more offers. IT companies like TCS, Tech Mahindra, Zoho, and Accenture visit the college for placements. The average salary package is 3 LPA. The highest salary package is 34 LPA in November 2023. The college provides more number of placements.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The college has a great infrastructure for all UG/PG programs. The college provides a great lab, a library, and hostel facilities. There are many hostels in the college, and they are safe and secure for girls on campus. For day scholars, there are more than 170 buses daily for students.
detailed_review.Faculty: Faculty members are good at teaching. They are well-experienced in all subjects knowledge. The course curriculum is good in this institution. All courses are NBA accredited, so that is good in all knowledge things. Semester exams are conducted in a tough manner, and students can gain knowledge in exams.

reviews.course: B.E. in Mechanical Engineering
reviews.review_title: Panimalar Engineering College has good infrastructure and facilities.

The highest package offered in mechanical courses is around 6 LPA. There are many top companies, like Bharat Benz and Ashok Leyland are recruiting from our course.

detailed_review.Faculty: In Panimalar Engineering College, the teachers are well-qualified and knowledgeable. Teachers are very kind to students so that they don't feel tired of taking classes or solving our doubts. They are always very kind to students. Semester exams are very easy, and the pass percentage is about 45%.
detailed_review.Other: Basically, I’m a bit more interested in mechanical engineering compared to IT and software engineering. By learning mechanical engineering, you gain a lot of knowledge about machines, vehicles, and more.

faqs.question: What is the schedule for TNEA Counselling at SRM Easwari Engineering College?
faqs.answer: TNEA Rank List for various categories is out on the official website of TNEA. To check ranks candidates must login using the username and password. Grievances Redressal option is available till June. Further, the Directorate of Technical Education (DoTE) Tamil Nadu released TNEA counselling dates and details. Tamil Nadu Engineering Admissions (TNEA) counselling registrations are ongoing, whereas the general TNEA Counselling process will start in July . TNEA counselling process includes registration, assignment of random numbers, certificate verifications, rank list publication, and finally the counselling. The counselling rounds will include steps like Choice Filling, Allotment, Confirmation of Allotment, and Reporting to the College/ TFC and payment of fees depending upon their confirmation.

faqs.question: How can I get into Panimalar Engineering College for UG/PG courses? Am I eligible for admission?
faqs.answer:
Panimalar Engineering College has below criteria for taking admissions to it's various courses: Courses Eligibility B.E. / B.Tech Candidate must have passed VIII, IX, X, XI & XII Std. from schools situated in Tamil Nadu.
Tamil Nadu native candidate who have passed any of the VIII, IX, X, XI & XII Std. or their equivalent exam from schools situated outside Tamil Nadu can also apply. They should produce Original Nativity Certificate.
Children of Central Government Employees, irrespective of their nativity, provided their parents or guardians (only if both parents are not alive) have been serving in Tamil Nadu continuously for the past five years can be eligible to apply.
Sons & daughters of All India service Tamil Nadu cadre officers are eligible to apply. A Self declaration from the parent in this regard is to be produced.
Children of employees in the Public Sector or Government recognised institutions had been working in their organisations for the past five years are also eligible, irrespective of their domicile.
Other State candidates who have studied VIII, IX, X, XI and XII Std. in Tamil Nadu are eligible to apply. MBA/PGDM Candidate who have completed 10+2+AMIE or 10+3 years Diploma + AMIE are also eligible.
AMIE candidate must have 2 years regular full time experience in the relevant field. M.E./M.Tech Candidate who have completed 10+2+AMIE or 10+3 years Diploma + AMIE are also eligible.
AMIE candidate must have 2 years regular full time experience in the relevant field. Not satisfied with answer? Ask Shiksha GPT

According to the NIRF ranking 2025, Panimalar Engineering College received #201-300 rank in the 'Engineering' category. It holds a comparable status to the most prestigious universities such as Aditya University, and Ajeenkya DY Patil University for NIRF rankings under the 'Engineering' category.
