Presidency University Bangalore Reviews on Placements, Faculty & Facilities

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: Review of School of Engineering, Presidency University, Bangalore.

detailed_review.Placements: About 60 percent of students get placed. The highest package offered is 13.5 LPA, and the lowest package offered is 3.75 LPA. The average package offered is 4.5 LPA. Many students are eligible to get jobs in the campus placements themselves. There is an international cell which helps students who want to study a Master's abroad.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Our college has a good infrastructure with air-conditioned labs. It has very good hostels with very big and vast rooms. It has the Sodexo food company, which maintains neat, hygienic, and good food. This college has a very good van facility that runs all over Bengaluru.
detailed_review.Faculty: Many exams are conducted in every course. Faculty members are friendly and approachable every time.
detailed_review.Other: Students will have at least one fest for each semester, which includes a beat boxing day every Wednesday on the last two hours of that day.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Technology (Big Data)
reviews.review_title: Overall, I am satisfied with the college I chose.

detailed_review.Placements: 80 to 90 percent of students got placement in our course. The highest package offered is 25.5 LPA, and the lowest package offered is 5.5 LPA. The average package offered is 7 LPA, and the top recruiting companies include HCL, Microsoft, Accenture, Infosys, etc. Approximately 70 to 85 percent of students secured internships with companies such as HCL, Infosys, Microsoft, etc.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Facilities and infrastructure are good for our course, which provides Wi-Fi, labs, advanced classrooms, and a library. We get proper hygienic food in the hostel and canteen. We will get immediate medical facilities, sports, and games are very much available, which we can play whichever we are interested in.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers are very helpful and highly qualified and have many years of experience and are highly knowledgeable. The course curriculum is relevant. The semester exams are not that difficult to pass, we can study and pass them easily. 95 percent of students have passed.
detailed_review.Other: I choose B.Tech course because of strong demand, innovative opportunities, global prospects, high salary with top benefits, and diverse roles in companies.

reviews.course: B.Sc. in Multimedia
reviews.review_title: Given a good amount of placements in 2024, really good infrastructure and facilities.

detailed_review.Placements: Most of my seniors have been placed in my course. The lowest package was around 1,50,000 per year, and the maximum was 24,00,000 per annum. Most of them get internships from my course. Some of them are going to animation companies. The top roles offered in my course are animator, graphic designer, video editor, cinematographer, director, story writer, etc.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: All my department labs are totally connected with Wi-Fi in the world university. The Wi-Fi connection is very good. Classes are well-maintained and totally furnished. The library has a lot of books. The hostel quality is also good. It is in a good area. The food quality is also nice. Even hostels have their own medical area, sports area, and indoor games. There is also a gym.
detailed_review.Faculty: In my course, Multimedia, there is not much difficulty in giving the exams. Like in the School of Design at Presidency University, we conduct jury evaluations for all the students, and according to the jury evaluation of their work, they get marks. It is not too easy, but not too hard either.
detailed_review.Other: I have chosen this course because I want to be an animator. What I think would be better is providing more labs and setups. The events here are good. The Presidency campus has around 3,000 to 4,000 students, so a little cloud connectivity is always available. There is no language barrier on the campus.

reviews.course: Master of Business Administration (MBA)
reviews.review_title: This is the best University for MBA Course.

detailed_review.Placements: Approximately 85 to 95 percent of students were placed in our course. The highest package offered was 18LPA, the average package offered was 9LPA, and the lowest salary offered was 3LPA. Top organisations that hire from our course include Aravind, Raymond, Vardhman, and others. Almost all students have the opportunity to complete internships in various companies. The most common assignments included quality executives, supervisors, and so on.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: They assist us in establishing hands on EC in labs from the beginning. Wi-Fi was also available in the first year, and we must obtain the password from the appropriate department. Students can enter their registration number and password. The restaurant serves both vegetarian and vegan cuisine, as well as appetisers, Dahi Wada, and other options.
detailed_review.Faculty: The teaching quality was quite good. In a government college, you must study on your own, but without an instructor, you can accomplish nothing. The college offers both intellectual and AC classes. Teachers were courteous enough, and it was simple to ask any questions. Semester exams were difficult, with only around half of the students passing.

reviews.course: Master of Business Administration (MBA)
reviews.review_title: This is the best university for the MBA course.

detailed_review.Placements: In this study, the placement record is strong. Last year, about 79% of students received job offers. Students can choose from companies like Microsoft, Infosys, and ICICI Bank. The highest salary offered ranges from 15 to 20 LPA. About 72% of students from our course secured an internship. The top roles offered are Accountant and more. Performance reviews and additional information are included.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Canteen serves excellent food that is consistently of high quality. The mess is clean and hygienic. The labs are well-organised, and the classes live up to expectations. The theatre atmosphere is fantastic, plus there is a library with a wide variety of literature. There are also intercollegiate competitions held here.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers at our college are skilled and knowledgeable. The maximum pass percentage is 70%, and students perform well on exams. Professors instruct students, and each subject teacher covers nearly all the material. Many experienced teachers work here and in other universities.

reviews.course: Master of Business Administration (MBA Dual Major Specialization)
reviews.review_title: Overall, this is the best university I have ever seen for the MBA course.

detailed_review.Placements: The university placement situation is good. Many companies like TCS, Wipro, Infosys, etc., come to the university to offer placements to the students in profiles like Management Trainee, etc. The highest package offered is around 24 LPA, while the minimum is 10 LPA. Almost 70 percent of my batch got placed. The internship scenario is successful in my university, and almost 95 percent of students got internships from my university, with the highest package of Rs. 55,000 per month.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: There are many possibilities, such as labs, classrooms, libraries, and smart rooms. The hotels are comfortable and clean, and the chaos provides high-protein meals. There are also hotels, a theater, and good libraries where you can learn more. Teachers are always available, both in hostels and universities.
detailed_review.Faculty: All teachers in our course are highly qualified and knowledgeable. The teaching here is good. All the teachers are fully supportive of all the students. This curriculum was appropriate and prepared students for employment. The semester exams are relatively tough, and the pass rate is over 95 percent.

reviews.course: Bachelor of Computer Applications (BCA)
reviews.review_title: There is one faculty named Madhusudhan, just because of him my entire first semester is ruined.

detailed_review.Placements: Having good placements under conditions of maintaining 8+ CGPA. If you are not having any knowledge, it's difficult and placements are a lie I guess. Most students didn’t get degree, some protest happened, so there are flaws and everything we had to take decision wisely.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Good quality of food, infrastructure, and good faculty. Hostel is maintained very clean and very hygiene. No scarcity of food in hostel, everyone tummy will be filled and very safe in hostel. No chance of getting out without permission. Parents are satisfied after leaving students here because it will take hours to even reach city of Bangalore, so students are in PG and hostel. Parents are happy.
detailed_review.Faculty: Pass percentage is 40 percent, very easy to score. Teachers are very useful, we will get question bank and only questions would be asked from that question bank. So preparing is easy. If we  did not read the question bank, then confirm fails, that’s our mistake, not faculty and management.
detailed_review.Other: Outer from city, difficult to travel.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: Value for your money unless you are a topper.

detailed_review.Placements: 100% placement in the college, which is actually true, you will at least get placed in a call centre.  I have heard from the seniors that this year might not continue. They made you sign a contract before sitting in the placement that you have to take whatever job you get in the placement, and you cannot leave the round unless you are rejected by every company that comes. The highest you will get here is about 10LPA, which is rare.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Most of the students join here to see the infrastructure. It is really good. It is a Wi-Fi enabled campus, so you have Wi-Fi everywhere. One thing you will notice is that the ceilings are not painted. We have a decent sports facility. There is no dedicated cricket field, but there is a football field. There is a clinic on the campus, which is free of charge for a consultation. The hostels are strict, you cannot go outside without your parents permission. You need to take it every time you go out. The food is below average.
detailed_review.Faculty: Mostly everything is good, the teaching faculty are mostly nice, but as usual, the lab assistants are super strict. The curriculum is decent. The exams are moderate, if you study a week before the exams, you will pass them. Failing or having attendance shortage is the worst thing that can happen here.
detailed_review.Other: There is a lot of crowd, so this is a really good college for socializing. There is a decent number of fests and activities conducted every now and then. The only negative is that it is located on the outskirts of the city, it feels like it is located in a village.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Electronics and Communication Engineering
reviews.review_title: The college is brilliant and very fantastic.

detailed_review.Placements: About 80% of students got placed from the course at the highest package of 25 LPA, with the lowest packages meeting the 10 LPA requirement. Companies like Reliance and Wipro, which are engineering companies, offered internships to students. About 50% of students secured top roles as engineers.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The very brilliant infrastructure is a great day. Wi-Fi, labs, and classrooms are very nice, the library is fantastic, the quality of postal facilities is average, and the food is average. The canteens are brilliant, and the medical facilities are not so good, but the sports and games are very brilliant.
detailed_review.Faculty: The teachers are very helpful, and they are very knowledgeable. Their teaching qualities are very brilliant. The semester exams are very hard. The pass percentage of the college is up to 90%. The faculty members are poorly qualified, yet knowledgeable, it is one of the best universities in India.
detailed_review.Other: I chose this course because I am interested in the B.Tech engineering and I want to become an engineer. I want to improve the course facilities in their country. There are events that are regularly held on the campus.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Information Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: I will suggest a college to my juniors proudly and welcome them to our Presidency University.

detailed_review.Placements: About 80% of students got placed in good companies in our ISE course. The highest package, which I saw, is 12.5 LPA as a fresher, which was offered to my seniors, and the lowest was 3 LPA in Infosys Mysore. The average I saw was 4 LPA-5 LPA, most of the students got. Top recruiting companies are Microsoft, Amazon, Google, Oracle, Cisco, Intel, and IBM, alongside large IT services companies such as Infosys, TCS, Wipro, Accenture, and Cognizant.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: We have a good infrastructure, a good library, great laboratories, and the availability of Wi-Fi. The hostel is good in almost everything, first and foremost, food is a big good thing, and we have a gym and playgrounds to play.
detailed_review.Faculty: The teachers are very helpful and friendly. I have been accepted into my college, the average experience of teaching of our faculty is 10-12 years, which is very knowledgeable about the topic they teach. Semester exams are moderate, not too easy and not too hard, we can say. About 95% of students can pass.
detailed_review.Other: I just wanted to go into a software field, and I was interested in Information Science ( AI and robotics) because I was interested in developing web and to learn UI/UX skills.

reviews.course: Master of Business Administration (MBA Dual Major Specialization)
reviews.review_title: Faculty members and placement records are always impressive.

detailed_review.Placements: Our college placement cell is especially active. More than 98% of students get placed every year. We get placements from the college. Various famous companies like Google, TCS, etc., visit our campus and give job offers to the qualified students through interviews. The lowest package offered in our college is 5.98 LPA, and the highest salary package is 15 LPA.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Our college infrastructure is arranged with stalls, large buildings, and beautifully decorated with plants. Classrooms here are also quite bright, and each classroom has a projector and air conditioning. In addition, there is a cafeteria for students to sit, campus-wide free Wi-Fi, and a field for sports. Our campus has a well-organised library for each department.
detailed_review.Faculty: Our faculty members are the most experienced and polite. They prepare students for the industry through various practical projects, etc. They teach various types of theory topics with care. Almost all professors of our college are PhD holders, so the pass rate of our college is above 95% every year.

reviews.course: Master of Business Administration (MBA Dual Major Specialization)
reviews.review_title: Our college campus and faculty members are very good. Placements are outstanding.

detailed_review.Placements: Our college placement record is always above 95%. Our college students are being interviewed by various renowned companies like Google, TCS, etc. It gives jobs to many students. The average salary package offered is 6 LPA, and the maximum salary package is 15 LPA. Many students from our college get the opportunity to study abroad. Also, the college is quite active in terms of placements.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The infrastructure of our college is very attractive. Classrooms here are very large and bright, decorated with plants all around. Each classroom has a projector and air conditioning. There is also a cafeteria, free Wi-Fi, a playground, and a huge library with numerous books.
detailed_review.Faculty: Our faculty members are very experienced and almost all of them are PhD holders. They carefully teach each topic to students. They arrange various practicals, projects, and internships for us. In our college, the pass rate is above 90% every year.

reviews.course: MBA in Business Analytics
reviews.review_title: The faculty members are great. The placement is good.

detailed_review.Placements: All students at the campus got placed. The highest salary package offered was 22 LPA, and the average salary package offered was 13 LPA. Top recruiting companies included Amazon, EY, Deloitte, Barclays, Wipro, Flipkart, etc. The placement process was very good.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Wi-Fi in hostel was very nice. Classrooms were well air-conditioned. The quality of food in the mess was great. The hostel had big rooms. Library was well-stocked with a silent atmosphere of self-study. The food served in the canteen was little bit expensive.
detailed_review.Faculty: All teachers had PhDs and were respected in their own fields. Semester exams were very easy if we just understood and studied the courses of that particular semester's subject. Minimum of 33% required for passing the semester exam. Exams were held twice a year.

reviews.course: Master of Computer Applications (MCA)
reviews.review_title: My honest opinion about Presidency University, Bangalore.

detailed_review.Placements: Presidency University gives a lot of job opportunities to students. Many students get placed in several IT companies, such as Emphasis, Deloitte, and Rinex, through the internship program. The highest salary package is around 25 LPA, and the lowest salary package is 6 LPA. Every year, almost 84% of students get placed from our college.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Our college provides a quiet and study-friendly environment for students. So that every student can concentrate on their studies easily. Almost every classroom has AC and projector facilities. Besides these, hostel facilities are also available in our college. Almost 400 students can easily stay in our hostel building.
detailed_review.Faculty: Faculty members of our college are dedicated to the education and well-being of the students. Our entire MCA course is divided into four semesters. The semesters are quite tough. To sit in the examination, a minimum of 65% attendance is required for students. Around 88% of students easily pass the examination every year.

reviews.course: Master of Business Administration (MBA Dual Major Specialization)
reviews.review_title: Overall, best university for MBA course.

detailed_review.Placements: University recruiting is excellent, so percentage in my course is 80% in MBA. Maximum salary package is 32 LPA. And minimum salary package is 6 LPA. Top companies include BCG, Deloitte, JP Morgan, and many others. Roles offered in my course include HR Manager, Financial Consultant, and many others. Internships are entirely possible.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: University provides B.Tech, MBA, BBA, and BCA programs, as well as excellent instructors and a well-equipped campus. Wi-Fi is accessible, and each branch has its laboratory. Classrooms are equipped with projectors, and there is a library. The motel caters well to students, and the cuisine is always changing owing to pandemonium.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers are qualified, and curriculum is well-suited for the power department. Tests are very simple, easy to learn and write, and have a 70% cutoff percentage. A foreign language is good, but it needs practical study beyond advanced theory for an authority major. Curriculum is good, and doing it will prepare candidates for jobs.

reviews.course: BBA in Digital Marketing
reviews.review_title: Best experience at this university.

detailed_review.Placements: 30% of students got placed in my course. The highest package is 9 LPA, and the lowest is 2.3 LPA. Top roles offered are digital marketing executive, social media marketer, etc. Almost 95% of people get internships from this course and companies like Facebook, Wipro, Deloitte, etc.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: There is full access to student Wi-Fi all over the campus. We have very friendly faculty members and a very pleasant environment around the campus fresh air, full of greenery, etc. The hostel is also good, we get delicious meal in mess. We also have gym, etc.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers are well-experienced and knowledgeable and have an excellent teaching quality. They are not that hard just we have to be well prepared with exams and do well in them as we will get a very good CGPA. Pass percentage is above 4 SGPA.
detailed_review.Other: I chose BBA in digital marketing because I am interested in e-commerce and digital marketing career path and wanted to grow my knowledge in it, and accomplish it. I wish to have more practical experience in this course than theoretical. I had a very wonderful experience at this university as they host events, fests, and extracurricular activities in large quantity as they are full of fun, engaging, and entertaining.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: Good placements and supportive environment. Faculty members are qualitative.

detailed_review.Placements: Placement at my college is quite active, structured, and pleasant way of approach. It is basically a systematic approach to competitive exams conducted before the exams, and to achieve their goals in both personal and professional settings and achieve success.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Infrastructure is a guide that highlights the practical application of serverless computing and microservices architecture that segregates responsibilities among independent deployable services like AWS Lambda and API Gateway, and throttling control are essential to protect.
detailed_review.Faculty: Faculty members are professional, highly resilient, and efficient in the college. They use all the better ways of approach to the software development life cycle of the following code for the subtraction of dull students that found in good skill training resources.
detailed_review.Other: Fests are grandly represented here.

reviews.course: Master of Business Administration (MBA Dual Major Specialization)
reviews.review_title: Overall, the best university for MBA course.

detailed_review.Placements: About 86% of students got placed in 2022 batch. The highest package is 23 LPA, the lowest is 6 LPA, and the average is around 15 LPA. The most recruiting companies are Johnson & Johnson, IBM, Axis Bank, etc. The top jobs are management consultant and financial analyst. 81% of students from our university got internships in good jobs.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The classrooms cannot accommodate pupils of all ages, and several lack suitable seats and chairs. Wi-Fi is available, but no names or uses are offered. The library appears to be fine, as are the labs, overall, not exactly poor, but certainly not good. The hostel facilities are poor, the food is subpar, and I've been moaning for over 3.5 months for nothing. I haven't heard of any dispensaries around.
detailed_review.Faculty: Instructors are helpful, and there are skilled physicians with excellent training from reputable universities. They want to make sure we understand the doctor-patient interface and provide us with the greatest education available. Although there are occasional issues, at least all of the facilities are useful for studying. Over 79% of students pass the comparatively difficult semester exams.

reviews.course: Master of Computer Applications (MCA)
reviews.review_title: Good infrastructure, helpful faculty, and decent placements for MCA students.

detailed_review.Placements: I pursued a degree at Presidency University, Bangalore. Around 85-95% of eligible students from our batch were placed. The highest package offered is around 10 LPA, and the average package is 4-5 LPA. The recruiters included Infosys, TCS, Wipro, Capgemini, and Cognizant.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The MCA department of PU offers good infrastructure with well-equipped computer labs and Wi-Fi-enabled classrooms, smart boards, and access to a central library with digital resources. The hostel facilities are decent; rooms are maintained well, and Wi-Fi is enabled. The mess food is average, but there are multiple canteens, and basic medical facilities are available.
detailed_review.Faculty: Supportive, with good knowledge about the subject. The teaching quality varies across departments. The curriculum is regularly updated, covering relevant technology and industry trends. Semester exams are moderate in difficulty, focusing more on understanding than rote learning, and the pass percentage is around 90-95%.

reviews.course: Master of Business Administration (MBA Dual Major Specialization)
reviews.review_title: Review of School of Management, Presidency University, Bangalore.

detailed_review.Placements: The college provides placements and job opportunities to a variety of firms including Flipkart, Infosys, etc. The college provides internships. Since I am a first-year student and our batch is the first in this course currently we don't have any experience. But the students in other departments of our college have a good opinion about the internships being provided by the college. There were nearly 50-60 companies that visited our campus for my course. Many companies are coming to the campus and many of the students are getting selected by the companies.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The courses are available and they show real interest in students! Its infrastructure is also awesome and the food court is also great. The hostel and maintenance were super and the infrastructure and atmosphere of the hostel were good it was located in mid of Bangalore and they provided room for 5 persons. The hostel and maintenance were super and the infrastructure and atmosphere of the hostel were good it was located in mid of Bangalore. They provided room for 5 members and the food was not that much spicy and not good but they will provide a good menu.
detailed_review.Faculty: Faculty members are well-versed in every field and will help the students enthusiastically in any future projects or seminars. Faculty from all departments or branches are great and helpful. All the faculty members are doctorate holders. The course and many electives can be chosen from one's area of interest. The exam structure is as follows; 2 tests of 30 marks each with a weightage of 15% are conducted, 20 marks assignment with a 10% weightage, 10 marks quiz, and 10 marks other curricular activities with an overall weightage of 10% are also included and an end term exam of 100 marks.

college_info.college_name: Presidency University Bangalore Course Admissions 2025: Fees, Application, Eligibility, Selection Criteria & Dates

admission.title: Presidency University Bangalore Admission Overview 2025
admission.overview_text: Presidency University Bangalore admission 2025 is both merit and entrance-based. The university accepts national or state-level entrance exams like KCET , MAT , XAT , CAT , CMAT etc. for admission to specific courses. Presidency University also conducts its entrance exam- Presidency’s Design Entrance Test (PDET), Presidency University Law Admission Test (PULAT), etc. for admission to some courses. The university offers 61 courses at UG, PG and PhD levels through seven schools in multiple streams like Engineering, Management, Science , Law, etc.

faqs.question: Is there any entrance exam at Presidency University, Bangalore?
faqs.answer: Yes, Presidency University, Bangalore has in house exams such as PULAT for Law and PDET for Design courses. It also accepts examination such as CAT, MAT, KCET and CLAT held at national level. In some courses, it is totally based on merit. The choice of a course determines entrance test requirement.

faqs.question: How can I get seat in Presidency University Bangalore?
faqs.answer: Admission to Presidency University is a multi-step process. Check below step-wise Presidency University admission process:

faqs.question: Is BTech available at Presidency University Bangalore?
faqs.answer: Yes, BTech is available at Presidency University Bangalore. BTech is a four-year course offered in multiple specialisations, namely Computer Science Engineering, Civil Engineering, Mechanical Engineering, Electronics & Communication Engineering, Electrical & Electronics Engineering, Petroleum Engineering, etc. through the School of Engineering. Candidates after completing Class 12 can send their applications for BTech. The selection is based on state-level entrance exam scores accepted by the university.

faqs.question: What is the commencement date of the BTech new session at Presidency University Bangalore?
faqs.answer: The exact dates have not been announced yet. Last year the BTech classes were starts on July 31, 2024. It is assumed that the classes of his year will commence on similar dates.

faqs.question: Where does Presidency University release the admission offer for the BCom course?
faqs.answer: In case candidates qualify for the merit list and complete the whole application process, the university communicates all its decisions via email. Candidates are required to register the correct email address, as further communication by the university is delivered to the email ID provided in the application form. Moreover, when admission is offered to successful applicants, the e-mail is also followed by an official offer of admission, sent via courier.

faqs.question: Which are the MBA specialisations offered at Presidency University Bangalore?
faqs.answer: MBA is a two-year course offered in five specialisations, namely Business Analytics, Digital Marketing, Dual-Major, Logistics & Supply Chain Management and E-Business Management through the School of Management. During the course, two month monitored Industrial Practice (SIP- Summer Internship Program) before the commencement of the second year of the course is reinforced with a four-month Industrial Practice (MIP- Monitored Internship Program) in the final semester.

faqs.question: How to get admission to MBA course at Presidency University Bangalore?
faqs.answer: Admission to the MBA course is based on CAT/ XAT/ NMAT/ CMAT/ ATMA/ KMAT score. After completion of the selection rounds, the university releases a merit list to announce the names of the shortlisted candidates. The shortlisted aspirants are called for counselling and document verification. Aspirants need to pay a course fee to confirm their seat in the university.

faqs.question: What is the seat intake for MBA at Presidency University?
faqs.answer: To secure a seat at Presidency University candidates must fulfil the course requirements constituted by the university. The total seat intake for MBA is mentioned below:

faqs.question: Does Presidency University offers seat reservation for BBA course?
faqs.answer: Yes, Presidency University does offer seat reservations for the BBA course, according to the rules and reservation policies mandated by the Government of West Bengal. Check out the seats reserved for which categories. Scheduled Castes (SC) Scheduled Tribes (ST) Other Backward Classes – A (OBC-A) Other Backward Classes – B (OBC-B) Economically Weaker Sections (EWS) Persons with Disabilities (PwD)

faqs.question: What is the commencement date of the BBA new session at Presidency University Bangalore?
faqs.answer: The exact dates have not been announced yet. Last year the BBA classes were starts on July 29, 2024. It is assumed that the classes of his year will commence on similar dates.

faqs.question: Where does Presidency University release the admission offer for the BBA course?
faqs.answer: In case candidates qualify for the merit list and complete the whole application process, the university communicates all its decisions via email. Candidates are required to register the correct email address, as further communication from Presidency university Bangalore is delivered to the email ID provided in the application form. Moreover, when admission is offered to successful applicants, the e-mail is also followed by an official offer of admission, sent via courier.

faqs.question: Is entrance exam required for BDes course at Presidency University Bangalore?
faqs.answer: The university conducts Presidency’s Design Entrance Test (PDET) for providing admission to BDes course. Apart from the entrance exam, the university also considers Statement of Purpose (SOP). The shortlisted candidates are further called for PI round. After completion of the selection rounds, the university releases a merit list to announce the names of the shortlisted candidates. The shortlisted aspirants are called for counselling and document verification. Aspirants need to pay a course fee to confirm their seat in the university.

faqs.question: What is the commencement date of the BA new session at Presidency University Bangalore?
faqs.answer: The exact dates have not been announced yet. Last year the BA classes were starts on July 29, 2024. It is assumed that the classes of his year will commence on similar dates.

faqs.question: Does Presidency University Bangalore provide any scholarships?
faqs.answer: The university offers numerous scholarships to the students, namely merit-based, means-based, need-based scholarships and financial assistantships along with AICTE PG Scholarship. There are a total of 18 scholarships at the university-level. However, the university is eligible for AICTE PG Scholarships (only for M.Tech and MBA students). Click here to know more about the Presidency University scholarships .

data.title: Presidency University Bangalore Placement Report 2025
summary: Presidency University, Bangalore, is conducting the placement for 2025. More than 260 recruiters have visited the Presidency University Bangalore campus and placed more than 2500 students of the batch 2025 of courses like MBA, BTech, BDes, and MCA etc. The highest as well as the average package offered during Presidency University Bangalore placement 2025 stood at INR 14.37 LPA and INR 5.98, respectively. The University recorded 82% placement for 2025 class. The median package offered stood at INR 6 LPA. More than 300 placement drives have been conducted so far. The top recruiters of Presidency University Bangalore include Federal Bank, Accenture, Deloitte, DHL, Ecolab, Mphasis, HCL, EY, Nestle, etc.

ranking_section.description: Presidency University Bangalore has been recognised for its excellence in various fields by NIRF 2025, outperforming other institutes in parameters such as Teaching, Graduation Outcome, Inclusivity & Research, as well as fostering an exceptional learning environment.  Explore the Presidency University Bangalore latest rankings by other ranking bodies and their categories below: According to the NIRF ranking 2025, Presidency University Bangalore received #201-300 rank in the 'Engineering' category. It holds a comparable status to the most prestigious universities such as Aditya University, and Ajeenkya DY Patil University for NIRF rankings under the 'Engineering' category. sections.heading: Introduction
text: Presidency University Bangalore campus is well-equipped with facilities, like modern classrooms, library, medical facilities, auditorium, gym, cafeteria, hostel, transport facilities, sports facilities, etc.
See the vidoes below to know more about Presidency University Bangalore Infrastructure.

facilities.name: Library
facilities.description: Our Library has 15 high end systems for the learning community to read various e-resources such as e-journals, e-books, and databases such as Pro Quest and NPTEL lectures. In due course of time, our university will have a Data Centre, to cater the IT needs.

facilities.name: Cafeteria
facilities.description:
University has a well-established Cafeteria located on the campus providing a wide range
of foods including North & South Indian as well as fast food for the benefit of the
students and staff. The food offered by the Cafeteria is hygienic and it offers a taste of home, with wholesome freshly-cooked dishes from around the country.

facilities.name: Hostel
facilities.description:
Resident students are provided furnished accommodation comprising cot,
chair, cupboard, internet wi-fi, etc. Each hostel is provided with independent dining area and common rooms, TV, etc. The hostel has an indoor games facility. The hot and cold drinking water facility is provided in the hostel. Transport facility is provided to girl students during weekends and on holidays to go to nearby Yelahanka new town for shopping. The hostel will be provided on a first come first served basis. Random allotment for hostel and rooms will be done. Rooms and hostel once allotted cannot be changed.

facilities.name: Sports Complex
facilities.description: The Sports Department at the university believes that when you exercise your body, you exercise your mind as well. Besides academics, sports is one of the important co-curricular activities, included in all educational institutions. Sports attribute positively to the academic performance of our learners. Playing as a team encourages co-operation and leadership among the players. A wide variety of indoor and outdoor sports activities are made available to the students of the university so that they can have an all-round development. The Sports department has excellent facilities and well trained sports instructors headed by experienced Director of Physical Education.. A well equipped  gymnasium is also coming up. There are separate coaches for all the games who groom the students and train them rigorously to compete at the national level. All the games have equipment of international standards which is accessible to all the students.

facilities.name: Labs
facilities.description:
The university has two state-of-the-art computing centers which are added feathers to the university’s learning architecture The center maintains two specialized high-performance servers. In addition to that, the Centre has around the clock Wi-Fi connection. Dedicated bandwidth of 20 Mbps and 10Mbps are available from two different vendors and hence internet is made available for all the stake-holders. The administrative blocks, academic blocks, library and other buildings of the campus are connected through the Wi-Fi.
The Computing Centre is also equipped with language lab software called the “Glob arena” e-mentoring system. It helps to develop the students’ listening, speaking, reading and writing skills apart from strengthening their grammar and vocabulary. Since it is used online, it facilitates to check their progress by administering pre-tests and post-tests. This software is used by the students who wish to tone up their communication skills.

data.description: Presidency University Bangalore is jam-packed with skilful and well-eminent faculty members. Most of the faculty members have earned their degrees from prestigious Universities. The faculty members have relevant experience stretching long across the timeline in both academics and the industry. This industry-specific experience is what fuels and propels professional brilliance which is one of the core values of Presidency University. Candidates can read the article below to know about the core, visiting and international faculty at Presidency University:

qualifications: Assistant Professor & HoD Accounting and Finance
Associate Professor General Management and International Business
Assistant Professor International Business and Supply Chain Management
Assistant Professor Business Analytics and Digital Marketing
Assistant Professor Finance and Project Management
Assistant Professor Marketing and International Business
Assistant Professor Accounts, Business Statistics and finance
Senior Admin Associate School of Commerce and Economics

college_info.college_name: Prince Shri Venkateshwara Padmavathy Engineering College: Courses, Fees, Admission 2025, Placements, Reviews

highlights.summary: Prince Shri Venkateshwara Padmavathy Engineering College, is located in Chennai, Tamil Nadu. Established in 2001, it is a private institute approved by AICTE. Prince Shri Venkateshwara Padmavathy Engineering College provides 8 UG and PG courses in 7 specialisations, namely Civil Engineering, Computer Science Engineering, Electrical Engineering, Electronics & Communication Engineering, Electronics Engineering, Information Technology and Mechanical Engineering. Theses programmes are offered in both Full Time mode. B.E. / B.Tech, M.E./M.Tech and MBA/PGDM are some of the courses offered at Prince Shri Venkateshwara Padmavathy Engineering College. Some of the streams in which these courses are offered include Engineering and Business & Management Studies. The total fee at Prince Shri Venkateshwara Padmavathy Engineering College ranges between INR 35,000 and 2,00,000. Prince Shri Venkateshwara Padmavathy Engineering College has a student intake of 429 for all the courses. The average median package at Prince Shri Venkateshwara Padmavathy Engineering College is INR 3,82,143. Prince Shri Venkateshwara Padmavathy Engineering College offers all the infrastructural facilities to students.

summary.college_name: Prince Shri Venkateshwara Padmavathy Engineering College

reviews.course: B.E. in Electronics and Communication Engineering
reviews.review_title: College is very old-fashioned and the worst.

detailed_review.Placements: 80% of students got placed from my course, and it is divided into separate classes by average and bright students. They give more importance to bright students. Students gets placed in companies like Cognizant and Movate, only some amount of students gets internships.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Hostel students describe their hostel life as bad. They find insects in their hostel food. Hostel food is very bad in price. Most students won't even eat. You can go and come whenever you want from hostel. Hostel facility is very poor. It is very bad.
detailed_review.Faculty: Some teachers are helpful, and some will spoon-feed you. Some teachers are full of themselves and they put arrears to students purposely. Course curriculum is relevant, but students did not gain or are gaining knowledge in the industry. It is kind of hard to pass the semester.

reviews.course: B.E. in Electrical and Electronics Engineering
reviews.review_title: Outstanding learning experience with practical insights.

detailed_review.Placements: 80% of the students were placed from the course. The highest package - is 4.5 LPA, the lowest package - is 2.5 LPA, average package - is 3 LPA. TCS, Infosys, Sutherland, Tata-related companies, more, etc. Software engineer, testing, vice process data analyst. Most students got internships and they were also placed in the same companies.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The infrastructure for the courses varied from different departments. The facilities are very good and clean, library looks silent and peaceful. The hostel was clean and neat, the food was medium, and the medical facilities and sports were a very high priority.
detailed_review.Faculty: The teaching quality was very excellent and they helped the students with knowledge. Yes, of course, the course curriculum is relevant. The semester exams are somewhat difficult, but the teaching, if you concentrate, you will easily clear the semester exams. 40%.
detailed_review.Other: The best things about the courses are we will experience real-life projects and they will understand very easily. The events, fests, and extracurricular activities are the highest priority and most valuable.

reviews.course: B.E. in Electronics and Communication Engineering
reviews.review_title: My college life - The teachers are well trained.

detailed_review.Placements: Many companies visited my college, including MNCs, Wipro, Infosys, Tech Mahindra, and Accenture. The teachers give training to students three months prior to get better placements. The highest package is 2 lakhs per year. 95% of students were placed in the top companies.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: For my subject, there are 3 staff members. For each subject, one staff member will teach, and another two will inspect us. Lab fees are around 6500, and the breakage fee is around 500. The hostel fee is 90,000, and the quality of food is also very hygienic. They provide the food on time.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers are well-qualified staff. They teach very well. They do not ask repeated questions on the exams; they ask twisted questions. In my college, the pass percentage is 45. The teachers train the students well. In my college, the students do not fail exams because the teachers give them training.
detailed_review.Other: I chose this college because I can go into both software and hardware. I have to improve my coding skills to get better placements in a software company.

reviews.course: B.E. in Electronics and Communication Engineering
reviews.review_title: Quite disappointed by the college curriculum and placements, wish they develop it soon.

detailed_review.Placements: The placements in the college are very average. I'm from the 2020-2024 batch and we hardly had 4 companies on campus and around 8 off-campus placements. Most of the companies that came for placement offered around 2.5 to 3 LPA, and the top company that came for placement was Accenture. Around 25 female candidates were placed.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Labs are pretty decent but not enough equipment. Hostels are available for boys and girls separately, but the food is mediocre. There's a big ground in college, but it's used only once or twice a year for sports events; the rest of the time, it's used as a parking lot for college buses.
detailed_review.Faculty: Since the college is now autonomous, the curriculum has changed and it's better now. Exams are really easy, but the college focuses more on theoretical classes over practical ones. Staff focus only on completing the syllabus, so the students never really get to gain interest in the syllabus.
detailed_review.Other: Though the college was average during my batch, it has really developed after 2024. The curriculum has changed, and many extracurricular activities have been initiated.

reviews.course: B.E. in Electrical and Electronics Engineering
reviews.review_title: If you want a degree with a reasonable price and more knowledge with less college enjoyment.

detailed_review.Placements: In my course, only a few students got placed in companies like HCL, TCS, and some more companies. The highest and the lowest packages offered by the course are 15 to 10 LPA. The top recruiting companies are HCL, TCS, Azure, etc. The percentage of students who got internships from these companies is high, and the roles offered to them are from freshers to HR.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The infrastructure and design of the college campus buildings are good. There are two blocks: one is the main block and the other is the PG block. There are also separate blocks for the mechanical and civil departments. The classrooms have their own Wi-Fi connections for students. The quality of the food in the canteen is not good, and there are no medical facilities inside the college. There is a sports complex block for using sports equipment, and there is also a gym inside the complex.
detailed_review.Faculty: When it comes to studies, teachers are very helpful, and the staff is very qualified and knowledgeable. The teaching quality is very understandable and good. The subjects in my course curriculum are very helpful and advanced for the future, and they make the students industry-ready. The semester exams are not that difficult to attend, and the pass percentage is more than 90%.
detailed_review.Other: I chose this course because of my father, as he told me there are more vacancies in this course. The best thing about this course is that only a few students have joined, which makes it easier for them to get placed in big companies. The thing I want to improve in my course is that more students should join. Other than studies, my college holds cultural events, sports, and annual day celebrations every year.

reviews.course: B.E. in Information Technology
reviews.review_title: Disappointed with the strict rules that they have and also with the placement offers.

detailed_review.Placements: The percentage of students placed last year was very low, like 5%. As my college has been autonomous since last year, the placement offerings have drastically reduced, and only a very few companies have approached us. I'm in my last year of college; till now, we have only one college for placement offers, and we hope some will come in the future.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: I really feel sad about infrastructure, especially in labs, as we have 5–6 labs in the computer field, but none of the labs are air conditioned. This really causes the computer to not work properly. The infrastructure of the college could be better. The canteen food provided will not be good to that level but still, the cost of food is high.
detailed_review.Faculty: Yea, the teachers are well qualified for their positions but still, very few would be aware of the upcoming technologies. Anyhow,  that won't affect us but they'll prepare enough content relevant to the concept. The subjects that are being chosen for my department are wholly relevant to my curriculum. The semester exams would be quite complex but they would be in the range that everybody could pass at least.
detailed_review.Other: I chose B.Tech. in information technology. I chose this course because I was highly influenced by the IT companies and their work while in school, so I opted for it. Anyhow, it's not that easy to complete this course as it contains all programming languages, especially the drastic upcoming technologies. That's the toughest part of this course—coping with the new technologies as well as the old ones.

reviews.course: B.E. in Information Technology
reviews.review_title: Average infrastructure, good faculty.

detailed_review.Placements: About 70% of students get placed in our course. TCS is one of the top recruiting companies in our course. Software engineer, data analyst, and software tester. 7LPA the highest, 4LPA the average, 2 LPA the lowest. 50% got internships with stipends in startup companies.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Three-block building; classroom has no Wi-Fi; ARVR lab and five normal labs; smart classroom in one block; projector in the classroom; library available Hostel food is average, canteen food is normal, but the canteen is not that much bigger. In terms of importance to sports, vendors have machines for snakes available.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers are helpful, and most of the teachers are doctorates. Yes, the course curriculum is relevant, and it makes the students ready for the industry. The semester exams will be easy if you concentrate and study well for the class tests and internal exams. About 95% of students will pass the semester.
detailed_review.Other: Because I aimed to become a software engineer The recent Fiesta 24 Cultural was so fabulous.

reviews.course: B.E. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: It is the best college for placements.

detailed_review.Placements: About 75% of students are placed in our course. The highest salary package offered is 12 LPA. The lowest salary package offered is 2.5 LPA. Students in our course are placed at Zoho as developers. Our college brings in more than 250 companies. The salary package is good.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The hostel is average. In the hostel, there are no rules. It is a free zone, like a home. All the facilities are available. Wi-Fi, labs, and a library are available at our college. A gym is also available. Sports are conducted. Medical facilities are good.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers are knowledgeable. They teach well. The curriculum is easy to learn. It makes students industry-ready. You don't need to worry about the exams. You will pass all exams because they make you study. The pass percentage is 50%.

reviews.course: B.E. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: The placements and campus are good.

detailed_review.Placements: Placements are good. Top IT companies are recruiting students regularly. The placement officer individually attends to students and helps them with their placements. The salary packages are decent. Almost 80% of students got placed in top companies.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The facilities and infrastructure are not bad, but it needs to be improved. Labs are well-equipped and well maintained. Classrooms are huge enough and spacious. The library is good. The canteen quality must be upgraded. There are only occasional sports events, and nothing much regarding sports.
detailed_review.Faculty: The teachers are qualified and knowledgeable. But the problem is the old-school way of teaching and conducting examinations. Repeated tests will test your patience. Feels like a school when you are studying. But the good part is you won't face any problems in the semester examination.

reviews.course: B.E. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: The college offered good placements and a better place to do B. Tech course.

detailed_review.Placements: Almost all students got placed on campus and off campus. The highest salary package offered was 6 LPA from TCS and the average salary package offered was around 3 LPA. The top recruiting companies would be TCS, Wipro, and Accenture. The roles offered depends upon the company.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: There was no Wi-Fi in our college if you're expecting that and mobile phones are not allowed too. The lab sessions were good I would say. There is a library session every week. The hostel infrastructure was good and I came to know the food was not so great. No medical facilities were available.
detailed_review.Faculty: As the college was affiliated with Anna University, the exams would seem a bit difficult compared to other colleges. The professors were helpful and they would help you to score good marks when it comes to internal exams. The course made students industry-ready.
detailed_review.Other: There was a symposium and a food fest would be conducted in our college.

reviews.course: B.E. in Mechanical Engineering
reviews.review_title: Overall, the college was good until 2016.

detailed_review.Placements: The placements are the worst for mechanical students as companies are not invited. Even if they come here, jobs are offered only on a temporary basis or contract basis. Only 3 companies were allowed, and not more than 5 members were allowed. So, the college is not much good for placements.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Wi-Fi is available but not for students. Laboratories are good. Hostels are not good. Weekly once, students are allowed to go out. Students can't even take sick leave without any procedure. Mobiles are not allowed on the campus.
detailed_review.Faculty: The faculty members are good, and some of them are beyond our expectations at teaching. The curriculum is designed by Anna University, and it is good. We can pass the exams, but we cannot expect internal marks. They conduct tests on a monthly basis. The pass percentage is 50%.

reviews.course: B.E. in Mechanical Engineering
reviews.review_title: It is a good college for students who want to study the course for basic knowledge and to get more.

detailed_review.Placements: I am from the mechanical engineering branch. Placements are not at all good for us, and only internships are provided. Our college does not care about the placements of our batch students.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Labs are good enough to learn. Many things are good here except for the hostel facilities and sports. Our college built a sports area, but they are not at all interested in students for to take sports and to play. Medical facilities are not available. The food served is good.
detailed_review.Faculty: A good thing is faculty members train you for passing the main semester examination. The pass percentage is comparatively low to their previous years. The syllabus provided by the university was not updated from years ago, and it was not worthy.
detailed_review.Other: I have chosen this course because my dream is to become a mechanical engineer and can learn how things work. Overall it is a good course. Still, they should improve it to make it easier for students and especially for parents.

reviews.course: B.E. in Electronics and Communication Engineering
reviews.review_title: It is a good college to study. The atmosphere is also good here.

detailed_review.Placements: About 50-60% of the students from our course got placed. The highest salary package offered in our course was 14 LPA, and the average salary package offered was 4 LPA, and the lowest salary package offered was 2 LPA. Top recruiting companies like Infosys, TCS, IBM, Cognizant, Wipro, Sutherland, Hexaware, Aspire System, Codemantra and Firstsource visit our campus for placements. Tier 2 and tier 3 level companies visit our campus for placements.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: There is no Wi-Fi facility in the college. Classrooms have fans, metal desks for writing and sitting and good air circulation. In the library, the atmosphere is good, and it has a variety of books. The food served in a mess and canteen is average. Sports and games are average in college. Facilities for other activities are average, but studies are good here.
detailed_review.Faculty: The pass percentage in all semesters is above 90%, and all the department results are the same. Our college is good for studies. Faculty members will make us prepare well for semester exams. They will conduct different class tests. Teachers are good and well knowledgeable. They will help us if needed.
detailed_review.Other: Scholarships are available for students. Our college conducts extracurricular activities,  and the campus crowd is average. I have chosen this course because, in our course, we can choose multiple fields in software and hardware fields.

reviews.course: B.E. in Electronics and Communication Engineering
reviews.review_title: Our college gives priority to education than socialize and cultural things of students.

detailed_review.Placements: I pursued B.E in ECE here. About 63% of the students from our batch got placed through campus interviews. The lowest salary package offered was about 1.32 LPA, while the average salary package offered was about 2.16 LPA. The highest salary package offered was about 3 LPA. Tata Consultancy Services, Flextronics, etc., were some of the top recruiters for our college. The top role offered is assistant ER or executive.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: I came to know that Wi-Fi routers were installed after our tenure at our college. All the facilities here were well and good enough for students. Mostly, our college doesn't give much importance to sports and even for sports quota students. The quality of the food served here is above average. Medical facilities are not sufficiently available here as our college is located in the remote area.
detailed_review.Faculty: Staff members and professors here were well qualified and are good at using proper teaching methods to make every student study. If any student has a good knowledge of electronics (our course), they can get a job as the scope for jobs is huge for electronics. I suggest you to pursue some additional small courses during your tenure only.
detailed_review.Other: Students of the opposite gender should not interact without taking permission or in the presence of staff members.

reviews.course: B.E. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: The place to learn discipline.

detailed_review.Placements: The major companies coming to our college are TCS, Tech Mahindra, Zoho etc. The college also provided placement training for the students to increase their ability to crack job in a good company. The teachers also helpful to students to get a decent job in good company.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: We have a small campus but all the basic needs for the students are provided inside the college. They also provide best lab training for the students. We also have a big playground for the students. We also have SAE club in our college. The college also has a good library for studying.
detailed_review.Faculty: The teachers have good knowledge about the subject and they have good experience in the teaching field and they know the students' behaviour very well. Their main motive is discipline between the students. They also motivate students to succeed in life.
detailed_review.Other: We celebrate all festival with unity and we believe in it.

reviews.course: B.E. in Mechanical Engineering
reviews.review_title: The place with lots of love.

detailed_review.Placements: Our college provide good placements for students who as taken computer Science engineering. Some of the company comes for placement are tech mahindra, TCS, HTC global and etc. The students who taken admission in mechanical and civil engineering are placed in small startup companies.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The college has larger playground and tennis court for the students. The fees of the college is very less compared to other private colleges. We also have SAE club in our college. We also have best lab facilities for better gaining of practical knowledge of the subject.
detailed_review.Faculty: The college is Anna university affiliated college with good passing percentage because of teachers in the college. Teachers are friendly and caring in nature. Their main motivation is discipline between the students. They also have large amount of experience in teaching field.
detailed_review.Other: The college fees is less compared to other private colleges and the student will be well trained with discipline.

reviews.course: B.E. in Mechanical Engineering
reviews.review_title: In this college, students can get discipline and learn good things.

detailed_review.Placements: Our college provides good placements in software companies like Tech Mahindra, Wipro, Zoho, TCS, etc. It also provides placement training for students and also provides placements for mechanical engineering and civil engineering in small start-up companies, etc.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Our college has good lab facilities which will improve the practical knowledge of the students. It also has a good playground and hostel facilities. The food served in our college is hygienic and good for the health of students. The fees structure is affordable and best, which can be affordable by economically middle-class students.
detailed_review.Faculty: There are well-qualified teachers who are friendly in nature and have good knowledge of the subject. Lab assistants have good industrial exposure who can provide good industrial knowledge to the students. They also provide career guidance to the students.

faqs.question: What is the average BTech Computer Science Engineering salary in India?
faqs.answer: The average BTech CSE salary for graduates in India can range between INR 4 LPA and INR 12 LPA . The scope of the BTech CSE programme in India is excellent and hence the starting salary packages offered by recruiters are also high as compared to some other engineering courses. The salary depends on factors like the years of experience you hold, your academic qualification, skill set, etc. Once you enter the industry and get some years of experience in hand, you will get a higher salary package. But, in the starting of your career journey, you can expect between INR 4 LPA and INR 6 LPA.

faqs.question: How can I get into Prince Shri Venkateshwara Padmavathy Engineering College for UG/PG courses? Am I eligible for admission?
faqs.answer:
Prince Shri Venkateshwara Padmavathy Engineering College has below criteria for taking admissions to it's various courses: Courses Eligibility B.E. / B.Tech Candidate must have passed VIII, IX, X, XI & XII Std. from schools situated in Tamil Nadu.
Tamil Nadu native candidate who have passed any of the VIII, IX, X, XI & XII Std. or their equivalent exam from schools situated outside Tamil Nadu can also apply. They should produce Original Nativity Certificate.
Children of Central Government Employees, irrespective of their nativity, provided their parents or guardians (only if both parents are not alive) have been serving in Tamil Nadu continuously for the past five years can be eligible to apply.
Sons & daughters of All India service Tamil Nadu cadre officers are eligible to apply. A Self declaration from the parent in this regard is to be produced.
Children of employees in the Public Sector or Government recognised institutions had been working in their organisations for the past five years are also eligible, irrespective of their domicile.
Other State candidates who have studied VIII, IX, X, XI and XII Std. in Tamil Nadu are eligible to apply. MBA/PGDM Candidate who have completed 10+2+AMIE or 10+3 years Diploma + AMIE are also eligible.
AMIE candidate must have 2 years regular full time experience in the relevant field. M.E./M.Tech Candidate who have completed 10+2+AMIE or 10+3 years Diploma + AMIE are also eligible.
AMIE candidate must have 2 years regular full time experience in the relevant field. Not satisfied with answer? Ask Shiksha GPT

highlights.summary:
PSNA College of Engineering and Technology is an autonomous college founded in 1984. It is approved by the AICTE and is affiliated with Anna University. The College is located in Kothandaraman Nagar Tamil Nadu. It is also accredited by NBA and NAAC with A++ Grade.
The courses provided by the institute include BTech, ME/ MTech, MCA, MBA and PhD. The top recruiters include Accenture, Cognizant, Genpact Systems, etc. Below are the major highlights of PSNA College of Engineering and Technology:

summary.college_name: PSNA College of Engineering and Technology

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Information Technology
reviews.review_title: Supportive campus with good placements, strong scholarships and student life.

detailed_review.Placements: Around 80% of students got placed through campus placements. The average salary is 4.25 LPA. The highest salary is 11 LPA, and the lowest is around 2.5 LPA. Top companies like TCS, Infosys, Wipro, Accenture, and Capgemini came for placements. About 60% of students got internships in IT companies and startups. Jobs offered include Software Developer Trainee, System Engineer, Analyst, and support roles.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The college has decent infrastructure that helps learning. Classrooms are spacious, labs are useful, Wi-Fi works well, and the library is well-maintained. Hostel facilities are safe and comfortable. The food is hygienic, medical help is available, and sports facilities support both indoor and outdoor games for a balanced student life.
detailed_review.Faculty: The teachers are helpful in studies and personal support, and they teach in a friendly way. Their subject knowledge is average, so students need self-study and outside help for advanced topics. The syllabus is useful and covers basic theory and practical topics. With projects and internships, it helps students get entry-level jobs. Semester exams are not very hard, and the pass percentage is around 80%.
detailed_review.Other: I chose this course because it offers good career options and a strong academic base. The best part is the industry-related syllabus and chances to improve skills through projects and internships. I wish there were more advanced practical classes and industry exposure. The campus crowd is friendly, connectivity is good, and the surroundings are peaceful. Events and cultural fests are not regular. Scholarships are high and helpful, and sports and other activities are well encouraged.

reviews.course: B.E. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: A good engineering college, and it will be a value-for-money education.

detailed_review.Placements: The top recruiting companies are Accenture, ServiceNow, HCL Tech, Tech Mahindra, Kaar Technologies, LTI Mindtree and many more. About 75% of students get placed in our college in the batch of 2025. The top courses offered are IT, CSE, AIDS and cybersecurity.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The infrastructure of Wi-Fi, labs, classrooms and library was good, and on the campus, free Wi-Fi facilities are available. In labs, the systems are all very good. Separate labs are given for each department, and the labs are very comfortable with AC, neat and clean.
detailed_review.Faculty: The teachers are helpful, qualified and knowledgeable, and the teaching quality is good and understandable. The course curriculum is relevant, but not as industry-ready. It needs to include more practical, and the exams are moderate to clear, sometimes they come with an application-oriented approach.
detailed_review.Other: Events, fest, campus crowd, connectivity with seniors and campus surroundings were great and calm. Scholarship will be provided, and extracurricular activities like club activities will also be engaged in.

reviews.course: B.E. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: A good place for the right path of career education.

detailed_review.Placements: Above 80 per cent of students got placed in our college. The highest salary package offered by our college is 44 LPA. It provides various placement training, but one or two training will be paid training, but it will be very useful. The top roles offered in my college are cybersecurity, artificial intelligence and data science.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The college hostel infrastructure is really good. The lab facilities and Wi-Fi facilities are all available in our college. In our library, free Wi-Fi is available, and the food will be of such quality and hygienic that there will be veg and non-veg provided in the mess and also the canteen.
detailed_review.Faculty: The faculty members in the college are extremely good, and they will support the students for placements and guide them towards the right path. The course will be curriculum relevant, but not that much industrial practical knowledge. The exams will be moderate to clear.
detailed_review.Other: I completed B.E CSE at my college, and the college campus was so good. I wish to improve the more practical exposure and project works related to the course, which will be very supportive.

The highest salary package offered is 12 LPA, and the lowest salary package offered is 4 LPA. 85% of students got placed. The top roles offered are project manager and software developer. 65% of students got internships.

Many technical and financial books are available in the library. The hostel facilities are good with an attached bathroom. The canteen is also available. Medical facilities are good.

The course curriculum is relevant, and it makes students industry-ready. Semester exams are difficult, and the pass percentage is 68%.

Top roles offered were marketing management and management consulting. 62% of students got internships.

reviews.course: B.E. in CSE (Cyber Security)
reviews.review_title: PSNACET - A hub for quality engineering education and career growth.

detailed_review.Placements: PSNACET has built strong tries with leading companies in both IT and core sectors. Top recruiters such as Tata Consultancy Services (TCS), Infosys, Wipro, Cognizant, Accenture, Zoho, HCL, and Tech Mahindra regularly visit the campus. In addition, core companies like Ashok Leyland, TVS, L&T, Bosch, MRF, and others recruit students from mechanical, civil, and electrical streams.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Computer science and engineering (CSE) department at PSNA College of Engineering and Technology (PSNACET) is equipped with state-of-the-art infrastructure to support high-quality technical education and research. The department features modern classrooms with smart boards and digital teaching tools, promoting interactive learning. It houses several advanced computer laboratories with high-speed internet, the latest software, and high-performance systems to support programming, artificial intelligence, data science, cybersecurity, and cloud computing projects.
detailed_review.Faculty: The curriculum at PSNACET is designed as per Anna University guidelines and is regularly revised to match current industry requirements. It offers a balanced mixture of theoretical concepts and practical knowledge. The syllabus covers core subjects, electives, value-added courses, and project work. Emerging areas such as artificial intelligence, data science, IoT, cybersecurity, and cloud computing are integrated into the curriculum, especially for computer science and other engineering branches.
detailed_review.Other: The infrastructure and education at PSNACET are excellent, and the facilities are up to date. Even the faculty members are friendly in all departments.

reviews.course: B.E. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: PSNA College of Engineering and Technology has the best placements and infrastructure.

Top companies like TCS, Wipro, Infosys, Accenture, and Reliance visit the campus for recruitment, offering attractive salary packages to students. The salary package ranges from 3-10 LPA. 90% of students get placed in campus interviews.

The biggest library facilities are also there in this college. This college provides good hostel facilities for boys and girls. Hostel rooms are daily maintained very cleanly. Hostel food taste is also good. Sports grounds and coaching staff facilities are also available in this college.

They arranged more industrial visits and workshop events every semester. They conduct more practical exams. 95% of students pass all exams.

This college management gives more scholarships to all students. More sports events are conducted in this college every year. It has a good engineering college.

reviews.review_title: Good college for management.

detailed_review.Placements: Around 70% to 80% of students were placed from our course. The highest package offered in our course was 12 LPA. The average package was around 4 LPA-5 LPA. Top recruiting companies were TechNook, Krutanic Solution, etc. Some students got internship offers.

reviews.course: B.E. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: A very good college if you are searching for the best engineering college in Tamil Nadu.

detailed_review.Placements: Placements are really good and there are top companies offering jobs for each individual. Also, there are a lot more seniors who got placed in our college. The average package offered to the students ranges from 1 LPA - 4 LPA. It is one of the top colleges in Dindigul.

It's such a peaceful environment where we can study peacefully. The hostel and mess foods are too good. We also have a big playground for sports and a lot of facilities available for sports and games.

There are always internal tests every month. Semester exams are easy if you study well and you need to put in a lot of effort. Teachers are also very helpful.

reviews.course: Master of Business Administration (MBA)
reviews.review_title: Review of PSNA College of Engineering and Technology.

The average salary package offered in my course is 5 LPA. Around 58% of students got internships from all top companies in India. Almost 83% of students got placed in my course.
