college_info.college_name: QIS College of Engineering & Technology Fees 2026
QIS College of Engineering & Technology Reviews on Placements, Faculty & Facilities

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: As a QIS Institution student, it is the best college for locals who stay near the college.

detailed_review.Placements: 912 students have been placed in different companies from different branches. The highest package is 10 LPA by Dazn company. The lowest package is 2.5 LPA by Cognizant. Top recruiting companies for my course are Infosys, Tech Mahindra, Cognizant, TCS, Wipro, HCL, and BYT.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: We have Wi-Fi and charging port facilities in every class, and a projector is available in every class. For my course, there are many labs for the 2-year second semester. We have operation system lab with many computers and data base management system lab. We also have a vast library, and quality is not bad, pretty good. We have 4 canteens, one is for only girls and other is for both. We have two basketball courts and two volleyball courts. Dispensary is also available for sick ones.
detailed_review.Faculty: Some lectures are good at teaching the concepts, and some are just coming and playing a PPT on the projector and scrolling through it. Some lectures are good at teaching. They teach us according to the syllabus, and curriculum is good enough for industry level. Semester exams are pretty difficult, and pass percentage is 80 percent.
detailed_review.Other: I am interested in computers and coding so I have taken B.Tech in computer science engineering. The best thing about my course is that they teach us practically only on board. I think there are no drawbacks to my course only thing I want to improve is to invite some other faculty to our class. Smart India hackathon was recently conducted in our college. Our college conducts many innovative events for the students. We have fest in February 7, 8, 9. These three days, we will dance, sing, and enjoy eating in stalls and play games.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Artificial Intelligence and Data Science
reviews.review_title: Really good infrastructure.

detailed_review.Placements: Mine is the 2027 passing out batch, and I am studying Artificial Intelligence and Data Science. Almost 50-70 percent of the students are being placed every year. The highest package is 25 LPA, the lowest package is 2.5 LPA-4 LPA, and the average is 5 LPA-6 LPA. Top recruiting companies include some MNCs and mostly startups. Internships are fewer, but students gain their internships themselves. Top roles include AI  engineer, developer, analyst, data scientist, and data analyst.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Labs are very spacious and are equipped with a large number of computers. The main thing I like about our labs is that there are separate labs where we can work on our laptops with team workplace facilities, and also with Wi-Fi facilities, and classrooms are good as well as the library. Medical facilities are strongly available, and in sports, we have a lot of encouragement. I don't know much about the hostel as I am a day scholar, but the talks are good and fine about the hostel.
detailed_review.Faculty: The teachers are helpful and are qualified too. They are very knowledgeable with their experience, and the teaching quality is good. The curriculum is very relevant to the current industry situation and also includes CRT programs, which are very helpful. The pass percentage of the passing students is 60-75 percent. The semester exams are not too difficult and not too easy. We need a little more effort, and getting a higher percentage requires much more effort.
detailed_review.Other: I chose this because jobs in data Science give a better package (salary), and I also know about AI. The college and surroundings are very good and peaceful, as it is located a bit far from the town. Recently, SIH was held in our college, which is a national-level hackathon.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Artificial Intelligence and Data Science
reviews.review_title: Completely good for faculty infrastructure and studies.

detailed_review.Placements: In my course Artificial Intelligence and Data Science, 60 percent are placed, and it may increase in the future.  The package is about 3 to 8 LPA. Top recruiters are Wipro, TCS, etc. Roles offered in my course are Data Analyst and Software Web Developer.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The campus is very good with a clean and peaceful environment. The college contains 3 to 4 canteens, and food is also available at any time. The campus gives such cool vibes, with a lot of trees and clean air. Good facilities like cool water and clean washrooms.
detailed_review.Faculty: Faculty are very well educated. They are teaching very well and are helpful for all, like soft skills, communication skills, motivation, and they teach to be confident. The semester exams are strict, and the study is so good that we can learn easily with the faculty.
detailed_review.Other: I have chosen this course for web development. It is better in the future, the events and cultural activities in college are really good. The best way to enjoy all events and fests.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Information Technology
reviews.review_title: Good infrastructure, good placements, and the best faculty.

detailed_review.Placements: 30 percent of students are in Computer Science and Information Technology. The highest package is 8 LPA, the lowest package is 2.5 LPA to 3.5 LPA, and the average package is 6 LPA. Top recruiting companies are Wipro, TCS, and Infosys. 25 percent of students got internships. The top roles offered in my course are IT-related CSIT.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: All facilities are available, like faculty, and the infrastructure is very good. Wi-Fi and labs are provided for 2 days every week. Classrooms are digitalised. Good hostel food and accommodation. There are 2 stationaries.
detailed_review.Faculty: Very good teaching quality. Every professor holds a Ph.D. and has a doctorate. Every professor has good knowledge of the subject and presents the required industrial knowledge. Every course curriculum is related to industrial knowledge. Semester exams are difficult.
detailed_review.Other: By choosing this, having better feature scope in data science, full-stack, and web development, I need to improve in backend programming languages. Events regarding the internship are there.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: I am very satisfied because, in my final year, the college calls many companies for placements.

detailed_review.Placements: 65% of students get jobs through college placements. The highest package is 8 LPA, and the lowest is 3.5 LPA. Companies like Cognizant, Tech Mahindra, and Global Logic recruit students. 70% of students get internships at Vision Weaves and Tech Mahindra. Top roles are back-end developer, front-end developer, and DevOps.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Facilities are very good. Everything the current generation of students needs is available. The hostel is good, with daily study hours. You feel a good environment when you enter the college. Everyone in the college has a unique ID, and there are many classrooms and labs.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers are highly qualified and friendly. The pass percentage is 90%. The college follows the JNTU curriculum, and the semester exams are very tough. You gain good knowledge about your subjects in class. The college conducts special classes for placements.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: QISCET is a mid-tier engineering college in Andhra Pradesh.

detailed_review.Placements: Highest package is 8 LPA (offered by Amazon), the lowest package is 3.2 LPA, and the average package is 6.5 LPA. Top recruiters include Infosys, TCS, Capgemini, Cognizant, and Deloitte. The placement percentage is 85%.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: All facilities are available, like labs, library, and projector classrooms. There are dedicated innovation and research centers to encourage student projects.
detailed_review.Faculty: Top-ranked or autonomous colleges often set challenging question papers that focus on conceptual understanding and application. Strict evaluation can make scoring higher more challenging. Consistent study and attending classes regularly make exams easier.
detailed_review.Other: Cultural fests include music, dance, drama, and fashion shows. Popular fests also bring celebrity performances. Sports events include college tournaments like cricket, volleyball, basketball, and badminton. Workshops with industry experience are invited for skill-based training sessions.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering (Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning)
reviews.review_title: It has really good infrastructure and facilities.

detailed_review.Placements: An average of 50% of students got placed. In our branch, the highest package is 7 LPA. The top recruiting companies are TCS, Mphasis, and Capgemini. Not many students got internships from our college, and I don't know the reason. Few students got selected here.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The infrastructure of our college is so good. We have good facilities like Wi-Fi, labs, smart classrooms, and a library. The hostel is good, but the food is not really good. Sometimes, they don't even cook the rice properly, and workers do not really coexist with us.
detailed_review.Faculty: Most of the faculty members in our college are very friendly, and they clear our doubts without any hesitation. Semester exams are not that difficult. We can easily pass if we study well. In our class, 90% of students have passed all semester exams.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering (Data Science)
reviews.review_title: It is a good college with decent faculty members and good placements.

detailed_review.Placements: I am from a B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering (Data Science) course. A lot of students get chances for internships as well as training and placements. The highest package ranges from 11-12 LPA. Many recruiting companies come to our college including Tech Mahindra, AWS, and other famous companies.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: We got nice classrooms as well as libraries. We also got nice canteens. Every place is always clean and tidy. I do not know much about the hostel because I am not a hostel student but as much as I heard from my friends, they said that rooms are very small. The storage space is less and also I don't think they are getting quality and tasty food when compared to others. The food is nice but not up to the grade.
detailed_review.Faculty: Faculty members are very experienced and knowledgeable. The syllabus they are teaching is very helpful for us. They also make us do hands-on training on things, which is also a nice way for us to learn and get hands-on experience. The course curriculum is relatable and understandable.
detailed_review.Other: The course I chose is Data Science and I chose this course because it is one of the emerging trends right now. Artificial Intelligence and Data Science are becoming a very important part of our future. Fests and events are always conducted every year. It is celebrated very nicely with so much entertainment as well as with knowledge-getting challenges.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering (Data Science)
reviews.review_title: At QIS College, I am satisfied with the placements.

detailed_review.Placements: In my QIS College of Engineering and Technology, 65% of students got placed in my year. The highest package was 8 to 9 LPA, and the average was 3 to 5 LPA. The top recruited companies were Tech Mahindra and Accenture. Additionally, 70% of students got internships from Infosys, Tech Mahindra, Capgemini, etc.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: In QIS College of Engineering and Technology, labs and facilities for our department were well-managed, and classrooms were clean daily maintained by floor assistants. Each classroom and lab had Wi-Fi. The college also provided a canteen, and the hostel mess was good. Hostel was managed by different members.
detailed_review.Faculty: Exams at QIS College of Engineering and Technology were conducted strictly, and the faculty and students were friendly. The faculty was qualified, and the teaching curriculum was relevant to the software and department-related topics. The pass percentage in semester exams is above 77%.
detailed_review.Other: The campus life at QIS College of Engineering and Technology is good. It is located near Ongole, which makes it better for transportation. The courses chosen by the students are knowledge-oriented, and students improve semester by semester. Fests in the college were held well in February and extracurricular activities. The college also provides scholarships, which give students valuable experience.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Business Systems
reviews.review_title: College is very good. It provides excellent faculty members and more placements and internships.

detailed_review.Placements: The percentage of students placed at this college is 60%. Most recruiters are Sopra Steria, Tech Mahindra, BYD Auto, and Euler. Internships are provided by this college. It is very excellent and they are selected with a minimum pay scale. Top role offered in our course is business analyst. There is more scope for this in the future so I have selected this course. The percentage of students who secured internships is 70%. The highest salary package offered is 8 LPA. The average salary package offered is 4 LPA. The minimum salary package offered is 3.5 LPA.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: College has well developed infrastructure and facilities. Hostel is very good. The food served by this college is very hygienic and tasty. There is a dispensary available at this college where it is helpful for students.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers are very talented. They are qualified and knowledgeable. They are trained under the guidance of industrial-based experts so they can teach industrial-based curriculum to the students. The curriculum is prepared by industrial experts and students can get their projects from the management. Semester exams are very difficult and there are no malpractices. This college has tough examination cell where there is no cheating possible in the examinations. Pass percentage is 65%. Faculty members are very talented and they have more technical knowledge. They are trained by industrial experts who are in top-notch companies.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Electronics and Communication Engineering
reviews.review_title: College is very good. Whoever joined the college will have good future.

detailed_review.Placements: Almost 70-80% of students got placed. The highest salary package offered is 8 LPA. The average salary package offered is 3 LPA. The lowest salary package offered is 2.5 LPA. Top recruiting companies are HCL, TCS, Infosys, Emphasis, Amazon, etc. Almost 60-70% of students got internships in HCL and TCS. The top role offered is coding.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: In our college, the infrastructure is good. Wi-Fi is better. Our labs are very good now. Classrooms are also very good. The library is a bit better. The quality of the hostel is average. The food is average. The canteen is good. Prices are very high. Medical facilities are good. Sports and games are good.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers are helpful. They are qualified and knowledgeable. The teaching quality is very good. The course curriculum is relevant and makes students industry-ready. Semester exams are not difficult in our college. The pass percentage is 4 out of 10 points.
detailed_review.Other: I chose this course because of my interest in doing a software job. Events and fests are very good. The campus crowd is better. Surroundings are very good. Overall, our college is good.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: Satisfied because of good lectures.

detailed_review.Placements: Computer Science and IT departments often SEE higher placement rates compared to other engineering disciplines. Nationally, these rates can range from 70% to 95% depending on the institution. For mid-tier colleges, the average package often falls between 4–8 LPA. Infosys, TCS, Wipro, Cognizant, and Accenture are common recruiters across India. Typically, 60–80% of students in Computer Science or IT may secure internships. Roles offered include Software Developer/Engineer, Data Analyst/Data Scientist, Full Stack Developer, Cloud Engineer, and DevOps Engineer.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: There is no particular Wi-Fi for students; it's only for staff. The Wi-Fi does not come properly. Hostels are quite clean and the food is healthy with proper dishes. Medical facilities are provided, and we have sports to play. It is a big playground, including a volleyball court.
detailed_review.Faculty: The teachers are very helpful during the exams and very knowledgeable about the subjects. Very nice faculty. Engineering programs typically cover essential subjects, such as programming, data structures, algorithms, and software engineering. These are crucial for many tech roles and give students a solid foundation. Exams in most engineering colleges test both theoretical knowledge and problem-solving skills, generally requiring consistent study rather than rote learning alone.
detailed_review.Other: High Demand and Career Opportunities: With the tech industry's rapid growth, Computer Science offers a range of career paths, from software development to data science and AI. Many students are drawn to the high demand for tech skills and the potential for well-paying jobs. Computer Science courses usually provide practical experience through projects and labs, helping students apply theoretical concepts. Most colleges host annual tech fests, cultural fests, and departmental seminars, giving students a platform to showcase their skills and socialize. Hackathons and coding events are common for Computer Science students.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Artificial Intelligence and Data Science
reviews.review_title: The college is good but the fee structure is too high.

detailed_review.Placements: Our college has good placements. Many companies come for campus placements, including Cognizant, Teach Mahendra, and HCL.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The canteen and medical facilities were good and available during all college hours. The labs were mostly equipped with the latest Wi-Fi systems, and the classrooms, labs, and library were equipped with projectors for live classes.
detailed_review.Faculty: The exam and course curriculum is maintained by the exam departments in the college to give the best curriculum to the students. The faculty are very helpful, friendly, and knowledgeable. The exam is moderately easy to pass.
detailed_review.Other: The campus is good, with well-designed labs and good infrastructure. There are fests and other technical events like quizzes, Ideathons, and Hackathons.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: Facilities and infrastructure are good.

detailed_review.Placements: Placements are available in my college, and the percentage of achieved placements is 72%. The highest package is 10.5 lakhs per annum. Wipro, TCS, Amazon, PayPal, and many other companies visit my college every year, and drives are conducted from the 3rd semester onwards.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The infrastructure is good, but the hostel food is not satisfactory. In labs, from the second year, all computers are functioning properly, but in the first year, 5 to 10 computers are not working properly. The hostel mess timings are from 7:30 to 9:00 AM for breakfast, 12:40 to 1:30 PM for first-year students, and 1:30 to 2:20 PM for the 2nd, 3rd, and 4th-year students, with dinner from 8:00 to 10:30 PM.
detailed_review.Faculty: The faculty is good, and semester exams are strictly conducted. If invigilators see a student with notes, they take the answer sheet immediately and punish the student by taking them to the HOD. Exams are strictly monitored in my college.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Electronics and Communication Engineering
reviews.review_title: It is good, but the college needs to improve more in facilities, quality of education, and placement

detailed_review.Placements: I am Chennai Kesavulu Putchakayala from QIS College of Engineering, where I have taken up selection and communication engineering. In this college, placements are just normal. In my batch, only 10% of students were placed. Among them, the highest package was about 7 LPA, and the lowest package was about 3.5 LPA. The top companies hiring for software and hardware roles are ITC Infotech, IBS, and H Foxconn. No internships are provided for my course, and all roles are quite ordinary.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The labs, Wi-Fi, classrooms, and library are available, but they are generally basic facilities. The labs lack proper equipment, there are no digital classes, and the Wi-Fi connection is inadequate. The library is good. When we consider a college, proper facilities are very important. Having better facilities is essential to spark interest in studying.
detailed_review.Faculty: Most of the faculty in my college are qualified but not necessarily knowledgeable. While they are qualified, many do not have a strong foundation in their particular subjects. However, they provide assistance as much as they can and are very friendly and helpful. There is no industry-ready course available.
detailed_review.Other: I belong to the Electronics and Communication Engineering branch, and I chose this course because it offers opportunities in both the software and hardware sectors.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Electronics and Communication Engineering
reviews.review_title: The college environment is good with beautiful scenery.

detailed_review.Placements: The highest package offered is 6 LPA and the lowest is 3 LPA. Companies like TCS, HCL, Wipro, etc visited our college for recruitment. Many students got internships. The college also provides skill development courses and training classes.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Our college has facilities like ATMs within the campus, a basketball court, a cafeteria, a digital library, and medical facilities. But the Wi-Fi connectivity is poor. Classrooms and labs are good and sometimes cool water is also provided.
detailed_review.Faculty: Faculty members are good at teaching and clearing our doubts. The curriculum is relevant to the course. The semester exams are more relevant to the curriculum.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: A very nice college to study at.

detailed_review.Placements: In the stream of computer science, the minimum percentage of the 12th Board exam is 60% and in the EAMCET entrance exam, it is above 42 marks. The highest package offered in my stream was absolutely 18 lacs, and the average was about 8 lacs. Internships are a bit less common at our college.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Everything is good to see about our college. The classrooms are very neat and good. Laboratories are very well-equipped for every need. Wi-fi is a bit of an of an issue. Even though rooms are great, the class size is high and suffocating. Beside that, everything was fine and the hostel was too. The only downside is food.
detailed_review.Faculty: Every teacher and lecturer is very great and excited to teach here. Students show interest in every activity that happens. Because other activities are less likely to happen. It was very easy to pass the semester exams if you followed the teacher's guidance, which is given to every student beside the classes.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: Our college is worth giving a shot.

detailed_review.Placements: There were about 78% of students getting placed in the campus selection. The highest package is 18 lacs and the average is 8 lacs per annum. The top recruiting companies in our college are Calsoft, Accenture, Viatris, TCS, and Wipro. In my course, developer roles are mostly offered.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The infrastructure is great and the facilities are above average. The laboratories have great equipment and the latest equipment. But the classrooms are a bit suffocated because the strength in the class is high. Hostel accommodation is okay but when it comes to food, they need to improve a lot.
detailed_review.Faculty: The teachers are very helpful, qualified from top universities with highly qualified degrees, and knowledgeable. The curriculum was especially good and they use the Blooms taxonomy-level method here. The semester exams at this college are difficult but the pass percentage is over 70%.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Civil Engineering
reviews.review_title: Review of QIS College of Engineering & Technology.

detailed_review.Placements: 70 percent of students are placed in my course (civil engineering). The highest package offered in the course is 5 LPA, the lowest package is 1.8 LPA and the average package in civil engineering is 3 LPA. The top recruiting companies in civil engineering are TCS, Accenture, MEIL, and URC. 80 percent of students got internships in civil engineering. Top companies, like BIM Associates, provide internships. The top roles offered in our course are site engineer and construction supervisor.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The infrastructure is good in our department, with technical and non-technical labs and a good surveying area. Our department has high-speed internet and digital classrooms and labs. In the college library, all kinds of books are available. The college hostel is good with hygienic rooms and a good menu in a mess with proper furniture and every student has a separate bed and racks with clean surroundings.
detailed_review.Faculty: The teachers are so helpful with academics, they are well-qualified professors on campus and they have good knowledge. The teaching quality is good with communication and career-building ideas for students. The course curriculum is relevant and understandable for students. It should prepare students for future development. The semester exams are too difficult but faculty help students study. The pass rate is 85% in all departments.
detailed_review.Other: I have a passion for construction and architecture. In civil construction, things are good and in our course, the lab structure is good. The things that would be improved in our course are labs and labs in charge and some projecting should be repaired. Events are held once every 4 months and fests are held on college annual days and department festivals. The campus crowd is high. And high-speed connectivity is good on the internet. The campus surroundings are good, with gardens and trees and good building infrastructure. Scholarships are highly preferred on campus and extracurriculars are held every week.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Mechanical Engineering
reviews.review_title: College is good for who are looking less fee and more opportunities .

detailed_review.Placements: Coming to our college, there are a lot of placements and internships in college during your final year of B.Teach, and they provide an average package of 3.2 LPA for mechanical engineering, with the highest package being 8.2 LPA. You can do an internship during your final year, according to your interests.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Coming to infrastructure, it looks normal only, but the atmosphere in the college with its full greenery and gardening area is good, and coming to the hostel, they will charge around 70,000 per year for food, but you can't go outside of the hostel without warden permission, and the hostel is also not good.
detailed_review.Faculty: Who are working in Qiscet College? 50% of the faculty have completed their Ph.D. in their specialisation domain, and the curriculum will change every 2 or 3 years according to the trending subjects in the market. The semester exams will be conducted every 5 months.

college_info.college_name: RMK College of Engineering and Technology: Courses, Fees, Admission 2025, Placements, Reviews

highlights.summary: Founded in 2008, R.M.K. College of Engineering and Technology is a private institute. It is located in Thiruvarur, Tamil Nadu. The institute is accredited with AICTE. RMK College of Engineering and Technology provides UG courses in Full Time mode. It provides 7 courses across specialisations such as Computer Science Engineering, Electrical Engineering, Electronics & Communication Engineering, Electronics Engineering and Mechanical Engineering. Some of the courses offered at this institute include B.E. / B.Tech. RMK College of Engineering and Technology fees is INR 2,00,000. The student intake for these courses is 750. RMK College of Engineering and Technology offers these course across fields such as Engineering and IT & Software. The median salary offered to students is INR 4,75,000. RMK College of Engineering and Technology offers all the campus facilities to students.

summary.college_name: RMK College of Engineering and Technology

reviews.course: B.E. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: The college provides quality education and has a strong placement percentage.

detailed_review.Placements: Placements here are excellent. The average package is from 5 to 6 LPA, and students are trained very well for placements separately. It is not 100 percent, but more than 95 percent of students get placed with good packages. There are also nice jobs and internships, and students receive proper training and opportunities.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The hostels are excellent, and the food is very hygienic with excellent taste.
detailed_review.Faculty: Exams are conducted every week, including Unit Test 1 and 2, IAT 1 and 2, Model Exams, and the final semester exams. Teachers here are very friendly and helpful. The pass percentage is more than 90 percent. Faculty trains the remaining students to achieve a good pass percentage. I am a CSE student. Not only CSE but also all courses like Mechanical, ECE, EEE, and AIML have top-notch faculty and excellent teaching.
detailed_review.Other: I am a CSE student here. This course provides many opportunities like hackathons and other technical events, which are very interesting.

reviews.course: B.E. in Electronics and Communication Engineering
reviews.review_title: College is good for placement and training. The staff here is friendly.

detailed_review.Placements: 100% of students are placed who opt for placement and good coaching for students during placement period. You will be getting good support from professors during the placement period. Some people opt for higher studies, and they get guidance from the professors.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Food is good, tasty, and hygienic with good infrastructure for canteen. It has good labs that help to understand concepts better. My classroom is supported by Wi-Fi with high-speed 5G network which is very helpful for laptop usage and study purposes.
detailed_review.Faculty: Semester exam will be easy if everyone listens properly to the notes given by the professors. They help us to understand the subjects and answer the questions easily to attend the exam well and get more marks in semester exams at this college. Everyone scores well on semester exams.

reviews.course: B.E. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: I am absolutely dissatisfied because it does not conduct creative events and fests.

detailed_review.Placements: The semester syllabus will be explained by the staff members. However, the major drawback will be the practical knowledge for students to understand code and reality. Companies are recruiting students with a decent salary package that ranges from 3 -4.5 LPA for freshers.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Infrastructure is decent in the hostel. Facilities like Wi-Fi, hot water, good toilets, proper bed sheets, and beds for an individual are available. The college provides good classrooms, good labs, a library, a playground, and seminar halls to summit the meetings or webinars over there. I would rate 4.8 out of 5 stars for the quality of the food. In case of a medical emergency, they provide a check-up at a nearby hospital, or else students can go home. The canteen will not meet the expectations. The food is very nice.
detailed_review.Faculty: Faculty members are good at explaining the syllabus of the semester courses. In addition, they used to take care of slow learners with additional study hours from the afternoon 3 PM to 4:30 PM. Recently they included various COE domains such that you can choose your interested domains and work on them. It may help you in getting decent salary packages.
detailed_review.Other: The fee will be changing every year based on management terms and conditions. Fests and concerts are not conducted in all our 4 years. Instead of that, they have clubs to showcase our talent but that will be of no use.

reviews.course: B.E. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: I am happy with this college. Most of the top MNCs visit the college to hire students.

detailed_review.Placements: In our college, about 50-60% of students get placed with an average salary package that ranges from 3-4 LPA. In our department, the lowest salary package offered is 3 LPA. Most of the students get placed in new startup companies. Most popular IT companies like Zoho, etc., visit the college for placements. Around 10 students are only placed in top MNCs. The percentage of placements is better in our college than in other colleges. The top roles offered are software developer, analyst, web testing, web development fields, etc. They share placement information on a daily basis. For placements, the college is very good.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The infrastructure is good. It has a good campus environment. The college is not big to visit and enjoy. There are some advantages like discipline. The maintenance of the hostel is very good and neat with all facilities. In sports, students join through the TNEA sports quota as there are facilities. But they do not encourage the students for training and other competition purposes, which is the main disadvantage of this college. Wi-Fi and food facilities are excellent, well-maintained, and clean.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers are well-qualified. Most of the professors are PhD holders, and some of them are pursuing PhD. Most of the teachers are informative of students, and they clarify doubts. The course curriculum of the college is very much related to company requirements. There are COE courses to learn on behalf of specific company requirements based on the student's performance, and the COE official companies hire the students. They are more friendly with students.
detailed_review.Other: In our batch, all the departments except mechanical departments around 550 students get admitted to the college. Most of the students get admitted through TNEA counseling. Admission through counseling is very best for college admission. The campus crowd is minimal. Scholarships are provided for first-year graduate students and other government schemes are valid in college admission, and they are valid only for TNEA admission through government Quota. I suggest students get admission through the government quota.

reviews.course: B.E. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: It has a very strict environment with only hope to complete 4 years soon.

detailed_review.Placements: Placements are above average here, and about 85-90% of students get placed. The highest salary package offered is 65 LPA, and the lowest package salary package offered is 3 LPA. The average salary package offered ranges from 5-7 LPA. Top recruiting companies like Zoho, Amazon, TCS, Infosys, Wipro, and Mindtree visit the college to hire students. About 50-60% of students got internships from third-party companies like Corizo, etc. Roles like full-stack developer, cyber security, etc., are offered to students.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The infrastructure of our college is average and it has a small campus. The entire campus is Wi-Fi powered. Labs are equipped with 200 intel i9 RTX 4060 workstations so the labs are best. Classrooms are spacious, with good lighting, numerous power sockets, and well-maintained. The library is top notch with modern infrastructure and the sack area is too big with an entire lot of books. A mess is well-maintained and the food served is very good, homely, hygienic, and clean. The hostel is a little small but maintained well. It provides about 5 to 7 members per room, which is quite comfortable. Toilets are maintained clean on a daily basis. Sports are not welcome here as the playground is small.
detailed_review.Faculty: Most of the faculty members are pursuing PhD with at least 5 years of experience. They are friendly and give a school environment, which is very strict. Their quality of teaching is moderate. The course curriculum is relevant and the objective is clear with prerequisite well-learned. The course curriculum is updated with industry-required skills and knowledge. The end-semester exam is a little tough to clear. Exams are conducted frequently like 2 sets of exams per month. The internal exams are also tough, and the pass percentage is about 70%.
detailed_review.Other: I chose a computer science course because of my interest in the field of teaching, and there is a scope in the computer science field in the future. The learning experience of exploring new teaching is the best thing about this course. Our college should focus more on practical learning than theory subjects. Few technical events are conducted yearly, and the campus crowd is about 2000 students. The connectivity is good, and many students are from Andhra Pradesh and Telangana, so exposure is good on this campus. Extracurricular activities are very few and conducted for namesake.

reviews.course: B.E. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: I am satisfied because of the placements and infrastructure.

detailed_review.Placements: In our college, more than 90% of students got placed in the last year. Especially in our course, several companies like Wipro, Zoho, Amazon, Google, TCS, etc., are recruiting companies. Many companies are intaking employees through our college placement interview.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The infrastructure in our hostel is very good and quite decent. The hostel fee is reasonable. The college mess food is also really good.
detailed_review.Faculty: In our course, there are many faculty members who teach us. Most of the professors are PhD holders, and some staff members are pursuing PhD.  In the course curriculum, there are so many placement training sessions. Our college conducts several examinations like a unit test, internal assessment test, model examination, practical examination, and end semester examination. Teachers are knowledgeable and qualified. Their teaching quality is very well to understand, and they take care of students' careers.
detailed_review.Other: I have chosen this college because of the placements and coaching. I also like the college atmosphere and infrastructure.

reviews.course: B.E. in Electronics and Communication Engineering
reviews.review_title: The college was a good one.

detailed_review.Placements: The placement percentage of the students was 85% and above. The average salary package is 4 LPA, and the highest salary package is 20 LPA. ECE and CSE department students will get more placement opportunities compared to other departments. They train the students from the second year for the placements.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The college campus was good. They maintain the college very well. The classrooms are also good. There was a 24/7 Wi-Fi facility. The hostel was excellent. The food was good, and they provide both vegetarian and non-vegetarian meals with ice cream. The bathrooms of the hostel were also maintained very cleanly.
detailed_review.Faculty: The staff were well qualified. Their teaching quality was very good. They help us to grasp the concepts very easily. The course curriculum is related to the industry. The semester was easy to difficult, and it was based on the individual's performance.

reviews.course: B.E. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: Nice college for the learners.

detailed_review.Placements: My college is one of the top engineering colleges in the Chennai region, continuously maintaining more than 95% placement. The highest package in my college history is 66 lacs per annum. The average package is 6 LPAs. Companies like Amazon, Microsoft, Infosys, TCS, Cognizant, Zoho, Upper, etc. are recruiting students from my college.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: More than 75% of the facilities in my college have completed their Ph.D. and are well experienced. The college will provide everything for your educational purposes. Wi-fi-enabled campus, digital library and AICTE-approved labs. RMK groups in college are known for food. They are providing 5-star-rated foods.
detailed_review.Faculty: Faculty members are very informative and they are always ready to guide the students. Examinations are conducted very strictly and question papers are also not very easy to face. Every 15 days, they will conduct examinations. They will punish you very severely if you are involved in any type of malpractice.

reviews.course: B.E. in Computer Science and Engineering (Cyber Security)
reviews.review_title: It is a good college for placements and studies.

detailed_review.Placements: This course was introduced this year. Students in departments like CSE and ECE get great placements. About 85% of students get placements. The highest salary package offered is 25 LPA, and the average is 5 LPA. They also conduct several programs to train you for placements in the first year itself.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The hostel is the best. Food items are best. They serve non-vegetarian food for 5 days and ice cream for 3 days a week. They provide Wi-Fi 24X7. There are grounds to play cricket, football, volleyball, basketball, kabaddi, handball, etc. There are 4 members in one room. Rooms are quite spacious. They will clean the rooms every day. Bathrooms are cleaned 3 times a day.
detailed_review.Faculty: Faculty members are talented and experienced. They are also friendly. Exams are conducted regularly. They award students who are shining in their studies.
detailed_review.Other: They provide you with a Skillrack platform where you can learn coding and practice several languages.

reviews.course: B.E. in Electrical and Electronics Engineering
reviews.review_title: Our college has good infrastructure.

detailed_review.Placements: Placements were good in our college. Many companies visited our college for placements to recruit students. Many students got placed in our college. The average salary package offered was 4 LPA.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The hostel facilities were good. Mobile phones were not allowed in the hostel. The food served in the hostel was tasty. The hostel was well-maintained, and its rules were very strict. Laptops were allowed in our college due to the online course structured after covid. Wi-Fi was not available in our college.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers were knowledgeable. They taught us well. The course curriculum was relevant.

reviews.course: B.E. in Electronics and Communication Engineering
reviews.review_title: It is a good college with good infrastructure and facilities.

detailed_review.Placements: Almost 50% of students got placed in our course. The highest salary package offered is 25 LPA. The lowest salary package offered is 4.5 LPA. The average salary package offered is 7 LPA. There are many top recruiting companies that visit our college for recruitment.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The infrastructure is very good. Classrooms are very clean. Hostel facilities are good. The food quality is average. Mediacl facilities are also provided.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers are helpful and well-qualified. The teaching quality is good. Semester exams are very easy, and they make us read all the topics in the classrooms.
detailed_review.Other: I opted for this course because we can do jobs related to both hardware and software. The best thing about this course is that we can learn the subject deeply.

reviews.course: B.E. in Electronics and Communication Engineering
reviews.review_title: This college has a reputation.

detailed_review.Placements: They train students right from 1st year for placements and training. Students need to learn two programming languages to secure jobs for the high package. Students do have a placements period once a week.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: In this college, the food quality is good, but outside food is not allowed. The canteen is closed during college time, and it is only for hostellers. There is no mobile usage on the campus, and the sports period is for name sake.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers have skills, and they do know the stuff they teach. The students do not get any black marks, because that would affect their internal marks. They conduct exams most often so better try to get a pass mark.
detailed_review.Other: I did not have much to say since my dad chose this college. If students want to have a memorable college life experience better not choose this one. They conduct cultural for namesake, and outside college students are not allowed.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Artificial Intelligence and Data Science
reviews.review_title: I am dissatisfied with some rules and regulations, but it is a good and well-disciplined college.

detailed_review.Placements: I have selected artificial intelligence and data science course. We are the first batch in our college. There will be better placements in the future for this course as AI is trending. Companies like Cognizant, Infosys, and many others approach here.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: There are good classrooms, and the college is maintained with good infrastructures. The food is amazing. Sports and games are also available for hostel students, and there is a small canteen.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers are well-knowledgeable and experienced. Teaching quality is also very good. This course curriculum is relevant, and it makes students industry-ready. Semester exams are also a bit difficult, but if we study well, we pass with ease.

reviews.course: B.E. in Electronics and Communication Engineering
reviews.review_title: I am not satisfied because of its placements and lack of practical knowledge.

detailed_review.Placements: Around 50% of students were placed. The highest salary pacakge offered was 6 LPA, and the lowest salary pacakge offered was 2 LPA. The average salary pacakge offered was 3.5 LPA. Cognizant, Infosys, and Wipro were the top recruiting companies. Less than 10% of students got internships. The associate software engineer was the role offered.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Wi-Fi was not provided in the department. Laboratories were not good. There was no proper knowledge in practicals. The library was good and students will have all kinds of books, and every book related to the course. The infrastructure was very good, and all the facilities were good, students will feel like another home. The mess was also very good.
detailed_review.Faculty: Some teachers were helpful and knowledgeable. But many of them were not professional and there were a lot of unqualified teachers. The course curriculum was relevant, but due to a lack of practical knowledge, the students were not industry-ready. The semester exams were difficult. If students study average, then they can manage to pass in exams. Do not expect teachers to teach all the syllabus and students did not get free exposure, and there was a lack of practical knowledge.

reviews.course: B.E. in Mechanical Engineering
reviews.review_title: Satisfied with faculty members, good infrastructure, delicious food, green and calm surroundings .

detailed_review.Placements: Around 80% of students in my course are placed in a reputed industry. Salary package starts from 2 lpa to 10 lpa. Amazon, L&T are some of the top recruiters. Internships can be obtained either through college or self as well. Significant amount of students got internship through college and self .
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Excellent food provided by the college. Library consists books from all departments. Wi-Fi is provided in hostel. Food is one of the major part where rmkcet excells. It offers delicious food to students and parents as well. Although food is compulsory here and must be paid along with the fee. But its totally worth the money.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teacher's are really friendly and help us gain excellent scores. Even the research going on within the college is excellent and very much related to industry. Semester exams can be done well. The internal exam patterns in this college paves way for the students to get what they deserve.
detailed_review.Other: Mechanical engineering is my passion. Practical learnings can be improved .

reviews.course: B.E. in Mechanical Engineering
reviews.review_title: This college is great place to learn.

detailed_review.Placements: This college is good for placements, and they will provide training for every company. Around 80% of students got internships.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The facilities and infrastructure are excellent in this college. The hostel is comfortable for every student. The quality of food is good, and they provide hygienic food. Wi-Fi is enabled on the campus. Laboratories are very good in this college.
detailed_review.Faculty: The teaching quality is very good. Faculty members are very good with students in this college. There is a mentor for every 15 students, and they will take care of every student. Teachers are helpful and qualified. This course curriculum is relevant.
detailed_review.Other: Everything is good in this college. It also oragnised events and fests for the students.

reviews.course: B.E. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: The best college for value of money.

detailed_review.Placements: Our college students are placed in top-notch companies like Amazon, Infosys, cognizant, IBM, Wipro, TCS. Over 85% of students got selected in placements. This year our college student got the highest package of 25 Lacs per annum. And a minimum of 5 Lacs per annum. Almost 80% of students got internships in top companies like Amazon, Infosys, Cognizant, TCS.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The infrastructure of our college is extremely good. Mobile phones are not allowed in our college. Our college of more a number of clubs to improve our Knowledge like the coding club. The labs are extremely good and the latest instruments are provided in the lab. The food provided in our college is extremely good. Our college provides healthy and hygienic food. The taste of the food is extremely good.
detailed_review.Faculty: Our college teachers are always helpful to us. Well qualified, knowledgeable and experienced teachers are there. Always teachers treat us in a friendly way. The teaching quality is awesome. The teaching us in a fantastic and modern way. They using the latest technologies as well as the latest educations. The difficulty of the semester exam is average. The pass percentage is above 97%.

reviews.course: B.E. in Mechanical Engineering
reviews.review_title: It is a good college for those who love to study.

detailed_review.Placements: Placements are mostly offered by IT companies. Once You get placed in a company you will not be able to attend interviews with other companies. You cannot expect more placements from the non-IT background. In previous years, companies like Ashok Leyland and HCL recruited students.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The college infrastructure is good. There are labs, a library, and classrooms. The food served is good. Everything is maintained well. The canteen is separate for vegetarians and non-vegetarians. There is a sports period once a week. If there is an exam upcoming, the sports period will be canceled.
detailed_review.Faculty: All the teachers in our college are very well trained, and they teach you concepts. The semester exams are sometimes difficult, and sometimes easy. Since it is affiliated with Anna University we cannot expect how the exam paper would be. The pass percentage of our college is 85%.
detailed_review.Other: My interest in automobiles and mechanical made me take this course. It would be better if they have arranged more practicals to understand the concepts rather than theoretical.

reviews.course: B.E. in Mechanical Engineering
reviews.review_title: It is a good college, but don't expect a good college life.

detailed_review.Placements: The college offers various placement options for the students. The college brings in 4 major recruiters every year, namely TCS, Wipro, Infosys and CTS. The placement rate on the first day is about 30%. But there is a lack of core related companies that come for recruitment. Only sectors related to IT fields are available for choosing. The salary ranges from 3 Lacs per annum to 5 Lacs per annum. Mostly, the system engineer jobs are offered in placements.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The infrastructure is limited as supposed to the developing needs. The college only consists of three buildings. Laboratories are good and well maintained. But classrooms lack smart class facilities and projectors. No CCTV camera surveillance is provided inside the campus. The hostel is good, and it offers great food, and cleanliness is maintained to perfection. It has four-sharing rooms, and there are bathrooms on each floor. Medical facilities are mediocre, and we have to go to the main college area for any medical requirements. There is a ground, but the facilities provided are limited.
detailed_review.Faculty: The teachers are well qualified and know their respective subjects. All have PG qualifications, and most have PhDs, or in line for getting one. The curriculum is based on Anna University, and the effectiveness of the curriculum is under serious consideration. It may well be suited perfectly for desk jobs rather than industries. It doesn't offer much practical knowledge to the students.
detailed_review.Other: Don't join this college if you are expecting a campus life or a college life, for the fact. It has some strict rules about carrying mobile phones. Phones or any electronic gadget are not allowed inside the campus and even in the hostel. The other rules regarding the interaction between opposite genders are also strict, being a Co-Ed. The college doesn't allow interactions between male and female students outside the classroom and are given separate paths to travel. There is no canteen, and outside foods are also not allowed.

reviews.course: B.E. in Electronics and Communication Engineering
reviews.review_title: It has good infrastructure, food and academics, but cultural activities are boring and get less fun.

detailed_review.Placements: Above 75% of the students get placed every year from our college. The lowest salary package offered here is 2 LPA, while the highest salary package offered may be up to 28 LPA. Top recruiting companies for our course are Wipro, Zoho, Infosys, etc. Mostly, 60% of the students get placed in these companies while others may get placed in small companies. However, the salary packages offered by small companies are also pretty good.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: All the facilities are very good here, which you can expect from a well managed private college. The main thing about our college is the food as they provide very high quality and great food for both hostellers and day scholars. For day scholars, the food is provided in the college, which cannot be denied and is worth it.
detailed_review.Faculty: All the faculty members here are well educated and experienced. They teach good and maintain the class very good. Courses are well managed for the students and are as per the Anna University guidelines. Students studied here are well trained also, but it depends on you to grab the opportunity and make good out of it.
detailed_review.Other: I have chosen this course because it has high job opportunities, and I have an interest in computing. Events and cultural activities are very poor and are much great. They are just organised for the namesake. Mostly this college gives importance to curriculum and academics and doesn't give much attention to this kind of activities. Rules are pretty strict here.

faqs.question: How can I get into R.M.K. College of Engineering and Technology for UG/PG courses? Am I eligible for admission?
faqs.answer:
R.M.K. College of Engineering and Technology has below criteria for taking admissions to it's various courses: Courses Eligibility B.E. / B.Tech Candidate must have passed VIII, IX, X, XI & XII Std. from schools situated in Tamil Nadu.
Tamil Nadu native candidate who have passed any of the VIII, IX, X, XI & XII Std. or their equivalent exam from schools situated outside Tamil Nadu can also apply. They should produce Original Nativity Certificate.
Children of Central Government Employees, irrespective of their nativity, provided their parents or guardians (only if both parents are not alive) have been serving in Tamil Nadu continuously for the past five years can be eligible to apply.
Sons & daughters of All India service Tamil Nadu cadre officers are eligible to apply. A Self declaration from the parent in this regard is to be produced.
Children of employees in the Public Sector or Government recognised institutions had been working in their organisations for the past five years are also eligible, irrespective of their domicile.
Other State candidates who have studied VIII, IX, X, XI and XII Std. in Tamil Nadu are eligible to apply. Not satisfied with answer? Ask Shiksha GPT

faqs.question: What is the overall intake at R.M.K. College of Engineering and Technology for all courses together?
faqs.answer: R.M.K. College of Engineering and Technology courses are approved by eminent Government bodies such as AICTE. The combined seats available for various programmes provided by R.M.K. College of Engineering and Technology goes up to 510. Not satisfied with answer? Ask Shiksha GPT

college_info.college_name: RMD Engineering College: Courses, Fees, Admission 2025, Placements, Reviews

highlights.summary: R.M.D. Engineering College is also known as RMD Engineering College was founded in 2001. It is a private institute and is located in Tamil Nadu. RMD Engineering College courses are offered to students at the UG and PG levels. The institute is approved by AICTE and offers courses in Full Time mode. RMD Engineering College offers a total of 8 courses in stream such as Engineering. Some of the popular courses offered at the institute are B.E. / B.Tech and M.E./M.Tech and the total seat intake for the available courses is 918. These courses are offered to students across several specialisations such as Artificial Intelligence & Machine Learning, Computer Science Engineering, Electrical Engineering, Electronics & Communication Engineering and Electronics Engineering. Further, the fee for all these courses ranges between INR 50,000 to 2,00,000 and the average median salary is around INR 4,80,000. Apart from this, the RMD Engineering College campus has a state-of-the-art infrastructure with all the advanced facilities.
