RMD Engineering College Reviews on Placements, Faculty & Facilities

reviews.course: B.E. in Electronics and Communication Engineering
reviews.review_title: I am really happy to study in this college.

detailed_review.Placements: The college gave so much training for placements like Ampcat, NPTEL, Japanese, and German. Then they suggest many portals like Infosys and Smartica. It also conducts training programs. The college invites some students to give guest lectures, and invites many people to talk about placements.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: In college, the food is awesome. They give so importance to sports. There is a good environment. It gives snacks in the evening daily. It gives sports prizes in cash, and many students got prizes in sports. Some students also went to the zonal level.
detailed_review.Faculty: Studies are also topmost. Faculty members are doctorates. They are friendly with us. I think it's the best choice to study engineering at RMD College. In our college, there are 5 courses, i.e., ECE, CSE, IT, AI ML, and CSBS. All faculty members are good. Students who want a better future should join RMD.

reviews.course: B.E. in Electronics and Communication Engineering
reviews.review_title: Study is good, but some of the faculty are a waste, and they are showing partiality to Tamil people.

detailed_review.Placements: 60% prefer this college. Average placements are provided. Companies are TCS, HCL, Cognizant, Wipro, Infosys, Tech Mahindra, KPIT Technologies, LTI Mindtree, Emphasis, and Good placements. They will give separate sessions for placements and conduct smart sections for aptitude learning.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Hostel is too good, especially the bathrooms are like a star hotel, very clean. Ground is also good, canteen is average, and no fast foods are allowed in college. Mess food is excellent. I will give 5 star rating. They are so hygienic and clean, and the menu was excellent.
detailed_review.Faculty: Faculty is good, but some of them were not supportive of the Telugu people. Professional lectures are present, most of them will guide. Project exports, hackathons will be conducted. They will elaborate on our knowledge. On campus, we have a library with more about tech and non tech.

reviews.course: B.E. in Computer Science Engineering
reviews.review_title: I would recommend students to join this college.

detailed_review.Placements: Placements are decent. Many top recruiting companies visit our college for recruitment. The average salary package offered ranges between 3 LPA - 4 LPA. The minimum salary package offered was 2.5 LPA. The highest salary package offered was 10 LPA.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Our campus is Wi-Fi enabled. Laboratory is very good. The food quality is decent. Mobile phones are not allowed on campus. Sports are conducted. Bus services are available for day scholars. I would rate it 3 stars out of 5 for facilities.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers are helpful and knowledgeable. The teaching quality is average. They also provide in-depth knowledge to students. Semester exams are moderate.

reviews.course: B.E. in Electronics and Communication Engineering
reviews.review_title: I am satisfied with this college.

detailed_review.Placements: In our college, almost 91% of students are placed. The highest salary package offered is 48 LPA and the lowest salary package offered is 3.6 LPA. Top recruiting companies like Zoho, Soliton, Emburr, etc., visit our campus. Almost 91% of students get internships at Zoho, Soliton, and Emburr. Top roles offered are team leader and intern.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The hostel facilities are good. Wi-Fi is available throughout the campus. The quality of the food in the hostel is good. They have maintained food quality every day.
detailed_review.Faculty: The teaching quality is excellent. They always encourage and motivate us. It has been helpful for our campus placements. Our teachers always guide us in a good way. They are always friendly with us. The pass percentage is 90%.
detailed_review.Other: Our college does not organise any events. Outside food is not allowed on campus. Our college is disciplined. They must allow outside food on campus. Our college always supports and encourages sports and extracurricular activities.

reviews.course: B.E. in Electronics and Communication Engineering
reviews.review_title: It is an excellent college and the quality of the food served is good.

detailed_review.Placements: Our college provides excellent placements. Top recruiting companies like CTS, TCS, Wipro, Soliton, Amazon, Flipkart, etc., visit our campus. Almost 50% of students get internships.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The quality of the food is good. Our college provides excellent infrastructure. Medical facilities and sports facilities are available. Wi-Fi is available 24X7. The library is excellent. Labs are available for practical purposes.
detailed_review.Faculty: Our teachers are excellent and well-qualified. They clear our doubts. The teaching quality is good. Semester exams are easy.

reviews.course: B.E. in Electronics and Communication Engineering
reviews.review_title: It is a good and disciplined college.

detailed_review.Placements: Placements start in the 6th semester. Top recruiting companies are Zoho, TCS, and HCL. After completing the course, we will get many opportunities from both the core and IT sectors. Our college conducts placement training programs.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The infrastructure of our college is the best. The hostel is good. We can play games in our college. The hostel is strict. We can't go for general outings. Outside food is not allowed. Phones are not allowed in the hostel. The food served in the hostel is good. We can't go around the campus after the bell.
detailed_review.Faculty: Regular exams are conducted to maintain the best education. All faculty members explain each topic. They are well-experienced. They always clear our doubts. For some sets of students, a single teacher is assigned to get a good education.

reviews.course: B.E. in Electronics and Communication Engineering
reviews.review_title: The college has the best placement record.

detailed_review.Placements: 96% of the students were placed in batch 2019-2023. Soliton technologies, HCL, KPIT are the best companies that recruit students. Many job offers are provided by the company. The highest package is INR 8 Lacs per annum and the lowest package is INR 4 Lacs per annum. Many students are selected for internships in Soliton, Goldman sachs, Virtusa, Infosys etc.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: All the rooms and washrooms are very clean and hygienic in both college and hostel. We have a central library with E resources online platform. We have practical lab sessions 3 times a week which increases our practical knowledge. Hostellers have a 24/7 Wi-Fi connection. Our college is verified by fssai, quality of food is very good and hygienic. They maintain a difference for vegetarians and nonvegetarians. A canteen is available in the hostel itself for hostellers. An immediate hospital is available for emergency. Sports and games are played  once in a week.
detailed_review.Faculty: There are required staff members who are highly professional and trained and have qualified degree. They clarify all our doubts then and there. Our curriculum is related almost to Anna university. They trained students for both semester, practical and industry level. Semester exams are moderate and pass percentage is 90%.
detailed_review.Other: No culturals will be available, but annual day is celebrated on professional topics, they give importance to studies, sports and co curricular contests and competitions related to study or technical knowledge are conducted.

reviews.course: B.E. in Electronics and Communication Engineering
reviews.review_title: If you want to enjoy your campus life, I would not recommend this college.

detailed_review.Placements: More than 90% of students get placed every year. The highest salary package offered is 9 LPA. The lowest salary package offered is 3 LPA. The top recruiting companies are Virtusa and CTS. Over 70% of students got internships from various companies. Top roles offered are web developer, full-stack developer, automation engineer, and tester.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: All the facilities and the infrastructure are good. Wi-Fi is fine. Only labs are neatly maintained, but not the components in them. The library is very vast and well maintained. The hostel is maintained well. The food quality is good. Medical facilities are also good. Sports and games are just fine.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers are helpful and well qualified. Over 90% of teachers are knowledgeable. The teaching quality is good. The course curriculum is relevant, but it doesn't make students industry-ready. It's up to how they learn. Semester exams are conducted very strictly, even though it is an autonomous college. The pass percentage is over 75%.

reviews.course: B.E. in Electronics and Communication Engineering
reviews.review_title: Satisfied by faculty and management support.

detailed_review.Placements: The placements are very good. But you should be skilled enough to get placed. College will provide all the required training. If you are good at communication and technical skills you will get good placement and the training provided by the college is very good.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Classrooms are clean and maintenance is amazing, but the buildings are old. Hostel rooms are okay but old and maintenance is good. 24/7 Wi-Fi is available. Library is good with very good book collection and the labs are well-equipped with required kits. The grounds we have in RMD are spacious but less importance is given to sports.
detailed_review.Faculty: The teachers are very friendly and well experienced in the subjects. They provide all the support and motivation to the students to reach their goals. The examination system is very strict but scoring good marks is not that difficult if you study hard.

reviews.course: B.E. in Electronics and Communication Engineering
reviews.review_title: It is a very good opportunity to achieve success and fulfill dreams.

detailed_review.Placements: In our college, more than 80% of students were placed in the previous batch. The highest salary package offered is 12 LPA by Google. Placements have not yet approached our batch as we have just completed our 5th semester. Top recruiting companies like Solitron, Goldman Sachs, TCS, CTS, etc., visit our campus.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Wi-Fi is available throughout the campus 24X7. Library access is provided without any charges. The food is delicious. Our college is certified by the FSSAI. The hostel students benefit more from special classes. Hostel students are encouraged to participate in sports.
detailed_review.Faculty: All faculty members are highly knowledgeable and skilled. They are very helpful wherever we need them. Apart from academics, they advise us on paper presentations and internships. They teach in such a way that all students will understand the concept easily.
detailed_review.Other: I chose this course because of my interest in electronics. I would like to have a query clarification session to clear up all our doubts.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Information Technology
reviews.review_title: Placements provided in our college this year are not good.

detailed_review.Placements: Placements provided in our college are average. Some students get placed and few of them search for off-campus placements. Around 65% to 75% of students get placements in local companies like Zepto and Swiggy. Around 3 to 5 students got placed in MNCs. Our college provided good placements in 2018 and 2019 but not this year and the previous year.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Classrooms are good but there are less labs with fans. Students don't like the food served in the hostel. Library contains less books. Hostels are average. Students can play many games in our college.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers in our college are not fully qualified and not experienced. The course curriculum doesn't make students ready for the industry. Semester exams are not strictly conducted.
detailed_review.Other: I chose B.Tech in information technology because there were no seats in other courses. Teachers should be improved a lot. Events and fests are not organised in our college.

reviews.course: B.E. in Computer Science Engineering
reviews.review_title: Good for placements.

detailed_review.Placements: 87% students got placed from our course. The highest package is 12.3 LPA, lowest is 3.6 LPA and average is 4.8 LPA. Top recruiting companies are zoho, Cognicent and TCS. 70% students got internship in Zoho and TCS.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Free Wi-Fi and integrated labs with Apple computer labs, good clean classrooms and library with more than 80000 books are available. The food in hostel is superb with a 5 star rating from fssai. 4 playgrounds, 2 basketball courts and 6 tennis courts are there. A hospital is also present for students.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers are highly qualified with PhD and they are with over 30 years of experience. They are good enough. The course is curriculum relevant and it makes students industry ready. Semester exams are somewhat difficult and the pass percentage is 80.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning
reviews.review_title: I am satisfied with environment and good placements.

detailed_review.Placements: Around 80% of students who are opting for placements are getting placed and few students opt for higher studies. The highest salary package offered is 25 LPA and the lowest salary package is 3.5 LPA. Top recruiting companies are Cognizant and Wipro. Around 50% of students get internships. Top roles offered are team manager and team leader. It is one of the best colleges in Tamil Nadu for placements.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Free Wi-Fi is available in classrooms and hostel for 24 hours. There is a central library with many types of books and articles. The hostel has many facilities for studying but mobile phones are strictly banned inside the college and hostel. Mess includes different types of menus on different days. Sports and games are fully available. Students can play for up to 3 hours every day.
detailed_review.Faculty: Some teachers in our college are knowledgeable and some are trying to learn new things every day. Few of them are partially knowledgeable as they don't know some topics in the course curriculum. The course curriculum makes students industry-ready. Semester exams are not much difficult because half of the subject papers are done by faculty members. The pass percentage is 45%.
detailed_review.Other: I chose this course because it has good scope for the future. Students can improve their general knowledge and mathematical skills with this course. Events are not conducted in our college. Extracurricular activities are conducted in all the games once a year. Symposium is organised by every department every year.

reviews.course: B.Tech in Computer Science and Business Systems
reviews.review_title: Faculty were well versed. But, as our course is new, they are just struggling.

detailed_review.Placements: The course that I took admission is new in my college. It was introduced in the year 2020.  So, no placements have been done yet. Hope my seniors and I get placed in good companies. My course syllabus is set by TCS, so we are studying everything according to their requirements.  Our ultimate aim is to get placed in TCS.  But, our college provides common placement training in other companies as well.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The Infrastructure in our college is really good. There is no doubt in that. Maybe, it was not eye-catching for youth but it is decent. There is no defect in our infrastructure. They are providing a library period. Wi-Fi is available in our college, but no mobile phones are allowed. We can use the wi-fi only in a laptop. The lab section is provided daily with 2 periods. As we are related to the computer group, our lab programs are done in the skill rack portal. There is no problem with the current supply if the current supply is off, immediately generators will be active. Coming to the hostel side, l am a day scholar, but my hostel friends say everything is fine. Their mess is clean and polished. They lag in Wi-Fi sometimes. Hostel students too use only laptops no mobile phones are allowed.
detailed_review.Faculty: The Faculties are well versed. But according to me, they are lagging somewhere.  I can't be able to understand that much quick, but after the class when we go and ask our doubts, they clear everything. Our curriculum is purely set by TCS. So, I think we actually studying the relevant one compared to other departments. Semester is always a difficult one, but we always give our best to score good.
detailed_review.Other: I actually chose this course, because this course is a combination of computer and business. So whoever want to handle business can also use this course. So, I felt to take this unique course then studying usual computer Science engineering. Coding is a foundation for every IT department. So, if my course add more coding syllabus, it might be good. In cultural side, my college is not that much active.

reviews.course: B.E. in Electronics and Communication Engineering
reviews.review_title: Our college is good for education, safety, food, and placements with discipline.

detailed_review.Placements: Our college provides placements for all students. The highest salary package offered is 10 LPA. The lowest salary package offered is 3 LPA and the average salary package offered is 5 LPA. In our batch, almost top multinational companies are visiting our college.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Facilities provided by the college are very good. In classrooms, they use digital boards and projectors for teaching and teachers take care of studies. Our hostel rooms are clean and have Wi-Fi, a heater, drinking water facilities, and 24X7 electricity.
detailed_review.Faculty: In our college, all of them have completed their Ph.D. They share their knowledge and experience with students. The pass percentage of our college is almost 90% every semester and every year. Our college is one of the best colleges in Tamil Nadu.

reviews.course: B.E. in Electrical and Electronics Engineering
reviews.review_title: Very good infrastructure and all.

detailed_review.Placements: Placements are very good. They will conduct trainings from FACE and AMCAT test for aptitude. There will campus interview conducted from large number of MNCs and other companies. They should have any arrears to be eligible and as per company criteria, it will differ. 70% placement has happened. TCS, Infosys, Zoho, Amazon, KPIT, etc. are the top recruiters.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The college does not have Wi-Fi facility but it is present in the hostel. But it is limited and can be used only on my laptops which are registered with the college’s IT department. Labs are very good. Library has almost all the books. For academics, we have used books in the library. Food is very tasty and health. Also, it is unlimited. Medical services are available all the time.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers are very helpful. They are very good in knowledge and they will explain everything and anything you need. For extra activities, also they will support you. The course curriculum is relevant. It will make students almost ready for the industry. Semester exams are conducted by the Anna University. We had the highest pass percentage of around 90%.
detailed_review.Other: Only thing is that mobile phones are not allowed inside the campus and beards are also not allowed. This is for everyone who is entering the college.

reviews.course: B.E. in Electronics and Communication Engineering
reviews.review_title: It has good placements, friendly faculty members, and the best infrastructure.

detailed_review.Placements: Our college provides good placements. More than 85% of students get placements. Infosys, Zoho, Kaar Technologies, TCS, Accenture, Amazon, and CTS are among the companies that visit the campus. They start placement training in the first year itself. Many students were placed in the third year. They analyse each and every student in their field of interest.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Our college has the best infrastructure and it is located in a good environment, which is free from noise pollution. The hostel and food provided by this college are good. There are several facilities, such as laboratories, sports centers, and hostels. The campus is clean and hygienic. The library has a collection of books available. There is a Wi-Fi facility available in the hostel.
detailed_review.Faculty: The faculty members are friendly and they encourage us. They clear up all our doubts and are great value for money. They will provide a wide curriculum for students. Our faculty members are teaching at their best levels. Many of them hold doctorates. The main focus of students is to study, and the college provides a very good education.
detailed_review.Other: Campus life is full of corporate patterns. I opted for this course because of my interest. We are engaged in many club activities, sports, cultural events, etc.

reviews.course: B.E. in Electronics and Instrumentation Engineering
reviews.review_title: Our college provides a good number of placement activities.

detailed_review.Placements: More than 80% of the students get placed with a good salary package every year. The highest salary package offered by Google is 12 LPA, and the minimum salary package offered is 4 LPA. Around 75% of the students got an internship during their studying time. Top recruiting companies like TCS, HCL, Zoho, etc., visit our college for placements. Most of the students get placed with a better role.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The college hostels have well-planned rooms for every student. The college hostel students are benefitted from some extra classes and lab sessions compared to the day scholars. Apart from academics, hostel students are also encouraged in extracurricular activities like sports, non-technical events, etc. The college has a fully arranged and well-developed library for the students.
detailed_review.Faculty: Faculty members in our institution are well-qualified with PhD degrees in their respective fields. Their teaching is are excellent, so most of the portion is covered within the classes. The course curriculum helps the students to learn in an easy way. Semester exams are conducted in a well-organised manner. The difficulty level of exams is average. The pass percentage is more than 40%.
detailed_review.Other: I have chosen this course because of the jobs offered, and the demand for electronic and instrumentation engineers are increasing. By this course, we will know about electronics as well as technology.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Information Technology
reviews.review_title: Overall, it is a good college for students who are interested in studying.

detailed_review.Placements: Placements in our college are amazing because many companies like Amazon, Wipro, Zoho, TCS, CTS, etc., recruiting students with some decent salary packages. The average salary package offered is 4.5 LPA, and the lowest salary package offered is 3 LPA. Many students get placed, so there is no problem with placements here.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: There is a world-class library system. Our college provides pure water, but mobile phones are not allowed on the campus. The quality of food is for every student, including day scholars. It is one of the best colleges in Tamil Nadu.
detailed_review.Faculty: Faculty members in our college are so sweet and friendly. They are open-minded. Many of them are doctorates. Exams are held through Anna University before the semester, and semester exams are held through college in a strict manner, so it is good to join this college.
detailed_review.Other: Our college does not conduct extracurricular activities like cultural programmes. It is the college for studies, to play or to enjoy together. I suggest everyone join this college for a good future. Be chill, calm and study a lot. Our college provides an awesome biriyani, healthy food, etc.

reviews.course: B.E. in Electronics and Communication Engineering
reviews.review_title: It is a good college for placements.

detailed_review.Placements: In terms of placements, this is one of the best colleges in the city. The placement training is provided from the first year itself, in coding, skill development, mini-project etc. If you don't have any arrears, you can 95% chances to get placed. In my batch of 180, 125 students attended placements, and nearly 100 of them got placed. The highest package depends on your skills, and it is 20 LPA, and the average package is 4 LPA. Top recruiters are TCS, CTS, Wipro, Infosys, HCL, Zoho, Robert Bosch etc. Most of the companies are IT companies.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The infrastructure is good. Wi-Fi is available, but mobile phones are not allowed inside the campus. Sports facilities are average. The food provided in the college is delicious like in hotels. You can get biryani every Tuesday.
detailed_review.Faculty: The teachers are well qualified, and most of them are doctorate holders. The college follows the syllabus of Anna University, and it somewhat makes students industry-ready. But you are given many mini-projects per unit, and it ruins your weekend. Unit tests are conducted after every unit. If you don't score well, re-tests are conducted.
detailed_review.Other: You must wear only formal dresses to the college. Boys must maintain a clean shave, otherwise, they are not allowed into the campus. If you a day scholar, then taking the college bus is compulsory. You should not talk to students of the opposite gender. There are no cultural activities in the college. Parents should also wear formals when they visit the college. The food is provided on the campus is good.

faqs.question: What is the schedule for TNEA Counselling at SRM Easwari Engineering College?
faqs.answer: TNEA Rank List for various categories is out on the official website of TNEA. To check ranks candidates must login using the username and password. Grievances Redressal option is available till June. Further, the Directorate of Technical Education (DoTE) Tamil Nadu released TNEA counselling dates and details. Tamil Nadu Engineering Admissions (TNEA) counselling registrations are ongoing, whereas the general TNEA Counselling process will start in July . TNEA counselling process includes registration, assignment of random numbers, certificate verifications, rank list publication, and finally the counselling. The counselling rounds will include steps like Choice Filling, Allotment, Confirmation of Allotment, and Reporting to the College/ TFC and payment of fees depending upon their confirmation.

faqs.question: How can I get into R.M.D. Engineering College for UG/PG courses? Am I eligible for admission?
faqs.answer:
R.M.D. Engineering College has below criteria for taking admissions to it's various courses: Courses Eligibility B.E. / B.Tech Candidate must have passed VIII, IX, X, XI & XII Std. from schools situated in Tamil Nadu.
Tamil Nadu native candidate who have passed any of the VIII, IX, X, XI & XII Std. or their equivalent exam from schools situated outside Tamil Nadu can also apply. They should produce Original Nativity Certificate.
Children of Central Government Employees, irrespective of their nativity, provided their parents or guardians (only if both parents are not alive) have been serving in Tamil Nadu continuously for the past five years can be eligible to apply.
Sons & daughters of All India service Tamil Nadu cadre officers are eligible to apply. A Self declaration from the parent in this regard is to be produced.
Children of employees in the Public Sector or Government recognised institutions had been working in their organisations for the past five years are also eligible, irrespective of their domicile.
Other State candidates who have studied VIII, IX, X, XI and XII Std. in Tamil Nadu are eligible to apply. M.E./M.Tech Candidate who have completed 10+2+AMIE or 10+3 years Diploma + AMIE are also eligible.
AMIE candidate must have 2 years regular full time experience in the relevant field. Not satisfied with answer? Ask Shiksha GPT

facilities.name: Library
facilities.description: R.M.D. Engineering College's library has a collection of nearly 24107 books, 1936 reference books, 2500 CD ROMs, 55 floppies, 35 audio cassettes besides subscribing to nearly 142 national and international journals and 43 leading magazines. In addition it has a collection of 515 back volumes of journals and magazines. The college library has a separate section for PG courses. The library has a special collection of books for the various examinations, which includes BEC, TOEFL, GRE, GATE (all branches), and UPSC. The college library also has a subscription of e-journals which include, IEEE ASPP, SPRINGER LINK, J.GATE, McGraw Hill, ELSEVIER, ASTM digital library, DELNET. The college also gives access to OPAC (Online Public Access Catalogue) Module facilitates easy search of resources for the researchers.

facilities.name: Hostel
facilities.description: R.M.D. Engineering College's hostel are spacious, adequately ventilated, well maintained and furnished with necessary accessories. The hostel also has a separate gymnasium and beauty parlor for the girls and a gymnasium, and air-conditioned saloon for the boys. The hostel, in addition, has a general store for provisions required by the students.

These reviews and ratings have been given by students. Shiksha does not endorse the same. Out of 64 published reviews , 52 reviews are verified.

highlights.summary:
Rabindranath Tagore University is recognised by a plethora of national- level authority bodies such as, the UGC, the NCTE, AICTE as well as by NAAC with a Grade- B, and approved by the BCI (Bar council of India) and (AIU) Association of Indian Universities.
It has published around 2K+ research papers and books with 50+ future skill courses. RNTU has marked its presence with 600+ companies for placements. Rabindranath Tagore University (RNTU) is approved by PCI,ICAR, AIU, MPPC, ACU, and INC.
RNTU offers more than 80 courses at UG,PG, and doctoral levels. The university also offers a vocational programme for Vocational Education and Skill development. Some key highlights of Rabindranath Tagore University are given in the table below:
Establishment Year | Institute Type

college_info_program.intro: Rabindranath Tagore University courses include UG, PG, PhD, UG Diploma, PG Diploma in streams such as Agriculture, Humanities and Languages, Commerce, Education, Engineering and Technology, Law, Management, Medical Science, Science etc. The University offers BSc, MBA and UG Diploma with various specialisations in full-time mode. Ravindranath University Bhopal BSc is available in Nursing, Agriculture, Forensic Science, Biotechnology, Computer Science, Microbiology, Yoga etc. Similarly, RNTU MBA/ PGDM is offerered in Rural Development, Urban Management, Rural Management, Hospital Administration etc. The University gives admission on the basis of Class 12 qualification with 45% minimum aggregate. Majority of courses consider the AJEE scores or the scores/ percentile of NEET, CAT/ MAT or other respective entrance exams. To learn more about the RNTU University Bhopal popular programmes, check out the table given below:

reviews.course: Diploma in Electrical Engineering
reviews.review_title: Faculty in this college is also good, who teach well and tell the students to stay understanding.

detailed_review.Placements: Nice university in Bhopal. Known for its academic excellence and holistic approach. Very nice university in placement. There are many students in our college who are preparing for different courses. Recruiting for AWS, Atos global, Aisect limited, Agromaxx.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Nice hostel and good food.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers at RNTU are helpful and qualified. Their teaching quality is good with a focus on practical. The course curriculum is relevant and industry-oriented. Semester exams are moderately difficult with a high pass percentage. My university is best. Rabindranath Tagore University, Bhopal, is India's first skill-based university with equal focus on both theoretical and practical learning. Keeping this in mind, the university management has established practical laboratories for all the courses that are conducted in every department.
detailed_review.Other: There are many courses in this college, like NCC and NSS, in which we are given discipline.

reviews.course: Diploma in Electrical Engineering
reviews.review_title: Supportive faculty and decent facilities, but the curriculum needs modernization.

detailed_review.Placements: The percentage of students who got placed from my course is 40%. The lowest package offered in my course is 20 LPA and the highest package for my college is 65 LPA. A percentage of students got internships from my course is 50% in companies. Top recruiting companies are Ceat, Tata, Motherson, and Exide.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Mess food quality is very good. Labs, library, Wi-Fi, and AC are available. The hostel facilities were quite satisfactory. The rooms are clean and well-maintained, with essential amenities like a study table, chair, bed, and cupboard. The hostel provides good sports facilities. There are dedicated grounds for cricket and football, and courts for volleyball and badminton. Indoor games like table tennis.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers are generally helpful, well-qualified, and knowledgeable in their respective subjects. Most of them hold advanced degrees and have a good command of the subject matter. The course curriculum is fairly relevant and is designed to cover both foundation and advanced topics in the field. It includes core theoretical subjects along with practical lab sessions, seminars, and project work, which help in building a strong base.

reviews.course: M.Sc. in Soil Science and Agricultural Chemistry
reviews.review_title: Review of RNTU Bhopal academics, campus, and beyond.

detailed_review.Placements: Placements at RNTU Bhopal for the 2024-25 batch were quite impressive. 85% of students got placed with a package of 15 LPA. The university provides strong internship opportunities. Students get more than 400 internships in top companies. Overall, RNTU offers a good balance of academics.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Hostels are decent with basic amenities. The mess food is hygienic but average in taste. Medical and sports facilities are available. RNTU Bhopal provides good infrastructure with smart classrooms, high-speed Wi-Fi, good labs, and a rich library for students.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers at RNTU are helpful and qualified. Their teaching quality is good with a focus on practical. The course curriculum is relevant and industry-oriented. Semester exams are moderately difficult with a high pass percentage. The teaching quality is decent, with regular use of digital tools and college boards. The environment is positive and career-focused.
detailed_review.Other: I chose this course for career scope. The best part of the college is practicals, learning, and supportive faculty members. Improvement is needed in the industry exposure. The campus is peaceful. The crowd is friendly. Extracurricular and scholarship options are available.

reviews.course: Bachelor of Arts (B.A.)
reviews.review_title: I would like to suggest this college to every student I know for admission.

detailed_review.Placements: Of course, RNTU is one of the best, but I don't think it has the highest chance of placement. Fastly, but placement and internship from our college are actually given, and the percentage of students who got internships is 80-90%. Overall, a good college.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The infrastructure of the college is good, and the hostel is also good. The security level is safe for students, but as we know, good food in the hostel is not expected. The facilities provided and hostel rooms are good, and overall RNTU is a good one.
detailed_review.Faculty: The faculty of RNTU is good just like the university. Exams are continuous, and many events, even small ones, are organized and celebrated. The pass percentage is, I guess, 40%. Teachers are helpful to students, and the way of teaching and everything is nice.
detailed_review.Other: Actually, I only want a degree in it. For humanities students, one of the best starting courses is B.A. I think they should take objective tests for preparation. Activities and events are all good.

reviews.course: B.E. in Computer Science Engineering
reviews.review_title: It is a very nice college and its facilities are very good.

detailed_review.Placements: Placements are also very good. Overall, in all departments, approximately 80% of students get placed. The lowest salary package in the B.E. CSE course ranges from 5-7 LPA. The highest package is 1.5 crores per annum in B.E. CSE. Top recruiting companies for our course are Amazon, Google, etc.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Overall, the infrastructure of our college is very good. Hostels are very well-organised. There are several facilities for students like a gym, library, cricket or football ground, basketball court, badminton court, libraries, etc., and useful facilities are all included.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers are very helpful and all are qualified. It has the best professors for all courses. Their teaching quality is very outstanding. The course curriculum is relevant, and it makes students industry-ready. There is no difficulty faced by students for exams as they are preparing very well.

reviews.course: Diploma in Medical Lab Technician
reviews.review_title: Diploma in Medical Lab Technician.

detailed_review.Placements: Career opportunities are available within the country as well as abroad. Top performers during internships got placed in reputed institutions and clinics. We got internships that included payment during the time of college. Most of the students got placed, at least in small clinics.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Rabindranath Tagore University supports an enormous number of courses at undergraduate and postgraduate levels. Laboratories are sanitized regularly, and the needed equipment is brought once a year. It's compulsory to wear lab coats throughout the day except during theoretical classes.
detailed_review.Faculty: We have both theoretical and practical exams. It's important to show equal concentration on both exams. All our teachers are experts in handling all the practical classes. Mostly, we have laboratory classes rather than classroom teaching.

reviews.course: Diploma in Computer  Application (DCA)
reviews.review_title: This college offers excellence in technical education.

detailed_review.Placements: Few alumni started their own software companies, which were truly beneficial for all the freshers. Normally, in placements students were divided into two sessions for better focus during training. The highest salary package offered is 7.87 LPA.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Avar University insists on a specific set of objectives to follow on campus for maintaining college decorum. Individual office rooms are arranged for placement offices, administrative offices, HODs, and PT incharges. Health care unit is also arranged for students' concerns.
detailed_review.Faculty: Our university aims to deliver technical concepts. Our teachers are very strict in maintaining attendance records. Each year, over 100 research projects are developed for project submission and inter-college competitions under the guidance of our teachers.

reviews.course: Diploma in Computer  Application (DCA)
reviews.review_title: Consistent technical education.

detailed_review.Placements: The grading system plays a significant role in placement activities. Meritorious students undergo extensive training sessions to get them placed in top companies. Leading organisations like Cognizant, TCS, and Tech Mahindra participate in drives organized by our college.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Students get access to medical emergencies at any time. Classrooms are developed with needed tools. There are no sports hours in our schedule. Sometimes, canteens are very crowded. The hostel provides food at a specific time.
detailed_review.Faculty: Regular technical training is held by faculty members. Through this training, students can learn a lot of practical things. The credibility of examination results graphically increases and decreases at all times. Only a few of the faculty members handle practical classes.

reviews.course: B.Sc. in Microbiology
reviews.review_title: A mini short college life.

detailed_review.Placements: There are very less chances of placement, because due to its B.Sc. programme, companies have very less interest. It is fortunate if the company selects you, and the role will be different than what you studied. Sometimes, it may be BPO or data entry jobs. Here, you always see jobs being searched every day.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The infrastructure of the college is very good, you can directly compare it with world-class infrastructure. The classrooms are very systematic and clean, and you will never be disappointed in terms of cleanliness and peacefulness. I think Wi-Fi will never work here, even if you have the password.
detailed_review.Faculty: Exams for my course are very good and very strict. In the exam centre, you are unable to talk with another student. If you try, they will suspend you for 6 months. The exams will be very easy if you study well. Most of the people complete their exams within one and a half hours from the starting time.

reviews.course: Diploma in Civil Engineering
reviews.review_title: Good placements, environment, and infrastructure.

detailed_review.Placements: The training and placement cell of RNTU has been associated with more than 600 companies to offer students a platform for placements. More than 6,000 students got placed. Our course is helpful.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: RNTU is the number 1 college in Bhopal city, so the infrastructure is very classic and attractive. We have good Wi-Fi connectivity. The campus has a good environment. There are high classrooms and a lab. Classrooms have good surroundings. Good facilities are provided. They have value for money. Overall, the hostel facility is good.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers are the best. They are qualified and knowledgeable. Most of them are helpful. They teach every topic in an easy method, and I understand it. The course curriculum is speculative. It organises industrial visits. Semester exams are moderate.
detailed_review.Other: I considered this course because of my interest in it and achieve my goals.

reviews.course: B.E. in Computer Science Engineering
reviews.review_title: One of the good private colleges in Bhopal.

detailed_review.Placements:
Approx. 10% to 15% of students placed in CSE every session.
The highest package for CSE is around 4-4.5 LPA.
And the average package is around 3 LPA.
Top recruiters are mostly startup companies.
Around 20% of students got internships, mostly in startups.
Data analytics, full stack developer, etc. are the top roles offered.
detailed_review.Infrastructure:
Infrastructure in our college is nice.
There is a Wi-Fi facility available with high speed.
A decent library is there, as is a big computer lab with at least 200 systems.
Hostel is available for both Boys and Girls.
Gym facilities are also available in the hostel.
Mess food is above average.(Non-veg not allowed).
Fantastic canteen is there.
Sports and games facilities are also available.
detailed_review.Faculty:
Teachers are very qualified and knowledgeable and also they're helpful.
Course curriculum is not so relevant.
Students need to do self-effort for the industry requirements.
Semester exams are not so difficult.
Difficulty level is average. 
About 80% is the pass percentage.
detailed_review.Other:
Big events is X factor of this college.
Big celebrities are invited to the college fest every year.
Last year, Darshan Raval (singer) came to our college.
Papon, Shilpa Rao, Maithili Thakur, and many more actors and businessmen, came in our college.

reviews.course: B.E. in Computer Science Engineering
reviews.review_title: Rabindranath Tagore University is the best in itself for placements.

detailed_review.Placements: My course is B.E. in CSE, and students are placed in different companies with packages ranging from 4.5 LPA to 12 LPA. The top recruiters include Amazon, Flipkart, and other MNCs, with around 60 percent of students securing internships. The primary roles offered by companies are in web development.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: RNTU hostels offer excellent facilities in the rooms, including daily cleaning, food, and Wi-Fi. Overall, the amenities provided by Rabindranath Tagore University are great, and I am thankful for all the support from the teachers, mentors, and principal.
detailed_review.Faculty: All teachers are experts in their subjects and are always ready to help students with their doubts. I really like Rabindranath Tagore University in Bhopal, and I encourage everyone to join RNTU to grow their careers and secure the best placements.
detailed_review.Other: Looking at the increasing technology, I decided that there will be a huge demand for software engineers in our country, which is why I chose this field.

reviews.course: Master of Business Administration (MBA)
reviews.review_title: Rabindranath Tagore university.

detailed_review.Placements: The highest and average salary package offered by recruiters will be 18.6 Lacs and 4 Lacs per annum. Top recruiters like Deloitte hire students from our college regularly. Amazing placement support and hardworking students have resulted in 100 percent placement every year.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The campus is good with neat classrooms, highly infrastructured buildings with all the facilities. All the students behave themselves to maintain the decorum of our college. There is a big spacious library, an open auditorium, and good transportation facilities available within the campus.
detailed_review.Faculty: Most of the faculty members are working in our college. They are highly experienced, with up to 6 years of experience, and highly qualified in their respective subjects. They provide their ideas, thoughts, and suggestions in the development of projects and help us in modifying them when needed.

reviews.course: Bachelor of Arts (B.A.)
reviews.review_title: Review of Rabindranath Tagore University.

detailed_review.Placements: In my course, there are 60 students. The lowest package of my course is 2 LPA and the highest package is 6-7 Lacs. Eicher, AIMMS (for the psychology student), etc. are the top recruiters. 90–95% students getting internship opportunities in different companies. Mainly in my course or subject, the role of working as assistant under the guidance of clinical psychologists or taking the advice of others, etc.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Faculty members and the infrastructure are totally fine. The faculty is very friendly with the students; they are flexible with them. The way of teaching is absolutely fine, and the infrastructure is really good, with all the facilities available in our course.
detailed_review.Faculty: The teachers are very helpful, highly qualified and knowledgeable, and the teaching process is adorable; they teach us in really simple language. Semester exams are a little bit tough but with the studies. Nothing is more tough. Teachers are helpful for the students.
detailed_review.Other: The best thing about my course is that I am doing it in psychology, so I am getting a lot of knowledge about how to speak with others, how to deal with others, problem-solving skills, analytical skills and all things. Also, in our college, there are mainly 2 fests on the international level: "VISHVARANG" and "RHYTHM." These fests happen on an international level, and people from 150 countries take part in them.

reviews.course: Discontinued (Aug 2024)- B.Com. (Hons.) in Accounting
reviews.review_title: Review of B.Com from the Rabindranath Tagore University.

detailed_review.Placements: At this college, 25–30% of the students get placements in our course. In the B.Com., most of the students pursue the Masters degree. The average package offered at this college was between 2 and 4 LPAs. At our college, some banking and finance companies visit for placements.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Infrastructure and facilities are available at Rabindranath Tagore University. Wi-Fi, labs, library, canteens, classrooms, etc. facilities are available at this college. Hostel facilities at this college were also available for the students. The food available for students in the hostel was also good to eat.
detailed_review.Faculty: The faculty of the college was helpful, qualified and knowledgeable. The quality of the teaching was good to eat. This course curriculum from the college was relevant and it makes the students industry-ready. Semester exams at this college were not hard to pass.

reviews.course: Bachelor of Computer Applications (BCA)

detailed_review.Placements: 80% of students are placed in my course. The highest package is INR 7 LPA for Jio, and the lowest is INR 4 LPA for Wipro. Global Logic, Jio, Wipro, Amazon, Byjus, OneConnect, ICICI Bank, and many more are the top recruitment companies. 100% of students have done internships at several institutions, like Ganit Softech Gurgaon.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The facilities and infrastructure are also good, as compared to those at other colleges. I am not in the hostel, but my friend says the hostel facilities are also good, and sports games are also in heavy supply. The college is excellent. It is an excellent college.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers are  helpful, well-qualified, and knowledgeable, and their teaching quality is fantastic. Yes, it prepares students for the workforce. Semester exams are not difficult, and I don't know what the pass percentage is.

reviews.course: Discontinued (Aug 2024)- B.Sc. (Hons.) in Mathematics
reviews.review_title: I am not satisfied because the higher authorities' attitude is not good.

detailed_review.Placements: In our department, almost all students are placed. Our department had fewer students at first, but now, we have more than 30 students. Our department does not participate in any activities, and we don't have practical classes regularly.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The hostel infrastructure is not good. The college has good environment and is safe for girls. The canteen is good. The quality of food in the mess is good. Wi-Fi is not available. There is a lab, but we get to go there only during exam time. Classrooms are clean. A library is available.
detailed_review.Faculty: Our teachers take classes regularly. We cover everything in our course. Semester exams are not so difficult if you study regularly and score good marks. We don't have any extracurricular activities regularly.

reviews.course: Discontinued (Aug 2024)- B.Com. in Computer Applications
reviews.review_title: It is the best college for degrees.

detailed_review.Placements: Top recruiting companies like Tata, Mahindra & Mahindra, etc., visit our campus. Approximately 50% of students are placed.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The infrastructure is good. All facilities are available in our classrooms. Wi-Fi is available throughout the campus. The library is available. The canteen is very good. All facilities are available like sports, games, and medical.
detailed_review.Faculty: Our teachers are qualified. All faculty members are doing very well. I recommend that you apply for admission to the college. The result from the university is very good. The semester exams are difficult.
detailed_review.Other: Our college is good.

reviews.course: B.Sc. (Hons.) in Agriculture
reviews.review_title: Absolutely satisfied with the faculty, good infrastructure and facilities.

detailed_review.Placements: 20% students were placed in my course. Packages offered in my course range from 2.5 to 9 LPA. 20% students got internship from my course.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Good facilities are there in the hostel. The quality of food available in the mess and the canteen is good. Medical facilities are also there. Sports and games are good.
detailed_review.Faculty: The teachers are helpful, qualified and knowledgeable. Good level of exams is there in terms of difficulty level. Semester exams in this college are good. Atleast 33% marks are required to pass in them. The course curriculum is relevant. It makes students industry ready.

reviews.course: B.Sc. (Hons.) in Agriculture
reviews.review_title: The college has a good infrastructure but its location is not good.

detailed_review.Placements: Placement department is quite good but they don't provide good packages. They don't invite good companies. They don't have good recruiting companies. Only 4 or 5 percent students get placement from here. They provide call center jobs, sales jobs, etc.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Infrastructure is really very good and Wi-Fi is available but its speed is not good. Hostel life is very good but food is okay in the campus. The location of the college is not good as it is located 25kms away from Bhopal.
detailed_review.Faculty: Faculty is quite good, well qualified and knowledgeable. Their teaching quality is quite good. Nature wise also they are good. The campus also has smart classes. A smart library is also present with Wi-Fi. The course curriculum is very relevant. Students become industry ready.

college_info.college_name: Rabindranath Tagore University Admission 2025: Eligibility, Process, Date, Fee

admission.title: Rabindranath Tagore University Admission Overview 2025
admission.overview_text: Rabindranath Tagore University admission 2025 is open. The university offers an online mode of application submission. Admission to all the courses at the university is offered basis of the entrance exam scores. To be eligible for admission, candidates are required to fulfil the eligibility and selection criteria set by the university. Given below is more updated information about Rabindranath Tagore University admission 2025, followed by course-wise eligibility, selection criteria and admission process:

faqs.question: Can I get direct admission in Rabindranath Tagore University?
faqs.answer: Rabindranath Tagore University generally does not offer direct admissions for any of its courses. Students wishing to enrol in to the courses provided at the university need to ensure that they meet the admission criteria set of the same. For most of the RNTU Bhopal courses, admissions are entrance-based. Students need to appear for AJEE exam or provide valid scores secured in other exams to be eligible for admission. Students can connect with the admission desk of the university to learn more.

faqs.question: What is the total BA fee at Rabindranath Tagore University?
faqs.answer: The total Rabindranath Tagore University BA fee vary across the BA specialisations offered at the university. For a BA in Journalism & Mass Communication, the total fee is INR 60,000. It is payable in three annual instalments of INR 20,000. For all other BA specialisations at RNTU Bhopal, the total fee is INR 36,000. The annual instalment for the three-year course comes down to INR 12,000. The mentioned fee is sourced from the official website of the university/sanctioning body. It is still subject to change and hence, is indicative.

faqs.question: What is the total BTech fee at Rabindranath Tagore University?
faqs.answer: Rabindranath Tagore University provides a four-year BE course in the full-time mode. The BE fee at RNTU Bhopal is INR 1.8 lakh for various specialisations. It is payable in annual instalments. The fee structure may also include other components, such as admission/registration fees, hostel fees, security deposits, etc. The mentioned fee is sourced from the official website of the university/sanctioning body. It is still subject to change and hence, is indicative.

faqs.question: Can I get into Rabindranath Tagore University without entrance exam?
faqs.answer: Rabindranath Tagore University, shortlists students mainly based on entrance scores. The university accepts valid score secured in the AJEE conducted by AISECT Group of Institutions. It is an in-house test conducted by the GOI for admission to all five of its universities. However, students may get admitted on a merit basis. To know about the RNTU Bhopal admission chances , students can connect with the admission desk of the university.

faqs.question: How many students can do B.Tech at Rabindranath Tagore University?
faqs.answer: Rabindranath Tagore University stands as a beacon of higher education, fostering an enriching academic environment that caters to the aspirations of a diverse student community, with an enrollment ranging from 5,000 to 5,999 students. Within its educational landscape, the university unfolds opportunities for students to delve into the realms of technology through its B.Tech courses. In a bid to sculpt future engineers and innovators, RNTU provides 60 coveted seats for each of its B.Tech courses, creating a space where knowledge converges with hands-on learning. The courses offered include: 1.Mechanical Engineering: A domain that explores the principles of mechanics and machines, offering students a chance to understand the intricate workings of the physical world. 2. Computer Science Engineering: A frontier where technology meets creativity, empowering students to navigate the dynamic world of software development, artificial intelligence, and innovation. 3.Electrical and Electronics Engineering: A discipline at the intersection of electricity and technology, providing a foundation for those intrigued by the intricacies of electronic systems. 4.Civil Engineering: The realm where blueprints come to life, inviting students to delve into the design and construction of structures that shape the physical landscape. In these courses, RNTU doesn't just provide seats; it crafts an educational journey where theoretical knowledge meets practical application, nurturing a cohort of engineers equipped to contribute meaningfully to the technological landscape.

placement_faqs.question: What is the total BA fee at Rabindranath Tagore University?
placement_faqs.answer: The total Rabindranath Tagore University BA fee vary across the BA specialisations offered at the university. For a BA in Journalism & Mass Communication, the total fee is INR 60,000. It is payable in three annual instalments of INR 20,000. For all other BA specialisations at RNTU Bhopal, the total fee is INR 36,000. The annual instalment for the three-year course comes down to INR 12,000. The mentioned fee is sourced from the official website of the university/sanctioning body. It is still subject to change and hence, is indicative.

placement_faqs.answer: Rabindranath Tagore University provides a four-year BE course in the full-time mode. The BE fee at RNTU Bhopal is INR 1.8 lakh for various specialisations. It is payable in annual instalments. The fee structure may also include other components, such as admission/registration fees, hostel fees, security deposits, etc. The mentioned fee is sourced from the official website of the university/sanctioning body. college_info.college_name: Rajalakshmi Institute of Technology: Courses, Fees, Admission 2026, Placements

highlights.summary:
Rajalakshmi Institute of Technology was founded in 2008. It is an autonomous college and one of the top Engineering colleges. RIT is a part of Rajalakshmi Institutions and has been accredited by NAAC with an A++ grade. Further, the college is affiliated with Anna University, Chennai, and offers AICTE–approved courses to students.
Rajalakshmi Institute of Technology courses are offered to students in full-time mode at the UG level. The college offers a BTech programme for 4 years across several specialisations such as Computer Science & Business System, Artificial Intelligence & Data Science, Biotechnology, etc. RIT courses are also NBA-approved and are mainly offered to students in the stream of Engineering & Technology. The college has a team of guest lecturers to inspire students in their respective careers and to give them tips and invaluable insights in every course. Most importantly, RIT Tamil Nadu courses are provided to students at reasonable fees, to enable students to acquire knowledge and skills in their preferred area of interest. The college also offers an excellent infrastructure facility to students. For more details, candidates can check out the table given below:
For more information about Rajalakshmi Institute of Technology check out the below:

college_info_program.intro: The flagship programme offered at Rajalakshmi Institute of Technology is BTech. The college offers this programme to students at the UG level. Further, the college offers this programme for a duration of 4 years with a comprehensive curriculum. RIT Tamil Nadu courses strive to enhance the learning experience of students in order to prepare them for the industry. Candidates can check the popular programmes offered at Rajalakshmi Institute of Technology in the table provided below:
