Rajalakshmi Institute of Technology Reviews on Placements, Faculty & Facilities

reviews.course: B.E. in Computer and Communication Engineering
reviews.review_title: I made a good decision on joining this college because of the great exposure I received.

detailed_review.Placements: The placements were excellent. My batch almost received many offers from top MNCs. The highest package is around 25 LPA, the lowest package is 3 LPA, and the average is around 6 LPA. Top companies like Amazon, Meta, Accenture, Infosys, HCL, and other top MNCs came to hire students, and all of them are related to my specialization. Nearly all of my batch (2025) gets internships from my course.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Only the classrooms were non-AC rooms. Other than that, every place like the seminar hall, library, laboratories, and computer labs were maintained with AC infrastructure. The quality of the faculty is absolutely fine. They are kind and helpful, and the mess and canteen are maintained hygienically. Medical facilities are available, and they immediately take students to the institutional medical college.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers are kind and helpful in assisting with notes and books for preparation for the exam. Doubts can be clarified with professors. The college follows the Anna University curriculum, but the college is autonomous. The semester exams are easy to clear. There is no difficulty in clearing the exams.
detailed_review.Other: I am interested in communication-based things, so I chose this specialization which had only two options: one is ECE and the other is CCE. I don't have an interest in electronics but have an interest in communication, so I chose Computer and Communication Engineering. Many events are held on campus monthly, nearly three.

reviews.course: B.E. in Electronics and Communication Engineering
reviews.review_title: Good placement in 2025, where each student was able to receive nearly 2 to 3 placement offers.

detailed_review.Placements: 90 percent of the students were placed in my batch of 2025. 30 LPA is the highest package offered, and 3 LPA is the lowest package. 6 LPA is the average package. Amazon, Foxconn, Accenture, and other companies came to our college. Nearly 100 percent of the students attended internships. Associate trainee and technical associate.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: College premises have the best infrastructure. Here, we maintain Wi-Fi for each floor, which has its own Wi-Fi. The labs and classrooms are well-maintained. AC is only available in the library, laboratory, and computer labs. In the classroom, there is no air conditioning available. Hostel food was fine to eat, but it was quite repetitive.
detailed_review.Faculty: Amazing teachers, highly qualified professionals, and doubts can be clarified. They can even teach in Tamil itself in case the student is incapable of understanding English. It follows Anna University curriculum, and now it's an autonomous college. Students were trained practically in my department. They were instructed to do so. There is no difficulty in passing the semester, and our batch's pass percentage is 93 percent.
detailed_review.Other: I am quite interested in electronics, so I have chosen electronics and communication engineering. In ECE, we can try for both electronics core jobs and IT jobs.

reviews.course: B.E. in Electronics and Communication Engineering
reviews.review_title: No value for money, the worst management, with poor infrastructure.

detailed_review.Placements: More companies will come to college, 50 percent will get placed, and the salary will be around 4LPA. The core ECE companies are low, and you cannot expect more companies. Students will get internship guidance from the intern in charge and the embedded staff.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Very poor facility and management, we have to clean the rooms, there is no proper room service, the food will be okay, not much, and no proper sports ground. If we complain about anything to the management, there will be no proper response from the management, and mainly, to have this all, we need a hostel, but here there is no hostel. We have moved to 3 places without proper facilities provided by the management. Very worst hostel facility.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers are not qualified as they recruit teachers with less experience as the salary is less for them, and they can teach you, but you will not have more beyond the scope. They explain the concepts but some staff do not teach and the exam will be tough.

reviews.course: B.E. in Electronics and Communication Engineering
reviews.review_title: My college is pleasant, and I am satisfied with faculty’s teaching methods.

detailed_review.Placements: According to November, more than 350 students get placed, which is about 40 percent of the students in my batch. The highest package is from Amazon for the SDE role, which is about 23 LPA, while the lowest is about 3 LPA and the average is about 6 LPA. Foxconn and ZF are the recruiting companies that come for my course. Almost every student attends internships, ranging from startups to reputable companies. Design Engineer and Verilog Designer are the top roles in my course.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: In my department, we have a Wi-Fi connection in our block. There are a sufficient number of labs to perform course-related activities. Classrooms are properly cleaned, but they are non-AC. If a student faces any health issues, they are first treated with first aid, and if anything serious occurs, they are taken to the hospital. The mess and canteen are maintained clean and hygienic. Cultural events are conducted on campus, and intercollege sports matches are also organized.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers are helpful, qualified, and knowledgeable. The teaching quality is quite understandable. My course is relevant to the curriculum. It helps students gain the necessary knowledge as it follows the Anna University Autonomous syllabus. It is easy to prepare for the semester exams, and the pass percentage is about 50 percent.
detailed_review.Other: I have an interest in electronics, which is why I have chosen this course. By selecting this course, I am able to attend placements from the IT sector and the core sector. Events, fests, campus activities, connectivity programs, campus gatherings, scholarships, and extracurricular activities are conducted by the college.

reviews.course: B.E. in Electronics and Communication Engineering
reviews.review_title: Average college with good exposure, they help in research and other stuff.

detailed_review.Placements: Good placement support, 50% of students placed so far. Almost 100% of students got internships. Amazon, Kaar Technologies, and other companies are the top recruiting companies. The highest package ever secured was 44 LPA, and the lowest hasn't been disclosed.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Good laboratories, well-equipped faculty members, and smart TV-equipped classrooms and libraries with a huge number of books for reference. Centralized Wi-Fi access, well-equipped labs, and classrooms. Classrooms contain either a projector or a smart TV for presentation and teaching.
detailed_review.Faculty: At the moderate level, teaching and faculty. The course curriculum is moderate and industry-relevant. The semester exams are mostly easy. The pass percentage is average, around 80%. Curriculum can be improved, and they're a bit hard for the core and circuit branches.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Artificial Intelligence and Data Science
reviews.review_title: Really good infrastructure.

detailed_review.Placements: Placements are good in our college. 95 percent of the students got placed in our college. The highest package is 44 LPA, the lowest package is 3 LPA, and the average package is 5 LPA. Infosys, Cognizant, TCS, Wipro, Zoho, Virtusa, Microsoft, Google, Hyundai, and Tata Electronics are visiting our college.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Infrastructure is also good. The facilities are extraordinary. Wi-Fi is available in labs, classrooms, and in the library. Hostel food is also good. Canteen food is affordable, and the food quality is also good in the canteen. Medical facilities are also available inside the campus.
detailed_review.Faculty: Faculty members are very helpful to the students. The curriculum is also good and related to the industry. Semester exams are a little bit tough. Internally, there are three exams: CAT 1, CAT 2, and CAT 3, and the assignment marks are considered. Semester exams are easy to pass and to score more marks.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Artificial Intelligence and Data Science
reviews.review_title: Good college for placements.

detailed_review.Placements: Placements are good, and the highest package is 44 LPA. Many top companies visit for campus interviews, and the placement percentage is 95 percent. The average salary package is 4 LPA. Companies like Infosys, Cognizant, TCS, Wipro, Zoho, Virtusa, Microsoft, Google, and Hyundai visit our college.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The infrastructure in our college is also good. Wi-Fi is available throughout the campus, in classrooms as well as in the library. Hostel infrastructure is good, but the boys’ hostel is not inside the campus. Food is also good in the mess and canteen. Medical facilities, sports, and games are also good.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers are very helpful, qualified, and knowledgeable. The quality of teaching is also good. The curriculum is relevant to the industry and makes the students ready. Semester exams are easy, and the pass percentage in semester exams is 95 percent.

reviews.course: B.E. in Computer Science and Engineering (AI and ML)
reviews.review_title: Success is not a destination, success is a journey.

detailed_review.Placements: The Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning department has strong placement results, with a 97% placement rate in 2024, many companies visit the campus for recruitment. While specific figures for the AIML programme aren't detailed, it contributes to the overall B.Tech placement.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: More than 8 lakh square feet of space in Chennai is set up to house all the classrooms, drawing halls, laboratories, workshops, and technology, hosting more than 700 computers, an administrative block, and NDA exception. The college has separate hostel facilities for boys and girls and is equipped with all modern amenities.
detailed_review.Faculty: The course aims to build expertise in Data Science, Machine Learning, Deep Learning, and related subfields of Artificial Intelligence. There is a Centre for Data Science and Artificial Intelligence in RIT to support research projects, practical and hands-on lab training, workshops, and seminars.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Artificial Intelligence and Data Science
reviews.review_title: Good college for placement.

detailed_review.Placements: Placements are excellent at this college. The highest package is 44 LPA. Microsoft, Amazon, Virtusa, IBM, ZF, Hyundai, Kaar Technologies, etc., are visiting our college. Placement cell is always active in our college. Our college is consistently gives 95% placements.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: I am a hosteller, there are three hostels in this college IMA hostel, RIT hostel, and RMC hostel. When I am a fresher, they allotted RMC hostel for all boys and some girls also. Basically RMC is a medical college under Rajalakshmi, and its infrastructure is best compared to other hostels.
detailed_review.Faculty: Faculty members are very good. In 1st year, after going to higher semesters maybe due to the hardness of the teaching may be difficult to understand. Exams are corrected by the staff themselves, and they pass everyone, if there is content in the sheet.

reviews.course: B.E. in Computer Science and Engineering (AI and ML)
reviews.review_title: Success is not a destination, and it is a journey.

detailed_review.Placements: The average salary package offered in Rajalakshmi Institute of Technology ranges from 4-7 LPA. Some top recruiting companies include Altair, Amazon, Hexaware Technologies, and IBM. The highest package offered at Rajalakshmi Institute of Technology is 44 LPA.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Rajalakshmi Institute of Technology provides separate hostel facilities for both boys and girls within the campus, offering a conducive environment for academic pursuits. Hostels are equipped with dining halls, internet access, and medical assistance.
detailed_review.Faculty: Faculty members at Rajalakshmi Institute of Technology are known for their strong academic backgrounds and industry experience, with many holding doctoral degrees. They have extensive corporate training experience. They are dedicated to providing students with a high-quality education.

reviews.course: B.E. in Computer Science and Engineering (AI and ML)
reviews.review_title: Review of Rajalakshmi Institute of Technology.

detailed_review.Placements: In 2023, RIT achieved a 97% placement rate, with 275 students placed. The median package for placed students in 2023 was 5 LPA. The highest package was 44 LPA. The AIML program at REC, which is affiliated with RIT, also boasts a solid placement record.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: RIT provides a range of infrastructure facilities for both academic and residential purposes. These include well-equipped classrooms, laboratories, a library, a computer centre, and a sports complex. For students residing in the hostel, RIT offers water supply, Internet, and a 24/7 medical facility.
detailed_review.Faculty: RIT offers a structured curriculum with experienced and friendly faculty. Students maintain discipline and regularly attend classes. Examinations are conducted under strict guidelines, with mobile phones prohibited in academic blocks and laboratories.

reviews.course: B.E. in Computer Science and Engineering (AI and ML)
reviews.review_title: Success is not a destination, success is a journey.

detailed_review.Placements: The highest package of this campus is 44 LPA and the lowest package of this campus is 7 LPA. The college attracts top recruiters from the IT, AI, and data science sectors. Recruiting companies are Wipro, Amazon, and Infosys. Approximately 90 percent of the students in the course secure placements.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The college provides separate hostels for boys and girls with dining halls, internet and washing machines. This RIT campus is affiliated with Anna University, Chennai. The college presently offers 18 undergraduate and 9 postgraduate programmes including an MBA programme.
detailed_review.Faculty: RIT boasts experienced faculty members in various engineering disciplines. The curriculum is designed to meet industry standards and is regularly updated. This campus curriculum includes a strong focus on developing core engineering skills, as well as soft skills and communication abilities.

reviews.course: B.E. in Computer Science and Engineering (AI and ML)
reviews.review_title: Success is not a destination, success is a journey.

detailed_review.Placements: Our college has good placements. We got last year 45 LPA, the highest package of our college. The average package is 3.5 LPA. Top recruiting companies are Tata Consultancy, L&T, Amazon, Google, etc. For B.E course, it has 44 LPA package is the highest.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: We have Wi-Fi in every block. Classrooms are digital. We have Wi-Fi and washing machines are available in our hostel. Hostel food is average. The canteen is available in the hostel and campus.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers are well qualified and knowledgeable. They are very helpful in clarifying doubts. The semester question paper is medium and hard. There are three CAT exams and one semester. The pass percentage is 40% for internal, and 60% for external exams. Faculty members are good and very helpful in teaching and doubt clarification.

reviews.course: B.E. in Mechanical Engineering
reviews.review_title: The pro is that it is a good college, and the con is campus is small.

detailed_review.Placements: Our college has good placement records with above 95%. Top companies like Amazon, Tata Consultancy Services, Wipro, Zoho, etc., visit the college for placements. The maximum package is 44 LPA. The average package is 5 LPA. Placement training starts from 2 years onwards, and overall, it is worth it.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: It has a good centre of excellence. There are 14 centres in the college. Our college has a center for artificial intelligence, a center for smart manufacturing, a center for mobility and energy, a center for data science, a center for Apple, and a center for AR/VR. It has 8 balanced centers.
detailed_review.Faculty: Our college has good faculty members with a friendly teaching methodology. It has a good curriculum based on hands-on work and activity-based learning. The exam cell is very good. According to the semester, exams are a total of 100 marks, 40 marks from internals, and the remaining 60 are taken from the end-semester exam.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Artificial Intelligence and Data Science
reviews.review_title: Once visit the college before admission and then choose.

detailed_review.Placements: In our college, placement is very good. Many of the skilled students get placed every year. Placement assist is far good than expected. They also provide a placement training program for the students from the first year itself. We can use this kind of chance to be skilled.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: College infrastructure is good and that is not that much big and enough as we want. I am not a hosteller so I don't know about hostel facilities. As for hostel friends, it is good for their preference and day scholors are strictly not allowed in hostel and hostel mess food.
detailed_review.Faculty: Staffs in our college are really good at their teaching and they are supportive. They guide us to choose the right path in academics. CAT exams are conducted once a month and that also not that much hectic. We can also enhance our knowledge by accessing the library.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Artificial Intelligence and Data Science
reviews.review_title: A journey of growth and learning at Rajalakshmi Institute of Technology.

detailed_review.Placements: 90% of students were placed in top companies like Amazon, Wipro, and Infosys. The highest package offered to a student was 44 lakhs per annum, while the minimum package for placements was above 6 lakhs per annum. 70 to 80% of students got internships for the course.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The infrastructure includes well-constructed classrooms, a library, a laboratory, and free ethernet access for both students and faculty members on campus. The hostel food is average in taste, lacking additional flavor, but it is healthy. The playgrounds are spacious enough for students to enjoy some time playing with friends.
detailed_review.Faculty: Faculty members were very kind to the students and created a good friendly bond with us to make and shape our future very well and shape us to lead in a well-settled and disciplined manner. The course is very relevant and makes students ready for the industry.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Artificial Intelligence and Data Science
reviews.review_title: It is a good college with a good education.

detailed_review.Placements: For nearly 90% of students placed in our course. The highest package is 44 LPA and the lowest package is 7 LPA. Wipro, Amazon, Infosys, and many more are top recruiting companies. The AI & this program offers strong placement support with top recruiters from IT, AI, and data sectors. Students get placed in leading companies through campus drives, internships, and training.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The college provides smart classrooms, advanced computer labs with AI tools, and high-speed internet. Hostel facilities include spacious rooms, Wi-Fi, study areas, dining, and 24/7 security. They ensure a comfortable and focused learning environment.
detailed_review.Faculty: The B.Tech artificial intelligence and data science program features expert faculty. The curriculum blends AI, ML, data analytics, and programming. It is evaluated through continuous assessment, lab work, and end-semester university exams. The pass marks are 50 out of 100.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Artificial Intelligence and Data Science
reviews.review_title: Good college for academic students.

detailed_review.Placements: As I heard all the things are good. They have contact with big companies that offer a good placement with a maximum salary. As our senior brother was placed in a big company with 44 LPA. Regarding placement, our college is the best. Also, our college is best for AI&this course.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: According to the course, all the facilities are good. Poor quality of the hostel room, food, and mess all the places are very bad. Also, bathrooms are bad. All the things in the hostel are missing. According to me, hostel is good with friends but all the others are bad.
detailed_review.Faculty: Few teachers are helpful for exams few do not even care for us. Few of them are clear about their work. Others don't even teach anything and give extra marks in exams, I think so 45 out of 100 is the passing mark. Difficult when compared to other colleges.

reviews.course: B.E. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: I'm satisfied with my college.

detailed_review.Placements: I was looking forward to this year's placements but they were mostly disappointing as very few people got placed and I think it was maybe 2 or 3 members from my department. I had high hopes because the last batch had many people who got placed. I think they are trying hard because this year we were collaborating with so many companies and we were given so many internship offers. I'm looking forward.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Honesty, our hostel is really bad. We don't have washing machines and our hostel rooms are not clean. The food is decent. Going out is hard, and the hostel wardens are arrogant and act very rude and according to their ego. Our classrooms are not cleaned, and our complaints go silent; no action is taken.
detailed_review.Faculty: The exams are really good and they test your knowledge and skills but the faculty is not the best. We aren't given proper notes and they make very little effort to give us proper lectures. It doesn't matter if you take any course all the subjects are common.
detailed_review.Other: The college is very lively, and the fest is really fun and entertaining. Although the campus is really small it's fun to walk around. It would be great if there were extra stationery shops that would be helpful.

reviews.course: B.E. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: They are creating an innovation.

detailed_review.Placements: Placements are good for students who have scored like 7.5 CGPA above and last year's placements were good. Many seniors secured positions in top companies such as Wipro, TCS, and Amazon. The highest package offered was 45 lakhs, which is the top package at our college, while the lowest package was 3.5 lakhs.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The infrastructure of the college is good. The college has a good and very peaceful environment. The hostel is very good, and a Wi-Fi connection is also provided which is good. The food is average and the hostel is also good.
detailed_review.Faculty: Every month we have three CAT tests which play a main role in internal marks assignments. They will also contain internal marks and one subject will contain five units. Every unit will have an assignment and attendance should be 75%.

admission.title: Rajalakshmi Institute of Technology Admission Overview 2026
admission.overview_text: Rajalakshmi Institute of Technology (RIT Chennai) admissions are merit-based. The institute offers admission to BE/ BTech courses in a full-time mode in affiliation with Anna University . The college also provides direct admission to the second year of the course through Lateral Entry. Rajalakshmi Institute of Technology admission process is conducted as per TNEA norms. Candidates must apply and participate in TNEA Counselling for the final seat allotment at RIT Chennai . Besides, the institute also offers a two-year ME in Electronics & Communication (VLSI Design). More details around Rajalakshmi Institute of Technology admissions are elaborated in the article below.

faqs.question: Does Rajalakshmi Institute of Technology offers admission under Management Quota?
faqs.answer: Candidates can apply for admission under Management Quota at Rajalakshmi Institute of Technology. The institute considers JEE scores for admission in this case. Aspirants must also meet the eligibility requirements to get a seat in the BE/ BTech programmes via Management Quota. Candidates have to apply directly on the institute's website or connect with the admission office for the form.

faqs.question: Which entrance exam is accepted by Rajalakshmi Institute of Technology?
faqs.answer: No, there is no entrance exam required for admission to RIT Chennai. For admission to UG course in Engineering at RIT Chennai, candidates need to fulfil the basic eligibility requirements of the programme at the time of applying for admission. Moreover, the eligible candidates need to apply for TNEA counselling for the seat allotment. However, the institute do considers JEE score for Merit Management admissions.

faqs.question: What is the eligibility criteria for admission to B.Tech at Rajalakshmi Institute of Technology?
faqs.answer: To be eligible for a four-year BTech course at Rajalakshmi Institute of Technology, candidates need to fulfil the basic eligibility requirements of the programme. Aspirants are required to qualify HSc (academic and vocational) with a minimum of 50% aggregate (for General category). The minimum percentage vary for other category candidates. Find it below:

faqs.question: Who can apply for lateral entry at Rajalakshmi Institute of Technology?
faqs.answer: Candidates must have a Diploma in relevant branch to apply for lateral entry to BE/ BTech programmes at Rajalakshmi Institute of Technology. Aspirants must have scored at least 50% in Diploma to apply for lateral entry. Below is the aggregate requirement for reserved category candidates: Note: Candidates belonging to communities other than SC/ ST should have passed the qualifying exam within two attempts.

faqs.question: How can I get admission in Rajalakshmi Institute of Technology?
faqs.answer: Rajalakshmi Institute of Technology admissions are merit-based. Candidates interested for admission to RIT Chennai must meet the basic educational requirements of the course they are applying for. Moreover, admission to BE/ BTech courses at RIT Chennai done through TNEA Counselling. The eligible candidates need to apply and appear for the counselling process for the final college and seat allotment.

faqs.question: Is Lateral Entry admission available at RIT Chennai?
faqs.answer: RIT Chennai offers direct admission to the second year of BTech/ B.E. programmes through Lateral Entry. In this course, students can skip the first year and take admission directly in the second year of the programme. For admission to Lateral Entry programmes, candidates must have a valid Diploma in the relevant branch.

faqs.question: How do I get admission to B.Tech at Rajalakshmi Institute of Technology?
faqs.answer: To get admission to B.E./ BTech course at Rajalakshmi Institute of Technology, candidates must fulfil the minimum eligibility requirements of the programme. Admission to BTech course at RIT Chennai is based on the merit of last qualifying exam of Class 12. Further, RIT Chennai accepts the TNEA scores for admission to its BE and BTech programmes. The admissions are done through the TNEA counselling.

faqs.question: What BTech specialisations does RIT Chennai offer?
faqs.answer: RIT Chennai offers BTech course across three specialisations, namely Biotechnology , Artificial Intelligence & Data Science and Computer Science and Business Systems. Further, the institute also offers a four-year B.E. programme in followin seven specialisations:

faqs.question: What is the last date to register for TNEA counselling?
faqs.answer: The Directorate of Technical Education, Tamil Nadu will release the TNEA 2026 counselling process dates for registration, assignment of random numbers, Certificate verifications, rank list publication, and finally, the counselling. The counselling rounds will include steps like Choice Filling, Allotment, Confirmation of Allotment, and Reporting to the College/TFC and payment of fees depending upon their confirmation. BE/B.Tech admission in Tamil Nadu is done based on the online counselling process called TNEA. There is no state-level entrance exam for admission in Tamil Nadu. Candidates have to register and appear for the online Tamil Nadu Engineering Admissions TNEA counselling held every year. 10+2 passed/appearing candidates can apply for TNEA counselling. Admission will be based on marks obtained by the candidates in the relevant subjects, namely, Maths Physics and Chemistry which will be reduced to 200 (Maths 100, Physics 50 and Chemistry 50).

college_info.college_name: Rajalakshmi Institute of Technology Photos & Videos

facilities.name: Library
facilities.description:
Rajalakshmi Institute of Technology's library has a rich collection of 18328 volumes of textbooks and reference books in all branches of engineering, science, technology, management and general studies. All the books in the library are bar-coded; bar code system is followed in all transactions of the library. The college has a subscription of 38 printed national journals and 26 magazines including the subscription of IEEE online. The Electronic Library section also has a rich collection of more than 900 CD-ROMs. The library is well equipped with computerized On-line Public Access Catalogue (OPAC).

The books are classified according to the Dewey decimal classification system. Open access system is followed in the library.

facilities.name: Cafeteria
facilities.description: Institute have Cafeteria with modern facilities within the campus and is open for staff, students and visitors. It has seating capacity in excess of 500 serves healthy and hygienic food.

facilities.name: Hostel
facilities.description: All the hostels are provided with dining halls, uninterrupted water supply, reading halls, Internet connection, indoor recreation, television, and 24/7 medical facility. Each room have attached bathroom facility.

facilities.name: Sports Complex
facilities.description: Rajalakshmi Institute of Technology provides indoor facilities for chess, carom, table tennis, badminton and outdoor facilities for volleyball, football, cricket, kho-kho, kabaddi. Students sent for participating in the Inter-collegiate sports and games have won many trophies in various events.

facilities.name: Gym
facilities.description: Institute has a central gym with fitness centre facilities - treadmill, exercise bikes and more of the latest fitness equipment.

facilities.name: Shuttle Service
facilities.description: Institute provides bus transport facility to various parts of the city.

highlights.summary: Established in 1995, Rajeev Gandhi Memorial College of Engineering and Technology is also known as RGM College is located in Kurnool, Andhra Pradesh. The institute offers courses like B.E. / B.Tech, M.E./M.Tech, MBA/PGDM and MCA. These courses are offered in Full Time mode. A total of 23 courses offered by the Institute are available across streams such as Engineering, Business & Management Studies and IT & Software. The institute has all the necessary facilities to the students.

RGM College Reviews on Placements, Faculty & Facilities

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Electrical and Electronics Engineering
reviews.review_title: Well-structured campus with good facilities and placement support.

detailed_review.Placements: About 70-80 percent of students at RGMCET got placed. The highest package is around 6 LPA-10 LPA, with an average of 3.5 LPA-5 LPA. Top recruitments include Infosys, Cognigent (CTS), TCS, and HCL. Nearly 60-70 percent of students get internships in IT Roles, mainly as developers and analysts.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The infrastructure at RGMCET is good with well-maintained classrooms, Wi-Fi, computer labs, and a decent library. Hostel facilities are comfortable and kept clean. Mess food is good and hygienic. The campus also provides basic medical facilities along with good sports and recreation areas.
detailed_review.Faculty: The faculty at RGMCET are helpful, well-qualified, and explain concepts clearly, making the classes engaging. The curriculum is updated and industry-oriented, giving students good practical exposure. Semester exams are moderately difficult, but with regular preparation, the pass percentage is consistently high.
detailed_review.Other: I chose this course at RGMCET because of its strong academic reputation and good placement support. The campus has a positive environment with active fests, cultural events, and technical activities that keep students engaged. Connectivity, the college is decent, and the campus surroundings are peaceful. Extracurricular opportunities, clubs, and sports events help students improve their skills beyond academics. I feel the course could include more hands-on workshops, but overall, the experience is very good.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: Good infrastructure, supportive faculty, and decent placements with scope for industry exposure.

detailed_review.Placements: In the last passing batch of B.Tech CSE, around 75% of students were placed. The highest package was 21 LPA. The average package was 4.5 to 5.2 LPA. The lowest was 3 LPA. Top recruiters included Amazon, TCS, Infosys, Wipro, Delta X, and Oracle. About 70% of students secured internships in tech roles.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Our college provides snacks and meals at reasonable prices. Medical facilities include a campus healthcare center with visiting doctors. Sports facilities include cricket, kabaddi, volleyball, basketball, kho-kho, and indoor games like chess for student recreation.
detailed_review.Faculty: Faculty members are well-qualified and very supportive when it comes to studies and other technical work. Co-curricular activities also take place on time, but mostly, the main focus is on studies. The course curriculum is relevant to the latest industry requirements, which helps make students job-ready. The semester exams can be managed easily by regular studying or by studying just before the exam. It totally depends on the student’s ability to grasp the concepts.
detailed_review.Other: Our college is friendly and diverse. It is well-connected to the city and has decent surroundings. Scholarships are available based on merit and EAMCET and E-CET scores. Extracurricular activities include clubs for dance, singing, as well as hackathons, HackerRank, and LeetCode, which add to a balanced student life.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Electronics and Communication Engineering
reviews.review_title: It is really good infrastructure, good faculty, and good in extracurricular activities.

detailed_review.Placements: Just 5 or 4 members are placed. 20 LPA is the highest, and 5 LPA is the lowest package. HCL and TCS are the recruiting companies. Top offer company is TCS. Seniors are placed in different companies. For the juniors, there will be training for the next placement offers at my college.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Infrastructure is common for all branches. Good facilities, clean, neat, peaceful. Food is very good compared to other hostels. There will be a peaceful lawn in the hostel, and food will also be provided for parents. Some programs will be held during festivals, freshers, and farewell for seniors. Even celebrities came to our college during fests.
detailed_review.Faculty:
Some faculty are good at explaining. Some other faculty were the best at encouraging in other activities, and they were good at communication.
Even faculty from different states have come to teach classes for us.
Good bond for us in my college, and they are also very friendly to talk and clear our doubts about the subjects.
detailed_review.Other: It is the best college in Kurnool.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: The teachers are experienced and highly qualified.

detailed_review.Placements: Nearly 60% of students are placed in our course. The highest package is 8 LPA, the lowest package is 4 LPA, and the average package is 6 LPA. The top recruiting companies are TCS, Cognizant, Hexaware, and Deltax. 50% of students got internships in our course through respective interviews.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Facilities provided in our college are Wi-Fi, classrooms, library, canteen, CAD lab, and bookshop. The facilities in our hostel are Wi-Fi, washing machine, CCTV, food, and TV. The food in the canteen is nice, with reasonable prices and good quality. The medical facilities are also available in our college.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers are experienced with high qualifications. With so much experience, the way they are teaching is very useful, which helps us in semester exams. The course I have taken is relevant to my future. The difficulty level in our exams is very easy to pass. The pass percentage is 75%.
detailed_review.Other: Because of my interest, I have chosen this course. The things I need to improve on are teaching. The events conducted in our college are very interesting and sportive. It is one of the biggest opportunities for every student.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: Satisfied with campus life and placements, with an average experience with some faculty.

detailed_review.Placements: In 2025 our batch had good placements but the packages offered are based on salaries ranging from 4 LPA above to 4 LPA below. Placement training will be offered by the college and assistance will be provided by TPO. We got CTS Capgemini TCS Coditas Wipro and some other companies.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: RGM hostels are known for tasty food, hygiene, and a clean environment. With feels around 1 Lacs, they offer great value. A large ground supports sports and co-curricular activities, making it ideal for both comfort and overall development. I recommend it.
detailed_review.Faculty: Earlier, teaching quality at RGM was excellent, but it has declined recently due to staff changes. However, the department remains supportive, encouraging student growth, learning, and participation in various academic activities. Semester exams are easy to moderate.
detailed_review.Other: It was near the highway and a peaceful place with plants and trees.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Electrical and Electronics Engineering
reviews.review_title: Satisfying experience, friendly faculty, good placements, and very well maintained.

detailed_review.Placements: My experience at Rajeev Gandhi Memorial College of Engineering and Technology has been truly memorable so far. Every year, 90% of students are placed in top MNCs with an average package of around 12 LPA. Top companies like Google, Cognizant, Infosys, etc., appear for recruitment every year.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Laboratories are well-equipped with computers and machinery. The classrooms have digital screens for easy teaching and proper understanding for the students. The internet is available all over the college campus, and the library is open to everyone till 8:00 PM. Hostel food is pretty decent, with a different variety of food every day and snacks every evening. Sports events are held every semester.
detailed_review.Faculty: All the faculty members are qualified with a Ph.D., and everyone is friendly and helps with everything. Teaching is detailed and easily understandable. The curriculum is pretty simple, which keeps students hooked to the system and doesn't get one bored. The pass percentage is around 83%. Semester exams are quite difficult but not so tough to crack.
detailed_review.Other: What I appreciate is the inclusive and very supportive environment created by the college authorities. Students from different places and family backgrounds come together to create a home away from home. Overall, our college offers a proper blend of education and cultural activities, sports, and events.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: Placements are good and if we are studying well, then definitely it is worth it here.

detailed_review.Placements: Students of talented and disciplined all get placed. The highest package is 12 LPA and the lowest package is 2 LPA. The average package ranges from 4-5 LPA. Companies like Tech Mahindra, Wipro, Cognizant, and TCS have been visited recently. Many students got internships.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The infrastructure is very good. It has a very nice library and well-equipped labs. A new block is under construction and almost finished. When it is available, there will be huge labs and classrooms with the best infrastructure. It is expected to inaugurate a new block in 3-4 months.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers are very good. All faculty members are well experienced. All faculty members are PhD holders. They are very talented and friendly with students. They help us a lot. Teachers help for internship purposes also. Mainly CSE faculty members are very good in both teaching and are friendly.
detailed_review.Other: Events and extracurricular activities are conducted very often.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Electronics and Communication Engineering
reviews.review_title: I'm satisfied. I would recommend someone to choose our college.

detailed_review.Placements: 80% of students got placed in various reputed companies. The highest package is 10 LPA and the lowest package is 4 LPA. Top recruiting companies are Meesho, Spring Works, Capgemini, Accenture, Hexaware, TCS, Tech Mahindra, etc. 100% got internships. Top roles offered are software engineer, data engineer, and data analyst.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: College have quality education with good infrastructure like labs, classrooms, digital boards, and libraries. Everything is good and the ambulance service is also there for anytime emergency.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers are helpful, qualified, and available during college hours, and guide well. The teaching quality is extraordinary.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Civil Engineering
reviews.review_title: Satisfied because of faculty and their quality education.

detailed_review.Placements: 50% of students were placed in the course. The highest package offered was 6 LPA and the lowest package was 3 LPA. The top recruiting companies were Steel Cube, Raster Technology, and Capgemini. 100% of students got internships in construction companies like Bharath Builders and Developers, etc. The top roles were in architecture.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Labs, classrooms, and the library, along with proficient lecturers, were available. The quality of food was good, with no restrictions or limits. An ambulance was also available. Sports and games were also conducted by the college. The environment was very good. I would suggest this college to those who were really interested in gaining knowledge.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers were qualified and giving quality education. The course curriculum was relevant and giving practical experience also. The semester exams were based on all students, it be like moderate, some tough, and others easy. The overall pass percentage was 90%.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering (Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning)
reviews.review_title: It is an absolutely good college with good infrastructure, but the placement percentage is low.

detailed_review.Placements: 20% of students are placed in my course. 15 LPA is the highest, 5 LPA to 8 LPA is the average, and 3 LPA is the lowest. Capgemini, Google, and Tech Mahindra are the top recruiting companies. 40 to 60% of students get internships in the above-mentioned companies.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Our college includes labs, Wi-Fi facilities, classrooms, and a huge library with good infrastructure. The hostel is very secure, with healthy food provided. The medical facilities are splendid. Sports and games are also provided. They encourage us to participate in tournaments.
detailed_review.Faculty: The teaching quality is spectacular. They provide us with many online software tools. A well-managed curriculum is provided. By participating in presentations and hackathons. The teaching quality is good, it’s easy to pass the semester.
detailed_review.Other: As I am very interested in technology, AI/ML is the best course. Our seniors are very helpful. They teach us many things about our course. They conduct ripples, farewells, one-day hackathons, etc. By EAMCET and JEE, we can join this college or we can join by paying fees. They have to improve the course with good practical experiments.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: The college campus is good and peaceful. Faculty is friendly to everyone.

detailed_review.Placements: Many companies visit the college. Around 70% of students got selected in my course. The highest salary package offered is 11 LPA. The average salary package offered is 4 LPA. Cognizant and HCL are the most-top recruiting companies. In Cognizant, around 50% of students got internships. Software developer, Java developer, and program analyst roles are offered in my course.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The infrastructure of my college is very peaceful. Smartboards, Wi-Fi, labs, and a big library are there. In the hostel, the food is good and tasty. All good facilities are there. There is an ambulance for emergency purposes. There is a huge ground. Every year, the college conducts a sports day.
detailed_review.Faculty: Faculty members are very friendly to everyone. Their way of explanation is very attractive. They explain everything with real-time examples. Most of the professors are Ph.D. doctorates. The course curriculum is very interesting. It helps me to prepare for placements. Semesters are good. Sometimes, it might be difficult. The passing mark is 32.
detailed_review.Other: I chose computer science engineering because I want to become a software engineer. In the recent world, this course has a huge demand. They need to put some more hands-on in this course and practical coding also. Many events are done in my college like fresher parties, sports day, and extracurricular activities.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Electronics and Communication Engineering
reviews.review_title: Provide good faculty in each department.

detailed_review.Placements: The percentage of students placed in your course is 50%. The lowest package is 3.3 LPA and the highest package is 7 LPA offered in our course. Top recruiting companies are Wipro, HCL, Tech Mahindra, Hexaware. 50% of students got internships from our course.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Wi-Fi is available now. In hostels, once upon a time, there were no cameras, but now cameras are available. Labs, classrooms, and the library are very good. Now the library is very good. In the hostel, there is no quality food. Weekly, thrice the food is not good. Except for the hostel food, all are good.
detailed_review.Faculty: The teachers are very helpful at the time of exams and clarify doubts. Some teachers are not good because they do not have good knowledge. Some teachers have just completed M. Tech, and those teachers come to class to teach the lessons. There are no knowledgeable persons. During exam time, the college is very strict. If, in case, cheating is identified during the exam, all exams will fail.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Electronics and Communication Engineering
reviews.review_title: Endless nights at RGM college.

detailed_review.Placements: College provides placements and training is provided to students according to their specialization. Students who scored a CGPA of 7 and above are eligible for attending placements. Around 65%-70% of students got placed. The average salary package offered is 4.2 LPA and the highest salary package offered is 9.8 LPA. Top recruiting companies visited in previous year were TCS, Cognizant, Accenture, IBM, Wipro, HCL, and Tech Mahindra.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: College feels fresh and pleasant. Environment is very good. There are grounds for sports like cricket, basketball, and badminton court. Hostel rooms are provided with free Wi-Fi. Classrooms are digital and libraries are also digitialised. Laundry is provided. Lockers are given in hostel rooms for students, bed, pillows, and carts are provided.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers are very adorable and highly qualified. Course is very relevant and the college even provides training for students and makes them prepared for placements. In each semester, there are two mid-term examinations along with lab internal and external exams.
detailed_review.Other: I opted for this college as it is a well-known college and sports facilities are very good and infrastructure is top notch. Whatever is needed for an engineering student is provided in college.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering (Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning)
reviews.review_title: Absolutely satisfied because of faculty, good placements in 2024.

detailed_review.Placements: Maximum percent for branch 5 to 10 members, the lowest 2.5 LPA and the highest 18 LPA. Amazon software, etc. At most of the students are doing eduskills like AWS offered by Microsoft. Artificial intelligence and machine learning (AI) is the present and future course for the students.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Wi-Fi, labs, classes, library in all places, total around Wi-Fi is there and available. Courses are CSE general and sub-branches like AI/ML, cybersecurity, data science, etc. Sports are good, we have a large ground. Food is good at the canteen and hostel. All infrastructure is available for my course.
detailed_review.Faculty: Yes, teachers are friendly with students and provide proper guidance. Mostly, many students are ready for different activities with different materials. The difficulty is if we study well, we can gain knowledge and skills. Pass percentage is above 85-90%. Skill development.
detailed_review.Other: I chose AI/ML because I'm interested in robotics and also making machines in ML and prepared some material as well. I want to improve my practice in different ways. Events like Repil (2-day event) and a good crowd, good nature, campus, etc.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: Good experience at RGMCET.

detailed_review.Placements: About 75% of students were placed. The highest package offered is 15 LPA, and the lowest package offered is 2.5 LPA. Companies like Amazon, SAP, TCS, Hexaware, Accenture, Tech Mahindra, and so on are the top recruiting companies in our college. 25% of the students got internships in companies like Meesho, Amazon, and Hanya. Roles offered for our course are Associate Software Engineer, Software Engineer Trainee, and Data Engineer.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The facilities provided by our college, such as Wi-Fi, labs, classrooms, and libraries are excellent. There is a central library in our college that provides lots of knowledge for us. The food provided in our hostel is too good and healthy. They also provide free medical services. Every year there will be a sports meet in our college.
detailed_review.Faculty: The faculty in our department helps in every aspect regarding the course, lab, project, and so on. The course curriculum is very relevant to our course, and this curriculum helped us get the placements. The semester exams will be conducted twice in a year. 30 marks for internal and 70 marks for external for each semester. The pass percentage is 70%.
detailed_review.Other:
This course totally helped in reaching my goal.
And this college provided everything and helped in every aspect. The extracurricular activities gave me confidence. This college provided me a scholarship and awarded me a cash prize of 25k for the merit.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Electrical and Electronics Engineering
reviews.review_title: If you communicate well with everyone, you can join this college and have a bright future.

detailed_review.Placements: I'm pursuing Electrical and Electronics Engineering from RGM College of Engineering and Technology. Choosing an EEE is very good; it has a wider scope . Nearly 30% of students got placed in core sectors; they got 5LPA. And 40% of students got placed in IT sectors; they got 7LPA. TCS , Accenture, Wipro, Deloitte, and Zomato are the companies offered to us.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The college infrastructure has good classrooms and a big playground, and carries Wi-Fi on the campus. We have separate hostels for boys and girls. They will give us hygienic food. They don't allow us on the campus after 6 o’clock. The hostel is completely strict.
detailed_review.Faculty: Academic wise, college is completely good, and professors are also supportive of us. They are helpful to solve the queries of every student. All professors are highly skilled. The semester examinations will be conducted strictly under the cameras . If you concentrate well, you can easily score nearly 80%.
detailed_review.Other: I chose EEE because we have plenty of jobs in private and government sectors. It has good scope in India. I wish to improve the practical knowledge on their particular subject; we don't have events mostly.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Electronics and Communication Engineering
reviews.review_title: The campus life of RGMCET Nandyal.

detailed_review.Placements: In our branch, around 60% of students got placed in our college placements. The highest salary package offered is 5.5 LPA. The lowest salary package offered in our branch is 3.6 LPA. Recruiting companies like TCS, HCL, Cognizant, and Tech Mahindra visit our college. Some core companies like Tessolve, Semiconductors, and Smartsoc visit our college. These are ECE-related companies.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The campus and classrooms are spacious. Each block has separate buildings. The library has a separate building. It has around 70,000 books and IEE journals. Each department has its labs related to their course in their respective buildings. The canteen is available in our college. It provides a wide variety of food items and snacks. Medical facilities are available in our college. There is a separate group for sports and games.
detailed_review.Faculty: In our branch, all faculty members are friendly, experienced, and knowledgeable. They encourage students to ask any questions at any time. The teaching quality is good. They provide practical knowledge to implement in labs. Faculty members can deal with more than one subject. The pass percentage is 75%. It can vary with courses and subjects.
detailed_review.Other: Our college is good in terms of placement opportunities. It had engineering excellence for 25 years. The faculty members are very experienced and knowledgeable. Our college has a student activity club. It organises events and fests every 3 to 4 months. Expose, Hackathons, and quizzes are organised to encourage students and improve their skills. The campus surroundings are pleasant with a lot of trees. It is far away from the cities.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Electrical and Electronics Engineering
reviews.review_title: Very good facilities in the college.

detailed_review.Placements: There are a total of 120 students in our department. The highest package offered by the college is 6 LPA, and companies like Springs Works and Accenture have come for recruitment. Most of the students did internships with government websites. The top roles offered by the company are as process executives.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The facilities in the college are very good, and the labs are equipped with high-quality equipment. The library contains many books. The hostel facilities are also excellent, with very good food in the mess. The canteen serves delicious food and offers a variety of sports and games.
detailed_review.Faculty: The teachers are very qualified, and most of them are M.Tech graduates. The EEE course curriculum is relevant and prepares students to be industry-ready. The difficulty of the exams depends on the importance of the subject, and if we study the material, it will be easy to write the exams.
detailed_review.Other: I chose this course because of my rank in the government exam. I wish we could improve the theory aspect of the subjects more in college. For every three years, we will have RPL, which is related to sports.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Electrical and Electronics Engineering
reviews.review_title: Very good library, which contains most of the books, along with a canteen and labs.

detailed_review.Placements: Total 120 students are in our class. The highest package offered by the college is 6 LPA, and the companies that came to the college include Springs Works and Accenture. Most students got internships in different government websites, and the top role offered was process executive.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The facilities are well qualified, and all the lecturers are M.Tech graduates. All the labs, canteen, and library are well-equipped and fully Wi-Fi enabled. We have all the sports and games available in the college, and the food in the mess is also very good. Additionally, we have medical facilities.
detailed_review.Faculty: All the teachers are fully qualified, and all are M.Tech graduates. The EEE course curriculum is relevant and prepares students to be industry-ready. The difficulty of the subjects depends on their importance, but if we prepare well, the exams are not that difficult.
detailed_review.Other: I chose this course because of my EMCET rank. The best aspect of the course is the lab practicals. I wish I could improve the theoretical part of the course more for the GATE exams. Every three years, we have RPL, which is for sports.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Electronics and Communication Engineering
reviews.review_title: Apart from placement satisfaction, the college has good faculty, infrastructure.

detailed_review.Placements: Total, we have 240 members in our batch, divided into 4 sections of 60 members each. On average, 70% of us got jobs, but not in our related field or in IT. Most of us found jobs in call center roles at companies like Skillwinner and Teachnook, which are consulting firms. About 20% got placed in IT sectors, and only 5% found jobs in core companies. The top roles hired in our batch include process roles and software development roles. The average package in our batch is 4 LPA.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The infrastructure and weather at the college are good, and the facilities are also satisfactory. The hostel provides good food, and room maintenance is decent. The food menu is unique, with non-vegetarian options available 4-5 times a week.
detailed_review.Faculty: The faculty members are knowledgeable, and some junior lecturers work hard and are friendly with students. We have the freedom to approach faculty anytime on campus to discuss our doubts or suggestions for the future.
detailed_review.Other: For those interested in sports, the college offers good facilities and excellent coordination for games, providing a great mental relief.

college_info.college_name: Rathinam Technical Campus: Courses, Fees, Admission 2025, Placements, Reviews

highlights.summary: Rathinam Technical Campus is a private institute, established in 2011 in Coimbatore, Tamil Nadu. Rathinam Technical Campus is approved by AICTE and offers a total of 17 courses at UG and PG levels in 11 specialisations such as Agriculture & Farm Engineering, Artificial Intelligence & Machine Learning, Biomedical Engineering, Biotechnology Engineering and Civil Engineering. Furthermore, it offer courses such as B.E. / B.Tech, M.E./M.Tech, MBA/PGDM and MCA in Full Time mode. Rathinam Technical Campus fee structure includes a total tuition fee ranging from INR 2,00,000 to 2,10,000. Rathinam Technical Campus has an annual seat intake of 1506 for all the programmes. It offers courses, in streams such as Engineering, Business & Management Studies and IT & Software. As per the recent Rathinam Technical Campus placement records, the average median salary at the Institute is around INR 5,50,000. The institute has a safe and well-equipped campus with all the advanced facilities.

college_info_program.intro:
Rathinam Technical Campus popular programmes are BTech and MBA. BTech and MBA students are placed in top companies such as Accenture, TCS, Cognizant, and others. MBA students can become Managers, Team Leaders, or can go for other job profiles. BTech students can become Engineers, Team Leaders, or can even go for non-technical as well as technical job profiles. BTech and MBA students can join the following clubs to increase their skills:
Overall, Rathinam Technical Campus is one of the best colleges offering quality education to students. Below mentioned are some of the Rathinam Engineering College courses and their respective eligibility and Rathinam Engineering College fees:
