reviews.course: B.E in Computer Science and Engineering (Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning)
reviews.review_title: The college is like heaven.

detailed_review.Placements: In one classroom, half of the students are placed. The highest package is 50 LPA, the average is 25 LPA, and the lowest is 5 LPA. Recruiting companies are Tata, Wipro, etc. More than 50% of students got internships. HR roles are offered.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Classrooms are very neat and clean. There are Wi-Fi facilities and very good medical facilities. The hostel food is good. In hostel, they give you full freedom. They conduct cricket matches.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers are very knowledgeable and friendly. Semester exams are very easy more than 70% of students pass.
detailed_review.Other: I chose this course because it leads to good future . Nothing needs improvement. Every Friday they conduct event.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Artificial Intelligence and Data Science
reviews.review_title: Absolutely satisfied and worth of money.

detailed_review.Placements: Every year, a large number of prestigious organizations recruit from our campus, demonstrating our college's exceptional placement record. To make sure students are ready, the placement cell takes great initiative and regularly arranges training, seminars, etc. The average package is 4.8 LPA. Our college is a top choice for recruiters because of our solid industries and committed instructors.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The hostel's amenities are intended to give students a cozy and comfortable place to live. Every hostel block has leisure space, sanitary restrooms, and room accommodation. To accommodate a range of dietary requirements, the hostel mess foods are to be improved.
detailed_review.Faculty: A group of exceptionally skilled and knowledgeable instructors who are authorities in their domains oversee our course. Faculty members ensure that students acquire a well-rounded education by combining their academic expertise with real-world industry experience.
detailed_review.Other: Events and fests are organized monthly once related to both academic and non-academic.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Artificial Intelligence and Data Science
reviews.review_title: Good decent college, good placement, and decent infrastructure.

detailed_review.Placements: 60% of students got placed from my course. The highest package is 58 LPA and the lowest package is 3 LPA to 3.5 LPA. Top recruiting companies for my course are Hashagile, Autodesk, and Palo Alto. I didn't know how many percentage of students got internships.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The college's infrastructure is decent and neat. The Wi-Fi is decent, and the classrooms and library are decent and neat. The quality of the facilities in the hostel was good, and the food provided by the hostel was decent. Our college supports students in sports to achieve.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers are helpful, qualified, and knowledgeable. The teaching quality of teachers is good. The course curriculum is quite relevant and it makes the students industry-ready. The semester exams are quite easy if you study well, and the pass percentage is 50%.

reviews.course: B.E in Computer Science and Engineering (Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning)
reviews.review_title: I'm satisfied. Average placement, teaching is average, infrastructure is above average.

detailed_review.Placements: Placements in our college are not similar to advertisements. Internships are not offered for all students, only for toppers. The highest salary package is 48 LPA, and the lowest is 2 LPA. Only 4% of students are offered internships in our course. Zoho, IBM, and Amazon are the top recruiters in our college.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Facilities are not good. There are only 3 buildings in Rathinam Technical Campus. Hostel facilities are very good but the food is average. Wi-Fi is not good very bad. Labs are average. Classrooms are above average, library is good. If you want sports this college is a better choice.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers are very harsh and not very qualified. The teaching quality is average. Course curriculum is above average but doesn't make students industry-ready. Semester exams are easy. Pass percentage is 94%. There is nothing to say about faculty members. They provide a question bank for studies. They are not strict in the exam hall. The major punishment in our college is suspension. If you are late in college teachers borrow your ID card from you and for 1-2 days beg teachers, the only way to get back your ID card.
detailed_review.Other: I chose this course because of AI evolution. The best thing about the course is job opportunities are high in top MNCs. There are some students called intellect, raised smart, they are not under TNEA the only management and fees are high. Events are good but while demand is rise in another side, our college provide scholarships for SC students.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Information Technology
reviews.review_title: Basically, Rathinam College is student-friendly.

detailed_review.Placements: Rathinam College is one of the upcoming colleges in Coimbatore which is located in the South of Coimbatore. Mostly, all secured internships by our college. The highest salary package offered in 2024 was 48 LPA. Most students got placed at the minimum salary package of 4.6 LPA.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Hostel facilities are top-notch. At present, I stay in 4 sharing rooms that have enough space for regular activities. They provide bed and pillow which is good. Hostel has laundry facility for 4 days once. Coming to food quality, for food quality I will rate 3.5 stars. It is okay but it can be improved. The lunch meal they provide is good to eat Arisi Paruppu price is also good.
detailed_review.Faculty: Most faculty members are well-experienced and trained. Teaching skills and qualities are also good. Major faculty members are youngsters. They provide a question bank to study. Most questions come from question bank. According to the pass percentage, we write an exam of 100 marks, and above 50 is a passing mark. There's nothing to say bad about faculty members. Likewise in other institutes some are good and some are not that cool but overall faculty members are cool make friendly moves and treat students as their child.
detailed_review.Other: They provide scholarships for SC community and there are some students called 'Intellect' who pay 4 LPA to study with 100% placement. Mac laptop is also provided.

reviews.course: B.E. in Electronics and Communication Engineering
reviews.review_title: You can enjoy the college as well as studies in our college.

detailed_review.Placements: Many of them are placed with nearly 4.5 Lacs per annum at present, but before, they got a maximum amount of 8.5 Lacs per annum. Now, maybe the salary has reduced, but we might bring it to the maximum as it was before. The experience speaks about the salary—it will increase with higher experience.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Even if it is an emergency, they will make us go to the hospital in a vehicle. If any student is sick or has any problems, they are verified by the hostel warden and informed to the management so that those problems are resolved by the management. Neat and clean surroundings, daily cleaning of rooms and buildings, and extra infrastructure.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers are good at explaining the concepts to students. They take care of each and every student, looking at where they are lagging and solving the trouble within the students. This might help students overcome the problems they are facing.
detailed_review.Other: Lots of students are studying—nearly 1000 per year.

reviews.course: B.E. in Agriculture Engineering
reviews.review_title: Review of the fabulous Rathinam Technical Campus.

detailed_review.Placements: 90% of students were placed on many companies like Rently, Autodesk and many companies that take students from our college and not only IT courses, but agriculture students can also get placed on many IT companies. Various roles are offered, but no one is allowed to take on roles like product sales.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Wi-Fi facilities are provided for students in classrooms as well as hostels; the infrastructure is very good and more attractive; the library is 24/7 accessible; and a hybrid learning hub is created with good air conditioning that is also available and accessible 24/7.
detailed_review.Faculty: Faculty are more hubble and carrying people; they can take care of your studies, help you groom your skills and give you more stuff and training. The faculty members are all industrial experts; they are good and knowledgeable people.

reviews.course: B.E. in Computer Science and Engineering (Tamil)
reviews.review_title: Exploring Rathinam Technical Campus.

detailed_review.Placements: The placements are very excellent and they're the major ones on our campus. The placement training starts at the beginning of the third year. Everyone will have 100 percent placement and offers for their studies. Guaranteed placement will be available on campus.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The hostel is good and clean. The food is hygienic. The quality is super and excellent and I recommend it. The rooms will be available according to the package the students are selecting while joining the campus and the rooms are very clean and secure.
detailed_review.Faculty: The faculty and curriculum are excellent. The faculty members are friendly to us. And they behave properly with us. They are like our parents; they guide us, give us what we actually need, and we trust them. Actually, they were the superiors at handling us in the campus environment.
detailed_review.Other: Cultural fest is the best of the college.

reviews.course: B.E. in Biomedical Engineering
reviews.review_title: Absolutely worth the money, it's a growing college with many reasons, such as Atal Incubation Center

detailed_review.Placements: Our college has more than 60 IT companies on campus, and our students have secured placements with high salary packages, such as 54 LPA at Palo Alto. We have an Atal Incubation Center funded by the government with 7 crore rupees, and partnerships with several international countries where foreign students also study here.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Our hostel management provides 24/7 Wi-Fi with good strength, gym facilities, and varied meal times. The food is very good in taste and hygiene, and water facilities are always available. Each person is provided with a separate desk, chair, and cupboard in the hostel.
detailed_review.Faculty: The faculty members are well-trained and experienced. Exams are conducted by the exam cell after every two units. The teachers are very polite and friendly. We have a very friendly relationship with our principal; you can share any difficulty at any time, and he will respond.
detailed_review.Other: RGF is a festival for students held once a year, extending up to 7 days. Weekly, we have dance and singing competitions for relaxation, and DJ parties are organized for placement students upon request.

reviews.course: Master of Computer Application (MCA)
reviews.review_title: Good placements and user-friendly staff.

detailed_review.Placements: My course is MCA Embedded IoT with a pre-offer letter from Phytec Embedded Solutions, an MNC, with a salary of 4.5 LPA. It's a very worthwhile course, user-friendly, and provides industrial training, so don't worry about placements and enjoy life there. The college campus is surrounded by an IT PARK.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The hostel at Westend offers worthy rooms, peaceful living, good and stable Wi-Fi, quality food, and refreshing amenities. The wardens and watchmen are friendly; no worries. They will care for you like at home and provide you with a study bench and chair surrounded by nature.
detailed_review.Faculty: Question banks are provided. Teachers do not just focus on getting full marks; they expect only passing marks. However, you must enhance your skills. They provide industrial-based training in my course, including Embedded C, Python, Full Stack (MERN) Development, Advanced Data Structures in C, Embedded Systems, Embedded Application Development, Embedded Application Development in Linux, and Firmware Development.
detailed_review.Other: It's a massive and wonderful experience there.

reviews.course: B.E. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: Review of Rathinam Technical campus.

detailed_review.Placements: 80 percent of students were placed in my course. INR 9 LPA is the highest package, INR 3 LPA is the lowest, and INR 5 LPA is the average package offered in my course. The top recruiting companies are Zoho, Codingmart, Hexaware, and Palo Alto. For my course. 70% of students got internships from my course.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: A Wi-Fi facility is available on the entire campus. But sometimes it is at low speed. Well-furnished labs with current, updated equipment and A/C libraries in a clean and silent environment are available. The quality of the facilities in my hostel is good. Good-quality mess, canteen, and medical facilities are available.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers were very helpful, well qualified, and very knowledgeable. Their teaching qualities are very impressive. Yes, this course curriculum is relevant. It makes the students industry-ready. Medium-difficult are the semester exams in this college, and the pass percentage is good.

reviews.course: B.E. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: Review about Rathinam Technical Campus.

detailed_review.Placements: 80 percent of the students were placed in my course. INR 9 LPA is the highest package, INR 3 LPA is the lowest, and INR 5 LPA is the average package offered in my course. The top recruiting companies are TCS, Zoho, Palo Alto, Hexaware, and Coding Smart for my course. 70 percent of students got internships from my course. Developer, tester, and software engineer are the top roles offered in CSE.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Wi-Fi facilities are available in the entire surrounding area of the campus. Labs have current, updated equipment. Library facilities are very good on my campus. The food quality is average in my college hostel. Mess and canteen facilities are good. Medical facilities and sports facilities are also good on this campus.
detailed_review.Faculty: The faculty members in my colleges were very helpful, well qualified, and knowledgeable. Their teaching qualities are good. The semester exams have medium difficulties in this college. 90 is the pass percentage at this college. They are providing good coaching and training.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Biotechnology
reviews.review_title: You can enjoy your college life and fulfill your dreams with rathinamites.

detailed_review.Placements:
60 percent of students are placed. 
2 Lacs per annum to 6 Lacs per annum
Zifo biotech company, Infosys and many top companies are available. 
50 percent internship in aavin and sugar industry etc. Placement coaching classes are starts from third year. More chance to get campus placement.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Good infrastructure and eco friendly campus. Free Wi-Fi available. Food court with variety of items. Free library available. Gym, sports ground, all facilities are provided. They are not only focusing on studies but also encourages sports activity. IV, tours, functions are conducted.
detailed_review.Faculty:
Staffs of rathinamites are very friendly and they teaches every concept very clearly. Here they teaches practically so that you can understand easily. Syllabus are very easy don't worry about exams, our staffs are there to teach us 
It is a friendly campus.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Information Technology
reviews.review_title: Value college for average students.

detailed_review.Placements:
Around 100% of students were placed
INR 6.5 LPA was the highest package.
TCS and Tech Mahindra both have a good percentage of placements with good packages.
Many were placed as software engineers in that company.
Many skill-building activities and training will be provided by the college.
.
detailed_review.Infrastructure:
Every facility is available.
Good food, good hostel with all facilities and free Wi-Fi with good speed.
Non-vegetarian food is given twice a week.
Every working employee is friendly, from the warden to the cleaning members.
detailed_review.Faculty:
A good curriculum with a neat and clean campus.
Exams are very good, with strict rules and regulations.
Faculty members are another parent for the students; they were very friendly and legible to the students. The training was very professional here, and everyone will get skilled.

reviews.course: B.E. in Electronics and Communication Engineering
reviews.review_title: It is a good college that provides ample opportunities for all students to achieve their goals.

detailed_review.Placements: I have scored 80% in exams. The highest salary package was Rs.100000 per month, and the lowest salary offered was Rs.15,000 per month. Top recruiting companies like Accenture, HCL, Infosys, etc., visited our campus.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Labs, classrooms, and libraries were good. Digital classrooms were average. The hostel facilities were excellent. The quality of the food in the hostel was average. Sports facilities were good.
detailed_review.Faculty: Our teachers were knowledgeable and qualified. They were very concerned about the industry-related practical courses that were so helpful. We were under the Anna University syllabus, which was very difficult. The pass percentage was 50%.
detailed_review.Other: Electronics and communication engineering courses play a major role in the communication industry. We must improve our knowledge in core subjects like telecommunication and VLSI. Many medals and trophies were achieved by students in sports competitions.

reviews.course: B.E. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: Our college provides good infrastructure.

detailed_review.Placements: Almost 70% of students got placed in our college. The highest salary package offered is 10 LPA. The lowest salary package offered is 3 LPA. Our college conducts good training.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Our college provides good Wi-Fi. All labs are well-maintained. The library has a lot of books. The food served in the mess and canteen is good. Our college provides good medical facilities. Our college gives importance to sports like volleyball, cricket, kabaddi, etc.
detailed_review.Faculty: Our college provides additional training in programming languages like C, Java, data structure, and algorithm. Teachers have enough knowledge to teach topics in a good way. The curriculum is relevant. It makes students industry-ready. Semester exams are difficult. The pass percentage is 50%. All teachers are very friendly. They always provide us with advice on our studies.
detailed_review.Other: I chose this course because I liked it more than other courses.

reviews.course: B.E. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: Our college provides good infrastructure.

detailed_review.Placements: Almost 93% of students got placed in good companies. Many companies visit our college to recruit students. We have a good placement team who helps all students to get placed.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The infrastructure of our college is good. Our college has many classrooms and a lab. We have a library with many subject-related and reference books, which help students to gain knowledge in various aspects.
detailed_review.Faculty: The course provides knowledge. Teachers are well-trained, knowledgeable, and qualified in their subjects. Semester exams are easy to pass.

reviews.course: B.E. in Electronics and Communication Engineering
reviews.review_title: I'm dissatisfied with the placements, faculty members, infrastructure, and facilities.

Some top recruiting companies are Robert Bosch, Larsen & Toubro, Sunrise Electronics, and many other electronics-related companies. Many students get internships in our college. The top role offered is a manager.

detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers in our college are good and well-qualified. The course curriculum is neither relevant nor makes students industry ready. Semester exams are easy for students to get good marks.

reviews.course: B.E. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: Our college provides good placements.

detailed_review.Infrastructure: I am a days scholar. I do not know about hostel facilities. Mess is available. The food quality is average. Many canteens are available on our campus.

detailed_review.Other: I chose this course because of my interest in it. The course helps us to learn extra subjects and programming languages. The best thing about this course is it is very easy.

reviews.review_title: Our college provides good placements.

The hostel facilities are good. The food served in the mess and canteen is good. They provide sports facilities.

college_info.college_name: Rathinam Technical Campus Admission 2025: Fees, Courses, Eligibility and Selection

faqs.question: Is Rathinam Technical Campus admission open?
faqs.answer: Yes, Rathinam Technical Campus admission is ongoing for all courses. The college offers entrance-based admission to all the courses. Interested candidates can visit the official website of the college to apply for admission. To be eligible for admission candidates are required to apply and appear for the entrance exam accepted by the college. Additionally, candidates are required to full fill the eligibility criteria set by the college for admission

faqs.question: What courses are available at Rathinam Technical Campus?
faqs.answer: Rathinam Technical Campus offers one UG and three PG courses. To be eligible for admission, candidates must apply and appear for the entrance exam accepted by the college followed by a counselling round for admission. Given below are the courses offered at Rathinam Technical Campus:

faqs.question: Can I join Rathinam Technical Campus without TNEA Counselling?
faqs.answer: No, without TNEA counselling candidates cannot apply for the BTech/B.E programme at Rathinam Technical Campus. To be eligible for admission to BTech/B.E., the candidates must apply and appear in the counselling round. Additionally, for other courses including M.E., MCA and MBA, it is not mandatory to appear in TNEA counselling.

faqs.question: Is there an entrance for admission to Rathinam Technical Campus?
faqs.answer: Yes,  Rathinam Technical Campus accepts various entrance exams for admission to UG and PG, courses. The college offers one UG i.e., BTech/B.E. and three PG courses i.e., M.E., MCA and MBA. The college accepts TNEA counselling for admission to BTech and TANCET and CEETA for admission to MBA, MCA and M.E., respectively. After filling out the admission criteria set by the college, candidates are required to apply to the official website of the college and fill out the admission form.

faqs.question: How can I get admission to Rathinam Technical Campus for BTech/B.E.?
faqs.answer: Rathinam Technical Campus offers entrance-based admission to BTech/B.E. To be eligible for admission to BTech/B.E, candidates are required to pass Class 10 and Class 12 from a recognised board. Additionally, candidates are required to apply and appear for TNEA Counselling accepted by the college. After filling out all the eligibility criteria candidates need to apply for admission form online.

faqs.question: How many BTech/B.E. specialisations are offered at Rathinam Technical Campus?
faqs.answer: Rathinam Technical Campus admission to BTech/B.E. programme is entrance-based. The BTech/B.E programmes are offered in nine specialisations as given below: BTech in Agricultural Engineering BTech in Artifical Intelligence and Data Science BTech in Bio-Technology B.E. in Bio-Medical Engineering B.E. in Computer Science and Engineering B.E. in Computer Scienece and Engineering (AI and ML) B.E. Computer Scienece and Engineering (Cybersecurity) B.E. in Computer Science and Engineering (Regional) B.E. in Electronic and Computer Engineering B.E. in Mechanical Engineering B.E. in Science and Humanities B.E. in Mechatronics

faqs.question: What is the total fee of the BTech/B.E course offered by Rathinam Technical Campus?
faqs.answer: The BTech course fee offered by Rathinam Technical Campus fee is range between INR 2 - 2.1 lakh. The fees might include components other than tuition fees. The mentioned fee is as per Tamil Nadu Engineering Admission (TNEA). Candidates are required to pay the course fee after completion of all the selection rounds to confirm their seats. Further, candidates note that the given fee is as per the official website/ sanctioning body and is subject to change.

faqs.question: What is the total tuition fee of the BTech/BE programme offered by Rathinam Technical Campus?
faqs.answer: Rathinam Technical Campus has a distinct fee structure for the vast variety of courses it offers. The fees details for the current academic year is usually intimated by the institute at the beginning of the admissions process. However, on a general basis, the total tuition fees of the BTech/BE programme at Rathinam Technical Campus ranges between INR 2 Lacs - INR 2.1 lakhs. This fee corresponds only to the total cost of tuition and does include the additional charges like hostel fee, mess fee, etc.. The fee structure is indicative in nature, as it is sourced from unofficial sources.

faqs.question: Is TANCET required for MCA at Rathinam Technical Campus?
faqs.answer: Yes, TANCET exam is required for admission to MCA at Rathinam Technical Campus Tamil Nadu Common Entrance Test which is mandatory for admission to MCA. Applicants seeking admission to MCA are required to apply and appear for TANCET to be eligible for admission.

faqs.question: Who is eligible for MCA admission at Rathinam Technical Campus?
faqs.answer: For admission to MCA programme at Rathinam Technical Campus, candidates must fulfill the following eligibility & selection criteria conditions: Course Eligibility Selection Criteria MCA Graduation degree in a relevant field from a recognised university/institute TANCET + Counselling

faqs.question: Can I take direct admission to M.E. at Rathinam Technical Campus?
faqs.answer: No, Rathinam Technical Campus offers entrance-based admission to M.E. Candidates are required to apply and appear for the accepted entrance exams i.e. CEETA. After filling out the eligibility criteria candidates are required to apply on the official website of the college to fill out the admission form. After all the procedures the college releases its merit list. If the candidates got selected on merit they are required to pay the admission fee to lock their final seats.

faqs.question: Can I apply for M.E. at Rathinam Technical Campus?
faqs.answer: Rathinam Technical Campus admission is open for M.E. The college offers entrance-based admission to M.E. The college accepts CEETA entrance exams for admission to M.E. Candidates looking for admission to Rathinam Technical Campus must fill out the online application form by visiting the official website of the college.

faqs.question: Is MBA available at Rathinam Technical Campus?
faqs.answer: Yes, Rathinam Technical Campus offers an MBA course for two years. The college offers admission to MBA entirely entrance-based. To be eligible for admission, candidates are required to apply and appear for TANCET exam, followed by counselling. To fill out the application form candidates are required to visit the college's official website. Additionally, candidates must pass graduation in the relevant stream to be eligible to apply for the course.

faqs.question: What is the seat intake for MBA at Rathinam Technical Campus?

Further, candidates are required to have a valid TANCET score to grab the final seat. After the fulfillment of the eligibility criteria, candidates have to visit the official website of Rathinam Technical Campus to apply online.

college_info.college_name: REVA University: Courses, Fees, Admission 2026, Placements, Ranking

highlights.summary:
REVA University Bengaluru was established in 2012 and is located in Bangalore, Kolkata. It is a state private university which was established in the state of Karnataka under the Goverment of Karnataka Act No. 13 and is one of the leading universities to offer technology-based education to students and is recognised by UGC as well as approved by the AICTE. REVA Bangalore has been accredited by national bodies such as the NBA and NAAC with an A+ grade. Further, the university has a sprawling campus of over 43 acres with modern facilities installed all around.
Students of UG, PG, PhD, certificate and diploma levels are offered education through the 30+ schools of study at REVA University. The university also has over 38 UG, 31 PG, 20 PhD, as well as a range of diploma and certificate course in different streams, which includes Engineering, Commerce, Law, Management, Architecture, Liberal Studies and Performing Arts. While the programmes offered at REVA University includes BTech, BSc, BBA, BCA, BCom, BPT, BArch, MBA, MSc, MTech, among many others.
REVA Institute Bangalore features 200+ smart classrooms with state-of-the-art laboratories, AR/VR labs, modern library, world-class sports facilities, hostels, food court, cultural, recreational centres, and others. Moreover, the REVA University Bangalore placement 2025 saw over 621 comapnies visiting the campus and more than 4482 placements offers. The highest package offered was INR 40 LPA with students having over 2329 internships.
REVA Bangalore advances interdiciplinary innovation through its new Resrach Center block, housing specialised hubs like Food Sciences, Biotechnology, Nano Research and Advanced Materials, and others. The university has a panel of guest lecturers to inspire students in their respective careers and to give them tips and invaluable insights in every course. Bangalore REVA University also offers excellent student infrastructure. For more details, interested candidates can check out the table given below:

Further, REVA Bangalore offers these programmes for a duration of 4 and 2 years, respectively with a comprehensive curriculum.
Both the MBA and BTech programmes are highly sought-after among students due to the doors they open and create in their future careers. Interested candidates can also check the other popular programmes offered at REVA University Bengaluru in the table provided below:

REVA University Bengaluru Reviews on Placements, Faculty & Facilities

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Electronics and Communication Engineering
reviews.review_title: Really good infrastructure and facilities.

detailed_review.Placements: 50 percent of students got placed. The highest package is 25 LPA, the average is 6 LPA. The placement in the college is not too much, but it is good, a lot of companies come for internships. Overall it is good, it is all about you, how you respond.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: There is great infrastructure in Reva University, there is a 24/7 Wi-Fi facility, labs, and classrooms are great, and the library is so big, and all books are available. For hostelers, it is available up to midnight, and hostel and mess food is also hygienic.
detailed_review.Faculty: The faculty at this university is too friendly and knowledgeable. The teaching quality is too good, they teach us practically, and the difficulty level in semester exams is moderate. It makes students industry-ready, it is part of the course curriculum.
detailed_review.Other: I chose ECE because I am curious about embedded systems and wireless communication, and I think it has a great future. The campus is next level, there are a lot of opportunities, and here we can connect with a lot of people.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Artificial Intelligence and Data Science
reviews.review_title: It has really good infrastructure and a good crowd.

detailed_review.Placements: As I am in the first year, I do not have much idea about placements, but there are decent companies visiting our college. So far, more than 140 companies have visited, and around 20 students have received offers of 15+ LPA CTC. There are also some international offers of 45+ LPA. The average placement stands around 7–8 LPA, as I know from my seniors. It is a good college for students who are studious and work hard because the college gives us a platform to perform with no limits.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: There are enough facilities in our hostel, including Wi-Fi, 24/7 hot water, and AC. The hostel food is good, with three meals and evening snacks. Each department has a separate library. There is also a central library with Wi-Fi. It is one of the best campuses in Bangalore. Along with facilities like a salon, novelty store, stationery and healthcare centre, food court, indoor sports arena, and fitness centre.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers are very helpful, qualified, and knowledgeable. The teaching quality at REVA is decent, according to the curriculum. You will find experienced teachers, and the curriculum is industry-ready. The semester exams are difficult, but most students pass.
detailed_review.Other: I chose the course Artificial Intelligence in Data Science because it is future-proof and allows me to work in data analytics, data science, or as a full-stack developer. The best part of my course is the excellent faculty members. We get to make many projects based on the curriculum. There are more than 720 events in a year. The college conducts good fests. The campus crowd is excellent, and it is easy to make connections on campus.

reviews.course: Master of Business Administration (MBA)
reviews.review_title: Overall, a good college for the MBA course.

detailed_review.Placements: Thus, half of the students are hired by one or more businesses. The MBA programme offers an average compensation package of five LPA. Numerous businesses, such as Omega, come to the campus to hire students. Additionally, the college offers paid internships. Top positions, such as financial accountant, are available here.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The campus is stunning and has everything we could possibly need. In addition to having large classrooms, labs, Wi-Fi, and libraries. The hostel is, to be honest, subpar and more costly than the college tuition. It has mediocre amenities, and the cuisine is undoubtedly a concern.
detailed_review.Faculty: The instructors here are excellent. They comprehend and follow the kids' flow. They have excellent teaching skills and are quite amiable. Topics that are deemed pertinent and helpful. Exams at the conclusion of the semester are simple. Students can pass them with ease and receive good grades.

reviews.course: B.A. LL.B. (Hons)
reviews.review_title: Good college that provides various opportunities.

detailed_review.Placements: I had enrolled for the B.A. LL.B. course. There were around 39 students studying along with me. Around 65 percent of our class got internships. We also got to visit courts to gain experience. Advocates play their roles, and we get to understand our future.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: We get clean and neat washrooms, water facilities, and hygienic food. Food in hostels is repetitive as they have fixed a timetable for each day. Sports and games are optional and depend on personal preference. Hostel maintenance is very good and acceptable.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers were very helpful, friendly, and knowledgeable. I personally rate the teaching quality as 4.5 out of 5. Regarding the curriculum, it is absolutely relevant. Pass percentage was 40 percent, and it is easy to pass if we dedicate ourselves to studies.
detailed_review.Other: My course B.A. LL.B. is a very outstanding course, as we had scope for future advocates. I chose this course because it suits me and it is a very respectable course through which we can earn respect in society. There were many events and fests that our college conducts occasionally, which keeps us engaged.

reviews.course: Bachelor of Business Administration (BBA)
reviews.review_title: Good infrastructure and facilities, and we can expect our future here.

detailed_review.Placements: 500 to 600 students are there. The highest package is around 12 LPA, the lowest is 5 LPA, and the average is 7 LPA. Recruiting companies are IBM, Amazon, Accenture, and many others. Roles offered are marketing executive, business development executive, financial analyst, HR executive, and operations manager.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Facilities like computer labs, Wi-Fi & Internet, library, resource center, seminar halls & auditorium, well-maintained indoor and outdoor door games, on-campus medical centre, trained medical staff, nutritionists, hygienic food, and spacious and well-maintained rooms are available.
detailed_review.Faculty: Highly qualified teachers, real-world education, and much more. It makes them ready to do their work without trouble 40% per subject to get passed, difficult to pass due to real-world experience to achieve in the outer world for students.
detailed_review.Other: It helps to understand how to stand in business. It has helped many to get into high posts faster. There is nothing it should improve, but I think it should be more digital. Reva is known for fests and events that they let the students handle, so there should be no hesitation for students to participate.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: College looks nice and beautiful campus, but placements are average for the fee we pay.

detailed_review.Placements: There was not much placement for our batch, due to the coronavirus and recession, but the faculty in the college were really helpful, like they would inform and train us for the placements, but unfortunately, the placements were really not up to the mark. I don't know about the other batches.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Coming to the infrastructure, the college looks really neat and colourful thanks to the maintenance department from the college workers over there, and the hostel is also really good, but the fee is slightly high, and there are restrictions in the hostel.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers are better qualified, so they can handle us. They were really helpful in every aspect, so we understand the subject properly and gain practical experience from the projects and internships we do. They really motivated us every time.

reviews.course: B.Sc. in Mathematics, Statistics, Computer Science
reviews.review_title: REVA has good infrastructure , qualified teachers ,good placements ,Hostel rooms were big

detailed_review.Placements:
Almost student gets the placement opportunity and nearly students above 70 percent got placed
Package differs from stream to stream ,for my stream highest was 10 LPA and lowest 2.5LPA
Amazon,Google, carylon, cocentrix etc.
Almost everyone got internship in above mentioned conpanies
detailed_review.Infrastructure:
REVA has best infrastructure .Classrooms are really good even have smart classes . Washrooms are super clean and hygenic . Campus has a very good environment as well. Campus grounds are so well maintained.college library has books from almost all fields, interesting novels as well.
Mess has different food for breakfast lunch and dinner as per their schedule.
Canteens are have quality food at best price
Medical facilities are good
detailed_review.Faculty:
REVA has really good and qulaified teachers .Teachers doubt solving skills are commendable.
Yes course curriculum was relevant . Whole syllabus is covered based on the curriculum.
For statistical understanding we have been taken on industrial visits which has given us a better understanding regarding the industries.
Semester exams were a little tough but the kind of questions appers in exam were already discussed in classes .

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: Really good placements in 2025.

detailed_review.Placements: Good college, many are placed. You can join without seeing it. The highest package that is offered is 45 LPA, and the lowest LPA is 2 LPA. It does not matter what you will study and what you are asked in interviews, we need to check this.  I will rate a good number of stars.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The Wi-Fi is not good, its always getting disconnected, and we need to connect again and again. It becomes somewhat difficult for us, so I prove that we can do it. The library is good, the environment is also good, we have so many trees on campus, which makes us feel good.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers will just be there, nothing they will teach, so I preferred YouTube to study everything, so u also do the same. This helped me so much to push myself, however, in the real placements, they are good with a little bit of knowledge, and we can easily get placed.
detailed_review.Other: Thats it. Its a good campus.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Electronics and Communication Engineering
reviews.review_title: This college is good. If students are interested, then they can join this college.

detailed_review.Placements: Placement-wise, our college is good. The highest package is 40 LPA, and the average package is 7 LPA. 72% of students get placed in our college. It is a good college if students are searching for a college with good infrastructure.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The infrastructure is nice, and I like it. The hostel fee and the college fee are a little expensive. If we put extra effort, then we will achieve success in our lives. There is a little issue with the lab faculty members, as they are not very good.
detailed_review.Faculty: Faculty members are okay, but we need to put extra effort into our future. The management of REVA University is good, and they will support extracurricular activities and other things. I suggest students join this college.

reviews.course: Master of Business Administration (MBA)
reviews.review_title: This college is very good for the course MBA.

detailed_review.Placements: Almost 90% of the students get placements here. Many good companies come here to recruit new employees. Companies like Microsoft, Wipro, and Infosys have played a significant role in recruiting new talent from the university. A large number of placements have been done, and internship opportunities are also available. The placement cell is really strong, and they provide extensive training to all the students.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The college has all the necessary facilities. All students have free Wi-Fi access, and the classrooms are well-equipped with smart boards and sound systems. The library contains a large collection of books and excellent infrastructure. The university offers relevant literature on all subjects. They have planted several trees, creating a magnificent atmosphere for the campus.
detailed_review.Faculty: Every teacher in our college has a high level of education. Many lecturers have PhDs and are extremely pleasant on campus. There is the best learning opportunity in the classroom. The classes and curriculum are both quite engaging. Before the semester exams, two internal tests are administered. To be considered for recruiting, one must get around 50% in each semester

reviews.course: Master of Computer Applications (MCA)
reviews.review_title: It is a great university for placements.

detailed_review.Placements: REVA University offers organised placements to students. The placement cell started preparing for general aptitude, coding, etc. From the start of the third semester, it gives full help during the interview. The highest package offered is 12.5 LPA, and the average package is 4.1 LPA. Cognizant and Mount Blue are the top recruiting companies of our university. Our university offers many internship programs to enhance students skills.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Our university infrastructure is pretty good. A huge playground is located. The campus is Wi-Fi enabled. The library has many kinds of books. Labs are in good condition. Java and Python-like software are easily run on computers. Hostels are situated inside the university campus. Mess food is delicious and maintains proper hygiene. Each hostel rooms is shared by 3-4 students. The hospital is located near the university.
detailed_review.Faculty: All faculty members are skilled and experienced. They are kind in nature and very helpful. They clear all doubts of every student. They teach most of the software that is used in industries. Class tests are conducted every 4 weeks. Teachers give proper guidance and complete the full syllabus before exams.

reviews.course: Master of Business Administration (MBA)
reviews.review_title: The college has very good infrastructure with proper placements.

detailed_review.Placements: This college has a good reputation for placements. They also provided placement training from well-known facilities. Almost 90% of my class got placement in various companies like Amazon, TCS, Wipro, Byjus, Marico, KPMG, etc. The highest package offered was 22 LPA, and the average was 6 LPA. In our course, every one of our students got an internship in various companies.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The infrastructure on our campus is very good. The campus is green, which is very motivating and relaxing. Every possible facility is available. Hostel rooms are clean, and the food is very delicious. Both North Indian and South Indian foods are available. Wi-Fi is provided to all. There are various grounds for sports.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers are great. They are very helpful. The number of faculty members is great. They all do their responsibility very well and look after the growth of the students. Teachers are very experienced and knowledgeable. The course curriculum is very relevant, and it utilizes the modern world. The semester exams are at a moderate level.

reviews.course: Master of Business Administration (MBA)
reviews.review_title: Overall, it was a good college for the MBA course.

detailed_review.Placements: As a result, half of the students were hired by a company. 4 LPA was the average compensation package offered in the MBA program. Numerous businesses, such as JIO, came to the campus to recruit students. Additionally, the college offered paid internships. This is where the best positions, such as financial accountant, were offered.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The campus was stunning and had everything we could need. In addition to having large classrooms, libraries, Wi-Fi, and labs. The hostel was, to be honest, impressive and cost more than the college tuition. It had mediocre amenities, and the food was undoubtedly subpar.
detailed_review.Faculty: These teachers were excellent. They comprehended and followed the pupils' lead. They provided excellent instruction and were quite amiable. The subjects' opinions were pertinent and helpful. Students could easily pass and receive good grades on the simple semester-end exams.

reviews.course: Master of Business Administration (MBA)
reviews.review_title: The campus was very good, and fests were held in our college.

detailed_review.Placements: We offered our placement services through our college placement ceremony, which was great. All of the helpers were young people who worked during the event. From my batch, 81% of students got placed. The minimum package offered was approximately 4.5 LPA, and the highest package offered was 25 LPA. The average salary package was 14.5 LPA. The annual survey was conducted by companies like Deloitte, KPMG, Google, PwC, HDFC Bank, ICICI Bank, and TCS. More than 79% of students received internships.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The college was in a good place, allowing students to study with a fresh mind. All campuses were Wi-Fi-enabled, and laboratories had advanced technological equipment. The library had many books. There were medical facilities as well. The cost of living in college was very low. The hostel and mess were clean and tidy.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers at this college were the best mentors I ever had in my life. They were very friendly, down to earth, always supportive, and provided clear explanations of every situation. Many industrial visits were arranged so that students could gain real-time experience. We had good management.

reviews.course: Master of Business Administration (MBA)
reviews.review_title: My life at REVA University.

detailed_review.Placements: Actually compared to other universities, our university is not that much. Our class consists of 60 students, and overall, it has 300 students. The average package is 5 LPA and the highest package is around 10 LPA. Around 90% of students got internships in the MBA post-graduation course.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The quality of the food is superb and there are no words to explain it. The food is so luxurious and not bad. AC is attached in each classroom, and we can study very luxuriously. The Wi-Fi facility is also very good. In our university, there is a library where the collection of books is kept and we have 24-hour availability.
detailed_review.Faculty: Lecturers are not helpful at all. Even they will not clarify small doubts. In each semester, we have two internals and one end-semester exam and then the mark will be calculated for 100. 35 is the pass percentage. They only provide internship opportunities.
detailed_review.Other: I chose this course because of the business mentality and in need to improve my knowledge skills via this course.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Information Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: Reva College is worth the money and provides very good support in education.

detailed_review.Placements: Around 80% of our students placed. The highest package is 20 LPA, and the lowest package is 4 LPA. The top recruiting companies at our college are PhonePe, PayPal, IBM, Infosys, Ultratech, and several other companies that come for recruitment. Many students also get internships.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: There are no hostel facilities inside the campus. The infrastructure is very well-built, and the classes have Wi-Fi. The canteen is very hygienic, and sports receive good support from the college. Separate sports coaches are also available.
detailed_review.Faculty: In our college, many teachers are Ph.D. holders and are very friendly on campus. The course and curriculum are not boring. They are very interesting. Exams are not tough, and we can score easily in them.
detailed_review.Other: Events are good, and fests happen twice a month.

reviews.course: B.Sc. in Computer Science (Cyber Security)
reviews.review_title: Overall, academic life is good, bit messed up college life, could've been better in some places.

detailed_review.Placements: Talking to seniors, only very less students are placed. The package is also a bit disappointing. Most of our seniors are doing internships, and they had to arrange them on their own. B.Sc. Cybersecurity actually provides a lot of opportunities, so it is pretty good to chose, but you definitely need an M.Sc. to back it up.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: You get free Wi-Fi facility, classrooms are good, and libraries are excellent. The campus has a great vibe, especially during the rainy season 10/10, not gonna lie, it's so good. The food court is clean and provides very good food at affordable rates. You also have chances to prove yourself in sports, but make sure to take those opportunities.
detailed_review.Faculty: Most of them are qualified and handle their subjects well, but not everyone. The SDP sessions and certification courses provided by REVA University are very helpful. The semester exams are pretty much good, they balance the difficulty of the paper well, so there are no worries about that.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Information Technology
reviews.review_title: I am so satisfied with the ambiance of the college.

detailed_review.Placements: More than 70% of students get placed. The highest package is 26 LPA and the lowest package is 6 LPA. The top recruiting companies for our course are Wipro, IBM, etc. A maximum number of students got internships. Students are well-studied, and they are so perfectly trained for the interview. So they never hesitate in the interview.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The infrastructure is completely good. The good quality of everything is provided. The college has more than 3 buildings, especially for engineers. Labs for each subject are very well-maintained. Every class is provided with a projector.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers are very helpful. The course curriculum is relevant. Semester exams are not difficult if we study. The pass percentage is 70%. Faculty members are being changed for every semester and no faculty is being repeated. All faculty members are very experienced and their teaching is good. They are friendly with students.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering (Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning)
reviews.review_title: Reva University is a growing college so easily you join the college.

detailed_review.Placements: Approximately 70% of students get placed. The highest package was around 30 Lacs last year. But the previous year, there was the highest package with 45 LPA. Top recruiters are IBM, Accenture, Cognizant, and internships. Around 80% of students are getting placed at IBM, Amazon, Infosys, and some other companies. Top roles they are getting as developer and analysts types of roles they are getting.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The infrastructure is very good with greenery everywhere. There is a Wi-Fi facility everywhere on the campus. Labs and classrooms are good. Teaching is also good and for references, we can use library for free. Coming to hostel food is awesome because the students who come from anywhere around the world can adjust to the food. Sports facilities are there. Canteen and games are there for hostel people. There is a gym for hostel people who can utilize it very well.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers are very much knowledgeable. They are very friendly and they will motivate students to grow more. There are clubs to join to make students much better. Pass percentage may be around 90% above only if we can read. Semester exams are not so difficult.
detailed_review.Other: Because Reva campus gives a tech full vibes so I have joined and like events, fests, and all are awesome. But you should participate in everything so that you may enjoy it more.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: Best choice of university.

detailed_review.Placements: I am currently pursuing my degree of B.Tech ISE and Reva University provides with best facilities, including academics, as well add other skills. They give skill development courses and placement training, too. The highest package is 30 LPA, the lowest is 3.6 LPA, and the average package is around 8 LPA. Top recruiting companies are Accenture, TCS, IBM, HCL, etc. There are around 40% of students getting internships from this course in companies like Microsoft. Top roles offered are software developer, data scientist, cybersecurity analyst, blockchain developer, etc.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The environment in Reva University is quite peaceful, and the infrastructure is eye-catching. There's a lot of greenery and good Wi-Fi. Classrooms are very neatly maintained. Top off all this, there's a library that's so beautiful and is open almost all the time. Hostel facilities are too good, food in hostel food is good. There's a food court and also there are various foods cafes.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teaching faculty is good and friendly. They help you overall in studies as well as mentor you. We have various industrial visits. We have two internal assessment that prepares us got the semester exams. The pass percentage in each subject is 75 for 100.
detailed_review.Other: I chose this course in this college because many of my seniors joined here, and they have done well. Not only academics, there are various clubs that you can join, which will help you develop other skills where you can show your passion as well as learn simultaneously.

admission.title: REVA University Bengaluru Admission Overview 2026
admission.overview_text:
REVA University admission 2026 is open for various courses. The university offers admission to courses including UG, PG, PhD, several certificate/diploma and PG Diploma programmes. The courses are offered in the fields of Engineering, Architecture, Science & Technology, Commerce, Management Studies, Legal Studies, Arts & Humanities and Performing Arts.

REVA University admissions are based on a valid score in the respective entrance exams . Candidates who wish to pursue BA LLB, MBA, BTech, BBA, BArch, BDes, BCom, BAJMC, BCA, BSc and MCA are selected based on the REVA CET score, which is conducted every year between June to July. However, REVA University also accepts all other major national-level entrance exam scores along with merit obtained in qualifying exams. More details around REVA University Bangalore admission process are explained in the article below.

faqs.question: Can I join REVA University without an entrance exam?
faqs.answer: No, REVA University does not provide direct admission. The university conducts REVA CET entrance exam for admission to most of the UG and PG courses. Along with that, there are other state-level entrance exams accepted by the university are CAT, MAt, CMAT, PGCET, etc.

faqs.question: How can I get admission at REVA University?
faqs.answer: The university offers admission to candidates based on their scores in REVA CET exam. Furthermore, REVA Bangalore also accepts scores of various state/ national-level exams for courses such as BTech, MBA, MCA, etc. Candidates applying through the scores of any other entrance exam are exempted from REVA CET. Aspirants are informed about their selection. The university then conducta a common counselling process for the final seat allotment to selected candidates.

faqs.question: Are admissions open at REVA University?
faqs.answer: REVA University admissions are open for 2026 session. Candidates are offered admission to most of the programmes based on REVA CET score. The university also accepts other national or state-level entrance exam scores. Interested candidates can apply online or offline for the preferred course.

faqs.question: What is the fee for BSc at REVA University?
faqs.answer: INR 1.2 Lacs and INR 1.6 Lacs is the REVA University BSc fee range for various specialisations. In addition to the course fee, candidates may be required to pay certain one-time fees, such as admission fees, security deposit, etc. While applying for the programme, candidates are required to submit an application fee of INR 500. It must be noted that the mentioned fee details have been sourced from the official website of the university/sanctioning body. They are still subject to change and hence, are indicative.

faqs.question: Is KCET accepted in REVA University for BTech?
faqs.answer: Yes, REVA University accepts a valid score of KCET entrance exam. This is a state-level entrance exam regulated by Karnataka Examination Authority (KEA), which is valid for admission to BTech at all the colleges of Karnataka state. Candidates applying via KCET score must pass Class 12 in the relevant stream before applying for the course. Futher, aspirants need to register and appear for the exam as per the defined KCET schedule .

faqs.question: I have 40000 rank in General in COMEDK UGET. Can I get into REVA University through this rank?
faqs.answer: Yes, if you belong to the General category under the All India quota, then a rank of 40000 can get u admission to various courses at REVA University in the last round, as the closing ranks were in the ranges of 44001 to 100240 for this category. Please keep in mind that these cutoff ranges are of the last round General category, other rounds, categories will have different cutoffs accordingly.

faqs.question: How to get a seat in MBA at REVA University?

faqs.answer: Yes, Reva University has a refund policy. It follows the UGC guidelines for the cancellation and refund. In a  few cases, there are no refunds. If the admission is cancelled due to disciplinary action or violation of Anti Ragging Regulations or breach of the code of conduct or any rule and regulation of the university, no refund is permissible. faqs.answer: The application process for BCom at REVA University is conducted online on the university's official website. The step-wise process of application is listed below: Step 1: Visit the university's official website and click on the "Apply Now" tab. Step 2: Enter a valid email ID to start the application process. Step 3: Register with basic details such as name, and mobile number (will be verified through OTP vis SMS) Step 4: Select the desired school & programme. Step 5: Accept the declaration & proceed to pay the application fee of INR 500 . Step 6: You will receive the payment confirmation mail along with the application number and login link. Step 7: Fill out the application form using the application number. Step 8: Submit the application.

sections.heading: Introduction
text: REVA University Bangalore is located in Bengaluru spread over 45 acres. The campus has facilties such as - academic studios, classrooms, counselling centres, laboratories a library and a media centre among others. The university has separate hostel facilities for girls and boys.
For more information about Reva University check out the below video:

facilities.name: Library
facilities.description: Air-conditioned central library with the seating capacity of 800 students and possesses a huge collection of books & journals both in print and e-form. The library is kept open from 8.00am to 12.00 midnight and it provides a mix of learning environments to meet different student needs. Online access to a vast range of information, including 3,000+ electronic journal titles and a huge number of e-books are available to all our students, researchers and faculty members. Candidates can also access business source elite collection of 1800+ e-journals and magazines through EBSCO database. Not just that, through NPTEL’s E-Vidya Media Streaming System through which you will view videos of all programs/ courses brought out by the NPTEL.

college_info.college_name: Saveetha Engineering College: Courses, Fees, Admission 2025, Placements, Rankings

highlights.summary:
Saveetha Engineering College is an affiliated institute of Anna University which was established in the year 2001. It has been accredited with an A Grade by NAAC and has been recognised as a SIRO by the DSIR. The institute offers courses of UG, PG, and PhD levels in various fields. These courses are provided across the Engineering, Management, and various other streams. 5 UG courses offered at this college have been granted the NBA accreditation and the college is UGC recognised. The college is ranked by the NIRF 2024 in the 201-300 Rank Band.
The BTech and MBA courses of Saveetha Engineering College are its flagship courses and their students get placements in Accenture, Cognizant, Capgemini, Virtusa, and others. The key highlights of Saveetha Engineering College are tabulated below:
Saveetha Engineering College Highlights 2025
Establishment year | Ownership type
For more information about Saveetha Engineering College, Chennai check out the below videos:

college_info_program.intro:
Saveetha Engineering College popular programmes are BTech and MBA. BTech is available in specialisations such as Agricultural Engineering, Artificial Intelligence and Data Sciences, Chemical Engineering, Information Technology, and others. MBA students are placed in top companies at top positions such as Accenture, Cognizant, Capgemini, Virtusa, and others. BTech students are given technical knowledge and are trained to become industry professionals.
Saveetha Engineering College MBA students can become Managers, Team Leaders, or can go for various other job profiles. MBA students are provided experiential learning with the help of case studies, capstone projects, and others. Below mentioned are some of the Saveetha Engineering College courses and their respective eligibility and Saveetha Engineering College fee:

Saveetha Engineering College Reviews on Placements, Faculty & Facilities

reviews.course: B.E. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: The college faculty members are good, but the placements are only average.

detailed_review.Placements: The percentage of placements is between 60% and 70%. The highest salary package is 44 LPA, while the average salary package is 6.5 LPA. The top recruiting companies are TCS and Zoho. Only 90% of students get internships. The top role is nothing in our college.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The Wi-Fi facility is average, but the classrooms have better infrastructure.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teaching quality is good and helpful for gaining knowledge. The curriculum is easy to study, but the semester exam is slightly difficult. If you study well, you can write well. In our college, there are two CIA exams, which are easy to write if you score high marks in CIA, then the mark is added to the semester mark. The faculty members are very knowledgeable and helpful, and their teaching method is good for students to study. Some faculty teaching is not good, and differs from person to person.
detailed_review.Other: I chose this course because of my personal interest in the subject. Earning a salary is the most appealing aspect of the course for me. I would like to shift the emphasis from theoretical papers to practical work. Celenza is the largest cultural event at my college.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Artificial Intelligence and Data Science
reviews.review_title: College life is good but not in placements.

detailed_review.Placements: 97 percent of students are placed. The highest package is 44 LPA and the lowest package is 3 LPA and the average package is 5 LPA. There are no top recruiting companies, many students got internships from my course not only internal but external. The top roles offered in my course are AI engineer and Data scientist.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Infrastructure of the college and hostel is good. Wi-Fi in the college is good but not good in hostel classrooms have AC but the quality of food is not good in the mess but good in the canteen. Medical facilities are good apart from that sports and games are average.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers are qualified and knowledgeable, teaching quality is good but not the mindset of the faculty members. The course curriculum is relevant but does not make the students industry ready. Semester exams are easy and predictable, pass percentage is 50 percent.

reviews.course: B.E. in Electronics and Communication Engineering
reviews.review_title: Good college. Helpful for the students who score more cut off.

detailed_review.Placements: More than 85 percent of the students are placed. The highest package is 36LPA from the ECE department. They give ideas to do internship from the first year. I also planned to do internship from the first year. I think more than 72 percent got internship from my course. Qualocom. Valuelabs etc are top recruiters.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The facilities and infrastructure of the college is good. It is a unique infrastructure in Tamil Nadu. SMART room class eg. Attendance are taken by QR method. In the hostel, I think the quality of food is good, they give more variety. Nearby Medical College and hospital are here.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers are qualified and they explain clearly with real life example. They make it easy to study for the semester exam. I think the pass percentage is more than 70 percent. I do not find it difficult. The curriculum make us more easy for us during this year.
detailed_review.Other: I take this course ECE because India is majorly growing with semiconductor industry. I can take this course. and also it gives two choices whether go to the IT field or the Core field. The college give event every year, which is called as calanza during may  June. The scholarship for the students is based on 12th mark cut off like I scored 192.5 in my 12th, the college gives full free for my mark, but they also give some conditions to maintain this condition like math CGPA more than 8, attendance more than 75 percent.

reviews.course: B.E. in Electronics and Communication Engineering
reviews.review_title: Good campus life and overall facilities .

detailed_review.Placements:
Placement record:97%
the highest package:44 Lacs per annum (Marquee offer), from two 3rd year students. Average package :5.36 Lacs per annum
652+ companies visited
Companies like Qualcomm, Juspay and sungmi. Good internships and training provided by various top recruiting companies.
detailed_review.Infrastructure:
Good customized and digitalized classrooms and good 
Restroom and canteen facilities across the campus. Best laboratories with availability of all equipments. Good hostel facility with NEET mess and Wi-Fi facilities. Here courses are mainly focused on theory related practical which enables provides us industrial based learning and training.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers are excellent and always available after the classes. And every student can select their own timetable by flexi learn which is a good facility for students and also attendance are taken digitally through my camu and all subject oriented details and syllabus are available in Moodle as well as my camu. Introduce new 45 to 60 days term (block system) which enables fast learning and focus more on practical oriented learning. Semester exams are overall average difficult, easy to clear all the exams.
detailed_review.Other: Here, students have more free period which helps them to clear modules for programming languages which is a very good thing in this college.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Artificial Intelligence and Data Science
reviews.review_title: Good in everything except food.

detailed_review.Placements: When it comes to placement my college is good. Saveetha gives 98 percent placement for the maximum number of courses and they are giving the highest salary package of 44 LPA and average salary of 6 LPA. This is one of the best things in this college and in Saveetha Engineering College for every student internship is compulsory to get a degree and this is one of the best colleges when it comes to placement.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: College infrastructure and hostel infrastructure are also good. We have high technology labs and a huge library and we have unlimited access to library and also in the hostel, we have good rooms and good beds. We have Wi-Fi available in every room. It is most useful to us when the quality of food is too low it is not good. I will not prefer my hostel food. Sometimes we have bugs in our food, which may cause health issues but we have medical facilities.
detailed_review.Faculty: In Saveetha Engineering College we have more than 3 staff for every single subject so it is very helpful to us when we have a doubt that is unclear. We have access to talk to all faculty members to get our doubts cleared and the course curriculum is relevant which makes students industry ready. Semester exams are not so difficult because each semester is divided into two half and we have the ability to choose our preferred subject, faculty and also timing.

detailed_review.Infrastructure:
Facilities & infrastructure for an AI/ML department are ready-to-use descriptions plus templates. Campus-wide high-speed Wi-Fi with good coverage in labs, classrooms, hostels, and library. Guest/visitors network and sufficient internet bandwidth for cloud work and dataset downloads. GPU labs: Dedicated workstations or servers with GPUs (NVIDIA Tesla/RTX class), multiple GPU nodes for experiments.  
High-performance computer cluster: On-premise cluster + queuing system (SLURM) or access to departmental cloud credit (AWS/GCP/Azure).
detailed_review.Faculty:

reviews.course: B.Tech. Artificial Intelligence and Data Sciences (Lateral entry)
reviews.review_title: It has good study environment, but there is no fun in the college.

The percent of students placed in my department is around 25% because it is relatively easy to learn Data Science compared to other AI fields like machine learning. Most of them get a job as a data analyst. I didn't know about the internship opportunity that much, I think it would be around 30% percent at the best.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: I'm a hosteller from my school days, comparatively, it is much better than that because here they would give a non-veg option seven days a week. And the hostel infrastructure is not that bad compared to other colleges for the same price, here in my college, it is much better. In the case of college infrastructure, they have Wi-Fi everywhere, so no problem with that. Classes are also fully air-conditioned with smart lab facilities, etc.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers are good, but not great, I would say, because it's a new field, my college didn't have that much experienced staff for my course. The curriculum is relevant, but that much great teaching involved because they by themself didn't know much. Semesters are pretty easy, without studying itself, you pass the subject, even if you can get an A+ grade if you are lucky. The pass percentage is 95%.
detailed_review.Other: Comparatively, I would say it is somewhat value for money for my batch, but now they have increased the price so much, so I would suggest others to take this college. It would be better if they also focused on the fun side. It's our only college life, but I didn't enjoy it that much in college, other than studying. It has an average crowd, I wold say there is not much of crowd, but it is not so empty either.

college_info.college_name: Saveetha Engineering College Course Admissions 2025: Selection, Eligibility, Fee,

faqs.question: What are the courses that Saveetha Engineering College offers?
faqs.answer: Saveetha Engineering College provides multiple programmes in the fields of Engineering, Technology, and Management. Students seeking to get into the college must ensure that they satisfy the admission criteria. The college offers BTech, B.E, MTech, MBA, and MS by Research (PhD) programmes. All courses except for PhD are offered in full-time. The doctoral programme can be pursued in full-time and part-time modes. Aspirants can visit the official website of the college to know more.

faqs.question: What is the admission process of Saveetha Engineering College, Chennai?
faqs.answer: The admission procedure for various courses is both merit and entrance-based. Aspirants need to register for the course on the university's official website and proceed with the admission process. The selection for BTech and BE courses is based on Class 12 score followed by TNEA Counselling. For PG courses, the college considers entrance exam scores. The college accepts GATE, MAT, CMAT, etc. for admission to specific courses. Candidates whose name appear in the merit list will be called for the counselling process. The final seat allotment is done either through TNEA Counselling or the Consortium of Self-Financing Professional, Arts and Science Colleges in Tamil Nadu for the respective courses.

faqs.question: Can I get direct admission to Saveetha Engineering College?
faqs.answer: Saveetha Engineering College does not offer any direct admissions. Students seeking to get into the courses offered at the college need to satisfy the admission criteria of the desired programme including participating in the counselling process for seat allotment. The college admits students based on valid score in either the college-level exams, such as Saveetha Engineering Aptitutde Test/ Saveetha Management Aptitude Reasoning Test (SEAT/ SMART). Or a valid score obtained in the accepted entrance test.

faqs.question: Does Saveetha Engineering College offer lateral entry to BTech course?
faqs.answer: Yes, Saveetha Engineering College offers lateral entry to all the available BTech specialisations. Candidates need to pass a Diploma examination to apply for lateral entry. Admission to BTech (LE) is via Single Window Counseling conducted by the DOTE through Tamilnadu Engineering Admissions (TNEA) or counselling conducted by the Consortium of Self Financing Professtional, Arts and Science Colleges in TN.

faqs.question: What is the eligibility criteria for BTech at Saveetha Engineering College?
faqs.answer: To get admission to BTech courses at Saveetha Engineering College, students must fulfill the eligibility and selection criteria. The institute is affiliated with Anna University and thus follows the norms set by the university. Any candidate who passed Class 12 with Physics, Chemistry and Mathematics with a minimum of 45% aggregate from a recognised board is eligible to apply for BTech courses.

faqs.question: How many students can do MBA at Saveetha Engineering College, Chennai?
faqs.answer: There are a total of 240 seats in MBA course of Saveetha Engineering College. SEC offers seats in MBA course based on a valid score in entrance exams such as MAT, TANCET, CAT, XAT or GMAT. Further, aspirants are allotted seats based on TNEA Counselling or a Consortium of Self-Financing Professional, Arts and Science Colleges.

faqs.question: What are the documents needed for Saveetha Engineering College?

faqs.question: Is there fee waiver at Saveetha Engineering College?

sections.heading: Introduction
text: Saveetha Engineering College has modern infrastructure with various facilities available for students, like hostels, dining halls, medical facilities, entertainment facilities, etc. The college has an e nergy-efficient campus with solar power installations, rainwater harvesting systems, and waste reduction initiatives for a green and eco-friendly campus. Saveetha Engineering college infrastructure has 3 ultra-modern auditoriums with good seating capacity.

sections.heading: Saveetha Engineering College Hostels
text: Saveetha Engineering College has a separate boys' and girls' hostels. The college hostel offers a comfortable, secure, and enriching living environment for students.
